Eye wo dometɔ ɖeka gblɔ bena: Ne edze ŋuwò la, ekema yi kpli mí. Eɖo ŋu bena: Mayi!
Tete wòyi kpli wo, eye wova Yordan nu hede asi atilalã me.
Esime wo dometɔ ɖeka le atia lãm la, fia la ge ɖe taa me. Tete wòdo ɣli gblɔ bena: Ao, nye aƒetɔ, ɖe meɣee!
Eye Mawu ƒe ame la gblɔ bena: Afika woge dze? Efia teƒe lae, eye wòlã ati tsɔ ƒu gbe ɖi, tete fía la ho ɖe dzi.
Eye wògblɔ be: Lée! Tete wòɖo asi ɖa lée.
Eye Aram-fia ho aʋa ɖe Israel ŋu, eye wòde adaŋu kple eƒe dɔlawo gblɔ bena: Afi kple afime maƒu nye asaɖa ɖo.
Ke Mawu ƒe ame la dɔ ame ɖo ɖe Israel-fia, ne woagblɔ nɛ bena: Kpɔ nyuie, ne màgato teƒe sia ŋu ayi o, elabena Aramtɔwo ƒu asaɖa anyi ɖe afima.
Eye Israel-fia ɖɔ ame ɖe teƒe, si Mawu ƒe ame la fiae hexlɔ̃ nui le eŋu la, eye wòkpɔ eɖokui dzi nyuie le afima ŋu; menye zi ɖeka o, eye menye zi eve o.
Tete Aram-fia ƒe dzi de asi dzodzo me nyanyanya le nya sia ŋuti, eye wòyɔ eƒe dɔlawo gblɔ na wo bena: Miate ŋu agblɔe nam mia dometɔ, si le Israel-fia la dzi dem oa?
Tete eƒe dɔlawo dometɔ ɖeka gblɔ bena: Kpao, nye aƒetɔ fia, ke boŋ nyagblɔɖila Elisa, si le Israel lae, nɔa wò nya, siwo nègblɔna le wò xogã me la, gblɔm na Israel-fia.
Egblɔ be: Miyi ɖakpɔ afisi wòle, ne mado ame dɔ, ne woalée vɛ. Eye wova gblɔ nɛ be: Kpɔ ɖa, ele Dotan.
Tete wòdo sɔwo kple tasiaɖamwo kple aʋakɔ gãa de ɖo ɖe afima, eye wova le zã me heɖe to ɖe dua.
Esi Mawu ƒe ame la ƒe dɔla fɔ ŋdi kanya, eye wòdo go la, kpɔ ɖa, aʋakɔa ɖe kple sɔwo kpakple tasiaɖamwo de to de dua. Eye eƒe ɖekakpui la gblɔ bena: Oo, nye aƒetɔ, nuka wo ge míala?
Edo ŋu bena: Megavɔ̃ o, elabena amesiwo le mía dzi la, sɔ gbɔ wu amesiwo le wo dzi.
Eye Elisa do gbe ɖa gblɔ bena: Yehowa, ʋu eƒe ŋkuwo, ne woakpe nu! Tete Yehowa ʋu ɖekakpui la ƒe ŋkuwo, eye wòkpɔ nu, eye kpɔ ɖa dzosɔwo kple dzotasiaɖamwo le to la ŋu kpaŋkpaŋ ƒo xlã Elisa.
Esi woɖi abu va egbɔ la, Elisa do gbe ɖa na Yehowa gblɔ bena: Na ameha sia ƒe ŋku nagbã! Eye wòna woƒe ŋkuwo gbã le Elisa ƒe nya la nu.
Eye Elisa gblɔ na wo bena: Menye mo lae nye esia o, eye menye du lae nye esia o; mikplɔm ɖo, ne makplɔ mi yi ŋutsu, si dim miele la gbɔe. Eye wòkplɔ woyi Samaria.
Esime wova Samaria la, Elisa gblɔ be: Yehowa, ʋu amesiawo ƒe ŋkuwo, ne woakpɔ nu! Tete Yehowa ʋu woƒe ŋkuwo, eye wokpɔ be, yewole Samaria titina.
Esi Israel-fia kpɔ wo la, egblɔ na Elisa bena: Fofonye, madza woa? Madza woa, fofonye?
Edo ŋu bena: Magadza wo o! Ɖe nèbe, yeadza amesiwo metsɔ wò yi kple wò dati de aboyoe o la? Tsɔ abolo kple tsi ɖo wo kɔ me, ne woaɖu nu ano nu, eye wòayi woƒe aƒetɔ gbɔ.
Tete wòwɔ amedzro gãa de na wo, woɖu nu no nu, eye wòdo mɔ wo woyi woƒe aƒetɔ gbɔ. Eye Aramtɔwo ƒe adzohawo megava Israel-nyigba dzi kpɔ o.
Esia megbe la Aram-fia Ben-Hadad ƒo eƒe aʋakɔ blibo la nu ƒu, eye woho va ɖe to ɖe Samaria.
Eye dɔ gãa ɖe to le Samaria; kpɔ da, wode to ɖee, vaseɖe esime tedzita ɖeka xɔ klosalo sekel blanyi, eye ahɔnemi kab eneliawo ɖeka xɔ klosalo sekel atɔ̃.
Esime Israel-fia le tsa ɖim le gli dzi la, nyɔnua ɖe do ɣli yɔe gblɔ bena: Nye aƒetɔ fia, xɔ nam!
Eɖo ŋu bena: Esi Yehowa mele xɔxɔm na wò o la, afika nyea mato axɔ na wò? Lugbɔƒe loo alo weinfiãƒea?
Fia la gagblɔ nɛ bena: Nya ka le asiwò? Eɖo ŋu bena: Nyɔnu sia gblɔ nam be: Tsɔ viwòŋutsu miaɖu egbea, eye miaɖu vinyeŋutsu etsɔ.
Eye míeɖa vinye heɖu. Ke esi ŋu ke, eye megblɔ ne be: tsɔ viwò míaɖu la, kpɔ ɖa, etsɔ via ɣla.
Esime fia la se nyɔnua ƒe nyawo la, edze eƒe awuwo hele tsa ɖim le glia dzi; eye dukɔ la kpɔe be, eta akpanya de eƒe awuwo te.
Eye wògblɔ bena: Mawu afiam agafiam ɖe dzi, ne Elisa, Safat vi ƒe ta aganɔ eŋu fi!

Esi Elisa bɔbɔ nɔ eƒe me, eye ame tsitsiwo bɔbɔ nɔ egbɔ la, fia la ɖɔ ame ɖo ɖe eŋgɔ. Ke hafi ɖɔla la nava egbɔ la, egblɔ na ame tsitsiawo bena: Miele ekpɔm be, hlɔ̃mevi sia ɖɔ ɖo ɖa, be woatso ta le nunyea? Miɖo ŋku anyi, ne dɔla la va la, ekema mitutui kple ʋɔtru, eye mido nɔa! Ɖe menye eƒe aƒetɔ ƒe afɔzi le eyome gbɔna oa?
Ke esi wogale nu ƒom kpli wo la, kpo ɖa, fia la do ɖe egbɔ gblɔ bena: Kpɔ ɖa, dzɔgbevɔ̃e sia tso Yehowa gbɔ, nukata maganɔ mɔ kpɔm na Yehowa?
Tete Elisa gblɔ bena: Se Yehowa ƒe gbe! Ale Yehowa gblɔ esi: Etsɔ wɔale siawo la wɔ memee dzidzenu ɖeka axɔ sekel ɖeka, eye lu dzidzenu eve axɔ sekel ɖeka le Samaria ƒe agbo nu.
Ke fia ŋu me, si ƒe alɔ ŋu fia la ziɔ ɖo la, ɖo ŋu na Mawu ƒe ame gblɔ bena: Kpɔ ɖa, ne Yehowa aɖe fesre ɖe dziƒo ŋu hã la, ɖe esia ava mea? Eɖo ŋu nɛ be: Kpɔ ɖa, akpɔe kple wò ŋkuwo, ke maɖu ɖeke o!
Eye anyidzela ene le agboa nu, amesiwo gblɔ na wo nɔewo bena: Nukaŋuti mianɔ afisia, vaseɖe esime míaku?

Ne miehe, miayi dua me la ekema miaku ɖe afima, elabena dɔwuame le dua me; eye ne míetsi afisia hã, kuku ge míala. Eyata mina miayi Aramtɔwo ƒe asaɖa me aɖabu aka na wo! Ne wona míetsi agbe la, ekema míetsi agbe; ne wowu mí la, ekema ɖe mieku.
Esi anyigba le tsyɔtsyɔm la, wodze mɔ, be yewoayi Aramtɔwo ƒe asaɖa me. Eye esi wova Aramtɔwo ƒe asaɖa ƒe mlɔenu la, kpɔ ɖa, amea ɖeke mele afima o.

Elabena Aƒetɔ la na Aram-aʋakɔ la se tasiaɖamwo kple sɔwo kpakple aʋakɔ gãa ɖe ŋkɔ; tete wogblɔ na wo nɔewo bena: Kpɔ ɖa, Israel-fia tsɔ aʋa Xiti-fiawo kple Egipte-fiawo ɖe mía ŋu, be woava dze mía dzi.
Tete wotso hesi, esime anyigba le tsyɔtsyɔm, eye wogblẽ woƒe asaɖa ɖi, abe alesi wòle ene; wogblẽ wo ƒe agbadɔwo, sɔwo kple tedziwo ɖi, eye wòsi heɖe woƒe agbe.
Esi anyidzelawo va asaɖa ƒe mlɔenu hege ɖe agbadɔa ɖe me la, woɖu nu no nu, eye wotsɔ klosalo kple sika kpakple awuwo le eme ɖade do. Emegbe wovi agbadɔ bubu me, eye wotsɔ nu le eme ɖade do.
Tete wogblɔ na wo nɔewo bena: Menye nu nyui enye esia wɔm miele o, elabena egbe enye du nyui xɔgbe. Ne míelala, vaseɖe ŋu ke la, ekema míaɖi fɔ; eyata mina míayi aɖagblɔe le fia fe me.

Eye woyi ɖayɔ dua ƒe agbonudzɔlawo gblɔ na wo bena: Miede Aramtɔwo ƒe asaɖa me, eye kpɔ ɖa, amea ɖeke meli o, eye amegbetɔ ƒe gbe meɖi o, ke boŋ wode ka sɔwo kple tedziwo ɖi, eye agbadɔwo li, abe alesi wole ene.
Woyɔ agbonudzɔlawo, eye woawo ɖagblɔe le fia ƒe me.

Tete fia la fɔ le zã gblɔ na eƒe dɔlawo bena: Magblɔe na mi, nusi Aramtɔwo be, yewoawɔ mí. Wonyae bena, dɔ le mia wum, eyata wodzo le asaɖa la me yi ɖaɣla ɖe gbe me gblɔ bena: Ne wodo tso dua me la, ekema míalé wo agbagbe, eye míage ɖe dua me.

Eye eƒe dɔlawo dometɔ ɖeka xɔ edzi gblɔ bena: Na woaɖe sɔ alɔ̃ tso sɔ, siwo kpɔtɔ ɖe dua me la me, ɖewohĩ ava me na wo abe Israel ƒe ameha blibo, si kpɔtɔ la ene, alo ava me na wo abe Israel ƒe ameha blibo, si ku la ene; eye na míadɔ ame woaɖakpɔe ɖa.
Tete woɖe tasiaɖam eve kple sɔwo, eye fia la dɔ wo ɖe Aramtɔwo ƒe asaɖa me gblɔ bena: Miyi ɖakpɔe ɖa!
Eye wodze wo yome vaseɖe kekeke Yordan nu, eye kpɔ ɖa, mɔ blibo la dziya fũ kple awuwo kple aʋawɔnuwo, siwo Aramtɔwo tsɔ ƒu gbe, esime wole sisim. Eye dɔlawo gbugbɔ va gblɔe na fia la.
Tete dukɔ la do go ɖaha Aramtɔwo ƒe asaɖa la, eye wɔ memee dzidzenu ɖeka xɔ sekel ɖeka ɖe Yehowa ƒe nya la nu.
Ke fia la ɖe fia ŋu me, si ƒe alɔ ŋu wòziɔna ɖo la, ɖo agbo la nu, eye dukɔ la fanyae ɖe agbo la nu woku, abe alesi Mawu ƒe ame la gblɔ, esime fia la va egbɔ ene!
Elabena esi Mawu ƒe ame la gblɔ na fia la bena, lu dzidzenu eve axɔ sekel ɖeka, eye wɔ memee dzidzenu ɖeka axɔ sekel ɖeka le Samaria ƒe agbo nu etsɔ wɔale siawo la,
fia ŋu me la ɖo ŋu na Mawu fe ame la gblɔ bena: Kpɔ ɖa, ne Yehowa ɖe fesre ɖe dziƒo ŋu hã la, ɖe nusia ava mea? Eye wògblɔ be: Kpɔ ɖa, àkpɔe kple wò ŋkuwo, gake màɖu ɖeke o.
Eva me nɛ nenema, eye dukɔ la fanyae ɖe agbo la nu woku.

Eye Elisa ƒo nu kple nyɔnu, si ƒe vi wògbɔ agbee la, gblɔ bena: Mia kple aƒewòmetɔwo mitso, ne miaɖanye amedzro le afisiafi, si ke miekpɔ; elabena Yehowa le dɔwuame he ge vɛ ƒe adre, eye ele anyigba dzi xoxo.
Tete nyɔnu la kple eƒemetɔwo dze mɔ, eye wòwɔ, abe alesi Mawu ƒe ame gblɔ ene, eye wòɖanye amedzro le Filistitɔwo ƒe anyigba dzi ƒe adre.
Esi ƒe adrea nu yi vɔ la, nyɔnua gbugbɔ tso Filistitɔwo ƒe anyigba dzi, eye wòyi, be yeaɖe kuku na fia la le eƒe aƒe kple eƒe agble ta.
Eye fia la le nu ƒom kple Mawu ƒe ame ƒe ɖekakpui Gexazi bena: Taflatse, gblɔ nu gã nu gã, siwo katã Elisa wɔ la nam.

Esi wògblɔ na fia la be, egbɔ agbe ame kuku la, kpɔ ɖa, nyɔnu, si ƒe vi wògbɔ agbee la, va ɖe kuku na fia la le eƒe aƒe kple eƒe agble ta. Tete Gexazi gblɔ bena: Nye aƒetɔ fia, nyɔnu la nye esia, eye esia nye via, si Elisa gbɔ agbee la.

Tete fia la bia nyɔnu la woxlẽe fiae. Eye fia la ɖe aƒemenuwo dzikpɔla ɖeka kpe ɖe eŋu gblɔ bena: Ɖo eƒe nuwo katã kple nuku, siwo wɔ le agblea me tso gbesigbe wòdzo le anyigba dzi vaseɖe fifi la teƒe nɛ.
Elisa va Damasko, esime Aram-fia Ben-Hadad le dɔ lém. Eye wova gblɔ nɛ be: Mawu ƒe ame va afisia!
Tete fia la gblɔna Xazael bena: Tsɔ nunana ɖe asi, nayi aɖakpe Mawu ƒe ame la, eye nabia gbe Yehowa le egbɔ be: Mahaya le dɔ sia mea?

Eye Xazael yi ɖakpee, eye wòtsɔ nunanawo kple Damasko ƒe nu veviwo ɖe asi; wole kposɔ blane ƒe agbatsɔtsɔ. Eye wòva egbɔ gblɔ bena: Viwò, Aram-fia Ben-Hadad dɔm ɖe gbɔwò gblɔ bena: Mahaya le dɔ sia mea?
Elisa ɖo ŋu bena: Yi ɖagblɔ ne bena: Àhaya! Gake Yehowa ɖee fiãm bena, ele kuku ge.
Eye wòlé ŋku ɖe edzi gã eteƒe didi, eye Mawu ƒe ame la de asi avifafa me.

Tete Xazael gblɔ bena: Nukaŋuti nye aƒetɔ le avi fam? Eɖo ŋu bena: Menya nu vɔ̃ɖi, si wɔ ge nala ɖe Israel-viwo ŋu; àtɔ dzo woƒe du sesẽwo, eye atsɔ yi awu woƒe ɖekakpuiwo, àxlã woƒe vidzĩewo ɖe nu, eye adze ƒo le woƒe funɔwo nu.
Xazael gblɔ be: Nuka wò dɔla, avũ, nye be, wòawɔ nu gã sia? Elisa gblɔ bena: Yehowa ɖee fiãm be, wòe le fia ɖu ge ɖe Aram dzi.
Tete wodzo le Elisa gbɔ heyi eƒe aƒetɔ gbɔ, eye wòbiae bena: Nya ka Elisa gblɔ na wò? Eɖo ŋu bena: Egblɔ nam bena, èle hayahaya ge.
Ke esi ŋu ke la, etsɔ avɔ de tsi me hetsyɔ mo nɛ, tete woku. Eye Xazael zu fia ɖe eteƒe.
Eye Yoram, Yuda-fia Yosafat ƒe vi, zu fia le Israel-fia Axab ƒe vi Yoram ƒe ƒe atɔ̃lia me, le Yuda-fia Yosafat ŋɔli.
Exɔ ƒe blaetɔ̃ vo eve, esime wòzu fia, eye woɖu fia le Yerusalem ƒe enyi.
Eye wòto Israel-fia wo ƒe ʋe me, abe alesi Axab ƒe aƒe la wo ene, elabena eɖe Axab ƒe vinyɔnu, eye wòwɔ nusi enye vɔ̃ le Yehowa ŋku me.
Ke Yehowa mebe, yeagblẽ Yuda o, le eƒe dɔla Dawid ta, abe alesi wògblɔ nɛ be, yeana akaɖia ɖe eya kple viawo ɖaa ene.
Le eŋɔli Edom dze aglã ɖe Yuda ƒe dziɖuɖu ŋu, eye woɖo fia ɖe wo ɖokui nu.
Tete Yoram ho yi Zair, eye tasiaɖamwo katã kpe ɖe eŋu. Esi wòfa le zã me la, edze Edomtɔ, siwo ɖe to ɖe eya kple tasiaɖam-amegãwo la, eye dukɔ la si yi eƒe agbadɔ me.
Ale Edom dze aglã ɖe Yuda ƒe dziɖuɖu ŋu vaseɖe egbe; eye Libna hã dze aglã le ɣemaɣi.
Yoram ŋutinya susɔea kple nusiwo katã wòwɔ la, woŋlɔ wo ɖe Yuda-fiawo ƒe ŋutinyagbalẽ me.
Eye Yoram mlɔ fofoawo gbɔ, eye woɖii ɖe fofoawo gbɔ le Dawid ƒe du la me, eye via Axazya zu fia ɖe eteƒe.
Axazya, Yuda-fia, Yoram ƒe vi, zu fia le Israel-fia Axab ƒe vi Yoram ƒe ƒe wuievelia me.
Axazya xɔ ƒe blave vɔ eve, esime wòzu fia, eye woɖu fia le Yerusalem ƒe ɖeka. Dadaa ŋkɔ nye Atalya, Israel-fia Omri fe vinyɔnu.
Eto Axab ƒe aƒe la ʋe me, eye wòwɔ nusi nye vɔ̃ le Yehowa ŋku me, abe Axab fe aƒe la ene; elabena to wònye na Axab ƒe aƒe la.
Eye Axab vi Yoram ho aʋa yi Ramot-Gilead ɖe Aram-fia Xazael ŋu; ke Aramtɔwo si Yoram.

Tete fia la gbɔ va aƒe, be wòana woada gbe le abi, siwo Aramtɔwo de enu le Rama, esime wòwɔ aʋa kple Aram-fia Xazael la ŋu. Eye Yuda-fia, Yoram ƒe vi Axazya yi, be yeakpɔ Axab vi Yoram ɖa le Yezreel, elabena ele dɔ lém.
Eye nyagblɔɖila Elisa yɔ nyagblɔɖilawo ƒe nusrɔ̃viwo dometɔ ɖeka gblɔ nɛ bena: Bla wò ali dzi, eye natsɔ amigoe sia ɖe asi ayi Ramot-Gilead.
Ne eɖo afima la akpɔ Yehu, Nimsi vi Yosafat ƒe vi, ge ɖe eme, eye nana wòatsi tre tso nɔviawo dome, eye kplɔe yi xogã me.
Eye natsɔ amigoe la akɔ ɖe ta me nɛ agblɔ bena: Ale Yehowa gblɔ esi: Mesi ami na wò heɖo fia ɖe Israel dzi. Emegbe naʋu ʋɔa, eye nasi, megalala o.
Tete nyagblɔɖilawo ƒe nusrɔ̃vi la yi Ramot-Gilead.
Esi woge ɖe eme la, kpɔ ɖa, aʋakɔ la ƒe amegãwo ɖi anyi. Eye wògblɔ bena: Amegã, mehe gbea ɖe vɛ na wò! Yehu ɖo ŋu bena: Mí katã dometɔ kae? Eɖo ŋu bena: Amegã wòe!
Tete wòtsi tre heyi xɔa me, eye wòka ami la ɖe eƒe ta me gblɔ nɛ bena: Ale Yehowa, Israel ƒe Mawu la, gblɔ esi: Mesi ami na wò heɖo fia wò ɖe Yehowa ƒe aƒe Israel dzi.
Eye tsrɔ̃ wò aƒetɔ Axab ƒe aƒe la, ne mabia hlɔ̃ Izebel ɖe nye dɔla nyagblɔɖilawo ƒe ʋu kple Yehowa ƒe dɔlawo katã ƒe ʋu nu.
Axab ƒe aƒe blibo la atsrɔ̃ gbidigbidi, eye matsrɔ̃ Axab ƒe ŋutsuwo, ɖeviwo kple ame tsitsiwo siaa.
Mawo Axab ƒe aƒe la abe Yerobeam. Nebat vi ƒe aƒe kple Baesa, Axiya vi ƒe aƒe ene.
Eye avũwo aɖu Izebel le Yezreel-gble me, eye amea ɖeke maɖii o. Tete woʋu ʋɔa hesi.
Eye esi Yehu do va eƒe aƒetɔ ƒe dɔlawo gbɔ la, wobiae bena: Eme nyoa? Nya ka ta aɖaʋatɔ sia va gbɔwò ɖo? Eɖo ŋu na wo bena: Mienya ŋutsu la kple eƒe nuwɔwɔ tso!
Ke wogblɔ bena: Aʋa tsoe, gblɔe na mí dzro! Tete wògblɔ bena: Ale kple ale wògblɔ nam enye si be: Ale Yehowa gblɔ esi: Mesi ami na wò heɖo fia wò ɖe Israel dzi.
Tete wowɔ kaba, eye wo dome amesiame tsɔ eƒe avɔ ɖo ete le atrakpuifɔflɔ la dzi, eye woku kpẽ gblɔ bena: Yehu zu ha!
Ale Yehu, Nimsi vi Yosafat ƒe vi, bia nu ɖe Yoram ŋu. Ke Yoram kple Israel blibo la wonɔ ŋudzɔ na Aram-fia Xazael le Ramot-Gilead.

Emegbe fia Yoram gbugbɔ yi aƒe, be woada gbe le abi, siwo Aramtɔwo de eŋu, esime wòwɔ aʋa kple Aram-fia Xazael la ŋu ne. Eye Yehu gblɔ bena: Ne edze mia ŋu la, ekema amea ɖeke megasi tso dua me ayi aɖagblɔe le Yezreel o.
Tete Yehu ɖo tasiaɖam heyi Yezreel, elabena Yoram le aba dzi le afima, eye Yuda-fia Axazya yi, be yeakpɔ Yoram ɖa.
Eye esi dzɔla le mɔ̃ ta me le Yezreel kpɔ Yehu ƒe amehawo gbɔna la, egblɔ be: Mekpɔ amehaa ɖe! Tete Yoram gblɔ bena: Ɖe sɔdola ɖeka ɖo ɖa, ne wòaɖakpe wo abia bena: Ŋutifafaea?

Eye sɔdola la do sɔ yi ɖakpee gblɔ bena: Ale fía la gblɔ esi: Ŋutifafaea? Yehu gblɔ bena: Ŋutifafanya kae tsɔ gbɔwò? Trɔ va yi megbenye! Eye dzɔla la yi ɖagblɔ bena: Dɔla la yi ɖaɖo wo gbɔ, ke megatrɔ gbɔ o.
Eye wòdɔ sɔdola evelia wòdo sɔ yi wo gbɔ gblɔ bena: Ale fia la gblɔ esi: Ŋutifafaea? Yehu gblɔ be: Ŋutifafanya kae tsɔ gbɔwò? Trɔ va yi megbenye!
Eye dzɔla la yi ɖagblɔ bena: Eyi ɖaɖo wo gbɔ, gake megatrɔ gbɔ o. Nuwɔwɔ la le abe Yehu, Nimsi vi ƒe nuwɔwɔ ene, elabena ele nu wɔm abe aɖaʋatɔ ene.

Tete Yoram gblɔ bena: Tsi sɔ ɖe tasiaɖam ŋu! Eye wotsii ɖe tasiaɖam ŋu, eye Israel-fia Yoram kple Yuda-fia Axazya dome amesiame ɖe eƒe tasiaɖam me, eye woyi Yehu kpe ge: eve wokpɔe Yezreeltɔ Nabot ƒe agble me.
Esi Yoram kpɔ Yehu la, egblɔ bena: Yehu, ŋutifafaea? Eɖo ŋu bena: Ŋutifafa ka? Esi dawo Izebel ƒe ahasiwɔwɔ kple dzosasa ta le agbɔ sɔm ɖaa ko laa?
Tete Yoram trɔ hesi, eye wogblɔ na Axazya bena: Axazya, nugbeɖoɖoe!
Ke Yehu vu ete da me, eye wote megbe na Yoram, eye aŋutrɔ la ŋɔ eƒe dzi ɖi go, eye wòmũ dze eƒe tasiaɖam me.
Eye wògblɔ na fia ŋu me Bidekar bena: Kɔe ƒu gbe ɖe Yezreeltɔ Nabot ƒe agble me, elabena esi mía kple eve mieɖo sɔ nɔ fofoa Axab yome la, eya Yehowa gblɔ nya sia ɖe eŋu
Ale Yehowa gblɔ esi Mekpɔ Nabot kple viawo ƒe ʋu etso tso! Yehowa ƒe gbe enye si; Maɖo eteƒe na wò le agble sia me. Eyata kɔe ƒu gbe ɖe agble la me le Yehowa ƒe nya la nu!
Ke esi Yuda-fia Axazya kpɔe la, esi to abɔ me xɔ ƒe mɔ, eye Yehu ti eyome gblɔ bena: Mité eya hã! Eye wotée ɖe tasiaɖam la me le Gur-togbɛ, si le Yibleam gbɔ la dzi, eye wòsi yi Megido heku ɖe afima.
Eye eƒe dɔlawo kɔe yi Yerusalem, eye woɖii ɖe eƒe yɔdo me ɖe fofoawo gbɔ le Dawid ƒe du la me.
Axazya zu fia ɖe Yuda dzi le Axab vi Yoram ƒe ƒe wuiɖekɛlia me.
Emegbe Yehu va Yezreel. Esi Izebel see la, eɖo tu ɖe ŋku, eye wòwɔ leke na eƒe ta, eye wòdo mo ɖe fesre nu.
Eye esi Yehu va agboa me la, tete wògblɔ be: Zimri, eƒe aƒetɔ wula doa?
Wòfɔ ka dzi kpo fesre nu gblɔ bena: Ameka le dzinye, amekae? Tete aƒemenuwo dzikpɔla eve alo etɔ̃ do mo ɖe fesre nu.
Eye wògblɔ bena: Mitu asii ƒu anyi! Tete wotu asii ƒu anyi, eye eƒe ʋu hlẽ ɖe gli kple sɔwo ŋu, eye wofanyae.
Eye esi woge ɖe eme ɖu nu no nu la, egblɔ bena: Miyi ɖakpɔ fiƒodeme sia ɖa, ne miaɖii, elabena fia vinyɔnue.
Ke esi woyi, be yewoaɖii la, womekpɔ eƒe afia ɖeke o, negbe eƒe takoli, afɔbaya kple asibayawo ko.
Eye wogbugbɔ va gblɔ̃e nɛ; tete wògblɔ be: Esia nye nya, si Yehowa gblɔ to eƒe dɔla Eliya, Tisbitɔ la dzi bena: Avũwo aɖu Izebel ƒe lã le Yezreel-gble me.
Eye Izebel ƒe kukua ano abe mi ene anɔ gbe me le Yezreel-gble me, ale be amea ɖeke mate ŋu agble be: Izebel enye si o.
Ŋutsuvi blaadre le Axab si le Samaria. Eye Yehu ŋlɔ agbalẽ ɖo ɖe Israel-amegãwo, ame tsitsiwo kple Axab viwo dzikpɔlawo le Samaria bena:
Azɔ, ne agbalẽ sia ɖo mia gbɔ̃ la, — miaƒe aƒetɔ ƒe viŋutsuwo, tasiaɖamwo kple sɔwo, du sesẽwo kple aʋawɔnuwo le mia gbɔ tso —
ekema mitia miaƒe aƒetɔ ƒe viŋutsuwo dome nyuitɔ kple zãzɛtɔ ɖo fofoa ƒe fiazikpui dzi, eye miwo aʋa ɖe miaƒe aƒetɔ ƒe aƒe la nu.
Tete vɔvɔ̃ ɖo wo vevie ŋutɔ wogblɔ bena: Kpɔ ɖa, fia eve mete ŋu na te ɖe enu o, aleke miawo míate ŋu ana te?

Tete amesi le aƒea nu kple amesi le dua nu kple ame tsitsiwo kpakple ɖeviawo dzikpɔlawo ɖo ame ɖo ɖe Yehu, ne woagblɔ nɛ bena: Wò dolawo míenye, eye nusianu, si nagblɔ na mi la, míawɔe; miele amea ɖeke tso ge aɖo fiae o; wo nusianu, si dze ŋuwò!

Eye wòŋlɔ agbalẽ ɖo ɖe wo zi evelia bena: Ne míenye tanye, eye miebe, yewoaɖo to nye gbe la, ekema mitsɔ miaƒe aƒetɔ ƒe viŋutsuwo ƒe tawo va gbɔnye le Yezreel etsɔ wòalé siawo! Fia viŋutsuawo le ame blaadre, eye wonyi wo le dua me bubumewo gbɔ.
Esime agbalẽ la ɖo wo gbɔ la, wolé fiavi blaadreawo wu, eye wotsɔ woƒe tawo de kusiwo me ɖo ɖee le Yezreel.
Eye dɔlaa ɖe va toe nɛ gblɔ bena: Wotsɔ fiaviawo ƒe tawo vɛ. Egblɔ bena: Mitsɔ wo li kɔ eve ɖe agboa nu, vaseɖe ŋu nake!
Esi ŋu ke la, edo yi ɖatsi tre hegblɔ na dukɔ blibo la bena: Míenye ame dzɔdzɔewo! Kpɔ ɖa, mebia nu ɖe nye aƒetɔ ŋu, eye mewui; ke ameka wu amesiawo katã?
Midze sii bena, nyaa ɖeke meto le Yehowa ƒe nya, si wògblɔ ɖe Axab ƒe aƒe ŋu la me o, eye Yehowa wɔ nusi wògblɔ to eƒe dɔla Eliya dzi ta.
Eye Yehu wu amesiwo katã kpɔtɔ ɖe Axab ƒe me le Yezreel, eƒe amegãwo katã, xɔlɔ̃awo kple eƒe nunɔlawo, vaseɖe esime amea ɖeke mekpɔtɔ si o.
Emegbe wodzo yina Samaria. Esi Yehu va ɖo alẽkplɔviwo ƒe takpexɔ gbɔ le mɔ to la,
eɖo go Yuda-fia Axazya nɔviŋutsuwo, eye wòbia bena: Amehawo míenye? Woɖo ŋu bena: Axazya nɔviŋutsuwo mienye, eye mieyina, be míado gbe na fia viŋutsuwo kple fiasrɔ̃ ƒe viŋutsuwo.
Tete wògblɔ be: Milé wo agbagbe! Eye wòlé wo agbagbe hewu wo ɖe takpexɔ la ƒe do me; wole ŋutsu blane vɔ eve, eye mena wo dometɔa ɖeke si o.

Eye wodzo tso afima heva ɖo go Rexab vi Yonadab, amesi va ekpe ge. Tete wòdo gbe nɛ biae bena: Wò dzi me kɔ, abe alesi nye dzi le ɖe wo dzi ŋu enea? Yonadab ɖo ŋu bena: Ele nenema! Yehu be: Ne ele nenema la, ekema na asim kpɔ! Eye wòna asii. Tete wòna wòɖo egbɔ le tasiaɖam la me,
eye wogblɔ bena: Va miyi, ne nakpɔ, alesi mele ŋu nam ɖe Yehowa nui eye wòna woɖo eƒe tasiaɖam la.
Eye wòyi Samaria ɖawu Axab ƒe amesiwo katã kpɔtɔ ɖe Samaria la, vaseɖe esime wotsrɔ̃ wo vɔ, le Yehowa ƒe nya, si wògblɔ na Eliya la nu.
Tete Yehu ƒo dukɔ blibo la nu ƒu gblɔ na wo bena. Axab mesubɔ Baal wòde edeƒe o, Yehu asubɔe ɖe edzi awu.

Eyata miyɔ Baal fe nyagblɔɖilawo katã kple esubɔlawo katã kpakple eƒe nunɔlawo katã ɖem, amea ɖeke megatsi anyi o, elabena mele vɔsaŋkeke gãa ɖe ɖu ge na Baal. Amesi ke tsi anyi la, maganɔ agbe o! Ke ŋɔdzomenue Yehu wɔ, be woatsrɔ̃ Baal-subɔlawo.
Eye Yehu gblɔ bena: Miwo ŋkekenyuie ƒe takpekpe la kokoe na Baal! Tete woɖe gbe ƒã.
Eye Yehu dɔ ame ɖo ɖe Israel blibo la, eye Baal-subɔlawo katã wova, amea ɖeke metsi anyi si meva o; woyi ɖe Baal ƒe xɔ la me, eye Baal ƒe xɔ la yɔ tratratra tso go ɖeka me vaseɖe go keme me.
Eye wògblɔ na awudzikpɔla bena: Ɖe awuwo do goe na Baal-subɔlawo katã! Tete woɖe awuawo do goe na wo.

Azɔ Yehu kple Yonadab, Rexab vi, wova Baal ƒe xɔ la mɔ, eye wògblɔ na Baal-subɔlawo bena: Midzro eme, ne míakpɔ be. Yehowa ƒe subɔlawo dometɔa ɖeke maganɔ mia dome afisia o, negbe Baal-subɔlawo ɖeɖeko.
Ke esi wova akpedavɔ kple numevɔ sa ge la, Yehu ɖe ame blanyi ɖo xexe gblɔ bena: Ne amesiwo mede asi na mi la, dometɔa ɖe si la, ekema agbe anɔ agbe teƒe.

Esime wowu numevɔsa nu la, Yehu gblɔ na fia ŋu asrafowo kple fia ŋu amewo bena: Mige ɖe me, ne miawu wo, eye amea ɖeke megasi o! Tete wowu wo kple yi. Ke esi fia ŋu asrafowo kple fia ŋuti amewo tsɔ woƒe kukuawo ƒu gbe la, woge ɖe Baal ƒe xɔ kɔkɔetɔ me,
eye woɖe legbawo tso Baal ƒe xɔa me heta dzo wo.
Wogbã Baal ƒe legba la, eye wogbã Baal ƒe xɔ la hetsɔe ɖo kpɔxadeƒee vaseɖe egbe.
Ale Yehu tsrɔ̃ Baal ɖa le Israel enye si.
Negbe Yerobeam, Nebat vi ƒe nuvɔ̃, siwo nye sikanyivi le Betel kple Dan, siwo wòtsɔ ble Israel de nuvɔ̃ me la, ŋu ko Yehu meɖe asi le o.
Eye Yehowa gblɔ na Yehu bena: Esi nèwɔ nusi dze ŋunye pɛpɛpɛ, eye nèwɔ Axab ƒe aƒe la, abe alesi le nye dzi me tututu ene la, eyata viwòwo anɔ Israel-fiazikpui la dzi vaseɖe dzidzime enelia dzi.
Ke Yehu melé ŋku ɖe Yehowa ƒe seawo ŋu, ne woazɔ ɖe wo nu kple eƒe dzi blibo o; eye meɖe, asi le Yerobeam ƒe nuvɔ̃, siwo wotsɔ ble Israel de nuvɔ̃ me la nu o.
Ɣemaɣi Yehowa de asi Israel nu tsitsi me, eye Xazael si wo le Israel ƒe liƒowo katã dzi,
tso Yordan nu ɖota ɣedzeƒe. Gilead-nyigba blibo la, si nye Gad, Ruben kple Manase tɔ, tso Aroer, si le Arnon-tɔʋu la nu vaseɖe Gilead kple Basan.
Yehu ŋutinya susɔeawo, nusiwo katã wòwɔ kple eƒe kalẽwɔwɔwo katã da, woŋlɔ wo ɖe Israel-fiawo ƒe ŋutinyagbalẽ me.
Eye Yehu mlɔ fofoawo gbɔ, eye woɖii ɖe Samaria, eye via Yoaxaz zu fia ɖe eteƒe.
Ɣeyiɣi, siwo Yehu ɖu fia ɖe Israel dzi le Samaria la, le ƒe blave vɔ enyi.
Esi Atalya. Axazya dada, kpɔ be, via ku la, etso, eye wowu fia ƒome blibo la.
Tete fia Yoram nɔvinyɔnu Yoseba, amesi nye Axazya nɔvinyɔnu, fi Axazya ƒe viŋutsu Yoas le fiavi, siwo wu ge wòala la dome, eye wotsɔ eya kple eƒe nonala yi ɖaɣla ɖe Atalya ɖe abaxɔ me, eye womaɖui o.
Eɣla ɖe egbɔ le Yehowa ƒe me ƒe ade. Eye Atalya ɖu anyigba la dzi.

Ke le ƒe adrelia me la Yehoyada do woɖayɔ bia towo kple fia ŋu asrafowo ƒe ame alafawo ƒe amegãwo vɛ, eye wòkplɔ wo yi Yehowa ƒe me hebla nu kpli wo, eye wòna woka atam nɛ le Yehowa ƒe me, eye wòfiã fiavi la wo.
Eye wòde se na wo gblɔ bena: Nusi miawɔ enye si: Mi amesiwo le dɔ me do ge le dzudzɔgbe dzi la ƒe akpa etɔ̃liawo ɖeka nadzɔ fia ƒe aƒe la ŋu;
akpa etɔ̃liawo ɖeka nanɔ agbo Sur me, eye akpa etɔ̃liawo ɖeka nanɔ fia ŋu asrafowo yome le agbo la me, eye midzɔ aƒe la ŋu le ɖoɖo me.
Eye mia dometɔ, siwo katã do le dɔ me le dzudzɔgbe dzi la, ƒe akpa eve nadzɔ Yehowa ƒe aƒe la ŋu le fia la ta.
Miƒo xlã fia la godoo va kpe, eye amesiame nalé aʋawɔnu ɖe asi; amesi be, yeadze mi la, naku; eye minɔ fia la gbɔ, ne eɖo, alo wògbɔ.

Tete ame alafawo ƒe amegãwo wɔ pɛpɛpɛ, abe alesi nunɔla Yehoyada de se ene, eye wo dome amesiame ɖe eƒe amewo, amesiwo ɖo dɔ me le dzudzɔgbe dzi kple amesiwo do le dɔ me le dzudzɔgbe dzi siaa, eye wova nunɔla Yehoyada gbɔ.
Eye nunɔla la tsɔ fia Dawid ƒe akplɔ kple akpoxɔnu, siwo le Yehowa ƒe me la, na ame alafa ƒe amegãwo.
Eye fia ŋu asrafowo dome amesiame lé eƒe aʋawɔnu ɖe asi tso xɔ la ƒe ɖusi me gome vaseɖe xɔ la ƒe mia me gome kpakple vɔsamlekpui kple xɔ la ŋgɔ.
Tete wòkplɔ fiavi la do goe hetsɔ fiakuku la ɖɔ ne, eye wotsɔ se la de asi nɛ, eye wòɖoe fia hesi ami nɛ; tete woƒu akpe hedo ɣli bena: Fia nenɔ agbe!
Ke esi Atalya se fia ŋu asrafowo kple dukɔ la ƒe ɣli la, eyi ɖe dukɔ la gbɔ le Yehowa ƒe me.

Esi wòkpɔ bena, fia la tsi tre ɖe kɔkɔƒe, abe alesi wònye kɔnu ene, amegãwo kple kpẽkulawo ƒo xlã fia la, esi dukɔ hahoo la le dzidzɔ kpɔm hele kpẽ kum la, Atalya dze eƒe awuwo gblɔ bena: Nugbeɖoɖoe! Nugbeɖoɖoe!

Tete nunɔla Yehoyada de se na ame alafawo ƒe amegãwo, siwo nye aʋakɔ la ƒe kplɔlawo gblɔ na wo bena: Mikplɔe to amea wo dome, eye ne amea ɖe dze eyome la, mi wui kple yi! Elabena nunɔla la gblɔ be, womawui ɖe Yehowa ƒe aƒe la me o.
Esi wolée, eye wova ɖo afisi sɔwo tona yia fia ƒe me la, wowui ɖe afima.
Eye Yehoyada ɖo nubabla Yehowa, fia la kple dukɔ la kpakple fia la kple dukɔ la dome, be woanye Yehowa ƒe dukɔ.
Tete dukɔ hahoo la katã ge ɖe Baal ƒe me, womũ eƒe vɔsamlekpuiwo, eye wogbã eƒe legbawo gudugudu, eye wowu Baal ƒe nunɔla Matan ɖe vɔsamlekpuiawo ŋgɔ. Eye nunɔla la ɖe dzɔlawo ɖo Yehowa ƒe aƒea ŋu.

Eye wòɖe ame alafawo ƒe amegãwo, blafowo kple fia ŋu asrafowo kpakple dukɔ hahoo la katã, eye wokplɔ fia la tso Yehowa ƒe me heto fia ŋu asrafowo ƒe agbonumɔ yi ɖe fia ƒe me, eye wòbɔbɔ nɔ fiawo ƒe fiazikpui la dzi.
Dukɔ hahoo la katã kpɔ dzidzɔ, eye du la me fa. Ke woatsɔ yi wu Atalya ɖe fia ƒe aƒe me.
Yoas xɔ ƒe adre, esime wòzu fia.
Le Yehu ƒe ƒe adrelia me Yoas zu fia, eye woɖu fia le Yerusalem ƒe blane. Dadaa ŋkɔ nye Zibya tso Beer-Seba.
Eye Yoas wɔ nusi nyo le Yehowa ŋku me le eƒe agbe me ŋkekewo katã me, elabena nunɔla Yehoyada fia nui.
Negbe nuxeƒewo ko womeɖe ɖa o, eye dukɔ la gasa vɔ hedo dzudzɔ le nuxeƒewo.

Eye Yoas gblɔ na nunɔlawo bena: Klosalo, siwo katã ŋu wokɔ, eye wotsɔ va Yehowa ƒe mee, amesiwo wotia xlẽ ƒe klosalowo, amesiwo wodo asi na ƒe klosalowo kple klosalo, siwo katã amea ɖe na le eɖokui si hetsɔ va Yehowa ƒe mee la,
nunɔlawo naxɔe, amesiame naxɔe le ehavi si, ne woatsɔe aɖɔ xɔ la ƒe gbagbãƒewo ɖo afisiafi, si wonyã kpɔ wògbã ko.
Ke le fia Yoas ƒe ƒe blave vɔ etɔ̃lia me la nunɔlawo mekpɔ ɖɔ xɔ la ƒe gbagbãƒewo ɖo haɖe o.
Tete fia Yoas yɔ nunɔla Yehoyada kple nunɔla bubuwo gblɔ na wo bena: Nukaŋuti mieɖo xɔ la ƒe gbagbãƒewo ɖo oa? Azɔ migaxɔ gãa ɖeke le mia haviwo si o, ke boŋ mitsɔe ɖɔ xɔ la ƒe gbagbãƒewo ɖo.
Eye nunɔlawo lɔ̃ edzi be, yewomegale ga xa ge le dukɔ la si o, eye yewomaɖɔ xɔ la ƒe gbagbãƒewo hã ɖo o.

Tete nunɔla Yehoyada tsɔ aɖakaa ɖe, eye wòŋɔ do ɖe nutuvia ŋu, eye wòtsɔe ɖe vɔsamlekpui la xa le ɖusi me gome. Ne amea ɖe va Yehowa ƒe me la, ekema nunɔla, siwo le kpumu dzɔm la, tsɔ ga, siwo katã wotsɔ va Yehowa ƒe mee la, kɔna ɖe eme.
Ne wokpɔ be, ga, si le aɖaka la me, sɔ gbɔ la, ekema fia la ƒe agbalẽŋlɔla kple nunɔlagã vana, eye woblaa ga, si le Yehowa ƒe me la, hexlẽna.
Emegbe wotsɔ ga, si woxlẽ la, na Yehowa ƒe aƒe la ƒe dɔ nunɔlawo, eye wotsɔe na atikpalawo kple xɔtulawo, amesiwo le dɔ wɔm le Yehowa ƒe aƒe la nu
kple gliɖolawo kple kpefulawo, eye wotsɔe ƒle atiwo kple kpewo, ne woatsɔ aɖɔ Yehowa ƒe aƒe la ƒe gbagbãƒewo ɖo, kple nusiwo katã wohiã le xɔ la ɖɔɖɔɖo me.
Ke wometsɔ ga, si wotsɔ va Yehowa ƒe mee la, wɔ klosalogbawo, hɛwo, ʋutrewo kple kpẽwo, sikanuwo kple klosalonuwo dometɔa ɖeke hena Yehowa ƒe aƒe la o;
ke boŋ wotsɔ wo na dɔnunɔlawo be woatsɔ aɖɔ Yehowa ƒe aƒe la ɖoe.
Eye womebu akɔnta kple amesiwo si wode ga lae, be woatsɔ na dɔnunɔlawo o, elabena wo wɔe le anukware me.
Ke wometsɔ ga, si woxe ɖe dzidada kple nuvɔ̃wo ta la, va Yehowa ƒe me o; nunɔla wo tɔ wònye.
Ɣemaɣi Aram-fia Xazael ho va wɔ aʋa kple Gat, eye wòxɔe, eye Xazael ɖo be, yeaho ɖe Yerusalem ŋuti.

Tete Yuda-fia Yoas tsɔ nusiwo katã ŋu fofoa, Yuda-fiawo: Yosafat, Yoram kple Axazya kɔ, kple nusiwo ŋu eya ŋutɔ kɔ kpakple sika, siwo katã le Yehowa ƒe aƒe ƒe nudzraɖoƒe la, ɖo ɖe Aram-fia Xazael, eye wòdzo le Yerusalem ŋu.
Yoas ŋutinya susɔeawo, kple nusiwo katã wòwɔ la, woŋlɔ wo ɖe Yuda-fiawo ƒe ŋutinyagbalẽ me.
Eye eƒe dɔlawo tso ɖo nugbe ɖe eŋu, eye wowu Yoas le Milo ƒe aƒe, si le Silo gome la me.
Eƒe dɔlawo Yozaxar, Simeat vi, kple Yozabad, Somer vi, wonye amesiwo wui, eye woɖii ɖe fofoawo gbɔ le Dawid ƒe du la me; eye via Amazya zu fia ɖe eteƒe.
Le Yuda-fia Axazya ƒe vi Yoas ƒe ƒe blave vɔ etɔ̃lia me la Yehu ƒe vi Yoaxaz zu fia de Israel dzi le Samaria ƒe wuiadre.
Ewɔ nusi nye vɔ le Yehowa ŋku me, eye wòwɔ Yerobeam, Nebat vi ƒe nuvɔ̃, siwo wòtsɔ ble Israel de nuvɔ̃ me, eye meɖe asi le eŋu o.
Tete Yehowa do dɔmedzoe ɖe Israel ŋu, eye wotsɔ wo de asi na Aram-fia Xazael kple Xazael vi Ben-Hadad ŋkekeawo katã.
Eye Yoaxaz ƒo koko na Yehowa, eye Yehowa ɖo toe, elabena ekpɔ alesi Aram-fia te Israel ɖe anyii.
Tete Yehowa ɖo xɔnametɔa ɖe na Israel, eye woge le Aramtɔwo si me, eye Israel-viwo nɔ woƒe agbadɔwo me abe tsã ene.
Ɖeko womeɖe asi le Yerobeam ƒe aƒe la ƒe nuvɔ̃, siwo wòtsɔ ble Israel de nuvɔ̃ me la ŋu o; ke boŋ wowɔ wo, eye Aserawo hã tsi Samaria.
Elabena Yoaxaz ƒe aʋakɔ, si ko kpɔtɔ di nɛ la, le sɔdola blaatɔ̃, tasiaɖam ewo kple afɔzɔla akpe ewo; elabena Aram-fia tsrɔ̃ wo, eye wòwɔ wo abe ke, si wofanya kple afɔ ene.
Yoaxaz ŋutinya susɔeawo, nusiwo katã wòwɔ kple eƒe kalẽwɔwɔwo la, woŋlɔ wo de Israel-fiawo ƒe ŋutinyagbalẽ me.
Eye Yoaxaz mlɔ fofoawo gbɔ, eye wodi ɖe Samaria, eye via Yoas zu fia de eteƒe.
Le Yuda-fia Yoas ƒe ƒe blaetɔ̃ vɔ adrelia me la Yoaxaz ƒe vi Yoas zu fia ɖe Israel dzi le Samaria ƒe wuiade.
Ewo nusi nye vɔ le Yehowa ŋku me, eye meɖe asi le Yerobeam. Nebat vi ƒe nuvɔ̃, siwo katã wòtsɔ ble Israel de nuvɔ̃ me la ŋu o, ke boŋ ewɔ wo.
Yoas ŋutinya susɔeawo, nusiwo katã wòwɔ kple eƒe kalẽwɔwɔwo kpakple aʋa, si wòwɔ kple Yuda-fia Amazya la, woŋlɔ wo de Israel-fiawo ƒe ŋutinyagbalẽ me.
Eye Yoas mlɔ fofoawo gbɔ, eye Yerobeam bɔbɔ nɔ eƒe fiazikpui la dzi, eye woɖi Yoas ɖe Israel-fiawo gbɔ le Samaria.
Ɣemaɣi do, si me Elisa alo aku la, dze edzi. Tete Israel-fia Yoas yi egbɔ, eye wòfa avi le egbɔ gblɔ bena: Fofonye, fofonye! Israel ƒe tasiaɖam kple eƒe sɔdolawo!
Eye Elisa gblɔ nɛ bena: Yi ɖatsɔ dati kple aŋutrɔ vɛ! Esi wòyi ɖatsɔ dati kple aŋutrɔ vɛ nɛ la,
egblɔ na Israel-fia bena: Tso wò asi ɖo dati la dzi! Esi wòɖo eƒe asi edzi la, Elisa tso eƒe asi ɖo fia la ƒe asi dzi

gblɔ bena: ʋu fesre, si ɖo ta ɣedzeƒe gome! Eye wòʋui. Eye Elisa gblɔ be: Da aŋutrɔ la! Tete wòdae. Eye wògblɔ bena: Dziɖuɖu ƒe aŋutrɔ tso Yehowa gbɔ kple Aram-tɔwo dziɖuɖu ƒe aŋutrɔ! Asi Aramtɔwo le Afek, vaseɖe esime woatsrɔ̃.
Eye wògblɔ bena: Fɔ aŋutrɔawo! Esi wòfɔe la, egblɔ na Israel-fia la bena: Tsɔ wo ƒo anyigbae! Eye wòƒoe zi etɔ̃ ko tasi.
Tete Mawu ƒe ame do dɔmedzoe ɖe eŋu gblɔ bena: Ɖe wònye zi atɔ̃ alo zi aɖe nèƒoe la, eya ko hafi nasi Aramtɔwo, vaseɖe esime woatsrɔ̃; ke azɔ la zi etɔ̃ ko nasi Aramtɔwo.
Emegbe Elisa ku, eye woɖii. Esi ƒe trɔ la, Moabitɔwo ƒe adzohawo va anyigba la dzi.
Eye wòva me, esime wole ŋutsua ɖe ɖim, eye wokpɔ adzohawo la, wotsɔ ŋutsu la ƒu gbe ɖe Elisa ƒe yɔdo me. Ke esi ŋutsu la ka Elisa ƒe ƒuwo ŋu la, egbɔ agbe, eye wòtso ɖe eƒe afɔwo dzi.
Ke Aram-fia Xazael te Israel ɖe anyi le Yoaxaz ƒe agbe me ŋkekewo katã me.
Gake Yehowa ve wo nu, ekpɔ woƒe nublanui, eye wòtrɔ ɖe wo ŋu le nu, si wòbia kple Abraham, Isak kple Yakob la ta, eye meɖi be, yeagblẽ wo o, eye meɖe woɖa le eƒe ŋkuta o vaseɖe fifi.
Esi Aram-fia Xazael ku, eye via Ben-Hadad zu fia ɖe eteƒe la,
tete Yoaxaz vi Yoas gaxɔ du, siwo Xazael xɔ le fofoa Yoaxaz si le aʋa me la, le via Ben-Hadad si. Zi etɔ̃ Yoas sii, eye wògaxɔ Israel-duwo.
Le Israel-fia Yoaxaz ƒe vi Yoas ƒe ƒe evelia me la Amazya, Yuda-fia Yoas ƒe vi, zu fia.
Exɔ ƒe blave vɔ atɔ̃, esime wòzu fia, eye woɖu fia le Yerusalem ƒe blave vɔ asieke. Dadaa ŋkɔ nye Yehoadan tso Yerusalem.
Ewo nusi dze Yehowa ŋu, ɖeko meɖe fofoa Dawid nu o, eye wòwɔ pɛpɛpɛ, abe alesi fofoa Yoas wɔ ene.
Negbe nuxeƒewo ko womede ɖa o, eye dukɔ la gasa vo hedo dzudzɔ le nuxeƒewo.
Esime fiaɖuɖu la li ke ɖe esi me la, ewu eƒe dɔla, siwo wu fofoa fia.
Ke mewu hlɔ̃dolawo ƒe viwo o, abe alesi Yehowa ɖe se gblɔ woŋlɔ ɖe Mose ƒe segbalẽa me ene bena: Womagawu fofowo ɖe viwo nu o, ke boŋ amesiame nèku ɖe eƒe nuvɔ̃ ta.
Ewu Edomtɔwo dome ame akpe ewo le dzeʋe la me, eye wòxɔ Sela le aʋa la me hetso ŋkɔ nɛ bena Yokteel vaseɖe egbe.
Ɣemaɣi Amazya do ame ɖo ɖe Israel-fia Yoas, Yehu vi Yoaxaz ƒe vi gbã, ne woagblɔ nɛ bena: Va, ne miakpe akɔ kple mía nɔewo kpɔ!

Tete Israel-fia Yoas da ame ɖo ɖe Yuda-fia Amazya gbã, ne woagblɔ nɛ bena: Ŋuvegoe, si le Libanon dzi la, dɔ ame ɖo ɖe sederti, si le Libanon dzi, gblɔ bena: Tsɔ viwònyɔnu na vinyeŋutsu, ne wòaɖe. Tete gbemelã, siwo le Libanon dzi, va nyã avuzi le ŋuvegoe la dzi.
Esi Edomtɔwo, eyata dzi ɖo ƒowò. Wò bubu la nenɔ ŋuwò, ne natsi aƒe; nukaŋuti nèbe, yeade ɖokuiwò dzɔgbevɔ̃e me, eye mia kple Yuda siaa míatsi?
Ke Amazya meɖo toe o. Tete Israel-fia Yoas ho va, eye eya kple Yuda-fia Amazya wokpe akɔ le Bet-Semes, si nye Yuda to la.
Ke Israel si Yuda, eye wo dome amesiame si yi eƒe agbadɔ me.
Israel-fia Yoas lé Yuda-fia Amazya, Axazya vi Yoas ƒe vi, le Bet-Semes, eye wòkplɔe va Yerusalem. Eye wògbã Yerusalem ƒe gli tso Efrayim-gbo la nu vaseɖe dzogoedzigbo la gbɔ, ele abɔklugui alafa ene.
Eve wòlɔ sika kple klosalowo katã kple nusiwo katã le Yehowa ƒe aƒe kple fia ƒe aƒe ƒe nudzraɖoƒe hekpe ɖe awɔbamewo ŋu, eye wògbugbɔ yi Samaria.
Yoas ŋutinya susɔea, nusiwo wòwɔ kple eƒe kalẽwɔwɔwo kpakple alesi wòwɔ aʋa kple Yuda-fia Amazya la, woŋlɔ woɖe Israel-fiawo ƒe ŋutinyagbalẽ me.
Eye Yoas mlɔ fofoawo gbɔ, eye woɖu ɖe Israel-fiawo gbɔ le Samaria, eye via Yerobeam zu Ha ɖe eteƒe.
Eye Yuda-fia Amazya, Yoas vi, nɔ agbe ƒe wuiatɔ̃ le Israel-fia Yoas, Yoaxaz vi ƒe ku megbe.
Amazya ŋutinya susɔea la, woŋlɔe ɖe Yuda-fiawo ƒe ŋutinyagbalẽ me.
Ke woɖo nugbe ɖe eŋu le Yerusalem; tete wòsi yi Laxis, gake wodɔ ame ɖe eyome ɖe Laxis woɖawui le afima.
Eye wokɔe ɖo sɔ dzi va ɖi ɖe fofoawo gbɔ le Yerusalem ɖe Dawid ƒe du la me.
Tete Yuda-dukɔ blibo la tsɔ Azarya, amesi nye ƒe wuiade vi la, ɖo fia ɖe fofoa Amazya teƒe.
Eyae tso Elat, eye wògaxɔe na Yuda, le esi fia la mlɔ fofoawo gbɔ megbe.
Le Yuda-fia Amazya, Yoas vi ƒe ƒe wuiatɔ̃lia me la Yerobeam, Israel-fia Yoas ƒe vi, zu fia le Samaria ƒe blane vɔ ɖeke.
Ewɔ nusi nye vɔ le Yehowa ŋku me, eye meɖe asi le Yerobeam, Nebat vi ƒe nuvɔ̃, siwo katã wòtsɔ ble Israel de nuvɔ̃ me la ŋu o.
Egbugbɔ Israel ƒe liƒowo xɔ tso Xamat nutowo me vaseɖe tagbaƒu la nu, abe alesi Yehowa. Israel ƒe Mawu la gblɔ to eƒe dɔla, nyagblɔɖila Yona, Amitai vi, tso Gat-Xefer dzi la ene.
Elabena Yehowa kpɔ Israel ƒe hiã be, enu sẽ ŋutɔ, eye be, ɖeviwo kple ame tsitsiwo siaa nu yi, eye xɔnametɔa ɖeke meli na Israel o.
Elabena Yehowa megblɔ be, yeatutu Israel ƒe ŋkɔ ɖa le dziƒoa te o, eyata wòɖe wo to Yerobeam, Yoas vi la dzi.

Yerobeam ŋutinya susɔea kple nusiwo katã wòwɔ, eƒe kalẽwɔwɔwo kple aʋa, si wòwɔ kpakple alesi wògbugbɔ Damasko kple Xamat, siwo nye Yuda tɔ tsã, na Israel la, woŋlɔ wo ɖe Israel-fiawo ƒe ŋutinyagbalẽ me.
Eye Yerobeam mlɔ fofoa, Israel-fiawo gbɔ, eye via Zaxarya zu fia ɖe eteƒe.
Le Israel-fia Yerobeam ƒe ƒe blave vo adrelia me la Azarya, Yuda-fia Amazya ƒe vi, zu fia.
Exɔ ƒe wuiade, esime wòzu fia, eye wòdu fia le Yerusalem ƒe blaatɔ̃ va eve. Dadaa ŋkɔ nye Yexalya tso Yerusalem.
Ewɔ nusi dze Yehowa ŋu, abe alesi fofoa Amazya wɔ pɛpɛpɛ ene.
Negbe nuxeƒewo ko womeɖe ɖa o, eye dukɔ la gasa vɔ hedo dzudzɔ le nuxeƒewo.
Ke Yehowa ɖe fu na fia la, eye wòdze anyi vaseɖe eƒe kugbe, eye wònɔ xɔa ɖe me le aga. Eye fia ƒe vi Yotam no aƒe la nu hedrɔ̃ ʋɔnu dukɔ hahoo la.
Azarya ŋutinya susɔea kple nusiwo katã wòwɔ la, woŋlɔ wo ɖe Yuda-fiawo ƒe ŋutinyagbalẽ me.
Eye Azarya mlɔ fofoawo gbɔ, eye woɖu ɖe fofoawo gbɔ le Dawid ƒe du la me, eve via Yotam zu fia ɖe eteƒe.
Le Yuda-fia Azarya ƒe ƒe blaetɔ̃ vɔ enyilia me la Zaxarya, Yerobeam vi, zu fia ɖe Israel dzi le Samaria dzinu ade.
Ewɔ nusi nye vɔ̃ le Yehowa ŋku me, abe alesi fofoawo wɔ ene; eye meɖe asi le Yerobeam, Nebat vi ƒe nuvɔ̃, siwo wòtsɔ ble Israel de nuvɔ̃ me la ŋu o.
Tete Salum, Yabes vi, ɖo nugbe ɖe eŋu, eye wòwui le Yibleam hezu fia ɖe eteƒe.
Zaxarya ŋutinya susɔea la, woŋlɔe ɖe Israel-fiawo ƒe ŋutinyagbalẽ me.
Esia nye nya, si Yehowa gblɔ na Yehu bena: Viwòwo anɔ Israel-fiazikpui la dzi vaseɖe dzidzime enelia dzi: eye nenema wòva mee.
Le Yuda-fia Uziya ƒe ƒe blaetɔ̃ vɔ asiekelia me la Salum, Yabes vi, zu fia, eye woɖu fia le Samaria dzinu ɖeka.
Tete Menaxem, Gad vi, tso Tirza ho va Samaria, eye wowu Salum, Yabes vi la, hezu fia ɖe eteƒe.
Salum ŋutinya susɔea kple alesi wòɖo nugbe la, woŋlɔ wo ɖe Israel-fiawo ƒe ŋutinyagbalẽ me.
Ɣemaɣi Menaxem tsrɔ̃ Tapuax kple nusiwo katã le eme kpakple eƒe nutowo me, elabena esi wotso Tirza va la, womeʋu agbo nɛ o, eyata wòsi wo, eye wòdze ƒo le woƒe funɔwo katã nu.
Le Yuda-fia Azarya ƒe ƒe blaetɔ̃ vɔ asiekelia me la Menaxem, Gad vi, zu fia ɖe Israel dzi ƒe ewo le Samaria.
Ewo nusi nye vɔ̃ le Yehowa ŋku me, eye meɖe asi le Yerobeam, Nebat vi ƒe nuvɔ̃, siwo wòtsɔ ble Israel de nuvɔ̃ me la ŋu o.
Eŋɔli Asur-fia Pul va dze anyigba la dzi, eye Menaxem tsa klosalo talento akpe ɖeka na Pul, be woakpe ɖe ye ŋu, ne fiaɖuɖu la nali ke ɖe ye si me.
Eye Menaxem dzo ga le Israel tso aʋawolawo katã si, be ŋutsu sia ŋutsu natsɔ klosalo sekel blaatɔ̃ na Asur-fia. Ale Asur-fia gbugbɔ, eye metsi anyigba la dzi afima o.
Menaxem ŋutinya susɔea kple nusiwo katã wòwɔ la, woŋlɔ wo ɖe Israel-fiawo ƒe ŋutinyagbalẽ me.
Eye Menaxem mlɔ fofoawo gbɔ, eye via Pekaxya zu fia ɖe eteƒe.
Le Yuda-fia Azarya ƒe ƒe blaatɔ̃lia me la Pekaxya, Menaxem vi, zu fia ɖu Israel dzi ƒe eve le Samaria.
Ewɔ nusi nye vɔ le Yehowa ŋku me, eye meɖe asi le Yerobeam, Nebat vi ƒe nuvɔ̃, siwo wòtsɔ ble Israel de nuvɔ̃ me la ŋu o.

Tete eƒe fia ŋu me Pekax, Remalya vi, ɖo nugbe ɖe eŋu, eye wòwui le fia ƒe aƒe ƒe mɔ̃ me le Samaria: Arkob kple Arye kpakple ŋutsu blaatɔ̃, siwo nye Gilead-viwo, kpe ɖe eŋu, eye wòwui hezu fia ɖe eteƒe.
Pekaxya ŋutinya susɔea kple nusiwo katã wòwɔ la, kpɔ ɖa, woŋlɔ wo ɖe Israel-fiawo ƒe ŋutinyagbalẽ me.
Le Yuda-fia Azarya ƒe ƒe blaatɔ̃ vɔ evelia me la Pekax, Remalya vi, zu fia ɖe Israel dzi ƒe blave le Samaria.
Ewɔ nusi nye vɔ̃ le Yehowa ŋku me, eye meɖe asi le Yerobeam, Nebat vi ƒe nuvɔ̃, siwo wotso ble Israel de nuvɔ̃ me la ŋu o.
Le Israel-fia Pekax ŋɔli la Asur-fia Tiglat-Pileser va, eye wòxɔ Yion, Abel-Bet-Maaxa, Yanoax, Kedes, Xazor, Gilead kple Galilea, si nye Naftali-nyigba blibo la, eye wòkplɔ wo yi Asur.
Tete Xosea, Ela vi, ɖo nugbe ɖe Pekax, Remalya vi la ŋu, eye wòwui hezu fia ɖe eteƒe le Yotam, Uziya vi ƒe ƒe blavelia me.
Pekax ŋutinya susɔea kple nusiwo katã wòwɔ la, kpɔ ɖa, woŋlɔ wo ɖe Israel-fiawo ƒe ŋutinyagbalẽ me.
Le Israel-fia Pekax, Remalya vi ƒe ƒe evelia me la Yotam, Yuda-fia Uziya ƒe vi, zu fia.
Exɔ ƒe blave vo atɔ̃, esime wòzu fia, eye woɖu fia ƒe wuiade le Yerusalem. Dadaa ŋkɔ nye Yerusa, Zadok ƒe vinyɔnu.
Ewo nusi dze Yehowa ŋu; alesi fofoa Uziya wɔ la, nenema pɛpɛpɛ wòwɔ.
Negbe nuxeƒewo ko womeɖe ɖa o, eye dukɔ la gasa vɔ hedo dzudzɔ le nuxeƒewo. Eyae de dzigbegbo le Yehowa ƒe aƒe la nu.
Yotam ŋutinya susɔea kple nusiwo katã wòwɔ la, woŋlɔ wo ɖe Yuda-fiawo ƒe ŋutinyagbalẽ me.
Ɣemaɣi Yehowa de asi Aram-fia Rezin kple Pekax, Remalya vi dɔdɔ me ɖe Yuda ŋu.
Eye Yotam mlɔ fofoawo gbɔ, eye woɖu ɖe fofoawo gbɔ ɖe fofoa Dawid ƒe du la me, eye via Axaz zu fia ɖe eteƒe.
Le Pekax, Remalya vi ƒe ƒe wuiadrelia me la Axaz, Yuda-fia Yotam ƒe vi, zu fia.
Axaz xɔ ƒe blave, esime wòzu fia, eye woɖu fia ƒe wuiade le Yerusalem. Mewu nusi dze Yehowa, eƒe Mawu la ŋu abe fofoa Dawid ene o,
ke boŋ eto Israel-fiawo ƒe ʋe me; gɔglɔ̃gɔ la ena viawo to dzo me le dukɔ, siwo Yehowa nyã le Israel-viwo ŋgɔ la ƒe ŋunyɔnuwo nu.
Esa vɔ, eye wòdo dzudzɔ le nuxeƒewo, togbɛwo dzi kple ati damawo katã te.
Ɣemaɣi Aram-fia Rezin kple Israel-fia Pekax, Remalya vi, woho aʋa ɖe Yerusalem ŋu, eye woɖe to ɖe Axaz, ke womete ŋu wɔ aʋa kplii o.
Ɣemaɣi Aram-fia Rezin gaxɔ Elat na Edomtɔwo, eye wonyã Yudatɔwo tso Elat, eye Edomtɔwo va Elat henɔ afima vaseɖe egbe.
Tete Axaz dɔ ame ɖo ɖe Asur-fia Tiglat-Pileser, ne woagblɔ nɛ bena: Wò dɔla kple viwò menye, va, ne naɖem tso Aram-fia kple Israel-fia, amesiwo tso ɖe ŋunye la si me.
Eye Axaz tso klosalo kple sika, si le Yehowa ƒe aƒe kple fia ƒe aƒe fe nudzraɖoƒe la, wo nunanae ɖo ɖe Asur-fia.
Asur-fia ɖo toe, eye Asur-fia ho va Damasko hexɔe, eye wòkplɔ wo yi Kir, eve wowu Rezin.
Tete fia Axaz yi, be yeakpe Asur-fia Tiglat-Pileser le Damasko. Esi fia Axaz kpo vɔsamlekpui, si le Damasko la, eɖo eƒe nɔnɔme ɖe nunɔla Uriya, eye wotae, abe alesi wowɔe pɛpɛpɛ ene.
Eye nunɔla Uriya ɖi vɔsamlekpui la; alesi fia Axaz ɖoe ɖa tso Damasko la, nenema pɛpɛpɛ nunɔla Uriya wɔe, hafi fia Axaz gbɔ tso Damasko.
Esi ha la gbɔ tso Damasko, eye wòkpɔ vɔsamlekpuia la, ede vɔsamlekpui la dzi, eye wòsa vɔ le edzi.
Etɔ dzo eƒe numevɔsa kple nuɖuvɔsawo le edzi, eye wòkɔ eƒe nunovɔsawo ɖe edzi, eye wohlẽ eƒe akpedavɔsa ƒe ʋu ɖe vɔsamlekpui la dzi.
Ke ete akɔblivɔsamlekpui, si le Yehowa ŋku me le xɔa ŋgɔdze la ɖa, be maganɔ vɔsamlekpui; la kple Yehowa ƒe xɔ la domee o, eye wòtsɔe ɖe vɔsamlekpui la ƒe axa dzi le anyiehe gome.

Eye fia Axaz de se na nunɔla Uriya gblɔ bena: Sa ŋdinumevɔ kple fiẽnuɖuvɔ kple fia ƒe numevɔ kple eƒe nuɖuvɔ kpakple dukɔ hahoo la katã ƒe numevɔ kple nuɖuvɔ kpakple woƒe nunovɔwo le vɔsamlekpui gã la dzi, eye hlẽ woƒe numevɔsa kple akpedavɔsa ƒe nuwo katã ɖe edzi. Ke akɔblivɔsamlekpui la nena anyi, mana eŋuti bum kpɔ.
Eye nunɔla Uriya wo pɛpɛpɛ, abe alesi fia la de se ene.
Fia Axaz gbã anyinɔawo kɔgo, eye wòɖe zeawo ɖa le wo dzi, eɖe gazɔ, si le akɔblinyiawo dzi la, ɖe anyi hetsɔe ɖo kpewo dzi.
Eye wòɖe dzudzɔgbekpata, si wotu ɖe xɔ la ŋu, kple fia ƒe toƒe, si le gota gome la ɖa le Yehowa ƒe xɔ la ŋu le Asur-fia ta.
Axaz ŋutinya susɔea kple nusiwo wòwɔ la, woŋlɔ wo ɖe Yuda-fiawo ƒe ŋutinyagbalẽ me.
Eye Axaz mia fofoawo gbɔ, eye woɖii ɖe fofoawo gbɔ ɖe Dawid ƒe du la me, eye via Xizkiya zu fia ɖe eteƒe.
Le Yuda-fia Axaz ƒe ƒe wuievelia me la Hosea, Ela vi, zu fia ɖu Israel dzi ƒe asieke le Samaria.
Ewɔ nusi nye vɔ̃ le Yehowa ŋku me, ke menye abe Israel-fia, siwo nɔ ŋgɔ nɛ la ene o.
Eye Asur-fia Salmanaser ho ɖe eŋu, eye Hosea zu eƒe dɔla hedzo nu nɛ.
Ke Asur-fia kpɔ be, Hosea ɖo nugbe ɖe eŋu, elabena edo ame ɖo ɖe Egipte-fia So, eye megatsɔ nunana vɛ na Asur-fia abe ƒe sia ƒe ene o; tete Asur-fia lée, eye wòblae tso de gaxɔ me.
Eye Asur-fia ho va anyigba blibo la dzi, eye woho ɖe Samaria ŋu heɖe to ɖee ƒe etɔ̃.
Le Hosea ƒe ƒe asiekelia me la Asur-fia xɔ Samaria, eye wòkplɔ Israel yi Asur hetsɔ wo ɖo Xalax kple Xabor le Gozan-tɔsisi la nu kpakple Media-duwo me.
Elabena Israel-viwo wɔ nuvɔ̃ ɖe Yehowa, woƒe Mawu, si kplɔ wo tso Egipte-nyigba dzi tso Egipte-fia Farao ƒe ŋusẽ nu la ŋu, eye wovɔ̃ mawu bubuwo.
Wozɔ de dukɔ, siwo Yehowa nyã le Israel-viwo ŋgɔ la ƒe ɖoɖowo kple Israel-fiawo ƒe ɖoɖowo nu.
Israel-viwo wɔ nusi menyo Yehowa, woƒe Mawu ŋu o la, le adza me, eye wotu nuxeƒewo ɖe woƒe duwo katã me, ɖe dzɔlawo ƒe miwo kple du sesẽwo siaa gbɔ.
Woli aƒeliwo kple Aserawo ɖe togbɛ kɔkɔwo katã dzi kple ati damawo katã te;
eye wodo dzudzɔ le afima le nuxeƒewo katã abe dukɔ, siwo Yehowa nyã le wo ŋgɔ ene, eye wowɔ nu vɔ̃ɖiwo, be woatsɔ ado dziku na Yehowa.
Wosubɔ legbawo, evɔ wònye Yehowa gblɔ na wo be, migawɔe o hafi!

Eye Yehowa xlɔ̃ nu Israel kple Yuda to eƒe nyagblɔɖilawo katã, siwo nye nukpɔlawo la dzi gblɔ bena: Mitrɔ tso miaƒe mɔ vɔwo dzi, eye milé nye sewo kple nye dodowo me ɖe asi, abe alesi mede se na mia fofowo kple alesi mede nye dɔla nyagblɔɖilawo si ɖo ɖe mi la ene.
Ke womeɖo to o, hafi boŋ wosẽ ta me abe wo fofo, siwo mexɔ Yehowa, woƒe Mawu dzi se o la ene

Wodo vlo eƒe ɖoɖowo kple nu, si wobla kple wo fofowo kpakple eƒe se, si wòde na wo la, eye wowɔ yakanuwo hezu ame ɖigbɔwo, eye wodze dukɔ, siwo ƒo xlã wo la yome, eva wònye Yehowa de se na wo be, womegawɔ abe woawo ene o hafi.
Woɖe asi le Yehowa, woƒe Mawu ƒe sewo katã ŋu, eye wokɔ legbawo, siwo nye nyivi eve, wowɔ Aserawo, eye wode ta agu na dziƒonuwo katã, eye wosubɔ Baal.
Wona wo viŋutsuwo kple wo vinyɔnuwo to dzo me, woka afã hesa dzo, eye wotsɔ wo ɖokui ƒle na nu vɔ̃ɖi wowɔ le Yehowa ŋku me, ne woatsɔ aɖo dɔmedzoe nɛ.
Eyata Yehowa do dɔmedzoe ɖe Israel ŋuti ŋutɔ, eye wòɖe wo ɖa le eƒe ŋku ta; wo dometɔa ɖeke mekpɔtɔ o, negbe Yuda-to la ko.
Ke Yuda hã melé Yehowa, eƒe Mawu ƒe seawo me ɖe asi o, eye wozɔ le ɖoɖo, siwo Israel ɖo la nu.
Eyata Yehowa gbe Israel ƒe dzidzimeviwo katã, eye wote wo de anyi, etso wo de asi na adzodalawo vaseɖe esime wòɖe wo ɖa le eƒe ŋku ta.
Elabena Israel fe eɖokui da le Dawid ƒe aƒe la ŋu, eye wotsɔ Yerobeam, Nebat vi la, ɖo fiae, eye Yerobeam ɖe Israel ɖa tso Yehowa ŋu heble wo de nuvɔ̃ gã me.
Ale Israel dze nuvɔ̃, siwo katã Yerobeam wɔ la yome, eye womede asi le wo ŋu o,
vaseɖe esime Yehowa ɖe Israel ɖa le eƒe ŋku ta, abe alesi wògblɔ to eƒe dɔla, nyagblɔɖilawo katã dzi ene, eye wòkplɔ Israel tso eƒe anyigba dzi yi Asur vaseɖe egbe.
Eye Asur-fia kplɔ amewo tso Babel, Kuta, Awa, Xamat kple Sefarwayim, eye wòna wonɔ Samaria-duwo me ɖe Israel-viwo teƒe, eye woxɔ Samaria henɔ eƒe duwo me.
Ke esime wova afima tete la, womeyɔ Yehowa o, eyata Yehowa kplɔ dzatawo de wo, eye wowu amewo le wo dome.

Eye wogblɔ na Asur-fia bena: Dukɔ, siwo nèkplɔ yii, be woadanɔ Samaria-duwo me la, menya anyigba dzi mawu la ƒe kɔnuwo o, eyata wòkplɔ dzatawo de wo wowu wo, elabena womenya anyigba dzi mawu la ƒe kɔnu wo o.
Tete Asur-fia de se gblɔ bena: Miɖo nunɔla, siwo mieɖakplɔ tso afima la, dome ɖeka ɖa, ne wòayi aɖanɔ afima, eye wòafia anyigba dzi mawu la ƒe kɔnuwo wo.
Ale nunɔla, siwo wokplɔ dzoe tso Samaria la, dometɔ ɖeka va nɔ Betel, eye wòfia, alesi woavɔ̃ Yehowae la wo.
Ke dukɔ sia dukɔ wɔ mawuwo na eɖokui, eye wotsɔ wo ɖo nuxeƒexɔ, siwo Samariatɔwo wɔ la me; dukɔ sia dukɔ wɔe ɖe du, si me wòle la me.
Babeltɔwo wɔ Sukot-Benot; Kuttɔwo wɔ Nergal, eye Xamattɔwo wɔ Asima;
Awitɔwo wɔ Nibxaz kple Tartak, eye Sefarwayimtɔwo tɔ dzo wo viwo na Adramelex kple Anamelex, siwo nye Sefarwayimtɔwo ƒe mawuwo.
Ke wovɔ̃ Yehowa hã, eye wotsɔ wo dome amesiame ƒomevi ɖo nuxeƒewo ƒe nunɔlawoe, amesiwo sa vɔ na wo le nuxeƒexɔwo me.
Wova Yehowa, eye wogasubɔ woƒe mawuwo le dukɔ, siwo dome wokplɔ wo tsoe la ƒe kɔnuwo nu.

Vaseɖe egbegbe wogale woƒe kɔnu xoxoawo dzi; womevɔ̃a Yehowa ɖeɖe o, eye womewɔna le woƒe dodowo kple woƒe kɔnuwo ɖeɖe nu loo, alo wona le nufiafia kple se, siwo Yehowa de na Yakob, amesi wotsɔ ŋkɔ na be Israel ƒe viwo la nu o.
Elabena Yehowa bia nu kpli wo, eye wòde se na wo gblɔ bena: Migavɔ̃ mawu bubuwo o, migade ta agu na wo o, migasubɔ wo o, eye migasa vɔ na wo o!
Ke boŋ mivɔ̃ Yehowa, amesi tsɔ ŋusẽ gã kple abɔ, si wodo de dzi, kplɔ mi tso Egipte-nyigba dzi la; eya miade ta agu na, eye eya miasa vɔ na!
Eye milé ŋku de ɖoɖo kple kɔnu, nufiafia kple se, si woŋlɔ ɖi na mi la ŋu, ne miawɔ wo ŋkekeawo katã, eye migavɔ̃ mawu bubuwo o!
Migayɔ nu, si mebia kpli mi la be o, eye migavɔ̃ mawu bubuwo o,
ke boŋ mivɔ̃ Yehowa, mia Mawu la, ne wòaɖe miatso miaƒe futɔwo katã si me.
Ke womeɖo to o, hafi boŋ wowɔ woƒe kɔnu xoxoawo.
Ale dukɔ siawo vɔ̃ Yehowa, eye wosubɔ woƒe legbawo hã; wo viwo kple wo tɔgbuiyɔviwo le alea wɔm vaseɖe egbe abe wo fofowo ene.
Le Israel-fia Hosea. Eta vi ƒe ƒe etɔ̃lia me la Xizkiya, Yuda-fia Axaz ƒe vi, zu fia
Exɔ ƒe blave vɔ atɔ̃, esime wòzu fia, eye woɖu ba ƒe blave vɔ asieke le Yerusalem. Dadaa ŋkɔ nye Abi, Zaxarya ƒe vinyɔnu.
Eye wòwɔ nusi dze Yehowa ŋu, abe alesi fofoa Dawid wɔ pɛpɛpɛ ene.
Eɖe nuxeƒewo ɖa, eye wògbã aƒeliwo, elã Aserawo, eye wògbã akɔblida, si Mose wɔ la; elabena Israel-viwo do dzudzɔ nɛ vaseɖe ɣemaɣi, eve wòna ŋkɔe be Nexustan.
Eɖo ŋu ɖe Yehowa, Israel ƒe Mawu la ŋu, eye etɔgbea ɖeke mena Yuda-fia, siwo katã dze eyome alo do ŋgɔ nɛ la dome o.
Eku ɖe Yehowa ŋu, eye mele ɖa le eŋu o, eye wòle Yehowa ƒe se, siwo wòde na Mose la me ɖe asi.
Eye Yehowa nɔ kplu, afisiafi, si wòyi la, edzea edzi nɛ Eye wòdze aglã ɖe Asur-fia ŋu, eye megasubɔe o.
Esi Filistitɔwo vaseɖe Gaza kple eƒe liƒowo gbɔ, tso dzɔlawo ƒe xɔ tsralawo gbɔ vaseɖe du sesẽwo gbɔ.
Le fia Xizkiya ƒe ƒe enelia, si nye Israel-fia Hosea, Ela vi ƒe ƒe adrelia me la, Asur-fia Salmanaser ho ɖe Samaria ŋu, eye woɖe to ɖee.
Exɔe le ƒe etɔ̃ megbe. Woxɔ Samaria le Xizkiya ƒe ƒe adelia me, eya nye Israel-fia Hosea ƒe ƒe asiekelia.
Eye Asur-fia kplɔ Israel dzoe yi Asur hetso wo ɖo Xalax kple Xabor le Gozan-tɔsisi la nu kple Media-duwo me.
Elabena womeɖo to Yehowa, woƒe Mawu ƒe gbe o, eye woda eƒe nubabla kple se, siwo katã Yehowa de na eƒe dɔla Mose la dzi, womeɖo to o, eye womewɔ edzi o.
Le Xizkiya ƒe ƒe wuienelia me la Asur-fia Sanxerib ho ɖe Yuda-du sesẽwo katã ŋu, eye wòxɔ wo.

Tete Yuda-fia Xizkiya da ame ɖo ɖe Asur-fia le Laxis, ne woagblɔ nɛ bena: Mewɔ nuvɔ̃! Ho dzo le gbɔnye, eye maxɔ nusi natsɔ aɖo dzinye la atso. Eye Asur-fia ɖo klosalo talento alafa etɔ̃ kple sika talento blaetɔ̃ na Yuda fia Xizkiya, be wòaxe.
Eye Xizkiya tsa klosalo, siwo katã wòkpɔ le Yehowa ƒe aƒe me kple fia ƒe aƒe ƒe nudzraɖoƒe la hena.
Ɣemaɣi Xizkiya flo sika, siwo Yuda-fia Xizkiya fa ɖe Yehowa ƒe xa ƒe ʋɔtruwo kple sɔtiwo ŋu la, eye wòtsɔ wo na Asur-fia.

Ke Asur-fia do Tartan, Rabsaris kple Rabsake kpakple aʋakɔ gãa ɖe tso Laxis ɖo ɖe Yerusalem ɖe fia Xizkiya ŋu, eye woho heva Yerusalem. Esi woho va la, wotɔ ɖe dzigbeta, si le avɔnyãla ƒe agblenu dzi la, ƒe tɔʋu nu,
eye woyɔ fia la ɖa. Tete Elyakim, Xilkiya vi, amesi le aƒe la nu kple Sebna, agbalẽŋlɔla kpakple Yoax, Asaf vi, ha ƒe tsiami la, wodo yi wo gbɔ.
Eye Rabsake gblɔ na wo be: Migblɔ na Xizkiya bena: Ale fia gã, Asur-fia, gblɔ esi: Nuka ŋu gɔ̃ nele dzi ɖom ɖo?
Ɖe nèle bubum be, numenya ƒuƒlu enye aɖaŋuɖoɖo kple ŋusẽ hena aʋawɔwɔa? Azɔ tso, ameka ŋu nèle dzi ɖom ɖo, be nedze aglã ɖe ŋunye?
Azɔ èle dzi ɖom ɖe aƒla ŋeŋe ma, si nye Egipte la ŋu, esi ne amea ɖe ziɔ ɖe eŋu la, wòŋɔa asi nɛ flo la; alea Egipte-fia le na amesiwo katã le dzi ɖom ɖe eŋu.

Ke ne miegblɔ nam be: Yehowa, mia Mawu la ŋu miele dzi ɖom ɖo la, ekema ɖe menye eya ƒe nuxeƒewo kple vɔsamlekpuiwo Xizkiya ɖe ɖa, eye wògblɔ na Yuda kple Yerusalem bena: Miɖe ta agu ɖe vɔsamlekpui sia ŋgɔ le Yerusalem oa?
Eyata mia kple nye aƒetɔ, Asur-fia, mitso gbe kpɔ, eye matsɔ sɔ akpe eve na wò, be ate ŋu akpɔ sɔdolawo aɖo wo dzi mahã?
Mate ŋu asi aʋafia ɖeka, si nye nye aƒetɔ ƒe dɔlawo dome suetɔ hã o, eye wòa nele dzi ɖom ɖe Egipte gu le sɔwo kple sɔdolawo taa?
Azɔ ɖe Yehowa megbe meto ho ɖe teƒe sia ŋu, be magblẽea? Yehowae gblɔ nam be: Ho ɖe anyigba sia ŋu, eye nagblẽe!

Tete Elyakim, Xilkiya vi, kple Sebna kpakple Yoax wogblɔ na Rabsake bena: Taflatse, ƒo nu kple wò dɔlawo ɖe Aram-gbe me, elabena míawo míesenɛ, eye megaƒo nu kpli mí ɖe Yuda-gbe me ɖe dukɔ, si le glia dzi la, ƒe to me o.

Rabsake ɖo ŋu na wo bena: Ɖe wobe, mia kple wò aƒetɔ gbɔe nye aƒetɔ la dom ɖo, be magblɔ nya siawoa? Ɖe menye ŋutsu siawo, siwo na klotinu le glia dzi, be woaɖu woawo ŋutɔwo ƒe mi, eye woano woƒe aɖuɖɔ kple mi la, gbɔe oa?
Tete Rabsake le va do ɣli sesĩe le Yuda-gbe me ƒo nu gblɔ bena: Mise fia gã, Asur-fia ƒe gbe!
Ale fia la gblɔ esi: Migana Xizkiya naɖu mi o, elabena mate ŋu aɖe mi tso esi me o.
Eye migana Xizkiya natsɔ Yehowa ade dzi ƒo na mi agblɔ be: Yehowa aɖe mi, eye womatsɔ du sia ade asi na Asur-fia o.
Migado to Xizkiya o! Elabena ale Asur-fia gblɔ esi: Mibla nu kplim, eye mido va gbɔnye, ekema mia dome amesiame aɖu eƒe weintsetse, amesiame aɖu eƒe gbotitsetse, eye amesiame ano eƒe vudo me tsi,

vaseɖe esime mava, eye makplɔ mi ayi anyigba, si le abe mía ta ene la dzi, anyigba, si dzi bli, wein kple abolo, weingblewo, amitiwo kple anyitsi le, ne miano agbe, eye miaku o. Migado to Xizkiya o! Mia blem wòle le gbɔgblɔm be: Yehowa aɖe mí!
Ɖe dukɔwo ƒe mawuwo te ŋu ɖe woƒe anyigbawo tso Asur-fia si mea?
Afika Xamat kple Arpad ƒe mawuwo le? Afika Sefarwayim, Hena kple Iwa ƒe mawuwo le? Ɖe wote ŋu ɖe Samaria tso asinye mea?
Ɖe anyigbawo ƒe mawuwo katã dometɔa ɖe ɖe eƒe anyigba tso asinye me, ne Yehowa naɖe Yerusalem atso asinye mea?
Ke dukɔ la zi kpi, eye meɖo nyaa ɖeke ŋu nɛ o, elabena fia la de se gblɔ bena: Migaɖo nyaa ɖeke ŋu nɛ o!
Eye Elyakim, Xilkiya vi, amesi le aƒea nu, kple Sebna, agbalẽŋlɔla, kpakple Yoax, Asaf vi, fia ƒe tsiami, wole awu vuvuwo me va Xizkiya gbɔ, eye woto Rabsake ƒe nyawo nɛ.
Esime fia Xizkiya see la, edze eƒe awuwo, eye wòta akpanya heyi Yehowa ƒe aƒe la me.
Eye wòdo Elyakim, amesi le aƒea nu, kple Sebna, agbalẽŋlɔla, kpakple nunɔlawo ƒe ame tsitsiwo, amesiwo ta akpanya la, ɖo ɖe nyagblɔɖila Yesaya, Amoz vi gbɔ,
ne woagblɔ nɛ bena: Ale Xizkiya gblɔ esi: Egbe enye xaxa-, tohehe-kple vlodogbe; elabena viwo ɖo dzidzi me, gake ŋusẽ meli, ne wòadzi wo o.

Ɖewohi Yehowa, wò Mawu, se Rabsake, amesi eƒe aƒetɔ Asur-fia dɔ ɖo ɖa, be wòaɖe alɔme le Mawu gbagbe la ŋu la ƒe nyawo katã, eye woahe to nɛ le nya, siwo Yehowa, wò Mawu, se la ta; eyata ɖo gbe ɖa ɖe ame susɔe, siwo li la ta!
Eye Xizkiya ƒe dɔlawo va Yesaya gbɔ.
Tete Yesaya gblɔ na wo bena: Ale miagblɔ na miaƒe aƒetɔ enye si: Yehowa ƒe gbe enye si: Megavɔ̃ nya, siwo Asur-fia ƒe ɖekakpuiwo tso ɖe alɔme le ŋunye nèse la o!
Kpɔ ɖa, made gbɔgbɔa ɖe eme, eye wòase nyaa ɖe ahagbugbɔ avi eƒe anyigba dzi, eye mana woatsi yi nu le eƒe anyigba dzi.
Esi Rabsake gbugbɔ yi la, ekpɔ Asur-fia wòle aʋa wɔm kple Libna, elabena ese be, eho tso Laxis.
Ke esi wose le Kus-fia Tirhaka ŋu be: Kpɔ ɖa, eho, be yeawɔ aʋa kpli wò la, egadɔ amewo ɖo ɖe Xizkiya, ne woagblɔ nɛ bena:
Ale miagblɔ na Xizkiya enye si: Megana wò Mawu, si ŋu nèle dzi ɖom ɖo la, naɖu wò nagblɔ be: womatsɔ Yerusalem ade asi na Asur-fia o.
Kpɔ ɖa, wò ŋutɔ èse nusi Asur-fia wo anyigbawo katã, vaseɖe esime wotsrɔ̃ wo, eye woaɖe wò ya?
Ɖe dukɔ, siwo fofonyewo tsrɔ̃: Gozan, Xaran, Rezef kple Eden-viwo, siwo le Telasar la ƒe mawuwo ɖe woa?
Afika Xamat-fia, Arpad-fia kple du Sefarwayim, Hena kple Iwa ƒe fia le?
Esi Xizkiya xa agbalẽa le dɔlawo si xlẽe la, eyi Yehowa ƒe aƒe la me, eye Xizkiya kekee ɖe Yehowa ŋku me.
Eye Xizkiya do gbe ɖa le Yehowa ŋku me gblɔ bena: Yehowa, Israel ƒe Mawu, asi nɔa Kerubiwo dzi, wò ɖeka koe nye Mawu ɖe anyigba dzi fiaɖuƒewo katã dzi, wòe wo dziƒo kple anyigba.
Yehowa, ƒu to anyi, ne nase nu! Yehowa, ʋu wò ŋkuwo, ne nakpɔ nu, eye se Sanxerib ƒe nya, siwo wòɖo ɖa, be yeatsɔ ɖe alɔme le Mawu gbagbe la ŋu!
Yehowa, Asur-fiawo nya tsrɔ̃ dukɔwo kple woƒe anyigbawo vava.
Wotsɔ woƒe mawuwo de dzo me, elabena menye mawuwo wonye o, ke boŋ amegbetɔwo ƒe asinu dɔwɔwɔwoe, ati kple kpewo wonye, eyata wo srɔ̃ wo.
Eyata Yehowa, mia Mawu, ɖe mi tso esi me dzro, ne anyigba dzi tiaɖuƒewo katã nadze sii bena, wò ɖeka koe nye Yehowa Mawu!
Tete Yesaya, Amoz vi, dɔ ame ɖo ɖe Xizkiya gblɔ bena: Ale Yehowa, Israel ƒe Mawu la, gblɔ esi: Gbe, si nèdo ɖa nam le Asur-fia Sanxerib ŋuti la, mesee.
Ale Yehowa gblɔ ɖe eŋu enye si: Ɖetugbi, Zion vinyɔnu, ɖe alɔme le ŋuwo, eye wòke wò, Yerusalem vinyɔnu ʋuʋu ta ɖe yowòme.
Ameka nedo vloe, eye ameka ŋu neɖu fewu le, ameka ta nèɖo ɣli ɖo, eve ameka ŋu nèfɔ mo dzi ɖo? Israel ƒe kɔkɔetɔ lae loo!

Edo vlo Aƒetɔ la to wò dɔlawo dzi gblɔ bena: Metsɔ nye tasiaɖam gbogboawo va toawo ta me kple Libanon ƒe tsutsuẽ aƒe, eye melã eƒe sederti kɔkɔwo kple eƒe sesewu nyuitɔwo, azɔ mege ɖe eƒe nɔƒe kɔkɔwo kple eƒe abɔmeti dodowo gbɔ;
meɖe vudo, eye meno du bubu me tɔwo ƒe tsi, eye metsɔ nye afɔƒome na Egipte tɔsisiwo katã mie.
Mesee kpɔ be, metre ewɔwɔ tso tititi ke, eye meɖoe tso gbaɖegbe ke oa? Azɔ mena wòva me, be wogblẽ du sesẽwo wòzu glikpo.
Wo me nɔlawo ƒe lãme tu, dzi ɖe le wo ƒo, eye ŋu kpe wo; woɖi agblemenu kple gbe mumu, xɔtagbe kple bli, si tsi tonu hafi va ƒu.
Menya wò anyinɔnɔ, wo dodo kple wò gbɔgbɔ kpakple wò agbodzedze ɖe ŋunye.
Esi wò agbodzedze ɖe ŋunye kple wò dada va nye to me ŋuti la, eyata made nye ga wò ŋɔti, eye made nye numega nu na wò akplɔ wò agbugbɔ ato mɔ, si neto va la.

Eye esia anye dzesi na wò. Le ƒe sia me la miaɖu nusiwo mie le wo ɖokui si, eye le ƒe evelia me la miaɖu flu me nuwo, eye le ƒe etɔ̃lia me la miaƒã nu aŋe nu, eye miade weingblewo aɖu wo me kutsetsewo.
Yuda ƒe aƒe la ƒe amesiwo woɖe, eye wòkpɔtɔ la, aɖe ke aɖo ta to me, eye woatse ku ɖe dzi me.
Elabena ame susɔeawo ado tso Yerusalem, eye amesiwo woɖe la, atso Zion-to la dzi; Yehowa Zebaot ƒe ŋuʋaʋã la le esia wo ge.
Eyata ale Yehowa gblɔ ɖe Asur-fia ŋu enye si; Mava du sia me o, eye mada aŋutrɔ ɖe eme o, mate ɖe eŋu kple akpoxɔnu o, eye maƒu kpo ɖe eŋu o.
Agbugbɔ ato mo, si dzi wòto va, eye mava du sia me o Yehowa ƒe gbee nye esia!
Makpɔ du sia ta, eye maɖee, le nye ŋutɔ kple nye dɔla Dawid ta.
Eye wòva me le zã ma me be, Yehowa ƒe dɔla do ɖawu ame akpe alafa ɖeka kple blanyi vɔ atɔ̃ le Asurtɔwo ƒe asaɖa me. Esi wofɔ ŋdi kanya la, kpɔ ɖa, ame kukuwo sɔŋ koe li.
Tete Asur-fia Sanxerib ho dzo gbugbɔ yi aƒe, eye woɖanɔ Niniwe.
Eye wòva me, esime wòle gbe dom ɖa le eƒe mawu Nisrox ƒe me la, evia Adramelex kple Sarezer wowui kple yi, eye wòsi yi Ararat-nyigba dzi, eye via Esar-Xadon zu fia ɖe eteƒe.
Ɣemaɣi la Xizkiya lé dɔ de kuku ge; eye nyagblɔɖila Yesaya, Amoz vi, va egbɔ gblɔ nɛ bena: Ale Yehowa gblɔ esi: Ɖɔ wò aƒe ɖo, elabena èle kuku ge, eye mele agbe nɔ ge o.
Tete wòtrɔ mo ɖe gli ŋu hedo gbe ɖa na Yehowa gblɔ bena:
Oo Yehowa, ɖo ŋu, alesi mezɔ le ŋkuwò me le nyateƒe kple dzi blibo me, kple alesi mewo nusi nyo le ŋkuwò me la. Eye Xizkiya fa avi kple ɣli.
Esi Yesaya mekpɔ do le dua titina o la, Yehowa ƒe gbe va egbɔ bena:

Gbugbɔ yi ɖagblɔ na nye dukɔ ƒe amegã Xizkiya bena: Ale Yehowa, fofowò Dawid ƒe Mawu la, gblɔ esi: Mese wò gbedodoɖa, eye mekpɔ wò aɖatsiwo, kpɔ ɖa, mayɔ dɔ wò, eye le ŋkeke etɔ̃agbe la ayi Yehowa ƒe me.
Mada ƒe wuiatɔ̃ ɖe wò agbenɔŋkekewo dzi, eye maɖe mia kple du sia tso Asur-fia si me, eye makpɔ du sia ta le nye ŋuti kple nye dɔla Dawid ta.
Eye Yesaya gblɔ bena: Mitso gbotsetsebolo vɛ! Eye wotsɔe va do ƒoƒoeawo dzi, tete wòhaya.
Eye Xizkiya gblɔ na Yesaya bena: Nuka nye dzesi be, Yehowa ahayam, eye mayi Yehowa ƒe aƒe la me le ŋkeke etɔ̃agbe?
Yesaya ɖo ŋu be: Esia nye dzesi tso Yehowa gbɔ be, Yehowa le nusi wògblɔ la wɔ ge. Ɖe vɔvɔli la nayi ŋgɔ ɖoƒe ewo loo, alo negbugbɔ ɖe megbe ɖoƒe ewoa?
Xizkiya gblɔ bena: Mesesẽ be, vɔvɔli nayi ŋgɔ ɖoƒe ewo o, ke boŋ vɔvɔli la negbugbɔ ɖe megbe ɖoƒe ewo.
Tete nyagblɔɖila Yesaya yɔ Yehowa, eye wòna vɔvɔli, si yi ŋgɔ la, gbugbɔ yi ɖoƒe la dzi; egbugbɔ ɖe megbe le Axaz ƒe ɣega la dzi ɖoƒe ewo.
Ɣemaɣi Babel-fia Berodax-Baladan, Baladan vi, ɖo agbalẽ kple nunanawo ɖe Xizkiya, elabena ese be, Xizkiya lé dɔ.

Eye Xizkiya ɖo to wo, eye wòfia eƒe kesinɔnuxɔwo katã, klosalo kple sika, atike ʋeʋẽe kple ami xɔasi kple aʋawɔnuxɔ kpakple nusiwo katã le eƒe kesinɔnuwo me la wo, naneke meli, si Xizkiya metsɔ fia wo le eƒe aƒe kple eƒe fiaɖuƒe blibo la me o.
Tete nyagblɔɖila Yesaya va fia Xizkiya gbɔ gblɔ ne bena: Nya ka ŋutsu siawo gblɔ, eye afika wotso va gbɔwò? Xizkiya ɖo ŋu bena: Wotso kekeke Babel ke.
Eye wògblɔ be: Nuka wokpɔ le aƒewò me? Xizkiya ɖo ŋu be: Wokpɔ nusiwo katã le aƒenye me la, naneke mele nye ke sinɔnuwo me, si nyemetsɔ fia wo o.
Tete Yesaya gblɔ na Xizkiya bena: Se Yehowa ƒe gbe!
Kpɔ ɖa, ŋkekewo gbɔna, esime wòala nusiwo katã le aƒewò me kple nusiwo fofowòwo tu ɖo vaseɖe egbe la, ayi Babel, naneke makpɔtɔ o; Yehowa gblɔe!
Eye woakplɔ viwòŋutsu, siwo dzɔ tso mewò, amesiwo nèdzi la, dometɔa ɖewo woaɖanye aƒemenu dzikpɔlawo le Babel-fia ƒe me.
Xizkiya ɖo ŋu na Yesaya bena: Yehowa ƒe gbe, si nègblɔ la, enyo. Eye wògagblɔ tomefafa kple nuteƒewɔwɔ nya le nye ŋkekewo me ko evɔ.
Xizkiya ŋutinya susɔea kple eƒe kalẽwɔwɔwo katã, alesi wòɖe ta kple tɔʋui, eye wòhe tsi va dua mee la, woŋlɔ wo ɖe Yuda-fiawo ƒe ŋutinyagbalẽ me.
Eye Xizkiya mlɔ fofoawo gbɔ, eye via Manase zu fia ɖe eteƒe.
Manase xɔ ƒe wuieve, esime wòzu fia, eye woɖu fia le Yerusalem ƒe blaatɔ̃ vɔ atɔ̃. Dadaa ŋkɔ nye Xefziba.
Eye wòwɔ nusi nye vɔ̃ le Yehowa ŋku me, le dukɔ, siwo Yehowa nyã le Israel-viwo ŋgɔ la ƒe ŋunyɔnuwo nu.
Egagbugbɔ nuxeƒe, siwo fofoa Xizkiya gbã la tu, eɖi vɔsamlekpuiwo na Baal, eye wòwɔ Asera, abe alesi Israel-fia Axab wɔ ene, eye wòde ta agu na dziƒonuwo katã hesubɔ wo.
Eɖi vɔsamlekpuiwo ɖe Yehowa ƒe aƒe, si ŋu Yehowa gblɔ le be, yeatsɔ yeƒe ŋkɔ aɖo Yerusalem la me.
Eye wòɖi vɔsamlekpuiwo na dziƒonuwo katã ɖe Yehowa ƒe aƒe la ƒe xɔxɔnuwo kple eve.
Ena viawo to dzo me, eye wosa dzo, eka afã, eye wòɖo ŋɔliyɔlawo kple akunyawɔlawo, eye wòwɔ nu vɔ̃ɖi geɖe le Yehowa ŋku me, ne wòatsɔ do dziku nɛ.
Eye wòtsɔ Asera ƒe legba, si wòwɔ la, ɖo aƒe la me, aƒe, si ŋu Yehowa gblɔ le na Dawid kple via Salomo be: Matsɔ nye ŋkɔ aɖo aƒe sia me kple Yerusalem, si metia le Israel-toawo katã me la tegbee.
Eye nyemena Israel ƒe afɔ nage le anyigba, si metsɔ na wo fofowo la dzi o, nenye be, wòlé se, siwo katã mede na wo kple se, siwo katã nye dɔla Mose de na wo la me ɖe asi, eye wowɔ wo dzi ko
Ke womeɖo to o, eye Manase ble wo wowɔ nu vɔ̃ɖi wu dukɔ, siwo Yehowa tsrɔ̃ ɖa le Israel-viwo ŋgɔ
Eye Yehowa ƒo nu to eƒe dɔla, nyagblɔɖilawo dzi gblɔ bena:
Esi Yuda-fia Manase wɔ ŋunyɔnu sia, eye wòwɔ nu gbegblẽ wu nusiwo katã Amoritɔwo wɔ le eŋgɔ, eye wòtsɔ eƒe legbawo ble Yuda hã de nuvɔ̃ me la,
eyata ale Yehowa, Israel ƒe Mawu la, gblɔ esi: Kpɔ ɖa, mahe dzɔgbevɔ̃e ava Yerusalem kple Yuda dzi, ale be amesiwo katã asee la, ƒe towo kple eve me laɖi yeŋ.
Matsi Samaria ƒe ka kple Axab ƒe aƒe la ƒe kpe ɖe Yerusalem dzi, eye matutu Yerusalem, abe alesi wotutua agba me tsɔna tsyɔ anyi ene.
Mate nye domenyinu ƒe susɔea ɖa, eye matsɔ wo ade asi na woƒe futɔwo woanye aboyonu kple nuxaxa na woƒe futɔwo katã.
Elabena wowɔ nusi nye vɔ̃ le ŋkunye me, eye wodo dziku nam tso gbesigbe wo fofowo ʋu tso Egipte vaseɖe egbe.
Manase kɔ ʋu maɖifɔ geɖe ŋutɔ hã ɖi, vaseɖe esime wona Yerusalem yɔ tso go ɖeka me vaseɖe go keme me hekpe ɖe eƒe nuvɔ̃, siwo wotsɔ ble Yuda wòwɔ nusi nye vɔ̃ le Yehowa ŋku me la ŋuti.
Manase ŋutinya susɔea kple nusiwo katã wòwɔ kpakple eƒe nuvɔ̃, siwo wòwɔ la, woŋlɔ wo ɖe Yuda-fiawo ƒe ŋutinyagbalẽ me.
Eye Manase mia fofoawo gbɔ, eye woɖii ɖe eƒe aƒe ƒe abɔ, si nye Uza ƒe abɔ la me, eye via Amon zu fia ɖe eteƒe.
Amon xa ƒe blave vɔ eve, esime wòzu fia, eye woɖu fia ƒe eve le Yerusalem. Dadaa ŋkunye Mesulemet, Xaruz ƒe vinyɔnu tso Yotba.
Eye wòwɔ nusi nye vɔ̃ le Yehowa ŋku me, abe alesi fofoa Manase wo ene.
Eto mɔ, si fofoa to la pɛpɛpɛ, eye wòsubɔ legba, siwo fofoa subɔ hede ta agu na wo.
Egblẽ Yehowa, fofoawo ƒe Mawu la ɖi, eye meto Yehowa ƒe mɔwo o.
Eye Amon ƒe dɔlawo ɖo nugbe ɖe eŋu, eye wowu fia la le eƒe xɔ me.
Tete dukɔ hahoo la wu amesiwo katã ɖo nugbe ɖe fia Amon ŋu la, eye dukɔ hahoo la tso via Yosiya ɖo fia ɖe eteƒe.
Amon ŋutinya susɔea kple nusiwo wòwɔ la, woŋlɔ wo ɖe Yuda-fiawo ƒe ŋutinyagbalẽ me.
Eye woɖii ɖe eƒe yɔdo me ɖe Uza abɔ me, eye via Yosiya zu fia ɖe eteƒe.
Yosiya xɔ ƒe enyi, esime wòzu fia, eye woɖu fia le Yerusalem ƒe blaetɔ̃ vɔ ɖeke. Dadaa ŋkɔ nye Yedida, Adaya ƒe vinyɔnu tso Bozkat.
Ewo nusi nyo le Yehowa ŋku me, eye wòto fofoa Dawid ƒe ʋe me pɛpɛpɛ, eye medze ɖe ɖusi alo mia me o.
Eye wòva me le fia Yosiya ƒe ƒe wuienyilia me be, fia la ɖo Mesulam vi Azalya ƒe vi Safan, amesi nye agbalẽŋlɔla, ɖo ɖe Yehowa ƒe aƒe la me gblɔ bena:
Yi nunɔlagã Xilkiya gbɔ, ne wòaxlẽ ga, siwo katã wotsɔ va Yehowa ƒe aƒe la me, siwo kpuinudzɔlawo dzɔ le dukɔ la si la.
Eye woatsɔ wo na dɔnunɔla, siwo wotsɔ ɖo Yehowa ƒe aƒe la nu, eye woatsɔ wo na Yehowa ƒe aƒe la ŋu dɔwɔlawo, ne woaɖɔ xɔ la ƒe gbagbãƒewo ɖo.
Woatsɔ wo na atikpalawo, xɔtulawo kple gliɖolawo, ne woaƒle atiwo kple kpe fufuwo aɖo xɔ la ɖo.
Ke womebu akɔnta kpli wo le ga, si wotsɔ de wo si la ŋuti o, elabena wowɔe le anukware me.
Tete nunɔlagã Xilkiya gblɔ na agbalẽŋlɔla Safan bena: Mefɔ segbalẽa ɖe le Yehowa ƒe aƒe lãme. Eye Xilkiya tsa agbalẽ la na Safan wòxlẽ.
Eye agbalẽŋlɔla Safan va fia la gbɔ, eye wòhe gbe vɛ na fia la gblɔ bena: Wò dɔlawo trɔ ga, si le aƒe la me, eye wotsɔe de asi na dɔnunɔla, siwo wotsɔ ɖo Yehowa ƒe aƒe la nu.
Eye agbalẽŋlɔla Safan to na fia la bena: Nunɔla Xilkiya tso agbalẽa ɖe nam; eye Safan xlẽe na fia la.
Esime fia la se segbalẽa me nyawo la, edze eƒe awuwo.
Eye fia la de se na nunɔla Xilkiya kple Safan vi Axikam, Mixaya vi Axbor kple agbalẽŋlɔla Safan kpakple ha ƒe subɔla Asaya gblɔ bena:

Miyi ɖabia nu Yehowa ɖe tanye kple ɖe dukɔ la kpakple Yuda blibo la ta le agbalẽ, si wòfɔ lãme nyawo ŋuti; elabena Yehowa ƒe dɔmedzoe, si wòdo de mía ŋuti la, nu sẽ, elabena mia fofowo meɖo to agbalẽ sia me nyawo, ne woawɔ nusiwo katã woŋlɔ ɖe eme la dzi o.

Tete nunɔla Xilkiya, Axikam, Axbor kple Safan kpakple Asaya woyi nyɔnu nyagblɔɖila Xulda, amesi nye Xarxas vi Tikwa ƒe vi Salum, amesi nye awu dzikpɔla srɔ̃, eye wònɔ Yerusalem-du la ƒe to evelia la gbɔ, eye woƒo nu kplii.
Eɖo ŋu na wo bena: Ale Yehowa, Israel ƒe Mawu la, gblɔ esi: Miɖagblɔ na ŋutsu, si dɔ mi ɖe gbɔnye la bena:
Yehowa ƒe gbe enye si; Kpɔ ɖa, mane dzɔgbevɔ̃e ava teƒe sia kple eme nɔlawo dzi le agbalẽ sia me nya, siwo katã Yuda-fia xlẽ la nu.
Eye wogblẽm ɖi, eye wodo dzudzɔ na mawu bubuwo, ne woatsɔ woƒe asinudɔwɔwɔwo katã ado dziku nam la, eyata nye dɔmedzoe abi ɖe teƒe sia ŋu, eye matsi o.
Eye migblɔ na Yuda-fia, si dɔ mi da, be miaɖabia nu Yehowa la bena: Ale Yehowa, Israel ƒe Mawu la, gblɔ esi: Esi nèse nya siawo,

eye dzika tso ƒowò, eye nèbɔbɔ ɖokuiwò ɖe anyi le Yehowa ŋku me, le esi nèse nya, si megblɔ ɖe teƒe sia kple eme nɔlawo ŋu be, azu aƒedo kple ɖiŋudodo, eye nedze wò awuwo hefa avi le ŋkunye me la, nye hã mesee; Yehowa gblɔe!
Eyata mana nayi fofowòwo gbɔ, eye woaɖi wò ɖe wò yɔdo me le ŋutifafa me, eye wò ŋkuwo makpɔ dzɔgbevɔ̃e, siwo katã mahe ava teƒe sia dzi la o. Eye wohe gbea vɛ na fia la.
Tete fia la dɔ be, woaɖaƒo Yuda kple Yerusalem-ame tsitsiwo katã nu ƒu va egbɔe.

Eye fia la yi Yehowa ƒe aƒe la me, eye Yuda-ŋutsuwo katã kple Yerusalemtɔwo katã, nunɔlawo kple nyagblɔɖilawo kpakple dukɔ blibo la, ɖeviwo kple tsitsiawo siaa kpe ɖe eŋu, eye wòxlẽ nubabla ƒe agbalẽ, si wofɔ le Yehowa ƒe me la me nyawo katã ɖe woƒe towo me.

Eye fia la tsi tre ɖe enɔƒe hebla nu le Yehowa ŋku me, be yeadze Yehowa yome, eye yealé eƒe sewo, ɖaseɖiɖiwo kple ɖoɖowo me ɖe asi tso dzi blibo kpakple luʋɔ blibo me, eye yeawɔ nubabla sia ƒe nya, siwo katã woŋlɔ ɖe agbalẽ sia me la dzi; eye dukɔ blibo la bia nu.

Tete fia la de se na nunɔlagã Xilkiya kple nunɔlagã yometɔwo kpakple kpuinudzɔlawo, be woafɔ nusiwo katã wowɔ na Baal kple Asera kpakple dziƒonuwo katã la, ado goe le Yehowa ƒe xɔ la me; eye woɖatɔ dzo wo ɖe Yerusalem godo le Kidron-bali la me, eye wolɔ woƒe afi yi Betel.

Eɖe legba nunɔla, siwo Yuda-fiawo ɖo, be woasa vɔ le nuxeƒewo le Yuda-duwo kple Yerusalem-nutowo me la ɖa, hekpe ɖe amesiwo doa dzudzɔ na Baal kple ɣe, ɣleti kple ɣletiviwo kpakple dziƒonuwo katã la ŋuti.
Eye wòɖe Asera do goe tso Yehowa ƒe aƒe la me tsɔ yi Kidron-tɔʋu la nu le Yerusalem godo; etɔ dzoe le Kidron-tɔʋu la nu, eye wòtui memee helɔ wu de ame tsɛwo ƒe yɔdowo dzi.
Egbã matrewɔlawo ƒe xɔ, siwo le Yehowa ƒe aƒe la me, afisi nyɔnuwo nɔa agbadɔvɔ lɔ̃m na Asera le la.

Ena nunɔlawo katã tso Yuda-duwo me va, eye wòdo gu nuxeƒe, siwo nunɔlawo doa dzudzɔ le tso Geba vaseɖe Beer-Seba; eye wògbã agbowo nu nuxeƒe, siwo le dumegã Yosua ƒe agbo nu le dugbo la ƒe mia me gome.
Ke nuxeƒe nunɔlawo mekpɔ mɔ ade Yehowa ƒe vɔsamlekpui la dzi le Yerusalem o, ke boŋ woaɖu nu maʋamaʋã kple wo nɔviwo.
Edo gu ŋunyɔƒe, si le Ben-Hinom-bali la me, be amea ɖeke magana viaŋutsu kple vianyɔnu nato dzo me na Molex o.
Eye wòde sɔ, siwo Yuda-fiawo do na ɣe la ɖa le Yehowa ƒe aƒe la me yi aƒemenu dzikpɔla Netan-Melex ƒe xɔ, si le dua godo la me; ke etɔ dzo ɣe ƒe tasiaɖamwo.

Eye fia la gbã vɔsamlekpui, siwo le Axaz ƒe xɔta, siwo Yuda-fiawo ɖi, kple vɔsamlekpui, siwo Manase ɖi ɖe Yehowa ƒe aƒe ƒe xɔxɔnuwo kple eve la, eye wòɖe wo ɖa tso afima hetsɔ woƒe anyi ɖakɔ ɖe Kidron-tɔʋu la me.
Eye fia la do gu nuxeƒe, siwo le Yerusalem ƒe ɣedzeƒe le Amito la ƒe ɖusi gome, siwo Israel-fia Salomo tu na Zidontɔwo ƒe ŋunyɔnu Astartewo kple Moabitɔwo ƒe ŋunyɔnu Milkom.
Egbã aƒeliwo, eye wòmũ Aserawo helɔ ame ƒuwo kɔ de wo teƒe.
Egbã vɔsamlekpui, si le Betel hã, eya nye nuxeƒe, si Yerobeam, Nebat vi, amesi ble Israel de nuvɔ̃ me la ɖi; egbã vɔsamlekpui sia hã, eye wòtɔ dzo nuxeƒe la hetui memie, eye wòtɔ dzo Asera la.

Eye Yosiya tsa ŋku, eye wòkpɔ yɔdo, siwo le toa dzi afima; tete wòdɔ woɖalɔ ƒuwo le yɔdoawo me ve, eye woto dzo wo le vɔsamlekpui la dzi hedo gui le Yehowa ƒe nya, si Mawu amesi va gblɔ nya siawo, ɖe gbe ƒãe la nu
Eye wògblɔ be:, Ŋkuɖodzinu ka enye kem kpɔm mele? Duametɔwo ɖo ŋu nɛ bena: Mawu ƒe amesi tso Yuda va ɖe gbe ƒã nusiwo newɔ ɖe vɔsamlekpuia ŋu le Betel la ƒe yɔdoe.
Tete wògblɔ be Miɖe asi le eŋu, eye amea ɖeke megaka asi eƒe ƒuwo ŋu o! Ale womeka asi eya kple nyagblɔɖila, si tso Samaria la ƒe ƒuwo ŋu o.
Eye Yosiya ɖe nuxeƒexɔ, siwo katã le Samaria-duwo me, siwo Israel-fiawo tu tsɔ do dziku na Yehowa la ɖa, eye wòwɔ wo, abe alesi wòwɔ le Betel pɛpɛpɛ ene.
Eye wowu nuxeƒe nunɔla, siwo katã le afima la ɖe vɔsamlekpuiwo dzi, eye wòlɔ dzo ameƒuwo le wo dzi; emegbe wògbugbɔ yi Yerusalem.
Eye ba la de se na dukɔ blibo lã bena: Miɖu ŋutitotoŋkekenyuie la na Yehowa mia Mawu la, abe alesi woŋlɔ ɖe nubabla ƒe agbalẽ sia me ene.
Elabena womeɖu ŋutitotoŋkekenyuie sia le ʋɔnudrɔ̃la, siwo drɔ̃ ʋɔnu Israel la ŋɔli kple Israel-fiawo kpakple Yuda-fiawo katã ŋɔli kpɔ o,
negbe le fia Yosiya ƒe ƒe wuienyilia me ko woɖu ŋutitotoŋkekenyuie sia na Yehowa le Yerusalem.

Eye Yosiya ɖe ŋɔliyɔlawo kple akunyawɔlawo, aklama kpakpɛwo kple legbawo kpakple ŋunyɔnuwo, siwo katã wòkpɔ le Yuda-nyigba dzi kple Yerusalem la hã ɖa, ne wòawɔ se la ƒe nya, siwo woŋlɔ ɖe agbalẽ, si nunɔla Xilkiya fɔ le Yehowa ƒe aƒe me la dzi.
Fiaa ɖeke menɔ eŋgɔ de enu, amesi trɔ ɖe Yehowa ŋu kple eƒe dzi blibo kple eƒe luʋɔ blibo kpakple eƒe ŋusẽ blibo le Mose ƒe seawo katã nu o; eye etɔgbea ɖeke hã menɔ eyome o.
Ke Yehowa meɖe asi le eƒe dɔmedzoe gã, si wòdo ɖe Yuda ŋu la ŋuti o, le dziku, siwo katã Manase do nɛ la ta.
Eye Yehowa gblɔ be: Maɖe Yuda hã ɖa le nye ŋku ta, abe alesi meɖe Israel ɖa ene; eye mate Yerusalem-du sia, si metia, kple xɔ, si ŋu megblɔ le be, nye ŋkɔ anɔ afima la ɖa.
Yosiya ŋutinya susɔea kple nusiwo katã wòwɔ la, woŋlɔ wo ɖe Yuda-fiawo ƒe ŋutinyagbalẽ me.
Eŋɔli Egipte-fia Farao Nexo ho ɖe Asur-fia ŋu le Frat-tɔsisi la nu, eye ba Yosiya ho ɖakpee; ke esime wòkpɔe la, ewui le Megido.
Esime woku la, eƒe dɔlawo tsɔe tso Megido va Yerusalem, eye woɖii ɖe eƒe yɔdo me. Eye dukɔ hahoo la si ami na via Yoaxaz heɖo fia ɖe fofoa teƒe.
Yoaxaz xɔ ƒe blave vɔ etɔ, esime wòzu fia, eye woɖu fia dzinu elɔ̃ le Yerusalem. Dadaa ŋkɔ nye Xamutal, Yeremya ƒe vinyɔnu, tso Libna.
Ewɔ nusi nye vɔ̃ le Yehowa ŋku me, abe alesi fofoawo wɔ pɛpɛpɛ ene.
Eye Farao Nexo dee gaxɔ ɖe Ribla le Xamat-nyigba dzi, be maganye fia le Yerusalem o; eye wòtsɔ klosalo talento alafa ɖeka kple sika talento ɖeka he to na dukɔ la.
Eye Farao Nexo tsɔ Elyakim, Yosiya vi, ɖo fia ɖe fofoa Yosiya teƒe hetrɔ ŋkɔ nɛ be Yoyakim; ke èkplɔ Yoaxaz yi Egipte, afisi woku ɖo.

Eye Yoyakim tsɔ klosalo kple sika na Farao; ke ɖe wòbia fe na dukɔ la, be wòakpɔ ga ana, abe alesi Farao de se ene. Exɔ klosalo kple sika le dukɔ hahoo la si, abe alesi wòbia fe na wo dome amesiame ene, ne wòatsɔ na Farao Nexo.
Yoyakim xɔ ƒe blave vɔ alɔ, esime wòzu fia, eye wòɖu fia ƒe wuiɖekɛ le Yerusalem. Dadaa ŋkɔ nye Zebuda, Pedaya vinyɔnu, tso Ruma.
Ewɔ nusi nye vɔ le Yehowa ŋku me, abe alesi fofoawo wɔ pɛpɛpɛ ene.
Eŋɔli Babel-fia Nebukadnezar ho va, eye Yoyakim zu etevi ƒe etɔ̃; tete wòdze aglã de eŋu.

Eye Yehowa kplɔ Kaldeatɔwo ƒe adzohawo, Moabitɔwo ƒe adzohawo kple Amon-viwo ƒe adzohawo dee; èkplɔ wo de Yuda, ne woatsrɔ̃e, le Yehowa ƒe nya, si wògblɔ to eƒe dɔla, siwo nye nyagblɔɖilawo dzi la nu.
Le Yehowa ƒe nya la nu ko esia va Yuda dzi ɖo, ne wòatee ɖa le eƒe ŋku ta le Manase ƒe nuvɔ̃wo kple nusiwo katã wòwɔ la ŋuti;
hekpe ɖe ʋu maɖifɔ, si wòkɔ ɖe anyi, eye wotsɔ ʋu maɖifɔ yɔ Yerusalem taŋ la ŋuti; eyata Yehowa meba, yeatsɔe ake o.
Yoyakim ŋutinya susɔea kple nusiwo katã wòwɔ la, woŋlɔ wo ɖe Yuda-fiawo ƒe ŋutinyagbalẽ me.
Eye Yoyakim mlɔ fofoawo gbɔ, eye via Yoyaxin zu fia ɖe eteƒe.
Ke Egipte-fia megaho tso eƒe anyigba dzi azɔ o, elabena Babel-fia xɔ anyigba, siwo katã nye Egipte-fia tɔ tso Egipte-toʋu la nu vaseɖe Frat-tɔsisi la nu.
Yoyaxin xɔ ƒe wuienyi, esime wòzu fia, eye woɖu fia dzinu etɔ̃ le Yerusalem. Dadaa ŋkɔ nye Nexusta, Elnatan ƒe vinyɔnu, tso Yerusalem.
Ewo nusi nye vɔ̃ le Yehowa ŋku me, abe alesi fofoa wɔ pɛpɛpɛ ene.
Ɣemaɣi Babel-fia Nebukadnezar ƒe dɔlawo ho ɖe Yerusalem ŋu, eye woɖe to ɖe du la.
Eye esime eƒe dɔlawo ɖe to ɖee la, Babel-fia Nebukadnezar va dze du la dzi.
Tete Yuda-fia Yoyaxin do yi Babel-fia gbɔ, eya kple dadaa kple eƒe dɔlawo, eƒe amegãwo kple eƒe aƒemenu dzikpɔlawo, eye Babel-fia ɖe aboyoe le eƒe fiaɖuɖu ƒe ƒe enyilia me.
Eye wòlɔ Yehowa ƒe me kesinɔnuwo katã kple fia ƒe me kesinɔnuwo katã tso afima, eye wògbã sikanu, siwo katã Israel-fia Salomo wɔ ɖe Yehowa ƒe xɔ la me, abe alesi Yehowa gblɔ ene.
Eɖe aboyo Yerusalem blibo la kple amegãwo katã kpakple aʋawɔlawo katã, atikpalawo katã kple nutulawo. Aboyomeawo le ame akpe ewo, amea ɖeke mekpɔtɔ o, negbe dukɔ hahoo la ƒe ame dahewo ko.
Èkplɔ Yoyaxin yi Babel, eye wòkplɔ fia dada, fia srɔ̃wo kple eƒe aƒemenu dzikpɔlawo kpakple anyigba dzi bubumewo tso Yerusalem yi aboyo me le Babel.
Ŋutsu aʋawɔlawo katã le ame akpe adre, eye atikpalawo kple nutulawo le ame akpe ɖeka; wo katã nye aʋawɔla veviwo, eye Babel-fia ɖe aboyo wo yi Babel.
Eye Babel-fia tsɔ etɔɖia Matanya ɖo fia ɖe eteƒe hetrɔ ŋkɔ nɛ bena Zedekiya.
Zedekiya xɔ ƒe blave vɔ ɖeka, esime wòzu fia, eye woɖu fia ƒe wuiɖekɛ le Yerusalem. Dadaa ŋkɔ nye Xamutal, Yeremya ƒe vinyɔnu, tso Libna.
Eye wòwɔ nusi nye vɔ le Yehowa ŋku me, abe alesi Yoyakim wɔ pɛpɛpɛ ene.
Elabena le Yehowa ƒe dɔmedzoe la ta wòva me na Yerusalem kple Yuda alea, vaseɖe esime wòte wo da le eƒe ŋku la. Eye Zedekiya dze aglã ɖe Babel-fia ŋu.

Eye wòva me le eƒe fiaɖuɖu ƒe ƒe asiekelia me, le dzinu ewolia ƒe ŋkeke ewolia dzi be, Babel-fia Nebukadnezar kple eƒe aʋakɔ blibo la ho ɖe Yerusalem ŋu, woɖe to ɖee, eye woƒu kpo ɖe eŋu godoo va kpe.
Eye woɖe to ɖe du la vaseɖe fia Zedekiya ƒe ƒe wuiɖekɛlia me.
Le dzinu enelia ƒe ŋkeke asiekelia dzi, esime dɔwuame nu sẽ le dua me, eye aboloa ɖeke meli na dukɔ hahoo la o la,
woɖe mɔ ɖe du la ŋu, eye aʋawɔlawo katã si le zã me to fia ƒe abɔ ƒe agbo, si le gli eve dome la ƒe mɔ dzi, esime Kaldeatɔwo ƒo xlã dua, eye woto tagbamɔ.
Ke Kaldeatɔwo ƒe aʋakɔ ti fia la yome va tui le Yerixo-tagba, eye eƒe aʋakɔ blibo la ka le eŋu.
Eye wòlé fia la hekplɔe va Babel-fia gbɔ le Ribla, eye wodrɔ̃ ʋɔnui.
Wowu Zedekiya viwo le eŋku me, eye wogbã ŋku na Zedekiya hede gãe kplɔ yi Babel.
Le dzinu atɔ̃lia ƒe ŋkeke adrelia dzi, si nye fia Nebukadnezar Babel-fia ƒe ƒe wuiasiekelia me la, Nebuzaradan, fia ŋu asrafowo ƒe amegã, si nye Babel-fia ƒe dɔla la, va Yerusalem,
eye wòtɔ dzo Yehowa ƒe aƒe kple fia ƒe aƒe kple Yerusalem-xɔwo katã kpakple bubumewo ƒe xɔwo katã.
Kaldeatɔwo ƒe aʋakɔ, si le fia ŋu asrafowo ƒe amegã ŋu la, gbã Yerusalem-gliwo katã hã va kpe.
Eye Nebuzaradan, fia ŋu asrafowo ƒe amegã, ɖe aboyo dukɔ la ƒe susɔea, si kpɔtɔ ɖe dua me kple amesiwo si yi Babel-fia gbɔ kpakple ameha la ƒe susɔea.
Ke fia ŋu asrafowo ƒe amegã la gblẽ anyigba dzi ame dahewo ɖi, ne woanye weingbledelawo kple agbledelawo.
Eye Kaldeatɔwo gbã akɔblisɔti, siwo le Yehowa ƒe aƒe la me kple anyinɔawo kpakple akɔbligazɔ, si le Yehowa ƒe aƒe la me, eye wolɔ akɔbliawo yi Babel.
Wotsɔ zeawo, sofiawo, hɛawo kple treawo kpakple akɔblinuawo katã, siwo ŋu dɔ wòwɔna la, hã dzoe.
Eye fia ŋu asrafowo ƒe amegã la tsɔ sonuawo kple ʋutreawo, sikatɔwo kple klosalotɔwo siaa dzoe,
sɔti eve kple gazɔ ɖeka kpakple anyinɔawo, siwo fia Salomo wɔ bena Yehowa ƒe aƒe la; nusiawo katã ƒe akɔbli mele dada me o.

Sɔti ɖeka kɔ abɔklugui wuienyi, eye wotsɔ akɔbli wɔ ta do eta me; ta la ƒe kɔkɔme le abɔklugui etɔ̃, wowɔ gaɖɔ kple yevuboɖawo ɖe ta la ŋu godoo va kpe, wo katã nye akɔbli; alea wowɔe ɖe sɔti evelia ƒe ta hã ŋui.
Eye fia ŋu asrafowo ƒe amegã lé nunɔlagã Seraya kple nunɔlagã yometɔ Zefanya kpakple kpuinudzɔla etɔ̃;

eye le dua me la elé aƒemenu dzikpɔla ɖeka, amesi le aʋawɔlawo nu, kple ŋutsu, siwo tsia tre ɖe fia la ŋku me dome ame atɔ̃ siwo wokpɔ le dua me kple aʋafia ƒe agbalẽŋlɔla, amesi da dukɔ hahoo la dea aʋakɔ me kpakple dukɔ hahoo la dome ŋutsu, blaade, siwo wokpɔ le dua me.
Eye Nebuzaradan, fia ŋu asrafowo ƒe amegã la, le wo hekplɔ wo, ve na Babel-fia le Ribla.
Eye Babel-fia wu wo le Ribla le Xamat-nyigba dzi. Ale woɖe aboyo Yuda tso eƒe anyigba dzi enye si.
Eye Babel-fia Nebukadnezar tso Gedalya, Safan vi Axikam ƒe vi, ɖo dukɔ, si wogblẽ de Yuda-nyigba dzi la dzikpɔlae.

Esi aʋakɔ la ƒe amegãwo katã kple woƒe amewo se be, Babel-fia tso Gedalya do dzikpɔlae la, wova Gedalya gbɔ le Mizpa; eye Ismael, Netanya vi, Yoxanan, Kareax vi, kple Seraya, Tanxumet vi, tso Netofat kpakple Yaazanya, Maaxati vi, kple woƒe amewo hã le eme.
Tete Gedalya ka atam na woawo kple woƒe amewo gblɔ na wo bena: Migavɔ̃ Kaldeatɔwo ƒe dɔlawo o! Mina anyigba la dzi, eye misubɔ Babel-fia, ekema anyo na mi.
Eye wòva me le dzinu adrelia me be, Ismael, Elisama vi Netanya ƒe vi, amesi tso fiaƒome la me kple ŋutsu ewo, siwo kpe de eŋu la, wova wu Gedalya kple Yudatɔ kpakple Kaldeatɔ, siwo le eŋu le Mizpa.
Eye dukɔ blibo la, ɖeviwo kple tsitsiawo siaa, kple aʋakɔ la ƒe amegãwo dzo yi Egipte, elabena wole Kaldeatɔwo vɔ̃m.
Esime wode aboyo Yuda-fia Yoyaxin ƒe blaetɔ̃ vɔ adre megbe, le dzinu wuievelia ƒe ŋkeke blave vo adrelia dzi la, Babel-fia. Ewil Merodax de Yuda-fia Yoyaxin tso gaxɔ me le ƒe, si me wòzu fia.
Eƒo nu kplii fafɛ, eye wòtsɔ eƒe zikpui ɖo fia, siwo le eŋu le Babel la ƒe zikpuiwo ŋgɔ.
Ena wodo li eƒe gaxɔ me awuwo, eye wòdu nu le egbɔ ɣesiaɣi le eƒe agbe me ŋkekewo katã me.
Eye wòxɔ eƒe gbesiagbe nuɖuɖu, si wòhiã gbesiagbe la, tso Babel-fia gbɔ le eƒe agbe me ŋkekewo katã me.
Adam, Set, Enos,
Kenan, Mahalaleel, Yered,
Henox, Metusala, Lamex,
Noa, Sem, Xam kple Yafet.
Yafet viwo nye: Gomer, Magog, Madai, Yawan, Tubal, Mesex kple Tiras.
Gomer viwo nye Askenaz, Rifat kple Togarma.
Yawan viwo nye: Elisa, Tarsisa, Kititɔwo kple Rodantɔwo.
Xam viwo nye: Kus, Mizrayim, Put kple Kanaan.
Kus viwo nye: Seba, Xawila, Sabta, Raama kple Sablexa. Eye Raama viwo nye Seba kple Dedan.
Kus dzi Nimrod; eya de asi kalẽwɔwɔ me le anyigba dzi.
Mizrayim dzi Luditɔwo, Anamitɔwo, Lehabitɔwo, Naftuxitɔwo,
Patrusitɔwo kple Kasluxitɔwo, amesiwo me Filistitɔwo dzɔ tso kpakple Kaftoritɔwo.
Kanaan dzi Zidon, amesi nye ŋgɔgbea kple Xet,
Yebusitɔwo, Amoritɔwo, Girgastiɔwo,
Xiwitɔwo, Arkitɔwo, Sinitɔwo,
Arwaditɔwo, Zemaritɔwo kple Xamatitɔwo.
Sem viwo nye: Elam, Asur, Arpaxsad, Lud, Aram, Uz, Xul, Geter kple Mesex.
Arpaxsad dzi Selax, eye Selax dzi Eber.
Wodzi ŋutsuvi eve na Eber; ɖeka ŋkɔ nye Peleg, le esi wòmã anyigba lé eŋɔli la, eye nɔvia ŋkɔ nye Yoktan.
Yoktan dzi Almodad, Sale, Xazarmawe, Yarax,
Xadoram, Uzal, Dikla,
Ebal, Abimael, Seba,
Ofir, Xawila kple Yobab; amesiawo katã nye Yoktan viwo.
Sem, Arpaxsad, Selax,
Eber, Peleg, Regu,
Serug, Naxor, Tarax,
Abram, eya nye Abraham.
Abraham viwo nye Isak kple Ismael.
Woƒe ƒome enye si: Ismael ƒe ŋgɔgbevi enye Nebayo, Kedar, Adbeel, Mibsam,
Misma, Duma, Masa, Xadad, Tema,
Yetur, Nafis kple Kedma; amesiawo nye Ismael viwo.
Abraham ƒe ahiã Ketura ƒe viwo nye esi: eya dzi Zimran, Yoksan, Medan, Midian, Yisbak kple Suax. Yoksan viwo nye: Seba kple Dedan.
Midian viwo nye: Eta, Efer, Xanox, Abida kple Eldaa. Amesiawo katã nye Ketura ƒe viwo.
Eye Abraham dzi Isak. Isak viwo nye: Esau kple Israel.
Esau viwo nye: Elifaz, Reguel, Yehus, Yaelam kple Korax.
Elifaz viwo nye: Teman, Omar, Zeti, Gaetam, Kenaz, Timna kple Amalek.
Reguel viwo nye: Naxat, Zerax, Sama kple Miza.
Seir viwo nye: Lotan, Sobal, Zibeon, Ana, Dison, Ezer kple Disan.
Lotan viwo nye: Xori kple Homam, eye Lotan nɔvinyɔnu nye Timna.
Sobal viwo nye: Alyan, Manaxat, Ebal, Sefi kple Onam. Zibeon viwo nye: Aya kple Ana.
Ana vi nye: Dison. Dison viwo nye: Xamran, Esban, Yitran kple Xeran.
Ezer viwo nye: Bilhan, Zaawan kple Yaakan. Disan viwo nye: Uz kple Aran.
Amesiwo ɖu fia le Edom-nyigba dzi, hafi fia va nɔ Israel nu la, wonye: Bela, Beor vi; eƒe du enye Dinhaba.
Esi Bela ku la, Yobab, Zerax vi tso Bozra, zu fia ɖe eteƒe.
Esi Yobab ku la, Xusam tso Temanitɔwo ƒe anyigba dzi zu fia ɖe eteƒe
Esi Xusam ku la, Hadad, Bedad vi, zu fia ɖe eteƒe; eya si Midiantɔwo le Moab-tagba; eƒe du enye Awit.
Esi Hadad ku la, Samla tso Masreka zu fia ɖe eteƒe.
Esi Samla ku la, Saul tso Rexobot le tɔsisi la nu zu fia ɖe eteƒe.
Esi Saul ku la, Baal-Xanan, Axbor vi, zu fia ɖe eteƒe.
Esi Baal-Xanan ku la, Hadad zu fia ɖe eteƒe; eƒe du enye Pagi, eye srɔ̃a Mehetabeel enye Matred, si nye Mesaxab ƒe vinyɔnu la ƒe vi.
Esi Hadad ku la, Edom-amegãwo nye: Amegã Timna, amegã Alwa, amegã Yetet,
amegã Oholibama, amegã Ela, amegã Pinon,
amegã Kenaz, amegã Teman, amegã Mibzar,
amegã Magdiel, amegã Iram. Amesia wo nye Edom-amegãwo.
Israel viwo nye si: Ruben, Simeon, Lewi kple Yuda, Isaxar kple Zebulon,
Dan, Yosef kple Benyamin, Naftali, Gad kple Aser.
Yuda viwo nye: Ger, Onan kple Sela; wo ame etɔ la Sua vinyɔnu, Kanaan-nyɔnu la, dzi nɛ. Ke esi Yuda ƒe ŋgɔgbevi Ger ƒe nu medze Yehowa ŋu o la, ewui.
Eye lɔ̃xoa Tamar dzi Perez kple Zerax nɛ. Yuda viwo katã le wo ame atɔ̃.
Perez viwo nye: Xezron kple Xamul.
Zerax viwo nye: Zimri, Etan, Heman, Xalkol kple Dara; wole ame atɔ̃.
Karmi vi nye: Axan, amesi he dzɔgbevɔ̃e va Israel dzi, le esi wòtsɔ busunuawo ƒe ɖe ta.
Etan vi nye: Azarya.
Xezron ƒe vi, siwo wodzi nɛ, wonye: Yeraxmeel, Ram kple Kelubai.
Ram dzi Aminadab, eye Aminadab dzi Naxeson, amesi nye Yuda-viwo ƒe amegã
Naxeson dzi Salma, Salma dzi Boas,
Boas dzi Obed, Obed dzi Isai.
Isai dzi Eliab, amesi nye eƒe ŋgɔgbea, evelia nye Abinadab, etɔ̃lia nye Simea,
enelia nye Netaneel, atɔ̃lia nye Radai,
