Ne ame dzɔdzɔewo le aseye tsom la, atsyɔ̃ɖoɖo teƒe mekɔna o; ke ne ame vɔ̃ɖiwo ƒe alɔ de dzi la, amewo kpɔkpɔ nyea dɔ.
Amesi tsɔ nu tsyɔ eƒe vodada dzi la, madze edzi nɛ o; ke amesi ʋu eme, eye wòdzudzɔe la, woave enu.
Woayra ŋutsu, si le vɔvɔ̃ dzi daa, ke amesi sẽ eƒe dzi me goŋgoŋ la, adze dzɔgbevɔ̃e me.
Ame vɔ̃ɖi si le dukɔ dahe dzi ɖum la, le abe dzata ɖegbe kple sisiblisi dɔwui ene.
Amegã, si ɖo ko le gɔmesese me la, ameteteɖeanyi bɔ ɖe esi; amesi lé fu amebaba la, anɔ agbe didie.
Amesi dzi hlɔ̃fe le, ne esi vaseɖe aʋli me ke hã, amea ɖeke megalée o!
Amesi fɔɖiɖi mele eƒe zɔzɔme ŋu o la, woakpe ɖe eŋu; ke amesi toa mɔ gɔglɔ̃ dzi la, adze anyi zi ɖeka
Amesi ɖe eƒe agble la, nuɖuɖu abɔ ɖe esi; ke amesi ti yakanuwo yome la, ahedada ado gã ɖe edzi.
Woayra nuteƒewɔla geɖe; ke amesi tsi klokloklo ɖe hokpɔkpɔ ŋu la, womagbe tohehe nɛ o.
Amedzidede menyo o, abolo kakɛ pɛ hã ana ame dada vo.
Ŋubiala le yɔyɔm ɖe kesinɔnu ŋu; ke menyae be, hiã le ye dzi va ge o.
Amesi ka mo na ame la, axɔ akpe emegbe wu amesi ɖe ami ɖe eƒe aɖe.
Amesi da adzo fofoa kple ɖaɖaa hegblɔ be: Menye nuvɔ̃a ɖeke o la! nugblẽlawo ƒe hati wònye.
Ŋubiala ɖɔa dzre, ke amesi ɖoa dzi ɖe Yehowa ŋu la, woaɖi ƒo nɛ taŋ.
Amesi ɖoa dzi ɖe eya ŋutɔ ƒe gɔmesese ŋu la, bometsilae; ke amesi zɔna le nunya me la, woaɖee.
Amesi naa nu ame dahe la, hiã matui akpɔ o, ke amesi trɔa mo ɖe aga la, woaɖo ɖiŋu geɖe nɛ.
Ne ame vɔ̃ɖiwo ƒe alɔ ɖe dzi la, amewo ɣlaa wo ɖokui; ke ne wotsrɔ̃ la, ame dzɔdzɔewo dzina ɖe dzi.
Amesi woka mo na zi geɖe, ke wòsẽ la me la, agbã zi ɖeka gudugudu, eye gbedada manɔ eŋu o. Ne ame dzɔdzɔewo dzi de dzi la, dukɔ kpɔa dzidzɔ; ke ne ame vɔ̃ɖi le fia ɖum la, dukɔ dua tse.
Amesi lɔ̃a nyateƒe la, doa dzidzɔ na fofoa, ke amesi doa ka kple gbolowo la, gblẽa kesinɔnuwo dome.
Dza dzɔenyenye fia tsɔna lia ke anyigba; ke adzɔxɔla gblẽnɛ.
Amesi vivia nu me na ehavi la, eɖoa ɖɔ na eƒe afɔ.
Mɔ̃tetre le vodada me na nu vɔ̃ɖi wɔlawo; ke ame dzɔdzɔe atso aseye, eye wòakpɔ dzidzɔ.
Ame dzɔdzɔe nyaa ame dahèwo ƒe nya me na wo, ke ame vɔ̃ɖi masea sidzedze gome o.
Fewuɖulawo ƒlɔa dzo ɖe ɖu ŋu, ke nunyala faa dɔmedzoe nu.
Ne bometsila kple nunyala woɖo nya me la, eɖoa dɔmedzoe nɔa nu kom, eye mekpɔa gbɔdzɔe o.
Hlɔ̃dola léa fu ame maɖifɔwo, eye wòdia nuteƒewɔlawo ƒe agbe yome.
Bometsila dudua eƒe dɔmedzoe katã kɔna ɖi; ke nunyala la enu emegbe.
Dziɖula, si ɖoa to alakpanya la, ame vɔ̃ɖiwo nye eƒe dɔlawo katã.
Ame dahe kple ameteɖeanyila wodoa go wo nɔewo; amesi nana woa kple eve la ƒe ŋku dzi kɔna la, enye Yehowa.
Fia, si drɔ̃a ʋɔnu na ame dahewo le nyateƒe me la, eƒe fiazikpui ali ka tegbee.
Ati kple mokaname dzea nunya ame, ke ɖevi tsibodome dea ŋukpe mo na dadaa.
Ne ame vɔ̃ɖiwo dzi ɖe dzi la, vodada dzina ɖe edzi; ke ame dzɔdzɔewo akpɔ woƒe anyidzedze ɖa.
He to na viwò, ekema ana gbɔɖeme wò, eye wòado vivi na wò luʋɔ.
Ne nyagblɔɖi meli o la, dukɔ tsia bodome; ke ne edzra sea ɖo la, woayrae.
Wometsɔa nya hea to na kluvi o, elabena esenɛ hafi gbea toɖoɖo.
Ele ŋutsu, si tsi klokloklo dzi le nuƒoƒo me la, kpɔma? Mɔkpɔkpɔ le bometsila ŋu wu eyama.
Ne amea ɖe wɔ vinugbee ne eƒe kluvi tso ɖevime ta, ava ɖu aƒetɔ emegbe.
Dɔmedzoetɔ dea dzre aƒe, eye dzikutɔ ɖaa vo geɖe.
Amegbetɔ ƒe dãda abɔbɔe ɖe anyi, ke amesi bɔbɔ eɖokui ɖe anyi la ƒe asi asu bubu dzi.
Amesi woa kple fiafitɔ womã nu, eye wòse ɖiŋudodo, gake metoe o la, ele fu eya ŋutɔ ƒe agbe.
Amegbetɔvɔvɔ̃ mɔ̃e wònye ɖea eme; ke amesi doa dzi de Yehowa ŋu la, woakpɔ eta.
Ame geɖewo wɔa nu, be woadze amegã ŋu; ke Yehowa gbɔe ame ƒe afiatsotso tsona.
Nu madzɔmadzɔ wɔla enye ŋunyɔ na ame dzɔdzɔewo, eye amesi ƒe zɔzɔme to mɔ ɖeka la, enye ŋunyɔ na ame vɔ̃ɖi.
Agur, Yake vi ƒe nyawo. Ŋutsu la ƒe gbe enye si. Meku kutri, Mawu, meku kutri, eye nunye yi.
Elabena medzɔ la wu amesiame, eye amegbetɔ ƒe gɔmesese mele asinye o,
eye nyemesrɔ̃ nunya, be madze si kɔkɔetɔ la o.
Ameka lia yi dziƒo gaɖi va anyi? Ameka lɔ ya ɖe asiʋlo me? Ameka bla tsi ɖe avɔ me? Ameka ɖo anyigba ƒe mlɔenuwo katã tsitrenu? Eŋkɔ ɖe, eye aleke woyɔna na via? Enyaea?
Mawu ƒe nuƒoƒowo katã me dza; akpoxɔnu wònye na amesiwo sii tso la.
Megatsɔ nyaa ɖeke kpe eƒe nyawo, ne wòade ga nu na wò, eye nanye aʋatsotɔ atsi anyi ɖi o.
Nu eve biam mele wò, megatem, hafi maka o.
Alakpa kple aʋatsokaka neƒo asa nam! Megana ahedada kple hotsuim o; na maɖu nye nusi nyee tɔnye,
ne nyemagaɖi ƒo akpa ahasẽ nu agblɔ bena: „Amekae nye Yehowa hã“ o; eye ne nyemagaɖo ko ayi fi fi ge ahaɖa aƒu ɖe nye Mawu ƒe ŋkɔ ŋu o.
Megali dɔla ŋu le eƒe aƒetɔ gbɔ, ne woado ɖiŋu na wò, eye fɔɖiɖi nanɔ dziwò o.
Dzidzime, si doa ɖiŋu na fofoa, eye meyraa dadaa o la,
nenema nye dzidzime, si buna be, yedza, gake mele eƒe ɖiƒoƒo kpɔm o;
nenema nye dzidzime, si ta ŋku kɔkɔ le, eye eƒe aɖahawo ɖe dzi;
nenema nye dzidzime, si ƒe aɖuwo nye yi, eye eƒe tsyowo nye hɛ, ne woaɖu hiãtɔwo ɖa le anyigba dzi kple ame dahewo ɖa le amegbetɔwo dome.
Nyɔnuvi eve le axɔ̃ si: Tsɔe vɛ, tsɔe vɛ! Nu etɔ̃e meɖia ƒo gbeɖe o, eye enelia megblɔna be, esɔ gbɔ o:
Tsiẽƒe, nyɔnu ƒe dɔ tsiko, kple anyigba, si tsi meɖia kɔ na o, kpakple dzo, si megblɔna be: esɔ gbɔ gbɔ o.
Ŋku, si ɖea alɔme le fofoa ŋu, eye mebua dada ɖe naneke me o la, akpaviãwo ahoe le to me le tɔʋu to, eye hɔ̃viwo aɖui.
Nu etɔ̃e nye nuku nam, eye enelia la nyemenya ta le enu o:
Hɔ̃ toƒe le dziƒo, ɖa toƒe le agakpe dzi, ʋu loƒe le atsiaƒu titina kpakple ŋutsu toƒe le nyɔnuvi ŋu.
Alea nye gbolɔ toƒe hã; eɖua nu tutua nu xalixali gblɔna be: Nyemewɔ nu baɖaa ɖeke o.
Nu etɔ̃e nana anyigba dzona kpekpekpe, eye enelia mele tsɔtsɔ me nɛ o.
Ne kluvi zu fia, ne nuɖuɖu bɔ ɖe bometsila si,
ne nyɔnu tsi tre heva ɖe srɔ̃ emegbe kple ne dɔlanyɔnu ɖo alɔgo eƒe aƒenɔ do ɖa.
Nu enee nye suetɔwo le anyigba dzi, ke wodze nunya eteƒe mekɔ o:
Anyidiwo menye dukɔ sesẽa ɖeke o hafi, gake wodia woƒe nuɖuɖu le dzomeŋɔli;
hotoklolowo menye dukɔ sẽŋua ɖeke o, gake wowɔa woƒe nɔƒe ɖe agakpewo me;
fiaa ɖeke mele ʋetsuviwo nu o, ke woƒe ha blibo la yina le ɖoɖo me,
woate ŋu alé xɔ ŋu nyatri kple asi, gake enaa fiasãwo me.
Nu etɔ̃e zɔa atsyɔ̃zɔli, eye enelia zɔa fiazɔli:
dzata, si nye kalẽtɔ le lãwo dome, eye metrɔa megbe dea naneke o,
aʋawɔsɔ kple gbɔ̃tsu kpakple fia, si nu womate ŋu anɔ te ɖo o.
Ne ètsi bome le ɖokuiɖoɖoɖedzi me la, ekema ɖo asi nu, nenye be, nèdze nunya.
Elabena, ne woƒo notsi le eye ami dona, ne wofiã ŋɔti sesie la, eye ʋu dona, eye ne wofiã dɔmedzoe sesie la, eye dzre dzɔna.
Fia Lemuel ƒe nyawo nye esi, nya, siwo dadaa ku ɖe to me nɛ:
Oo vinye, oo nye dɔmevi, oo nye adzɔgbeɖeɖe ƒe vi!
Megatsɔ wò ŋusẽ na nyɔnuwo o kple wò zɔzɔme na nyɔnu fiagblèlawo o!
Lemuel, menye fiawo ƒe dɔ o, wein nono menye fiawo ƒe dɔ o, eye aha muame menye amegãwo ƒe dɔ o!
Ne magano aha aŋlɔ se la be, eye wòatrɔ gbo nya na hiãtɔwo katã o!
Ke boŋ mitsɔ aha muame na amesiwo do tsɔtsrɔ̃ ƒe etua nu kple wein na nuxala,
ne wòanoe, eye wòaŋlɔ eƒe ahedada be, eye eƒe ŋku nadzo le hiãkame dzi!
Ke wò nu de aɖetututɔwo nu kple ɖe dzɔgbevɔ̃etɔwo katã ƒe nye nu!
Ke wò nu natso efia ɖe eteƒe, eye nadrɔ̃ ʋɔnu na hiãtɔwo kple ame dahewo!
Amekae akpɔ nyɔnu zazɛ̃? Eƒe asime sẽ wu adzagba tɔ.
Srɔ̃a ɖoa dzi ɖe eŋu, eye nuwo kpɔkpɔ mavee o.
Ewɔa nyuie nɛ, eye menye vɔ̃ o, le eƒe agbe me ŋkekewo katã me.
Edia ɖetifu kple anazi, eye eƒe asiwo wɔa ɖɔ kple dzidzɔ.
Ele abe esiʋu ene, eye wòhea nuɖuɖu tso didiƒe vɛ.
Ne ŋu mekpɔ ke haɖe o la, efɔna, eye wònaa nuɖuɖu eƒemetɔwo kple eƒe dɔlanyɔnuwo tɔ gome wo.
Ebua la me le agble ŋu, eye wòƒlenɛ ka; eƒe asi ƒe kutsetse wòtsɔna ɖea weingblee.
Etsɔa ŋusẽ blaa ali dzii, eye wòdoa ŋusẽ eƒe alɔwo.
Edzea sii be, yeƒe asitsatsa nyo; eƒe akaɖi metsina le zã mee.
Edoa asi ɖa léa afi, si ŋu wodoa ɖetifu ɖo, eye eƒe asibiɖewo léa keke.
Edoa eƒe asi ɖe hiãtɔwo, eye wòkea eƒe abɔ me na ame dahewo.
Mevɔna ɖe eƒe aƒe nu le vuvɔ ta o, elabena wotsyɔ kuntru dzi na eƒe aƒemetɔwo.
Elɔ̃a kuntruwo na eɖokui, aklala kple aɖahɛ nye eƒe avɔtata.
Wonyaa srɔ̃a, ne eya kple anyigba dzi ame tsitsiwo wole ʋɔnuɖrɔ̃ƒe.
Etɔa awutewui hedzrana, eye asitsalawo xɔa alidziblanuwo tsoa egbɔe.
Ŋusẽ kple atsyɔ̃ nye eƒe ava, eye ŋkeke ɖia kokoe nɛ.
Ekea eƒe nu kple nunya, eye nufiame fafɛwo le eƒe aɖe dzi.
Eléa ŋku de nuwɔwɔwo ŋu le eƒe me, eye meɖua kuviabolo o.
Viaŋutsuwo tsona heyranɛ; srɔ̃a kafunɛ be:
„Nyɔnu zazɛ̃ geɖewo li; ke wòa èƒo wo katã ta!“
Nyonyo le alakpae, eye tugbedzedze la, yae; nyɔnu, si vɔ̃a Yehowa le, ele be, woakafui.
Mitsɔ eƒe esi ƒe kutsetse nɛ, eye eƒe dɔwɔwɔwo akafui le dua me!
Nyagblɔla, amesi nye Dawid vi, fia le Yerusalem la ƒe nyawo nye esi:
Nyagblɔla be: Toflokowo ƒe tofloko, toflokowo ƒe toflokoe; nusianu enye tofloko!
Viɖe ka emegbelɔ kpɔna tsoe eƒe agbagba, siwo katã wòdzena le ɣea te la mea?
Dzidzime nu yina, eye bubu vana; ke anyigba ya li tegbee.
Ɣe dzena, eya ɣe ɖoa to, eye wòɖea abla yia enɔƒe, afisi wòdzena tsona.
Ya ɖoa ta: dziehe, etrɔna yia anyiehe, eye wògatrɔna vaa afisi wotso.
Towo katã sina yia atsiaƒu me, ke etsiaƒu meyɔna gbeɖe o; afisi towo sina yina la, afima woyina ɖaa.
Nuwo kalã le agbagbadzedze dzi, emegbelɔ mele ŋu aƒo nu le wo ŋu avɔe o; nukpɔkpɔ meɖia ƒo na ŋku o, eye nusese meyɔa to o.
Nusi nɔ anyi va yi la, eya kae gbɔna anyi nɔ ge, eye nusi dzɔ va yi la, eya kae gbɔba dzɔdzɔ ge; ale nu ye yea ɖeke mele ɣea te o.
Ne nane to, eye amewo be: „Mikpɔ ɖa, nu yeyea ɖe to“ la, edzɔ do ŋgɔ na mi gbaɖegbe ke.
Ŋku dzo le blematɔwo dzi, nenema ke amesi gbɔna dzadza ge hã, wo yometɔwo maɖo ŋku wo dzi o.
Nye, nyagblɔla, meɖu fia ɖe Israel dzi le Yerusalem.
Meɖo nye ta me anyi, be matsɔ nunya adzro nusiwo kalã dzɔna le dziƒoa te la me akpa, eye makpɔ wo ta ɖa. Agbagbadzedze vɔ̃e wònye Mawu tsa na amegbetɔviwo, ne woatsɔ ana kutri kumi.
Mele ŋku ɖe nusiwo katã wowɔna le ɣea te la ŋu, eye kpa ɖa, wo katã tofloko kple dagbadagba ɖe ya me wonye.
Womete ŋu adzɔ nu gɔglɔ̃ o, eye nusi kpɔtɔ la, womate ŋu axlẽe akpe ɖe nu ŋu o.
Megblɔ le nye dzi me be: Vavãe, nye asi tu nunya ga geɖewo wu amesiwo katã bɔ Yerusalem nu ɖo ŋgɔ num la, eye nye dzi kpɔ nunya kple gɔmesese fũ.
Eye esi meɖo ta me enyi, be medze si nunya, eye medze si aɖaʋadzedze kple bometsitsi la, medze sii be, esia hã dagbadagba de ya me wònye.
Elabena dziku geɖe kpe ɖe nunya geɖe ŋu, eye amesi li kɔ sidzedze la, eli kɔ vevesese.
Megblɔ le nye dzi me be: Mãtsɔ dzidzɔ mee akpɔ, eye maɖu agbe! Ke esia hã toflokoe.
Megblɔ na nukoko be: adaʋae! eye na dzidzɔ be: nuka esia ya awɔ?
Mehe le nye dzi me be: Matsɔ wein anyro nye ŋutilã, ke nye dzi natsɔ nunya akplɔm, ne meva bometsitsi goŋgoŋ, eye makpa nusi nyo na amegbefɔviwo be, woawɔ le dziƒoa te le woƒe agbenɔɣi me la.
Mewɔ dɔ klitsuwo: metu xɔwo, mede weingblewo,
melɔ ahɔwo, eye mewɔ tsaɖiƒevewo hedo afi tseku ɖuɖua vovovowo ɖi;
medo tsitawo, ne matsɔ ade tsi avemeti damawo.
Meƒle kluvliwo kple kosiviwo, eye esiwo wodzi le aƒe me hã nɔ asinye. Nyihawo kple alẽhawo nɔ asinye taŋ wu amesiwo katã nɔ Yerusalem do ŋgɔ nam.
Meƒo klosalo kple sika, fiawo kple anyigbawo ƒe kesinɔnuwo nu ƒu; medo ŋutsu hadzilawo kple nyɔnu hadzilawo ne ɖokuinye; mese amegbetɔviwo ƒe vivisese, eye nyɔnu hɔ ɖe asinye kpaŋ.
Ade meɖo kpo gaɖo kpo ɖe dzi wu amesiwo katã nɔ Yerusalem ɖo ŋgɔ nam; eye nye nunya hã tsi ŋunye.
Nusianu, si nye ŋkuwo di la, nyemete wo o; nyemetsri dzidzɔa ɖeke na nye dzi o, ke boŋ nye dzi kpa dzidzɔ ɖe nye agbagbadzedzewo katã ŋu, eye esia nye tanye gome tso nye agbagbadzedzewo katã me.
Ke esi metrɔ kɔ ɖe ɖɔ, siwo katã nye asi wɔ, kple agbagba, siwo medze ɖe wo ŋu ŋutl la, kpɔ ɖa, tofloko kple dagbadagba ɖe ya me wonye, eye viɖea ɖeke mele ɣe la te o.
Eye metrɔ, be makpɔ nunya, aɖaʋadzedze kple bometsitsi ɖa, elabena nuka amesi ava dze fia yome la awɔ? Nusi wowɔ xoxo va yi la koe!
Tete mekpɔ be, nunya ƒo bometsitsi ta, ahe alesi kekeli ƒo viviti tae ene.
Nu nyala to ŋku ɖe ta, ke bometsila zɔa viviti me. Ke medze sii be, nye ɖeka tɔgbe koe dzɔna ɖe wo katã dzi.
Tete megblɔ le nye dzi me be: Nya, si adzɔ ɖe bometsila dzi la kee le dzɔdzɔ ge ɖe nye hã dzinye tso, nukata gɔ̃e nyea medze nunya alea gbegbe ɖo? Eye megblɔ le nye dzi me be: Esia hã toflokoe.
Womeɖoa ŋku nunyala kple bometsila dzi tegbee o, elabena ŋku adzo le wo dzi le ŋkeke, siwo gbɔna la me xoxo; alesi nunyala kunae la, nenema ke bometsila hã kunae.
Tete melé fu agbenɔnɔ, elabena nusiwo wowɔna le ɣea te la, medze ŋunye o, elabena wo katã tofloko kple dagbadagba ɖe ya me wonye.
Eye melé fu agbagba, siwo katã medze le ɣea le la, le esi mele wo gblẽ ge ɖi na yonyemedzela ta.
Eye amekae nyae be, nunyala loo, alo bometsila nye ge wògbɔna? Hafi eyae le ŋusẽ kpɔ ge ɖe nye agbagba, siwo katã metso kutrikuku kple nunya dze le ɣea te la dzi. Esia hã toflokoe!
Tete metrɔ, eye ɖikeke do nye dzi me ɖe agbagba, siwo katã medze le ɣea te la ŋu.
Elabena ne amea ɖe tsa nunya, gɔmesese kple aɖaŋu wɔ eƒe ɖɔe la, ele na be, wòagblẽe ɖi na ame bubu, si medze agbagba le eŋu o la, woa zu etɔ. Esia hã tofloko kple vɔ gã wònye.
Elabena nuka amegbefɔ kpɔna tsoa eƒe dɔwo kalã kple agbagba, siwoeƒe dzi dzena le ɣea te la mea?
Elabena eƒe ŋkekewo katã nye vevesese, eye nuxaxa nye eƒe dɔwɔwɔwo, le zã me gɔ̃ hã eƒe dzi mekpɔa gbɔdzɔe o. Esia hã toflokoe!
Ɖe menyo na amegbetɔ wu be, wòaɖu nu ana nu, eye eƒe luʋɔ naɖu agbe akpe ɖe eƒe agbagbadzedzewo ŋu oa? Ke esia la, Mawu si me ko wòtsona, abe alesi mekpɔe ene.
Elabena ameka ato exa aɖu nu, eye wòase vivi?

Elabena etsɔ nunya, sidzedze kple dzidzɔ na amesi ƒe nu dze eŋu la; ke nuvɔ̃wɔla la, etsɔ dɔwɔwɔ nɛ, be wòaƒo nu nu ƒu, eye wòali kɔ nu, ne Mawu natsɔ na amesi ƒe nu dze eŋu la. Esia hã tofloko kple dagbadagba ɖe ya me wònye.
Ɣeyiɣi li na nusianu, eye azã li na lameɖoɖowo katã le dzi ƒoa te.
Amedziɣi li, eye kuɣi li; nuɖoɣi li, eye nu dodoawo hoɣi li;
amewuɣi li, eye gbeɖaɣi li; xɔgbãɣi li, eye etuɣi li;
avifaɣi li, eye nukoɣi li; konyifaɣi li, eye ɣeɖuɣi li;
kpekakaɣi li, eyekpeƒoƒoƒuɣi li; asikplakɔɣi li, eye adzɔgenɔnɔ na asikplakɔɣi li;
nuɖiɣi li, eye nubuɣi li; nudzraɖoɣi li, eye nuƒugbeɣi li;
nuvuvuɣi li, nye nutɔɣi li; ɖoɖoeziɣi li, eye nuƒoɣi li;
lɔlɔ̃ɣi li, eye fuléɣi li; aʋawɔɣi li, eye ŋutifafaɣi li.
Viɖe ka ame kpɔna tsoa dɔ, si ŋu wòdzea agbagba lena la me?
Mekpe dɔ, siwo Mawu tsɔ de asi na amegbetɔviwo, ne woatsɔ aku kutrii la ɖa.
Ewɔ nuwo katã nyuie ɖe wo wɔɣi, eye wòde: mavɔmavɔ dzi me na wo, negbe ɖeko amegbetɔ menya mɔnu le nusiwo Mawu wɔ la ƒe agɔmegbɔ, kple tagbɔ ŋu ne
Medze sii bena, nu nyuia ɖeke meli na wo wu be, woakpɔ dzidzɔ, eye woaɖu agbe le woƒe agbenɔɣi o.
Ke be amea ɖe naɖu nu ano nu, eye wòanyo nɛ le eƒe agbagbadzedzewo katã me la, Mawu ƒe nunanae.
Medze sii be, nusiwo kam Mawu wɔ la, anɔ anyi ɖaa, womatsɔ naneke akpee o, eye womaɖe naneke le eme o. Mawu ɖe wòwɔe, alea, be woavɔ̃ ye.
Nusi li la, nɔ anyi tsã va yi, eye nusi gbɔna anyi nɔ ge la, nɔ anyi gbaɖegbe ke; eye Mawu gaɖia nusi nu va yi la.
Eye megakpɔ le ɣea te be, nu madzɔmadzɔ le ʋɔnuɖrɔ̃ƒe, eye nu madzɔmadzɔ le dzɔdzɔenyenye nɔƒe.
Tete megblɔ le nye dzi: me be: Mawu le ʋɔnu drɔ̃ ge ame dzɔdzɔewo kple ame vɔ̃diwo, elabena eɖo azã na tameɖoɖowo katã kple nuwɔwɔwo katã.
Megblɔ le nye dzi me bena. Amegbetɔviwo ta esia va me do, ne Mawu naɖo wo akpa, eye ne woadze sii be, lãwo yewonye.

Elabena nya ɖeka tɔgbe dzɔna de amegbetɔviwo kple lãwo siaa dzi; alesi esiawo kunae la, nenema ke ekemeawo hã kunae, gbɔgbɔ ɖekae le wo katã si, eye amegbetɔ mexɔ asi wu lã o; elabena wo katã tofloko wonye.
Wo katã woyina teƒe ɖeka; anyi me wo katã wotso, eye anyi wo katã woagazu.
De amea de nyae be, amegbetɔviwo ƒe gbɔgbɔ yia dzi, eye lãwo ƒe gbɔgbɔ yia anyi me loo?
Eyata mekpɔ be, enye wu na amegbetɔ be, wòakpɔ dzidzɔ le eƒe dɔwɔwɔwo ŋu, elabena esia nye eƒe gome. Elabena amekae akplɔe ayi afisi wòakpɔ nusiadzɔ le emegbe la le?

Eye megade ŋku de ameteteɖeanyi, siwo katã dzɔna le ɣea te la, eye kpa da, amesiwo woto de anyi la ƒe aɖatsiwo le tsyɔtsyɔm, ke akɔfalaa ɖeke meli na wo o; amesiwo te wo de anyi la, se ŋuta le wo ŋu, ke akɔfalaa ɖeke meli na wo o.
Tete mekafu amesiwo ku gbaɖegbe ke la, wu agbagbeawo, siwo gale agbe;
eye amesi medzɔ gɔ̃, ne wòayi nuwɔwɔ vɔ̃di, siwo dzɔna le ɣea te, kpɔ ge o la tɔ me nyo wu wo ame eve la tɔ.
Eye mekpɔ agbagbadzedzewo katã kple aɖaŋudzedzewo katã de dɔwɔwɔ ŋu be, ŋuʋaʋã wonye de amehavi ŋu. Esia hã tofloko kple dagbadagba de ya me wonye.
Bometsila ɖe asi asitɛ me hele eya ŋutɔ ƒe ŋutilã ɖum.
Gbɔɖeme asiʋlo ɖeka nyo wu agbagbadzedze kple dagbadagba ɖe ya me asiʋlo eve taŋ.
Eye megakpɔ tofloko le ɣea te;

Amea de eya ɖeka kolia li, eye evelia mekpe de eŋu o, ŋutsuvi alo nɔviŋutsu hã mele esi o, gake eƒe agbagbadzedzewo mewua enu o, eye kesinɔnuwo meɖia ƒo na eƒe ŋkuwo o. Ke ameka la gɔ̃e mehele agbagba dzem, eye mele nu nyui tsrim na ɖokuinye do? Esia hã tofloko kple agbagbadzedze vɔ̃di wònye!
Ne ame le eve la, enye wu ame ɖeka, elabena woakpɔ fam nyui de woƒe agbagbadzedzewo la.
Elabena ne wo ɖometɔ ɖka dze anyi la, nana ame de tsitre; ke haha na amesi tsi akogo, elabena ne edze anyi la, evelia meli afɔe de tsitre o.
Nenema ke ne ame eve womlɔ wo nɔewo gbɔ la, woléa dzo de wo nɔewo ŋu; aleke ame ɖeka alé dzo de eɖokui ŋui?
Eye ne ame ɖeka kpɔ ŋusẽ de amesi tsi akogo dzi hã la, ame eveawo ya anɔ te ɖe enu, eye ka ŋukplaba eta mateŋu alã bɔbɔeo.
Ɖekakpui dahe nyanu nyo wu fia tsitsi tsibome, si menana woxlɔ̃a nui o.
Eya la gaxɔ mee wotso, ne woava ɖu fia, eye ahedada me wodzii ɖo ɖe fiaɖuƒe la me.
Mekpe be, agbagbeawo katã, siwo le zɔzɔm le ɣea te la, xa ɖe ɖekakpui, si ana ame kemea teƒe la dzi.
Dukɔ, siwo katã nu wole la seƒeɖo meli na wo o; ke wo megbeviwo meva kpɔ dzidzɔ de eŋu o. Esia hã tofloko kple dagbadagba ɖe ya me wònye.
Ne èyina de wò Mawu ƒe me la, kpɔ wò afɔ dzi; elabena vava, ne woase nya, nyo wu bometsilawo ƒe akpedavɔsa; elabena numanyamanyae na wole nu vɔ̃ɖi wɔm.
Wò nu megatsɔ blablabla o, eye wò dzi megatsɔ, ne wòaƒo nu le Mawu ŋku me o; elabena Mawu le dziƒo, eye wòa nèle anyigba, eyata wò nyawo nenɔ ʋee.
Afisi kutrikuku geɖe le la, drɔ̃ekuku noa anyi, eye nu kpoloe ƒoƒo ɖea ha bometsilawo.
Ne èɖe adzagba na Mawu la, megahe edziwɔwɔ ɖe megbe o, elabena bometsilawo ƒe nu medzea eŋuo; alesi nèɖe adzɔgbe la, wɔe.
Ne méɖe adzɔgbe kura o la, enye wu esi naɖe adzɔgbe, eye mãwɔ edzi o.
Megaɖe mɔ da wò nu, ne wòahe wò ŋutilã aɖe nuvɔ̃ me o, eye megagblɔ le Mawu ƒe tame ɖɔɖɔ ŋku me be, ɖe woge le ye nu o. Nukaŋuti Mawu aɖo dɔmedzoe ɖe wò nuƒoƒo ŋu, eye wòagblẽ wò asinudɔwɔwɔa?
Elabena tofloko geɖe le ɖrɔ̃ekuku kple nu kpoloe ƒoƒo geɖe me. Ke wò la vɔ̃ Mawu boŋ!
Ne èle ame dahewo teteɖeanyi kple nya dzɔdzɔe tsitsri kpakple dzɔdzɔanyenyetsitsri kpɔm le anyigba dzi la, nya la megawɔ nuku na wò o; elabena ame kɔkɔ le ame kɔkɔ ŋuti dzɔm, ke kɔkɔtɔ le wo katã nu.
Le afiawo katã la anyigba ƒe viɖe wònye, ne fia tsa agbledede ɖo ɖɔe.
Amesi lɔ̃a ga la, ga maɖi ƒo na o, eye amesi lɔ̃a kesinɔnu la, viɖea ɖeke metso eme nɛ o. Esia hã toflokoe.
Ne kesinɔnu dzi ɖe dzi la, eɖulawo hã dzinu ɖe edzi, eye nuãtɔ mekpɔa viɖeã ɖeke tsoe eme o, negbe ekpɔkpɔ kple ŋku ko.
Dɔwɔla ɖaɖu nu ʋee o, eɖaɖu nu geɖe o, alɔ̃ vivina nɛ; ke kesinɔtɔƒe nu gbogboawo menana wòɖɔa alɔ̃ o.
Vɔ̃ gã, si mekpe le ɣen le la, enye be, kesinɔtɔ le eƒe nuwo ŋu dzɔm hena eya ŋutɔ ƒe dzɔgbevɔ̃e.
Ne nya vɔ̃a ɖe na kesinɔnu siawo bu, eye wòdzi ŋutsuvi le ekema naneke metsia esi me o.
Alesi wòle tso dadaa ƒe mi me la, nenema ke wòaganɔ amama ayii, abe alesi wole va ene, eye matsɔ naneke aɖo asi tso eƒe agbagbadzedzewo me o.
Esia hã vɔ̃ gã wònye be, alesi wònɔ va la, nenema ke wòaganɔ ayi, eye viɖe kawòkpɔ, be wòdze agbagba ɖe ya me?
Eɖu eƒe ŋkekewo kalã le viviti, dzibibi geɖe, fukpekpe kple dziku me.

Kpɔ ɖa, nusi nyea mekpe be, enye, eye wòdze ani la, enye be, ame naɖu nu ano nu, eye wòaɖu agbe ɖe eƒe agbagba, siwo katã wodze le ɣea te la ŋuti le eƒe agbe me ŋkeke, siwo katã Mawu tso nɛ la me; elabena esia nye eƒe gome.
Eye ne Mawu na kesinɔnu kple nu xɔesiwo amea de, eye wòna misee be, wòaɖui, wòaxɔ elɔ gome, eye wòakpɔ dzidzɔ ɖe eƒe dɔwɔwɔ ŋu la, Mawu ƒe nunana nye esia.
Elabena mebua ta me le eƒe agbe me ŋkekewo ŋu boo o, le esi Mawu do dzidzɔ na eƒe dzi ta.
Dzɔgbevɔ̃ea ɖe li mekpe le ɣea te, eye wòɖo agbe ɖe amegbetɔwo dzi fu;
Ne Mawu na kesinɔnu, nu xɔasiwo kple bubu amea ɖe, ale be nusiwo katã wòdina la, mehiãnɛ o, gake Mawu mene ŋusẽe, be wòaɖui o, ke boŋ ame tutɔ naɖul la, tofloko kple vɔ̃ gã wònye.
Ne amea ɖe dzi vi alafa, enɔ agbe ƒe geɖe, eƒe agbe me ŋkekewo sɔgbɔ, gake meɖi ƒo ɖe nu nyuiawo ŋu o, eye ameɖiƒea ɖeke mesu esi o la, mele gbɔgblɔm be, fu gege nyo wu eyama.
Elabena edzɔ de gbahlaya me, eye wòyi viviti me, eye viviti nye tsyɔ eƒe ŋkɔ
Mekpɔ ɣe loo, alo dze sii hã o; etɔ me nyo ne wu ame keme tɔ.
Eye nenye ƒe akpe eve wona agbe, ke meɖu agbe o la, ɖe menye teƒe ɖeka wo kam woyi oa?
Amegbetɔ ƒe dɔwɔwɔwb katã la, nue wòwɔnɛ, ke womefaa nudzodzro nu gbeɖe o.
Elabena nuka nunyala tsɔ wu bometsila, eye viɖe ka ame dahe, si nya zɔzɔ le agbagbeawo ŋku me la, kpɔna?
Nukpɔkpɔ kple ŋku nyo wu nudzodzro ƒe tsa glalã tsatsa. Esia hã tofloko kple dagbadagba ɖe ya me wonye.
Nusi dza la, woyɔ eƒe ŋkɔ ɖi tsa, eye nusi ame ava zu la, woɖoeɖa ɖi, eye mate ŋu ahe nya kple amesi sẽ wui o.
Elabena nya geɖe li, si dzia toflokonyenye ɖe edzi, ke viɖe ka amegbelɔ kpɔna tsoe eme?
Elabena ameka nya nusi nyo na amegbelɔ le agbe me, le eƒe agbe ƒuƒlu, si wònɔ abe vɔvɔli ene la ƒe ŋkekewo katã me? Elabena ameka agblɔ nusi adzɔ le amegbetɔ megbe le ɣea te la nɛ?
Ŋkɔ nyui nyo wu ami xɔasi, eye kugbe nyo wu dzigbe.
Kuteƒeyiyi nyo wu agloluƒeyiyi; elabena afi kemea nye emegbetɔwo katã ƒe nuwuƒe, eye wòdea dzigbɔ na agbagbeawo.
Nuxaxa nyo wu nukoko, elabena ne mo ɖo adã la, esɔnɛ na dzi.
Nunyalawo ƒe dzi le kuleƒe, ke bometsilawo ƒe dzi le dzidzɔleƒe.
Nunyalawo ƒe dzusese nyo wu, ne woase bometsilawo ƒe ha.
Elabena alesi aŋɔka wona kpotokpoto le ze gome la, nenema nye bometsilawo ƒe nukoko. Esia ha toflokoe.
Elabena sesẽnuɖuɖu doa bometsila nunyalawo, eye zãnunana gblẽa dzi.
Nu ƒe nuwuwu nyo wu eƒe gɔmedzedze; dzigbɔɖitɔ nyo wu ɖaɖala.
Wò gbɔgbɔ megayɔ ɖe dzikudodo ŋu o, elabena bometsilawo ƒe akɔtae dziku nana.
Megagblɔ be, nukata tsa ŋkekewo nyo wu fifitɔwo hã o, elabena mèle biabiam ɖe nunya me o.
Nunya nyo kpe ɖe domenyinu ŋu, eye wònye viɖe na amesiwo le ɣe kpɔm.
Elabena nunya doa vɔvɔli, eye ga hã doa vɔvɔli; eye sidzedze ƒe viɖe enye; Nunya léa amesi si wole la ƒe agbe ɖe te.
Ɖe ŋku ɖe Mawu ƒe ɖɔwo; elabena ameka hadzɔ nusi wòglɔ̃ la?
Kpɔ dzidzɔ le gbe nyui gbe, eye le dzɔgbevɔ̃egbe la ɖo ŋui be, Mawu ye wɔe abe ekeme ke ene, ne amegbelɔ maganya nusi adzɔ le emegbe o.
Nusiwo katã mekpɔ le nye agbe me ŋkeke ƒuƒluawo me la, enye esi: Ame dzɔdzɔea ɖewo tsrɔ̃na ɖe woƒe dzɔdzɔenyenye me, eye ame vɔɖia ɖewo nɔa agbe ɖiɖie ɖe woƒe vɔ̃ɖiwɔwɔ me.
Megawɔ nu dzɔdzɔe vivivo o, eye meganya nu tso eme akpa o; nukaŋuti nébe, yeaɖe ye ɖokui tsɔtsrɔ̃ me ɖo?
Megawu nu vɔ̃ɖi wòagbɔ eme o, eye meganye bometsila o; nukaŋuti nẽbe, yeaku, hafi azã nava de?
Enyo, ne ele esia ɖe asi sesie, eye ekemea hã niege le asiwò o; elabena amesi vɔ̃a Mawu la, ƒoa asa na wo katã.
Nunya naa ŋusẽ nunyalawo wu ŋusẽtɔ ewo, siwo le du me.
Elabena ame dzɔdzɔea ɖeke mele anyigba dzi, si wɔa nu nyui sɔŋ, eye mewɔa nuyɔ o.
Megalé to hã ɖe amewo ƒe nusiwo katã woƒona la ŋu o, ne mãgasee, ne wò dɔla le ɖiŋu dom na wò ti.
Elabena ele ŋku dzi na wò be, wò hã edo ɖiŋu na ame bubuwo zi geɖewo.
Nusiwo katã metso nunya te kpɔ la, wonye si: Mebu be, madze nunya; ke etsi adzɔgedzɔgee nam.
Nusi li la, adzɔge wòle; ele to me, ẽ, to me wòle; ameka ƒe asi atui?
Eye metrɔ hetsɔ tame ɖo anyi, be madze si nunya kple tamebubu, madzro eme, eye madii, ne manyae be, nu vɔ̃ɖi wɔwɔ la bometsitsi wònye, eye lãnyenye la aɖaʋadzedze wònye.
Eye mekpɔ be, nusi vena wu ku, enye nyɔnu, si nye ɖɔ vena kaɖikaɖi wu ku ɖeɖe sɔŋ, ete dzi nye mɔ̃ka, eye eƒe asiwo nye kunyowu. Amesi ƒe nu nyo Mawu ŋu la, sina le enu, ke eɖea nuvɔ̃wɔlawo.
Kpɔ ɖa, nyagblɔla be: Esiawoe nye asi tu ɖekaɖeka, ne makpɔ sidzedze.
Nusi dim mele atraɖi nyemekpɔe o la, enye si Mekpe ŋutsu ɖeka le wo ame akpe ɖome, ke nyemekpɔ nyɔnu le esiawo katã ɖome o.
Negbe esia ko mekpɔ be, Mawu wɔ amegbetɔwo woto mɔ ɖeka, ke woawo dia ayedzedze geɖe.
Amekae le ahe nunyala ene? Eye ameka se nuwo gɔmeɖeɖe me? Nunya nana amegbetɔ ƒe mo kɔna, eye eƒe mo kplala la trɔna.
Mebe: Dzra fia ƒe sedede ɖo le Mawu ƒe atam la te.
Wò afa megatsɔ nadzo le esia gbɔ o; megaɖo nya vɔ̃ me o; elabena nusianu, si dze eŋu la, awɔe.
Esi wònye ŋusẽ le fia ƒe nya ŋu ta la, ameka agblɔ nɛ be: Nuka wɔm nele?
Amesi dzra sedede ɖo la, vɔa ɖeke mava edzi o, eye nunyala ƒe dzi nyaa azãgbe kple ʋɔnudɔdrɔ.
Elabena azãgbe kple ʋɔnudɔdrɔ̃ li na nuwɔwɔ ɖesiaɖe, elabena amegbetɔ ƒe vɔ̃wɔwɔ do agba ɖe edzi.
Elabena menya nusi gbɔna dzɔdzɔ ge o; eye ameka ate ŋu agblɔ nusi le dzɔdzɔ ge la nɛ?
Amegbetɔa ɖeke mekpɔ ŋusẽ ɖe ya dzi be, wòaxe ma na ya o; amea ɖeke mekpɔ ŋusẽ ɖe kugbe dzi o, eye asiɖeɖe le ame ŋu meli le aba me o; nu vɔ̃ɖi wɔwɔ mexɔna na ewɔla o.
Nusiawo katã mekpɔ, eye melsɔ nye tame ɖo nuwɔwɔ, siwo katã dzɔna le ɣea te, le ɣeyiɣi, si me amegbetɔ ɖua fia ɖe ame bubuwo dzi bena woƒe dzɔgbevɔ̃e la ŋuti.
Emegbe mekpɔ woɖe ame vɔ̃ɖiwo yɔ me, eye woyi gbɔɖemeƒe; ke ele na amesiwo wɔa nu dzɔdzɔe la be, woaʋu adzo le teƒe kɔkɔe la, eye woŋlɔ wo be le dua me. Esia hã tofloko wònye.
Esi afia menye tsona le nu vɔ̃ɖi wɔwɔ ŋu kaba o ŋuti la, eyata dzi doa amegbetɔviwo ƒo ŋutɔ de nu vɔɖi wɔwɔ ŋu.
Ne nuvɔwɔla wɔa vɔ̃ zi alafa, gake nɔa agbe didie hã la, nyee menyae be, eme anye na mawuvɔ̃la, siwo sia eƒe ŋku me.
Ke eme menye na ame vɔ̃ɖiwo o, eye abe vɔvɔli ene womanɔ agbe didie o, elabena womevɔ̃a Mawu o.

Nu dzodzroa wònye dzɔna le anyigba dzi be: Ame dzɔdzɔea ɖewo li nya dzɔna ɖe wo dzi le eme vɔ̃ɖiwo ƒe nuwɔwɔ nu, eye ame vɔ̃ɖia ɖewo li nya dzɔna ɖe wo dzi le ame dzɔdzɔewo ƒe nuwɔwɔ nu. Mebe: Esia hã toflokoe!
Eyata mekafu dzidzɔkpɔkpɔ be: Nu nyuia ɖeke mele ɣea te na amegbetɔ wu esia be, wòaɖu nu ana nu akpɔ dzidzɔ o. Eye esia akplɔe alo eƒe agbe me ŋkeke, siwo Mawu nae le ɣea le la ƒe agbagbadzedzewo me.
Esi meɖo nye tame anyi, be madze si nunya, eye makpɔ nuwɔwɔ, siwo dzɔna le anyigba dzi ɖa la, — elabena ŋkeke kple zã amegbetɔ ƒe ŋku mekpɔa alɔ o —
mekpɔ Mawu ƒe dɔwo katã be, amegbetɔ menya ta le nusiwo le ɣea te la nu o, eye ne amegbetɔ le kutri kum le edim hã, menya ta le enu o, eye ne nunyala be, yedze sii hã la, manya ta le enu akpɔ o.
Nusiawo katã ŋu metsɔ nye tame ɖo, eye medzro wokɔtã me kpɔ be: Ame dzɔdzɔewo kple nunyalawo kpakple woƒe nuwɔwɔwo le Mawu si me; amegbetɔ medze si lɔlɔ̃ kple fuléle tsã o; wo katã wodo ŋgɔ na wo.

Nu ɖeka ƒomevie kpea amewo katã: Nya ɖeka tɔgbe dzɔna ɖe ame dzɔdzɔe kple ame vɔ̃ɖi, ame nyui, eme dzadzɛ kple eme madzamadza, vɔsala kple eme masavɔ, ame nyui kple nuvɔwɔlm atamkala kple amesi atam dzia ŋɔ na la dzi.

Esia nye vɔ̃ gã le nusiwo katã dzɔna le ɣea te la dome be, nye ɖeka tɔgbe dzɔna ɖe amewo katã dzi; eyata vɔ̃ɖiwɔwɔ yɔa amegbetɔviwoƒe dzi me, eye aɖaʋadzedze le woƒe dzi me le woƒe agbenɔɣi katã; ke emegbe la woayi kukuawo gbɔ.
Elabena amesi gale ha dem kple agbagbeawo ko le mɔkpɔkpɔ le esi; elabena avu gbagbe nyo wu dzata kuku.
Elabena agbagbeawo nyae be, yewogbɔna kuku ge, ke kukuawo menye naneke o, fetua ɖeke megali na wo o, eye woŋlɔ woƒe ŋkɔ be.
Woƒe emelɔlɔ kple fuléle kpakple ŋuʋaʋã nu yi gbaɖegbe ke, eye womagakpɔ gome le nusiwo katã dzɔna le ɣea te la me akpɔ o.
Eyata yi naɖu wò abolo kple dzidzɔ, eye nano wò wein le dzidzeme me, elabena gbaɖegbe ke Mawu tso na wò nuwɔwɔ sia.
Wò avɔwo nefu ɣeawokatãɣi, eye ami megagbe wò tamenɔnɔ o.

Mia kple nyɔnu, si nèlɔ̃na la, miɖu agbe le wò agbenɔnɔ ƒuƒlu ƒe ŋkekewo katã, si wotsɔ na wò le ɣea le la me, ŋkeke ƒuƒlu, siwo katã nele agbe; elabena esia nye wò agbe kple wò agbagba, si nèdze le ɣea te la ƒe gome.
Nusianu, si wò asi ate ŋu awɔ la, wɔe kple wò ŋusẽ; elabena nuwɔwɔ alo tamebubu, sidzedze alo nunya mele tsieƒe, afisi yi ge nala o.

Eye megakpɔ le ɣea te be, duƒuƒu mele alo ɖablae me o, aʋawɔwɔ mele kalẽ me o, nuɖudukpɔkpɔ mele nunya me o, kesinɔnu mele ayedzedze me o, eye ŋudzedzekpɔbpɔ mele nugɔmesese me o, ke boŋ azãgbe kple nudiɖeame li na wo katã.
Amegbetɔ menya eƒe azãgbe o, ke boŋ abe alesi wotsɔa dɔ vɔ̃ɖi ɖea tɔmelãwo, eye wotsɔa mɔ̃ ɖea xewoe la, nenema woɖea amegbetɔviwo abe woawo ene le dzɔgbevɔ̃eɣi, ne eƒo ɖe wo dzi kpoyi.
Mekpɔ nunya sia hã le ɣea te, eye wòdze gã nam:
Du suea ɖe li, ŋutsu ʋeea ɖewo koe le eme; tete fia gãa ɖe ho ɖe eŋu, eɖe to ɖee, eye wòƒo kpo gãwo ɖe eŋu.
Ŋutsu ɖahe nyanua ɖe le eme; eyae tsɔ eƒe nunya xɔ du lae; ke amea ɖeke medo ŋku ŋutsu dahe ma dzi o.
Tete megblɔ be: Nunya nyo wu ŋusẽ, ke wodoe vlo ame dahe ƒe nunya, eye womeléa to de eƒe nyawo ŋu o.
Wosea nunyala ƒe nyawo le dziɖeɖi me wu dziɖula ƒe ɣli le bometsilawo dome.
Nunya nyo wu aʋawɔnuwo; ke nuvɔ̃wɔla ɖe ka gblẽa nu nyui geɖe dome.
Nudzodzoe wuamewo nana amiɖala ƒe ami mina ku heƒaƒãna; bometsitsi ʋeea ɖe kpena wua nunya kple bubu.
Gomesese le ɖusi me na nunyala, ke bometsila ƒe gɔmesese le mia me nɛ.
Ne bometsila le mɔa ɖe dzi le nunya menɔa tagbɔ nɛ o, eye sii wo baa amewo katã bometsilawoe.
Ne dziɖula ƒe ɖɔmedzoe bi ɖe ŋuwò la, megaɖe afa le tewòƒe o, elabena tufafa tsia nuvɔ gãwo nu.
Mekpɔ nu vɔ̃ɖia ɖe le ɣea te, esɔ kple dziɖula ƒe ɖaɖaƒu
Wotsɔ bometsitsi ɖo kɔkɔƒe ʋi ke, eye kesinɔtɔwo bɔbɔ nɔ anyi me.
Mekpɔ kluviwo le sɔ dzi, eye amegãwo le afa zɔm ahe kluviwo ene.
Amesi le ne ɖem la, eyae gena dzea eme, eye amesi la gli gbãm la, eyae da ɖuna.
Amesi le kpe ɖem la, eyae wɔa nu vevi eɖokui, eye amesi le nake dzem la, eyae xɔa abi.
Ne lãnu tsi kpo, eye womenyire enu o la, ele be, woahe alɔkame; ke nuwɔwɔ, ne wòadze edzi, enye nunya ƒe viɖe.
Ne da ɖu ame, hafi wosa gbe ɖoe la, ekema gbesala mekpɔ viɖea ɖeke tso eme o.
Nyia, si tso nunyala nu la, nyo; ke bometsila ƒe nuyi gblẽa eya ŋutɔ ɖokui dome.
Eƒe nu me nyia ƒe gɔmedzedze enye bometsitsi, eye eƒe nuƒoƒo ƒe nuwuwu enye aɖaʋadzedze vɔ̃ɖi.
Bometsila ƒoa nu kpoloe; amegbetɔ menya nusi gbɔna dzɔdzɔ ge o, eye ameka agblɔ nusi ava dzɔ le emegbe la nɛ?
Bometsilawo ƒe agbagbadzedze nana ɖeɖi tea amesi menye du me mɔ o la ŋu.
Anyigba, si ƒe fia nye ɖevi, eye eƒe amegãwo ma ŋdi ɖe nuɖuɖu ŋu la, baba nɛ!
Woayra anyigba, siƒe fia nyee bubume, eye ete amegãwo ɖua nu ɖe eɖuɣi hena ŋusẽɖoɖo, eye menye hena nutsuɖuɖu o!
Kuviawɔwɔ nana ɖaɖedziwo nyẽna ɖe eme, alɔ gblɔlɔ wɔwɔ nana xɔ ɖuɖuna.
Ɖe woɖaa nuɖuɖu hena dzidzɔkpɔkpɔ, wein doa dzidzɔ na agbe, eye gae wotsɔna kpɔa nuwo katãe.
Megado ɖiŋu na fia le wò tamesusuwo me o, eye megado ɖiŋu na kesinɔtɔ le wò xɔgã me o, elabena dziƒoxeviwo atso gbeɖiɖi la ayii, eye xewo aɖato nya la.
Na wò abolo nato tɔ dzi yii, elabena àgakpɔe le ŋkeke geɖewo megbe.
Ma nu ɖe akpa adre, ɖe akpa enyi, elabena menya dzɔgbevɔ̃e ka le anyigba dzi va ge o.
Ne tsi ya alilikpowo la, wobunɛ kɔna ɖe anyigba dzi; ne ati mu le dziehe alo anyiehe la, afisi atia mũ ɖo la, afima wòtsina.
Amesi le to lém ɖe ya ŋu la, maƒã nuku o, eye amesi le ŋku lém ɖe alilikpo ŋu la, maŋe nu o.
Alesi menya ya toƒe kple alesi ƒuwo va wona ɖe dɔ me na funɔ o la, nenema mèdze si Mawu, amesi wɔ nuwo katã la ƒe dɔwɔwɔwo o.
Ƒã wò nukuwo le ŋdi, eye megadzudzɔ le ɣetrɔ me o; elabena mènya kae le wɔwɔ ge o, eɖanye asi alo ekeme alo woa kple eve lae le nyonyo ge o.
Kekeli nyo, eye ɣe kpɔkpɔ vivia ŋku nu.
Elabena ne amegbetɔ nɔ agbe ƒe geɖe la, nekpɔ dzidzɔ le wo katã me, eye wòanɔ ŋku ɖom vivitidogbe dzi be, wole agbɔ sɔ ge; nusiwo katã le vavam la, toflokowoe.

Ɖekakpui, kpɔ dzidzɔ le wò ɖekakpuime, na wò dzi naɖu agbe le wò ɖekakpui ŋkekewo me, eye nazɔ ɖe wò dzi ƒe toƒewo kple nusi wò ŋku kpɔ la nu; ke nyae be, Mawu le kplɔwò ge ava ʋɔnui le nusiawo katã ta.
Ɖe dziku da le wò dzi ŋu, eye vɔ̃ neƒo asa na wò ŋutilã; elabena ɖekakpui me nɔnɔ kple ŋutsu me nónɔ toflokowoe.
Ɖo ŋku wɔwòla dzi le wò ɖekakpuiŋkekewo me, hafi ne ŋkeke vɔ̃wo nava, eye ƒe, siwo ŋu nele gbɔgblɔ ge le be, womedze ye ŋu o la, nagogo;
hafi ne ɣe, ɣleti kple ɣletiviwo naɖo viviti, eye alilikpo nagatrɔ ava le tsidzadza megbe;
esime aƒe ŋu dzalawo dzona nyanyanya, eye ŋutsu kakowo xana gobaa, nyɔnu wɔtulawo dzudzɔa dɔwɔwɔ, elabena womegasɔ gbɔ o; esime fesrenukpɔlawo ƒe mo ɖoa viviti,
eye wodoa ʋɔtru, siwo lrɔ ɖe abla me, elabena wɔtutu megale ɖiɖim sesĩe o, eye wofɔna, ne xevi ƒe gbe tete ɖi, eye nyɔnu hadzilawo ƒe gbeme xena;
togbɛwo hã dzia ŋɔ na ame, eye ŋɔdzi nɔa mawo dzi; wotsria azi, eye ʋetsuviwo tea texlolo, eye nuɖuɖu medzroa ame o; elabena amegbetɔ yia eƒe aƒe mavɔ me, eye konyifalawo nɔa yiyim le kpɔɖome;
hafi ne klosaloka natso, eye sikagba nagbã, trekpezi nafli le vudo to, eye tsidumɔ̃ nakaka;
hafi ne ekewɔ nagatrɔ yi anyigba, si wònye tsã la gbɔ, eye gbɔgbɔ la nagbugbɔ ayi Mawu, amesi tsɔe na la gbɔ.
Toflokowo ƒe tofloko! Nyagblɔla be: Nuwo kalã toflokowoe!
Nyagblɔla sia la menye nunyala ko o, ke boŋ eda sidzedze dukɔ la, edo nu kpɔ, edi nu gɔme, eye wòdo lo geɖewo.
Nyagblɔla la di nya viviwo be, yeakpɔ, eye nyateƒenya, siwo woŋlɔ ɖi la, wole eteƒe.
Nunyalawo ƒe nyawo le abe ŋu kple gatagbadza, si woƒo ɖe nu ene. Kplɔla ɖekae ɖo amewo woƒo wo nu ƒu.
Hekpe ɖe esia ŋu la, vinye, na woaxlɔ̃ nu wò! Agbalẽ geɖe wɔwɔ mekpɔa seƒeɖo o, eye nusɔsrɔ̃ geɖe ɖe wòtea ɖeɖi ŋufilã ŋu.
Mina míase nyaawo kalã ƒe taƒonya be: Vɔ̃ Mawu, eye nalé eƒe seawo me ɖe asi; elabena esia nye amegbetɔtvo katã tɔ!
Elabena Mawu le nuwɔwɔwo katã, siwo ɣla la, he ge ava ʋɔnui, eɖanye nyui alo vɔ̃ o.
Salomo hawo ƒe ha.
Etsɔ wo nu gbugbɔ nu nam, elabena wo lɔlɔ̃ nyo wu wein.
Wò ami le ya ɖem nyuie; wo ŋkɔ le abe ami, si wowu ene, eyata ɖetugbiwo lɔ̃a wo nya ɖo.
Kplɔm yii, na míaɖe abla! Fia la kplɔm yi eƒe xɔ me. Míatso aseye, eye míakpɔ dzidzɔ, eye míakafu wò lɔlɔ̃ wu wein; amewo lɔ̃a wò ɖe eteƒe.
Yerusalem-nyɔnuviwo, menye ame yi, gake menye abe Kedar ƒe agbadɔwo kple Salomo ƒe kuntruwo ene.
Migamɔ kpɔyem be, menya alea o, elabena ɣee ɖum. Danye viŋutsuwo ɖo dɔmedzoe ɖe ŋunye; wotsɔm ɖo weingbledzɔlae, ke nyemedzɔ nye ŋutɔ nye weingble ŋu o.
Wò, amesi nye lunɔ lɔ̃na, gblɔe nam dzro: Afikanènyia lãwo le, eye afika wotsyɔa akɔ ɖo le ŋɖɔ me? Nukaŋuti manɔ tsa glãla tsam le hawòviwo ƒe lãhawo gbɔ?
Wò tugbedzɛ le nyɔnuwo dome, ne mènyae o la, ekema do go, eye naɖo lãhawo ƒe afɔ, eye nanyi wò gbɔ̃viwo le lãkplɔlawo ƒe agbadɔwo gbɔ!
Xɔ̃nye, èle abe nye sɔnɔ le Farao ƒe tasiaɖam ŋu ene.
Dzonu le tonu na wò nyuie, eye adzagba le kɔ na wò.
Míatu sikakɔsɔkɔsɔ kple klosalokpeviwo na wò.
Esime fia la bɔbɔ nɔ eƒe ablegɔ me la, nye gbe ʋeʋẽewo ɖe ya.
Nye lɔlɔ̃tɔ le ahe miregoe le akɔnu nam ene.
Nye lɔlɔ̃tɔ nye koferseƒoƒo nam le Engedi-weingblewo me.
Edze tugbe, xɔ̃nye, èdze tugbe loo! Wò ŋkuwo le abe ahɔne ƒe ŋkuwo ene.
Nye lɔlɔ̃tɔ, èdze ɖeka, eye nènyo; mía dɔƒe ɖe ama.
Míaƒe xɔ ƒe daɖedziwo nye sedertiwo, eye míaƒe xɔmeɖoʋuƒowo nye fɔfɔlĩ.
Nyee nye seƒoƒo le Saron kple dzogbenya le baliwo me.
Alesi dzogbenya noa aŋɔka mea le nenema xɔ̃nye le nyɔnuviwo domee.
Alesi atɔlɔŋutiti le avemetiwo domee la, nenema nye lɔlɔ̃tɔ le ɖekakpuiwo domee. Melɔ̃a eƒe vɔvɔli te nɔnɔ, eye eƒe kutsetsewo vivina le nye nu me.
Ekplɔm yi weinxɔ me, eye lɔlɔ̃ enye eƒe aflaga le dzinye.
Mi tso weintsetsebolo de agbe ŋunye, eye mitsɔ atɔtɔŋuti fa dzi nam, ale bena lɔlɔ̃ de dɔ la me nam.
Etsɔ eƒe mía de nye ta te, eye wòtsɔ eƒe nuɖusi kple kɔ nam.
Yerusalem-nyɔnuviwo, meta sãde alo zinɔ le gbe me ne mi: Miganyɔ lɔlɔ̃ o, migaʋuʋui o, vaseɖe esime wòadze eya ŋutɔ ŋu hafi!
Nye lɔlɔ̃tɔ ŋkɔ le ɖiɖim! Kpɔ ɖa, eya nye ekem gbɔna; ele kpo dzom flɔ towo, eye wòle kpo tim flɔ togbɛwo.
Nye lɔlɔ̃tɔ le abe sãde alo zivi ene, ele tsitre ɖe míaƒe gli te xoxo. Ele nu kpɔm to fesre nu, eye wòɖo ŋku ɖe adzrala nu.
Nye lɔlɔ̃tɔ xɔ edzi gblɔ nam bena: Xɔ̃nye, tso; nye tugbedzɛ, va!
Elabena vuvɔŋɔli yi aƒe, tsidzadza ke, eye enu yi.
Seƒoƒowo ɖo ɖe anyigba dzi, weinkawo ŋu ɖeɣi ɖo, eye wole akpakpa ƒe xɔxlɔ sem le míaƒe anyigba dzi.
Gboti ƒe tsetsewo ɖe asi ɖiɖi me, eye weinka ƒe seƒoƒowo le ya ɖem nyuie. Tso, xɔnye, nye tugbedzɛ, va!
Nye ahɔne le kpetowo me, le agawo ƒe globoeaƒe; na makpɔ ŋkuwò me, na mase wò gbe! Elabena wò gbe vivina, eye ŋkuwò me nyo.
Milé abeiwo na mi, abeiviwo, siwo gblẽa weingblewo; elabena míaƒe weingblewo ƒo se.
Tɔnyee nye nye lɔlɔ̃tɔ la, eye nye hã menye etɔ, eya amesi nyia lãwo le dzogbenyawo me.
Nye lɔlɔ̃tɔ, trɔ gbɔ, hafi anyinu nafa, eye vɔvɔli nu nayi, eye nanɔ abe sãde alo zivi le atike ʋeʋẽe towo dzi ene!
Meɖi amesi nye luʋɔ lɔna la, le nye aha dzi le zã me, medii nyemekpɔe o.
Eyata mafa aɖatsa le dua me le ablɔ me kple kpɔdomewo, ne madi amesi nye luʋɔ lɔ̃na la! Medii, ke nyemekpɔe o.
Dzɔla, siwo le tsatsam le dua me la, do gom. „Míekpɔ amesi nye luʋɔ lɔ̃na la oa?“
Nyemekpɔ to wo ŋu yi o, tete mekpɔ amesi nye luʋɔ lɔ̃na la. Melée, eye megbe asiɖeɖe le eŋu, vaseɖe esime mekplɔe va danye ƒe me, va nɔnye ƒe xɔ mee.
Yerusalem-nyɔnuviwo, meta sàde alo zinɔ le gbe me na mi: Miganyɔ lɔlɔ̃ o, mígaʋuʋui o, vaseɖe esime wòadze eya ŋutɔ ŋu hafi!
Amekae nye ekem tso gbe me gbɔna abe dzudzɔ babla ene, eye atike ʋeʋẽe, dzudzɔ ʋeʋée donu kple nudzralawo ƒe atike vovovowo le ya ɖem le eŋu?
Kpo da, Salomo ƒe apakae! Kalẽtɔ blaade tso Israel ƒe kalẽtɔwo dome ƒo xlãe.
Wo katã wobi de aʋawɔwɔ me, eye woƒe asi le yi dzi; amesiame ta yi de aklito le zã me ŋɔdzi la.
Fia Salomo na wotso Libanon-ti kpa atiklãe.
Ele alɔwo nye klosalo, eye medeƒe nye sika, anyinɔƒe nye aɖabɛ, eye Yerusalem nyɔnuviwo ƒe lɔlɔ̃ do atsiã ne ɖe eme gome.
Mi Zion-nyɔnuviwo, mido va, ne míakpɔ fia Salomo le fiakuku, si dadaa ɖɔ nɛ la me le eƒe srɔ̃ɖegbe, le eƒe dzi ƒe dzidzɔkpɔgbe!
Èdze tugbe, xɔ̃nye, èdze tugbe ŋutɔ. Wò ŋkuwo nye ahɔne ƒe ŋkuwo le moxevɔ la me. Wò ɖa le abe gbɔ̃hawoe tsyɔ akɔ anyi de Gilead-to kɔgo ene.
Wò aɖuwo le abe alẽha, si woke tu na tete, eye wodo tso tsileƒe la ene; wo katã wonye venɔwo, eye wo dometɔa ɖeke metsi ko o.
Wò nuyiwo le abe ka dzẽ ene, eye wò nu dze ani; wò tonuƒuiwo le dzedzem le moxevɔ me abe yevuboɖa, si me wole ene.
Wò ka le abe Dawid ƒe xɔ tsrala, si wotu bena gbetakpɔkpɔ ene Woku akpoxɔnu gagã akpe de eŋu, siwo katã nye kalẽtɔwo ƒe akpoxɔnuwo.
Wò nowo le abe sãdevi eve, zi venɔvi, siwo le gbe ɖum le dzogbenyawo me ene.
Mayi atike ʋeʋẽe towo kple dzudzɔ ʋeʋẽe donu togbɛwo dzi, hafi anyinu nafa, eye vɔvɔli nu nayi.
Xɔ̃nye, nusianu nyo le ŋuwò, dzuƒea ɖeke mele ŋuwò o.
Ɖi kplim tso Libanon dzi, ŋugbetɔ, ɖi kplim tso Libanon dzi! Zɔ tso Amana ta me, tso Senir kple Xermon ta me, tso dzatawo nɔƒe kple lãkletowo dzi.
Nɔvinyenyɔnu, nye ŋugbetɔ, ègblẽ tame nam, ètsɔ wò nukpɔkpɔ kple kɔsɔkɔsɔ, si le wò kɔdzonuwo me, gblẽ tame nam.
Nɔyinyenyɔnu, nye ŋugbetɔ, wò lɔlɔ̃ vivina loo! Wò lɔlɔ̃ nyo wu wein, eye wo ami ƒe ʋeʋẽ ƒo atike ʋeʋẽewo la.
Ŋugbetɔ, anyitsi le tsyɔtsyɔm le nuyi ŋu na wò; anyitsi kple notsi le wò aɖe te; wò avɔwo me ƒe ʋeʋẽ le abe Libanon ƒe ʋeʋẽ ene.
Nɔvinyenyɔnu, nye ŋugbetɔ enye abɔ, si ƒe ʋɔ wodo, vudo, si nu wotu nu do, kple tsidzɔƒe, si nu wotre.
Wò numiemiewo nye yevuboɖabɔ, si me kutsetse nyuiwo, koferseƒoƒo kple gbe ʋeʋẽewo,
gbe ʋeʋẽewo kple agumetaku, gbekee, botsyo kple dzudzɔ ʋeʋẽe dogbewo katã, mire kple aloe kpakple atike veviwo katã te.
Abɔ me tsidzidzi, tsi gbagbe vudo kple tɔʋu, si si tso Libanon dzi la nènye.
Anyieheya, tso, eye dzieheya, va, naƒo ato nye abɔ me, ne eƒe ʋeʋẽ nagbagba di.
Nye lɔlɔ̃tɔ va eƒe abɔ me, eye wòɖu eƒe kutsetse nyuiawo.
Nɔvinyenyɔnu, nye ŋugbetɔ, meva nye abɔ me, meke nye mire kple atike ʋeʋẽewo, menyi nye anyixe kple anyitsi, meno nye wein kple nye notsi. Xɔ̃nyewo, miɖu nu, miano nu, nye lɔlɔ̃tɔwo, mino aha mu!
Mele alɔ̃ dɔm, ke nye dzi le ŋute. Mido to, nye lɔlɔ̃tɔ le ʋɔ ƒom! Nɔvinyenyɔnu, xɔnye, nye ahɔne, nye ame dzadzɛ, ʋu ʋɔ nam! Elabena zãmu ƒo tame nam ƒũ, eye nye ɖa me yɔ fu kple dzadza.
Meɖe nye avɔwo ɖi, ɖe magatsɔ wo ataa? Meklɔ nye afɔwo, ɖe magaƒo ɖi woa?
Nye lɔlɔ̃tɔ do asi ɖe fesre nu, tete nye lãme gbagba yi ɖe eŋu.
Mefa, be maʋu ʋɔa na nye lɔlɔ̃tɔ, eye ami ʋeʋẽe le tsyɔtsyɔm le asi ŋu nam, ami nenẽe tsrolo le ɖuɖum le nye asibide ŋu ɖe gameti ƒe asiléƒe ŋu.
Meʋu ʋɔa na nye lɔlɔ̃tɔ, ke nye lɔlɔ̃tɔ trɔ dzo, ebu. Luʋɔ dzo le tanye, esime wòƒo nu. Medii, nyemekpɔe o; meyɔe, gake metɔ nam o.
Dzɔla, siwo le tsatsam le dua me la do gom, woƒom de abi ŋunye; gli ŋu dzɔlawo ɖe taɖedzi le ŋunye.
Yerusalem-nyɔnuviwo, mele mi: Ne miekpɔ nye lɔlɔ̃tɔ la, mito nɛ be, lɔlɔ̃ de dɔ lã me nam!
Nyɔnuwo ƒe tughedzɛ, nuka wo lɔlɔ̃tɔ tso ƒo lɔlɔ̃tɔ bubuwo tae? Nuka wo lɔlɔ̃tɔ tsa ƒo lɔlɔ̃tɔ bubuwo tae, hafi nèta nu na mí alea?
Nye lɔlɔ̃tɔ fu, eye wòbiã, eye wòƒo ame akpe nanewo la;
eƒe ta enye sika nyuitɔ, eƒe ɖa le abe ɖeʋala, siwo dza ɖe anyi me ene, eye wònyɔ abe akpaviã ene;
eƒe ŋkuwo le abe ahɔne le tɔʋu to ene, wole notsi, eye wosɔ ɖe ŋku to me;
eƒe alɔgo enye atike ʋeʋẽe kpo, si dzi atike ʋeʋẽe mie ɖo; eƒe nuyiwo nye dzogbenya, siwo le mire tsrolo tsyɔm;
eƒe alɔwo nye sikati mlimɔwo, siwo ŋu woɖo Tarsis-kpewoe; eƒe ƒoɖo enye aɖaŋudɔ, si wotsɔ nyiɖu wɔe, eye wotsɔ safir ɖo atsyɔ̃ ɖe eŋu;
eƒe atawo nye kpe ɣi sɔti, siwo woɖo sikafɔ dzi; eƒe dzedzeme le abe Libanon ene, eye wonye nu vevi abe sederti ene;
vivi le eƒe nu me, eye eyama ɖze ani. Yerusalem-nyɔnuviwo, nye lɔlɔ̃tɔ lae nye esia: amesiae nye xɔ̃nye la!
Nyɔnuwo ƒe tugbedzɛ, afika wò lɔlɔ̃tɔ la yi? Gakae wo lɔlɔ̃tɔ la trɔ ɖo, ne míadii na wo ti.
Nye lɔlɔ̃tɔ yi eƒe abɔ me, yi atike ʋeʋẽe kpowo gbɔ, ne wòanyi lã le abɔ me, eye wòaké dzogbenya.
Nye lɔlɔ̃tɔ la enye tɔnye, eye nye hã menye etɔ, eya, amesi nyia lãwo le dzogbenyawo me.
Xɔ̃nye, èdze tugbe abe Tirza ene, ènye abe Yerusalem ene, eye nèdzia ŋɔ abe aʋakɔ ene.
Ɖe ŋku ɖa le ŋunye, elabena wole ŋɔ dzim nam! Wo ɖa le abe gbɔ̃hawoe tsyɔ akɔ anyi de Gilead kɔgo ene.
Wo aɖuwo le abe alẽha, siwo do tso tsileƒe ene, wo katã wonye venɔwo, eye wo dometɔa ɖeke metsi ko o.
Wo tonuƒui le dzedzem le moxevɔ me abe yevuboɖa, si me wole ene.
Fiasrɔ̃wo le blaade, ahiãwo le blanyi, hekpe ɖe ɖetugbiwo ŋu kpaŋkpaŋ.
Ke ɖeka koe nye nye; ahɔne, nye ame dzadzɛ, eya nye dadaa ƒe tenu, nɔa ƒe nu vevi. Nyɔnuviwo kpɔe, eye woyrae, fiasrɔ̃wo kple ahiãwo kafui.
Amekae le anyi me kpɔmahe agudzedze ene, nyo ahe ɣleti ene, dza abe ɣe ene, eye wòdzia ŋɔ ahe aoakɔwo ene?
Meyi ɖe azibɔ me, ne makpɔ gbe fewo le bali me ɖa, eye maɖakpɔ be, weinkawo dze, eye yevuboɖatiwo ƒo se hã?
Nye didi kplɔm le manyamanya me yi ɖe nyee dukɔ ŋku la ƒe tasiaɖam gbɔe.
Trɔ, trɔ, Sulamit, trɔ, trɔ, ne míaɖe ŋku ɖe ŋuwò! Nuka míebe, yiewoakpɔ le Sulamit ŋu? Aʋaɣeɖuɖue loo?
Wo bubume vinyɔnu, aleke wò azɔlime nyo le atokota me ale? Wò kpenyenyẽ le ahe kɔdzonu, si nye aɖaŋua ƒe asinudɔwɔwɔ ene;
wò akɔnu enye ze tegblẽ, si me aha tɔtɔ mevɔna le o, wò ƒoɖo enye bli, si woli kɔe, eye dzogbenya ɖe to ɖee;
wò nowo le abe sãdevi eve, zi venɔvi ene;
wò kɔ enye nyiɖuxɔ tsrala; wò ŋkuwo le abe ta, si le Xesbon le Batrabim-gbo nu ene; wò ŋɔti le ahe Libanon ƒe xɔ tsrala, si ɖo ta Damasko ene.
Wò ta, si le nuwò, ɖi Karmel; wò taɖa le abe aɖabɛ ene; wò ɖa ɖe ga fia.
Edze tugbe, eye nenyo loo, wò lɔlɔ̃, si nye vivisesego!
Ele tsralɛ abe deti ene, eye wò nowo nye detawe.
Mebe, made deti la dzi, eye malé eƒe alɔwo. Wò nowo nenye weinkpo le weinka ŋu, eye wò ŋɔli ƒe ʋeʋẽ neɖi atɔtɔŋuti tɔ!
Wò nu me nenye wen nyuitɔ, si ato nuyi kple aɖu dzi na nye lɔlɔ̃tɔ wɔli.
Nye lɔlɔ̃tɔ tɔ menye, eye yonyeme mɔ dim wòle.
Nye lɔlɔ̃tɔ, va míado ayi gbe me, eye míanɔ koferseƒoƒowo me.
Míafɔ ŋdi kanya ayi weingblewo me, ne míakpɔ be, weinkaawo dze, seƒoƒoawo ke, eye yevuboɖatiawo ƒo se hã? Afima matsɔ nye lɔlɔ̃ na wò le.
Agbitsawo ƒe ʋeʋẽ gbagba ɖi, eye kutsetse nyui vovovowo le míaƒe ʋɔtru nu; nye lɔlɔ̃tɔ, medzra yeyeawo kple xoxoawo ɖo na wo.
Oo, esi nahanɔ nam abe nɔvinyeŋutsu, si no danye ƒe no ene ɖe! Anye ne mekpɔ wo le kpɔdome la, magbugbɔ nu na wò, eye amea ɖeke maɖo vlom o;
anye ne makplɔ wò ayi danye ƒe me, ayi nɔnye ƒe xɔ mee. Mana atike ʋeʋẽe ƒe wein kple yevuboɖaha wò nano.
Etsɔ eƒe mía de nye ta te, eye wòtsɔ eƒe nuɖusi kple kɔ nam.
Yerusalem-nyɔnuviwo, meta mi: Miganyɔ lɔlɔ̃ o, migaʋuʋui o, vaseɖe esime wòadze eya ŋutɔ ŋu hafi!
Ameka nye ekem tso gbe me gbɔna heziɔ ɖe eƒe lɔlɔ̃tɔ ŋu? Atɔtɔŋutiti le menyɔ wò le; afima dawò se veve dzi wò ɖo, afima nɔwò lé ku dzi wò ɖo.
Tsɔm wɔ ŋkɔslgɛ ɖe wò dzi ŋu kple ŋkɔsigɛ de wò asi! Elabena lɔlɔ̃ tri akɔ wu ku, eye ŋuʋaʋã se wu tsleƒe, eƒe bibi le abe dzo ƒe bibi ene, Yehowa ƒe dzoƒade wònye!
Tsi geɖe mate ŋu atsi lɔlɔ̃ o, eye tɔsisi gãwo mate ŋu akplɔe adzoe o. Ne amea ɖe be, yeatsɔ eƒe aƒe me kesinɔnuwo katã ana ɖe lɔlɔ̃ ta la, ɖeko woade alɔme te eŋu.
Nɔvinyɔnu suea ɖe le mia si, mekpɔ te no haɖe o. Aleke míawɔ na mía nɔvmyɔnu la, le gbesigbe woabia eta?
Nenye gbe wonye la, míatsɔ klosalo atɔ kpɔ ɖe edzi, eye nenye agboe wònye la, míatsɔ sederʋuƒowo aklãe.
Gli menye, eye nye nowo le ahe xɔ tsralawo ene; eye mekpɔ ŋutifafa le eŋku me.
Weingble le Salomo si le Baal-Hamon; etsɔ weingble la ɖe asi na dzikpɔlawo be, wo dome amesiame nana klosalo sekel akpe ɖeka ɖe kutsetseawo ta.
Nye weingble le nye ŋutɔ asinye me, Salomo, tɔwòe nye sekel akpe ɖeka, eye alafa eve enye kutsetse dzikpɔlawo tɔ!
Wò nyɔnu, si nɔa abɔ me, xɔlɔwo ƒu to anyi ɖe wò gbe ŋu; na masee!
Nye lɔlɔ̃tɔ, ɖe afɔ mi me, eye nanɔ abe sãde alo zivi, si le atike ʋeʋẽe towo dzi ene!
Esia nye ŋutega, si Yesaya, Amoz vi la, kpo le Yuda kple Yerusalem ŋu le Yuda-fiawo Uziya, Yotam, Axaz kple Xizkiya ŋɔli.
Mi dziƒowo, misee, eye anyigba, ƒu to anyi; elabena Yehowa le nu ƒom bena: Menyi viwo wotsi, eye medo wo ɖe dzi, ke wodze aglã ɖe ŋunye.
Nyitsu nyaa etoa, eye tedzi nyaa eƒe aƒetɔ ƒe lãto; ke Israel menyae o, eye nye dukɔ melé ŋku ɖe eŋu o.
Baba na mi anyigba dzi nɔlawo, dukɔ, si dzi fɔɖiɖi li kɔ ɖo, vodalawo ƒe viwo, vi gbegblẽ wo! Wogblẽ Yehowa ɖi, wodo ɖiŋu na Israel ƒe kɔkɔeto la, eye wogbugbɔ ɖe megbe.
Nukaŋuti woanɔ mia ƒoƒo dzi, esi miele godzedze dzi ɖaa? Ta blibo la xɔ abi, eye nu te dzi blibo la ŋu belibeli.
Teƒe nyuia ɖeke mele eŋu o, tso afɔƒo me vaseɖe dzodome: abi kple dodro kpakple ƒoƒo yeye; womeyɔ tsi le eme o, womeblae o, eye womeɖe ami ɖee wobɔbɔ o.
Miaƒe anyigba zu gbegbe; dzo fiã miaƒe duwo, eye du bubu me tɔwo ɖu miaƒe agble le mia ŋku me, eye wòzu gbegbe, abe alesi wogblẽ Sodom ene.
Eye Zion-nyɔnuvi tsi anyi abe agbadɔ le weingble me, abe miaƒe le adzamatregble me kple du, si woɖe to ɖo la ene.
Ɖe menye Yehowa Zebaot ye kpɔtɔ ame ʋeea ɖewo ɖi na mí o la, anye ne esuso vie ko miele abe Sodom ene, eye míeɖi Gomora!
Mi Sodom-amegãwo, mise Yehowa ƒe nya, mi Gomora-dukɔ, miƒu to anyi ɖe mía Mawu ƒe nufiame ŋu!
Yehowa be, Nuka miaƒe akpedavɔsa gbogboawo awɔ nam? Agbowo ƒe numevɔsa kple nyivi damiwo ƒe ami ti kɔ nam, eye nyiwo, alẽviwo kple gbɔ̃tsuwo ƒe ʋu medzea ŋunye o.
Ne mieva, be yewoado ɖe ŋkunye me la, amekae bia esia tso mia si be, mianɔ afɔ ƒom nye xɔxɔnuwo?
Migasa nuɖuvɔ alakpatɔ azɔ o, dzudzɔdonu nyɔŋu wònye nam. Dzinu yeyewo, dzudzɔgbewo kple gbeƒẽɖeɖe takpegbewo la, nyemate ŋu ado dzi atsɔ alakpa kple takpekpewo o!
Melé fu miaƒe dzinu yeyewo kple miaƒe ŋkekenyuiewo, wòzu agba nam, eye wo tsɔtsɔ glom.
Ne mieke miaƒe abɔwo la, matsyɔ nu ŋku me ɖe mi, eye ne mieli kɔ gbedodoɖa gleglegle hã la, nyemasee o, elabena ʋu yɔ asi me na mi!
Mile tsi, miklɔ mia ɖokui ŋu! Miɖe miaƒe nuwɔwɔ vɔ̃ɖiwo ɖa le ŋkunye me, eye midzudzɔ vɔ̃ɖiwɔwɔ!
Misrɔ̃ nu nyui wɔwɔ, miti nya dzɔdzɔe yome, mixɔ na amesi wote ɖe anyi, midrɔ̃ ʋɔnu na tsyɔ̃eviwo, eye mihe nya na ahosiwo!
Yehowa be: Miva mídrɔ̃ nɔ nu! Ne miaƒe nuvɔ̃wo le abe nyagadzĩ ene la, woafu abe sno ene, eye ne wòbiã abe aɖabɛ ene la, woazu abe alẽfu ene.
Ne mielɔ̃, eye mieɖo to la, ekema miaɖu anyigba ƒe nu nyuitɔ.
Ke ne miegbe, eye miesẽ to la, yi aɖu mi, elabena Yehowa ƒe nue gblɔe.
Aleke du wɔnuteƒe, si me nya dzɔdzɔe no tu la, zu gbolo? Afisi dzɔdzɔenyenye na tsã la, hlɔ̃dolawo li fifia!
Wò klosalo zu aŋuka, eye wotso tsi dzro wò wein!
Wò amegãwo zu aglãdzelawo kple fiafiwo xɔlɔ̃; wo dome amesiame lɔ̃a zãnunana, eye wotia fetu yome; womedrɔ̃a ʋɔnu na tsyɔ̃eviwo o, eye ahosiwo ƒe nya medea wo gbe o.
Eyata Aƒetɔ, Yehowa Zebaot, Israel ƒe ŋusẽtɔ la ƒe gbe enye si: Alele, mele akɔ fa ge na ɖokuinye ɖe nye ketɔwo ŋu, eye mele hlɔ̃ bia ge ɖe nye futɔwo ŋu.
Matrɔ nye asi ɖe ŋuwò, eye malólo wò aŋukawo abe adzalẽɖaɖi wotso wòe ene, eye maɖe wò tsumiwo katã ɖa.
Magaɖo ʋɔnudrɔ̃lawo na wò abe tsã ene, kple adaŋudelawo na wò abe le gɔmedzedzea me ene. Esia megbe woayɔ wò be dzɔdzɔenyenye ƒe du, du wɔnuteƒe.
Woatso ʋɔnudɔdrɔ̃ aɖe Zion, eye woatsɔ dzɔdzɔenyenye aɖe eƒe amesiwo trɔ ta me la.
Woagbã godzelawo kple nuvɔ̃wɔlawo siaa nyanyanya, eye amesiwo trɔ le Yehowa yome la nu ayi.
Elabena ŋu akpe mi le logoti, siwo ŋu miekpɔa dzidzɔ le la ŋu, eye miaƒe mo atsi dã le aba, siwo mielɔ̃na la ŋu.
Elabena mia ŋutɔwo mianɔ abe logoti, siwo ƒe aŋgba yrɔ, kple abɔ, si tsia ɖeke meli na o la ene.
Ame sesẽ la azu ɖetifu, eye eƒe dɔwɔwɔ azu dzoxi; wo kple eve la siaa woabi, eye amea ɖeke mate ŋu atsi wo o.
Nya, si Yesaya, Amoz vi la, kpo le Yuda kple Yerusalem ŋu la enye si:
Ava me le ŋkeke mlɔeawo me be, Yehowa ƒe aƒe ƒe to la akɔ ta agbɔ towo ŋu, eye wòaƒo togbɛwo ta, eye anyigba dzi dukɔwo katã aƒo zi ɖe eŋu.

Eye dukɔ geɖewo atso agblɔ bena: Mina míayi Yehowa ƒe to la, Yakob ƒe Mawu ƒe aƒe la gbɔ, ne wòafia nu mí le eƒe mawo ŋu, eye míazɔ eƒe toƒewo. Elabena nufiame atso Zion, eye Yehowa ƒe nya atso Yerusalem.

Adrɔ̃ ʋɔnu na anyigba dzi dukɔwo, eye woatso nya me na dukɔ geɖewo; woatso woƒe yiwo atu kodziwoe, eye woatso woƒe akplɔwo atu hɛ gobɛwoe; dukɔ magatso yi ɖe dukɔ ŋu azɔ o, eye womagasrɔ̃ aʋa wowu hã azɔ o.
Yakob ƒe aƒe, mitso, ne míazɔ le Yehowa ƒe kekeli me!
Etso wò dukɔ, Yakob ƒe aƒe la, ƒu gbe, elabena ɣedzeƒetɔwo ƒe afakaka yɔ wo fũ, wosa dzo abe Filistitowo ene, eye wona asi du bubu me viwo.
Klosalo kple sika yɔ eƒe anyigba dzi fũ, eye eƒe kesinɔnuwo teƒe mekɔ o; sɔwo yɔ eƒe anyigba dzi fũ, eye eƒe tasiaɖamwo teƒe mekɔ o.
Legbawo yɔ eƒe anyigba dzi fũ; wode ta agu na woawo ŋutɔwo ƒe asinudɔwɔwɔwo, nusiwo woawo ŋutɔwo ƒe asibide wɔ.
Ale amegbetɔ de ta agu, eye ŋutsu bɔbɔ eɖokui; màtsɔe ake wo o!
Yi ɖe agato me, eye naɣla ɖokuiwò ɖe ke me tso Yehowa ƒe ŋɔdzi kple eƒe gãnyenye ƒe atsyɔ̃ la nu!
Woabɔbɔ amegbetɔwo ƒe ŋku kɔkɔwo ɖe anyi, eye woate ŋutsuwo ƒe dàda ɖe to, ale be Yehowa ɖeɖeko lanye gã le ŋkeke ma dzi.
Elabena ŋkeke li na Yehowa Zebaot ɖe dadalawo katã kple ame kɔkɔwo, ɖe nusiwo katã kɔa ta dzi la ŋu, ne woabɔbɔ ɖe anyi;
ɖe Libanon ƒe sedertiwo katã, siwo ko, eye woƒo ta la ŋu, ɖe Basan ƒe logotiwo katã ŋu;
ɖe to kɔkɔwo katã kple togbɛ kɔkɔwo katã ŋu;
ɖe xɔ tsrala kɔkɔwo katã kple gli sesẽwo katã ŋu;
ɖe Tarsis-ʋuwo katã kple nukpɔkpɔ veviwo katã ŋu.
Woabɔbɔ amegbetɔwo ƒe adegbeƒoƒo ɖe anyi, eye woate ŋutsuwo ƒe dàda ɖe to, ne Yehowa ɖeɖeko nanye gã le ŋkeke ma dzi.
Eye legbawo nu ayi keŋkeŋ.
Eye wòayi kpetowo kple anyigba dzi dowo me tso Yehowa ƒe ŋɔdzi kple eƒe gãnyenye ƒe atsyɔ̃ nu, ne etso, be yeado ŋɔdzi na anyigba.
Gbemagbe la amegbetɔ atsɔ eƒe klosalolegba kple eƒe sikalegba, siwo wòwɔ, be yeade ta agu na la, aƒu gbe na alegeliwo kple agutɔwo,
ne wòayi agadowo kple kpetowo me tso Yehowa ƒe ŋɔdzi kple eƒe gãnyenye ƒe atsyɔ̃ la nu, ne etso, be yeado ŋɔdzi na anyigba.
Eyata miɖe asi le amegbetɔ, si ƒe ŋɔti me gbɔgbɔ le la ƒe nya me, elabena nukata gɔ̃ woabui ɖo?
Elabena kpɔ ɖa, Aƒetɔ, Yehowa Zebaot, aɖe atizɔti kple ziɔɖeŋu ɖa le Yerusalem kple Yuda, abolo ƒe xɔnamewo katã kple tsi ƒe xɔnamewo katã,
kalẽtɔwo kple aʋawɔlawo, ʋɔnudrɔ̃lawo kple nyagblɔɖilawo, afakalawo kple ame tsitsiwo,
ame blaatɔ̃wo ƒe amegãwo, ame ŋkutawo, adaŋudelavvo, aɖaŋuawo ƒe amegãwo kple dzotɔwo.
Matso ɖeviwo aɖo woƒe amegãwoe, eye ɖevinuwɔlawo aɖu fia ɖe wo dzi;
amewo asẽ ŋuta le wo nɔewo ŋu, eye amesiame le ehavi ŋu, ɖeviwo adze agbo ɖe amegã ɖeɖiwo ŋu, eye yakamewo ɖe bubumewo ŋu.
Ne amea ɖe alé nɔvia le fofoa ƒe me bena: „Avɔ le asiwò, eyata nanye míaƒe amegã, eye aƒe gbagbã sia nanɔ asiwò me“ la,
axɔ edzi agblɔ gbemagbe bena: „Nyemele abiwɔlaa ɖeke nye ge o, elabena abolo kple avɔa ɖeke mele aƒenye me o; migatsɔm ɖo dukɔ ƒe amegãe o!“
Elabena Yerusalem amũ, eye Yuda adze anyi, le esi woƒe aɖewo kple woƒe nuwɔwɔwo tso ɖe Yehowa ŋu, ne woaɖo dziku na eƒe kɔkɔenyenye ƒe ŋkuwo ta.
Woƒe moɖoɖo le ɖase ɖim le wo ŋu, eye woɖe woƒe nuvɔ̃wo fia faa abe Sodom ene, womeɣlae o; baba na wo, elabena woawo ŋutɔ ɖokui ŋu wole vɔ̃ wɔm ɖo.
Woayra ame dzɔdzɔewo, wo tɔ me nyo na wo, elabena woaɖu woƒe nuwɔwɔwo ƒe kutsetse.
Baba na ame vɔ̃ɖi, etɔ me vɔ̃e nɛ, elabena nusi eƒe asi wɔ la, eya woatsɔ awɔe.
Nye dukɔ ƒe ŋutasẽlawo nye ɖeviwo, eye nyɔnuwo ɖu fia ɖe wo dzi. Nye dukɔ, kplɔwòlawo nye ameflula wo, eye wobaɖa wò toƒe ƒe mɔwo.
Yehowa tso, be yeahe nya, etsi tre ɖi va, be yeadrɔ̃ ʋɔnu dukɔwo.
Yehowa kple eƒe dukɔ ƒe ame tsitsiwo kpakple eƒe amegãwo ɖi ʋɔnu be: Miawo miegblẽ nye weingble, eye mieha ame dahewo ƒe nuwo ɖe miaƒe xɔwo me.
Aƒetɔ, Yehowa Zebaot ƒe gbe enye si be: Nukaŋuti mienyã avuzi le nye dukɔ dzi, eye mieto hiãtɔwo ƒe mo nyanyanya?
Yehowa be: Esi Zion-nyɔnuviwo dana, eye wolia kɔ ganɛ nɔa yiyim, woɖoa mo ŋanɛ, wonɔa ble nyẽm xatsɛxatsɛ nɔa yiyim, eye woƒe afɔgawo nɔa ɖiɖim gleŋgleŋ la,
eyata Aƒetɔ la abebe ta na Zion-nyɔnuviwo, eye Yehowa aɖe ama wo.
Gbemagbe Aƒetɔ la aɖe afɔgɛwo ƒe atsyɔ̃ɖoɖo ɖa, ŋgoblanuwo, gaviwo,
togɛwo, abɔkpowo kple moxevɔwo,
takuwo, afɔwo dome kɔsɔkɔsɔwo, alidziblanuwo, anuwɔtregoewo kple kadodowo,
asigɛwo kple ŋɔtigɛwo,
atsyɔ̃vɔwo, awu ʋlayawo, taɖedziwo kple akplowo,
ahuhɔ̃ewo, awutewuiwo, tabablawo kple moxevɔ gãwo.
Ʋeʋẽ kũ axɔ ɖe ʋeʋẽ lilili teƒe, ka axɔ ɖe alidziblanu teƒe, tabebe axɔ ɖe ɖaƒoƒo teƒe, akpanyatata axɔ ɖe awu ʋlaya nyui teƒe, eye dzobi axɔ ɖe nyonyo teƒe.
Wò ŋutsuwo atsi yi nu, eye wò kalẽtɔwo atsi aʋa me.
Woƒe agbowo axa nu, woata konyi, eye woaɖi ƒuƒlu abɔbɔ nɔ anyigba.
Nyɔnu adre alé ŋutsu ɖeka gbemagbe agblɔ bena: Míaɖu mía ŋutɔwo ƒe abolo, eye míata mía ŋutɔwo ƒe avɔ; na woayɔ wò ŋkɔ de mía ŋu ko; ɖe míaƒe ŋukpe ɖa le mía ŋu.
Gbemagbe la Yehowa ƒe atidzedze anye atsyɔ̃ kple bubu, eye anyigba ƒe kutsetse anye adegbeƒoƒo, ɖekadzenu na Israel ƒe ame susɔeawo.
Eye ava me be, woayɔ amesiwo kpɔtɔ ɖe Zion kple amesiwo tsi Yerusalem, amesiame, si ŋko woŋlɔ ɖe agbagbeawo dome le Yerusalem la be kɔkɔewo,
nenye be, Aƒetɔ la tsɔ ʋɔnudɔdrɔ̃ ƒe ya kple dzo ƒe ya klɔ Zion-nyɔnuwo ƒe ɖiƒoƒo, eye wòkpala Yerusalem ƒe ʋu ɖa le wo dome.
Eye Yehowa aɖo alilikpo kple dzudzɔ ɖe Zion-to ƒe nɔƒewo katã kple eƒe takpeƒewo le ŋkeke me kpakple dzo keklẽ le zã me; elabena wòa tsyɔ nu atsyɔɖoɖowo katã dzi,
eye agbadɔ anɔ anyi anye vɔvɔli dodo le ŋkeke me le dzoxɔxɔ ta, eye wòanye sitsoƒe kple bebeƒe le dziya kple tsidzadza ta.
Mele ha dzi ge le xɔ̃nye ŋu, mele xɔ̃nye ƒe ha dzi ge le eƒe weingble ŋu. Weingblea ɖe le xɔ̃nye si le totame wɔnua ɖe.
Edzobo eme, eɖe kpewo le eme, eye wòdo weinka nyuitɔwo ɖe eme, etu xɔ tsrala ɖe etitina, ekpa weinfiãnu hã da ɖe eme hele mɔ kpɔm be, atse weintsetsewo; ke etse ʋukatsetsewo.
Eyata mi Yerusalemtɔwo kple mi Yuda-ŋutsuwo, midrɔ̃ nya le mía kple nye weingble la dome!
Nukae woawɔ na nye weingble la, eye nyemewɔe nɛ o? Nukaŋuti mele mɔ kpɔm be, atse weintsetsewo, eye wòtse ʋukatsetsewo?
Azɔ mana mianya nusi wɔ ge mala nye weingble la: Makaka kpo le eŋu, ne lãwo naɖui, magbã gli le eŋu, ne woazɔ edzi.
Mawɔe woazu afutime; womaɖe eŋu o, eye womaga eme o, ke boŋ aŋɔkawo kple ŋuwò amie ɖe eme; eye made se na alilikpowo be, womagadza tsi ɖe edzi azɔ o.
Elabena Israel ƒe aƒe lae nye Yehowa Zebaot ƒe weingble, eye Yuda ŋutsuwo nye eƒe dzidzɔkpɔkpɔ ƒe nudodowo: ekpɔ mɔ na afiatsotso, ke ʋukɔkɔɖie li; ekpɔ mɔ na nu dzɔdzɔe wɔwɔ, ke konyifafae li.
Baba na amesiwo le xɔ tsiãm ɖe xɔ nu, eye wole agble didim ɖe agble nu, vaseɖe esime teƒea ɖeke maganɔ anyi o, ne woawo ɖeɖe nanɔ anyigba dzi!
Yehowa Zebaot gblɔ ɖe to me nam bena: Ne xɔ gbogboawo matrɔ zu gbegbe, eye xɔ gã nyuiawo mazu xɔdowo o fĩ!
Elabena Weingble, si nyi eveve teƒe ewo aŋlɔ gbe ɖeka la, anye bat ɖeka, eye nuku gomer ɖeka anye eta ɖeka.
Baba na amesiwo tɔa fɔŋli hetia aha muame yome, eye wotsia anyi vaseɖe zãtiƒe, ne wein nade dzo lã me na wo!
Kasaŋkuwo, saŋkuwo, asiʋuiwo kple dzewo kpakple wein kpena ɖe woƒe aglotutu la ŋu; ke womeɖea ŋku ɖe Yehowa ƒe dɔwɔwɔ o, eye womekpɔa eƒe asinudɔwɔwɔ o.
Eyata woaɖe aboyo nye dukɔ le manyamanya me, woƒe ame ŋkutawo azu dɔwuitɔwo, eye tsikɔ awu woƒe amehawo ate wo ŋu.
Eyata tsieƒe ke eƒe ve me, eye wòke eƒe nu baa, eye Yerusalem ƒe atsyɔ̃, eƒe amehawo, eƒe howɔwɔ kple amesiwo kpɔa dzidzɔ le eme la, age ɖe eme.
Ekema amegbetɔ atsyɔ akɔ anyi, woabɔbɔ ŋutsu ɖe anyi, eye woate dàda ŋkuwò ɖe to;
Yehowa Zebaot anye gã le ʋɔnudɔdrɔ̃ me, eye Mawu kɔkɔe la akɔ eɖokui ŋu le dzɔdzɔenyenye me.
Alẽviwo aɖu gbe le afima, abe woawo ŋutɔ ƒe gbeɖuƒee wònye ene, eye lã tutɔwo aɖu nu le amidalawo ƒe aƒedowo me.
Baba na amesiwo tsɔa alakpaka dea vodada nɔa hehem, eye wotsɔa tasiaɖamka hea nuvɔ̃e!
Amesiwo noa gbɔgblɔm bena: Newɔ kabakaba, neƒo du ɖe eƒe dɔ nu, ne míakpɔe; eye Israel ƒe kɔkɔetɔ la ƒe adaŋudede nete va, ne miadze sii.
Baba na amesiwo yɔa vɔ̃ be nyui kple nyui be vɔ̃, amesiwo tsɔa viviti wɔa kekelii, eye wotso kekeli wo vivitii, amesiwo tsoa veve wɔa vivii, eye wotsɔa vivi wo vevee!
Baba na amesiwo bua wo ɖokui nunyalawoe, eye wonye nugɔmeselawo le woawo ŋutɔwo ŋku me.
Baba na amesiwo nye kalẽawo le weinnono me kple ŋutsuwɔlawo le aha muame toto me.
Amesiwo xɔa zãnu hetsona na ame vɔ̃ɖiwo, eye wodaa adzo nya dzɔdzɔe le ame dzɔdzɔewo si.

Eyata woƒe ke azu nu nyunyɔ abe ahɔ̃liti takpoe, si dzo ƒe aɖe fiã, kple gbe ƒuƒu, si nye afi ɖe dzo me la ene, eye woƒe seƒoƒo ami ya abe ʋuʋudedi ene, elabena wogbe Yehowa Zebaot ƒe nufiame, eye woɖe alɔme le Israel ƒe kɔkɔeto la ƒe nyawo ŋu.

Eyata Yehowa ƒe dɔmedzoe bi ɖe eƒe dukɔ ŋu, eye wòdo eƒe alo ɖe dzi heƒo wo, ale be towo dzo kpekpekpe, eye woƒe kukuawo tsi kpɔdome abe gbeɖuɖɔ ene. Ke to esiawo katã gbɔ hã la eƒe dɔmedzoe nu mefa o, eye eƒe alɔ gale dzi ko.
Akɔ aflaga dzi na dukɔa ɖe le didiƒe, eye wòala aku ayɔe tso anyigba ƒe mlɔenu, eye kpɔ ɖa, anɔ du dzi ava kaba.
Ɖeɖi mate amea ɖeke ŋu o, eye ame kudɔea ɖeke manɔ wo dome o; womada alɔ̃ o, eye womada akɔlɔ̃e o, alidziblanu matu le woƒe ali o, eye woƒe atokotaka matso o;
wonyre woƒe aŋutrɔwo, eye wovu woƒe dawo katã me; woƒe so wo ƒe afɔwo le abe kpe ene, eye woƒe tasiaɖamfɔwo ɖi ahom.
Wole gbe ɖem abe dzatanɔ ene, eye wole xaxlɔ̃m abe dzataviwo ene; wole gbe tem helé nu tso dzoe, eye amea ɖeke mate ŋu axɔe o.
Eye wòaɖe gbe ɖe eɖzi gbemagbe abe atsiaƒu ƒe gbeɖeɖe ene, eye ne woɖe ŋku ɖe anyigba dzi la, hiã ƒe blukɔ koe li, eye woƒe alilikpo na kekeli do viviti.
Le ƒe, si me fia Uziya ku la, mekpɔ Aƒetɔ la bɔbɔ nɔ fiazikpui kɔkɔ gãa ɖe dzi, eye eƒe awutoga yɔ gbedoxɔ la taŋ.
Serafiwo le eta me, wo dome ɖesiaɖe to aʋala adeade, wotsɔ wo ame eve tsyɔ ŋku me, wotsɔ eve tsyɔ afɔ, eye wotsɔ wo ame eve le dzodzomee.
Eye wodo ɣli ɖo ɖe wo nɔewo gblɔ bena: Kɔkɔe, kɔkɔe, kɔkɔe enye Yehowa Zebaot! Eƒe ŋutikɔkɔe yɔ anyigba blibo la dzi!
Ɣlidola la ƒe gbe na kpuiawo ƒe agunu ʋuʋu, eye dzudzɔ yɔ xɔ la taŋ.
Tete megblɔ be: Alele, evɔ nam! Elabena ame miyi makɔmakɔtɔ menye, eye mele dukɔ, si ƒe nuyi mekɔ o la dome, elabena nye ŋkuwo kpɔ fia Yehowa Zebaot.
Tete Serafiwo dometɔ ɖeka dzo va gbɔnye, eye wòlé kpe xɔdzo hẽ, si wotsɔ abe ɖe le vɔsamlekpuia me la, ɖe asi;
eye wòtsɔe lili nu nam gblɔ bena: Kpɔ ɖa, esia ka nuyi ŋu na wo, wò vodadawo ɖe ɖa, eye wòlé avu wò nuvɔ̃wo.
Tete mese Aƒetɔ la ƒe gbe wògblɔ bena: Ameka madɔ, eye ameka ayi na mí? Tete megblɔ bena: Nyee nye esi, dɔm!
Eye wògblɔ bena: Yi naɖagblɔ na dukɔ sia bena: Minɔ nusese dzi ko, ke mígase nu gɔme o; minɔ nukpɔkpɔ dzi, ke migadze si nu o.
Na dukɔ sia ƒe dzi naku atri, tsi to nɛ, eye natre eƒe ŋkuwo, ne magakpɔ nu kple eƒe ŋkuwo, wòase nu kple eƒe towo, eye wòase nu gɔme kple eƒe dzi, ne wòatrɔ la me, eye eƒe lãme nahaya o.
Tete megblɔ bena: Aƒetɔ, vaseɖe ɣekaɣie? Eɖo ŋu bena: Vaseɖe esime duwo nagbã, eye woazu aƒedo, xɔwo nazu xɔdo, eye anyigba nazu gbegbe,
vaseɖe esime Yehowa nakplɔ amewo adzoe, eye gbegbewo nasɔ gbɔ ɖe anyigba la dzi.
Eye ne akpa ewolia susɔ la, woagatsrɔ̃ eya hã ɖa; ke abe alesi ne wolã sesewu kple logoti, eye takpoea kpɔtɔna la, nenema ƒome kɔkɔe la anye takpoea.
Le Yuda-fia Axaz, Uziya vi Yotam ƒe vi ŋɔli la Aram-fia Rezin kple Israel-fia Remalya ƒe vi Pekax woho aʋa va Yerusalem ɖe wo ŋu, ke womete ŋu wɔ aʋa kpli wo o.
Eye wova gblɔ na Dawid ƒe aƒe la bena: Aram ƒu asaɖa anyi ɖe Efrayim. Tete eya kple eƒe dukɔ ƒe dzi ʋuʋu nyanyanya, abe alesi avemetiwo ʋuʋuna le ya nu ene.
Tete Yehowa gblɔ na Yesaya bena: Mia kple viwò Sear-Yasub mido yi ɖakpe Axaz le dzigbeta la ƒe tɔʋu ƒe mlɔenu le avɔnyãla ƒe agblemɔ to,
eye nagblɔ nɛ bena: Kpɔ ɖokui wò dzi, eye nanɔ anyi kpoo! Megavɔ̃ o, eye dzi megaɖe le ƒowò le dzoti takpoe eve, siwo le dzudzɔ tum, le Rezin kple Aram kpakple Remalya vi ƒe dɔmedzoe la ta o.
Esi Aram, Efrayim kple Remalya vi woɖo vɔ̃ ɖe ŋuwò gblɔ bena,
mina míaho ɖe Yuda ŋu, míado ŋɔdzi nɛ, eye míaxɔe na mía ɖokui atsɔ Tabeal vi aɖo fiae ɖe eɖzi la,
ale Aƒetɔ Yehowa gblɔ esi: Maɖze edzi o, eye mava me o!
Elabena Aram ƒe ta enye Damasko, eye Damasko ƒe ta enye Rezin, eye le ƒe blaade vɔ atɔ̃ me la woagbã Efrayim gudugudu, eye maganye dukɔ azɔ o.
Efrayim ƒe ta enye Samaria, eye Samaria ƒe ta enye Remalya vi. Ne miexɔe se o la, ekema mianɔ te hã o!
Eye Yehowa gaƒo nu kple Axaz gblɔ bena:
Bia dzesi tso Yehowa, wò Mawu la si, eɖanye tso tsieƒe ke alo tso dziƒo ʋĩ o.
Tete Axaz gblɔ bena: Nyema-biae o, ne nyemahayi Yehowa te ge akpɔ o.
Eye wògblɔ bena: Dawid ƒe aƒe la, misee: Nu tsɛ wònye na mi be, miana nu nati ko na amegbetɔ, hafi miehe, yewoana nu nati ko na nye Mawua ke hã?
Eyata Aƒetɔ la ŋuta ana dzesi mi: Kpɔ ɖa, ɖetugbi afɔ fu, eye wòadzi ŋutsuvi ana ŋkɔe be „Mawu li kpli mí“.
Notsi kpekẽ kple anyitsi wòano, vaseɖe esime wòanya vɔ̃tsitsri kple nyuitiatia.
Elabena hafi ɖevi la nava nya vɔ̃tsitsri kple nyuitiatia la, anyigba, si ƒe fia wo kple eve le ŋɔ dzim na wò la, lazu gbegbe!
Eye Yehowa akplɔ Asur-fia aƒu mia kple wò dukɔ kpakple fofowò ƒe aƒe, ŋkeke, siwo meva kpo tso esime Efrayim klã ɖa le Yuda ŋu o!
Eye woava me le ŋkeke ma dzi be, Yehowa ala aku ayɔ togbato, siwo le Egipte-tsiwo ƒe mlɔenu, kple anyi, siwo le Asur-nyigba dzi,
eye wo katã woava aƒo ɖe bali globowo kple kpetowo kple ŋuvegoewo katã kpakple lãnyiƒewo katã.
Gbemagbe la Aƒetɔ la aɣe talũhɛ, si nye Asur-fia tso tɔsisi la ƒe go keme, alũ ta kple aŋɔ me fu nɛ, eye wòaƒlɔ ge nɛ.
Eye woava me le ɣemaɣi be, ame ɖeka anyi nyinɔvi ɖeka kple alẽvi eve.
Eye le esi notsi bɔ ta la, woano notsi kpekẽ, elabena amesiwo kpɔtɔ ɖe anyigba dzi la dometɔ ɖesiaɖe ano notsi kpekẽ kple anyitsi.
Eye wòava me le ɣemaɣi be, afisi weinka akpe le, eye woxɔa klosalo sekel akpe la, lazu aŋɔka kple ŋuwò.
Aŋutrɔ kple da woatso yi afimae, elabena aŋɔka kple ŋuwò axɔ anyigba blibo la dzi.
Eye womagate ŋu aɖe to, siwo katã wotso agblenu ŋlɔ tsã la dzi o le aŋɔka kple ŋuwò vovɔ̃ ta, eye woazu nyikplɔƒe kple alẽwo toƒe.
Eye Yehowa gblɔ nam bena: Tso nuŋlɔkpe gãa ɖe, eye naŋlɔ nuŋɔŋlɔ hahootɔ ɖe edzi bena: Aboyonu, afɔ netsɔ, nuhaha, va kaba!
De ɖasefo wɔnuteƒe wo nam: nunɔla Uriya kple Zaxarya, Yeberexya vi.
Eye mete de nyɔnu nyagblɔɖila ŋu wòto fu, eye wòdzi ŋutsuvi. Tete Yehowa gblɔ nam be: Yɔ eƒe ŋkɔ be „Aboyonu, afɔ netsɔ, nuhaha, va kaba!“
Elabena hafi ɖevi la nade asi fofo kple dada yɔyɔ me la, woatso Damasko ƒe kesinɔnuwo kple Samaria ƒe aboyonuwo adze Asur-fia ŋgɔe.
Eye Yehowa gaƒo nu kplim gblɔ bena:
Esi dukɔ sia do vlo Siloa-tsi, si sina blewu la, eye wòkpɔ dzidzɔ kple Rezin kpakple Remalya vi la,
eyata Aƒetɔ la akplɔ tɔsisi la ƒe tsi gã sẽŋuwo ava ƒo ɖe wo dzi, si nye Asur-fia kple eƒe ŋusẽ blibo; ayɔ eƒe baliwo katã me, eye wòagbagba eƒe tɔgowo katã,
asi ato Yuda, eye aɖo agbagba vaseɖe ve ke, eye eƒe aʋala, siwo ke la, asa wò anyigba ƒe kekeme. Mawu ti kpli mí!
Mi dukɔwo, midze agbo, eye dzi neɖe le mia ƒo; mi amesiwo katã le didiƒe le anyigba dzi la, miƒu to anyi! Mibla ali dzi, eye dzi neɖe le mia ƒo, ẽ, mibla ali dzi, eye dzi neɖe le mia ƒo!
Ne miede adaŋu la, woagblẽ eme, ne mieɖo gbe ɖi la, mava me o; elabena Mawu li kpli mí!
Elabena ale Yehowa ƒo nu kplim, eye eƒe asi nu sẽ ɖe dzinye wogbe nya nam be, nyemagazɔ dukɔ sia ƒe mo dzi o hegblɔ bena:
Migayɔ nusiwo katã dukɔ sia yɔna be nugbeɖoɖo la, be nugbeɖoɖo o, migavɔ̃ nusi wovɔ̃na la o, eye megadzi ŋɔ na mi o.
Mibu Yehowa Zebaot kokoe, eye eya nenye vovɔ̃ kple ŋɔdzi na nu.
Azu kɔkɔeƒe, ke anye nuɖiaɖia ƒe kpe kple agakpe kikli na Israel ƒe aƒe eveawo, eye anye mɔ̃ kple adoboli na Yerusalemtɔwo;
eye ame geɖewo aklii adze anyi ahaŋe keŋkeŋ, eye mɔ̃ aɖe wo alé wo.
Bia ɖaseɖiɖi la, eye natre nufiame la nu ɖe nye nusrɔ̃viwo me.
Eyata mele Yehowa, amesi tsyo nu eƒe ŋku me ɖe Yakob ƒe aƒea la sinu dzɔm, eye mele mɔ kpɔm nɛ.
Kpɔ ɖa, mía kple vi, siwo Yehowa tsɔ nam la, míenye dzesi kple kpɔɖeŋu le Israel tso Yehowa Zebaot, amesi le Zionto dzi la gbɔ.
Ne wogblɔ na mi be, mibia nu ŋɔliyɔlawo kple afakalawo se, amesiwo nɔa ŋɔti me gbee dom, eye wonɔa gbe tem la, ɖe dukɔ mabia nu eƒe Mawu ase oa? De woabia nu kukuawo na agbagbeawoa?
Mitrɔ ɖe nufiame kple ɖaseɖiɖi la ŋu! Ne womegblɔ alea o la, ekema agu medze na wo o.
Woanɔ tsa glãla tsam, woate wo ɖe anyi, eye do awu wo, eye ne do le wo wum la, wòado dziku ahaƒo fi ade woƒe fia kple woƒe Mawu. Eye ne wofa ko dzi
alo wode ko to la, kpo ɖa, xaxa kple viviti li; xaxa ƒe tsizi kple blukɔ me woatutu wo ade.
Elabena afisi xaxa le la, matsi viviti me o. Tsã la eɖi gbɔ Zebulon-nyigba kple Naftali-nyigba, emegbe la ade bubu ƒutamɔ, si le Yordan ƒe go keme la ŋu, si nye dukɔwo ƒe anyigba.
Dukɔ, si le viviti me zɔm la, kpɔ kekeli gãa ɖe, amesiwo le blukɔ tsiɖitsiɖi ƒe anyigba dzi la, kekeli klẽ ɖe wo dzi.
Edzi dukɔ la ɖe edzi, eye nena dzidzɔ do gã; wokpɔ dzidzɔ le ŋkuwò me, abe alesi wokpɔa dzidzɔ le nuŋeɣi ene, abe alesi wotsoa aseye, ne wòmã aboyonu ene.
Elabena èŋe woƒe agba ƒe kɔkuti, ati, si le woƒe kɔʋu me, kple wo kplɔlawo ƒe ati, abe Midian ŋɔli ene.
Elabena wòtɔ dzo amesiwo ƒo aʋazi la ƒe afɔkpawo katã kple awu, siwo wobliba ɖe ʋu me la, eye dzo afiã wo.
Elabena wodzi vi na mí, eye wona ŋutsuvi mí, dziɖuɖu le abɔta nɛ, eye wotso ŋkɔ nɛ be; Nukunu, adaŋudela, Mawu kalẽtɔ, fofo mava, ŋutifafafia,

ne eƒe dziɖuɖu nakeke ta, eye seƒeɖo manɔe na ŋutifafa le Dawid ƒe fiazikpui dzi kple eƒe fiaɖuƒe la me o, ne wòafɔe ɖe te, eye wòatsɔ ʋɔnudɔdrɔ̃ dzɔdzɔe ali kee tso fifia ɖaseɖe mavɔ me. Yehowa Zebaot ƒe ŋuʋaʋã awɔ esia ade goe.
Aƒetɔ la gblɔ nya ɖo ɖe Yakob, eye wòva ƒo ɖe Israel dzi,
ne dukɔ blibo la nadze sii hekpe ɖe Efrayim kple Samaria-tɔwo ŋu, amesiwo nɔa gbɔgblɔm le adegbeƒoƒo kple dàda me be:
„Anyikpewoe mũ dze anyi, ke miatsɔ gãwo atui, gbotiwoe wolã, ke míado sedertiwo ɖe wo teƒe.“
Eye Yehowa do Rezin ƒe ketɔwo ɖe dzi ɖe eŋu, eye wòde akiti lã me na eƒe futɔwo:
Aram tso ɣedzeƒe, eye Filistitowo tso ɣetoɖoƒe, eye woɖu Israel wòyɔ nu me na wo. Ke to esiawo katã gbɔ hã eƒe dɔmedzoe nu mefa o, eye eƒe alo gale dzi ko.
Eye dukɔ la metrɔ ɖe amesi ƒoe la ŋu o, eye womedi Yehowa Zebaot yome mí o.
Eye Yehowa tsrɔ̃ la kple asike, deʋaya kple keti ɖa tso Israel le ŋkeke ɖeka dzi.
Ame tsitsiwo kple ame ŋkutawo nye ta la, eye nyagblɔɖila, siwo baa atakpadada la, wonye asike la.
Dukɔ sia kplɔlawo nye ameblelawo, eye amesiwo woble la, wobu.

Eyata Aƒetɔ la makpɔ dzidzɔ le woƒe ɖekakpuiwo ŋu o, eye mave woƒe tsyɔ̃eviwo kple ahosiwo nu o, elabena wo katã wonye ame vɔ̃ɖiwo kple nu tovo wɔlawo, eye nusianu gblɔa nya gbegblẽ. Ke to esiawo katã gbɔ hã eƒe dɔmedzoe nu mefa o, eye eƒe alɔ gale dzi ko.
Elabena vɔ̃ɖiwɔwɔ le bibim abe dzo ene, efiã aŋɔkawo kple ŋuwò, eye wòtɔ dzo ave dodowo, ale be dzudzɔ de dzi kɔtɔɔ.
Yehowa Zebaot ƒe dziku na dzo ƒo anyigba, eye dukɔ la le abe dzo ƒe nuɖuɖu ene; amea ɖeke mekpɔ nɔvia ta o.
Wole tsyo dam nu le ɖusi me, ke dɔwuame nu mefa o, wole nu ɖum le mia me, ke womeɖi ƒo o, amesiame ɖu eya ŋutɔ ƒe abɔ ƒe lã;
Manase ɖu Efrayim, eye Efrayim ɖu Manase; woa kple eve la siaa wotso ɖe Yuda ŋu. Ke to esiawo katã gbɔ ha eƒe dɔmedzoe nu mefa o, eye eƒe alɔ gale dzi ko.
Baba na amesiwo tsɔ ɖoɖo gbegblẽwo wɔ see, kple agbalẽŋlɔla, siwo le ameteteɖanyi ŋlɔm ɖi,
ne woate ame dahewo ƒe nya ɖe to, eye woada adzo nya dzɔdzɔe le nye dukɔ ƒe hiãtɔwo si, ne ahosiwo nazu woƒe aboyonu, eye woaha tsyɔ̃eviwo!
Nuka miawɔ le gbesigbe wotu eŋu fe, eye gbegblẽ tso adzɔge va? Ameka miasi atso, eye afika miagblẽ miaƒe kesinɔnuwo ɖo?
Ke boŋ ame labɔbɔ ɖe gatɔwo dome, eye wòadze anyi ɖe ame tsiaʋawo dome. Ke to esiawo katã gbɔ hã la eƒe dɔmedzoe nu mefa o, eye eƒe alɔ gale dzi ko!
Baba na Asur, nye dɔmedzoe ƒe ameƒoti wònye, eye nye dziku ƒe ati le esi me.
Medɔe ɖe dukɔ vɔ̃ɖi la ŋu, eye meɖe gbe nɛ ɖe nye dɔmedzoe ƒe dukɔ la ŋu, ne wòaɖe aboyo, wòaha nu, eye wòafanyae abe ba le kpɔdome ene.
Ke eya mesusu alea o, eye mebu ɖe dzi me alea o, ke boŋ eɖo ɖe ta be, yeagblẽ nu, eye yeatsrɔ̃ dukɔ geɖewo.
Elabena egblɔ be: Ɖe nye amegãwo katã menye fiawo oa?
Ɖe meva me na Kalno abe Karkemis ene, Xamat abe Arpad ene, Samaria abe Damasko ene oa?
Alesi nye asi tu fiaɖuƒe siawo kple woƒe legba, siwo nyo wu Yerusalem kple Samaria tɔwoe la,
ɖe nyemawɔ Yerusalem kple eƒe legbawo, abe alesi mewo Samaria kple eƒe legbawo ene oa?
Eye ava me, ne Aƒetɔ la awu eƒe dɔwo katã nu ɖe Zion-to la kple Yerusalem ŋu vɔ la, atu Asur-fia ƒe dada ƒe kutsetse kpakple eƒe dadaŋku ƒe adegbeƒoƒo ŋu fe nɛ.
Elabena egblɔ be: Nye asi ƒe ŋusẽ kple nye nunya metsɔ wɔe, elabena mese nu gɔme, meɖe dukɔwo ƒe liƒowo ɖa, eye metutu fiazikpui dzi nɔlawo ƒu anyi abe ŋusẽtɔ ene;
nye asi tu dukɔwo ƒe kesinɔnuwo abe xevitɔ ene, abe alesi wolɔa azi, siwo dzi xeviwo dzo le lae la, nenema mele anyigba blibo lae, eye amea ɖeke meƒo aʋala alo ke dɔ heyi xɔxlɔ̃ ge o.
Ɖe fía aƒo adegbe ɖe amesi tsɔe le nu lãmee la ŋua? Alo ɖe laxalaxa atɔ asi akɔ ɖe amesi le ehem la ŋua? Ɖe ati anye amesi fɔe ɖe dzi la ɖa? Eye ɖe atizɔti akɔ nusi menye ati o la dzia?
Eyata Aƒetɔ, Yehowa Zebaot, aɖo kpexlẽ ɖe eƒe ame damiwo dome, eye eƒe aʋakɔ abi, abe alesi dzo binae ene.
Israel ƒe kekeli azu dzo, eye eƒe kɔkɔetɔ la azu dzoƒaɖe ahabi eƒe aŋɔkawo kple ŋuwo le ŋkeke ɖeka dzi, eye wòafiã wo;
agblẽ eƒe ave kple atibɔwo tso tu me vaseɖe tsrokpa dzi, eye wo nu ayi abe dɔnɔ ene;
woate ŋu axlẽ eƒe avemeti susɔeawo, eye ɖevi ɖeka ade wo agbalẽ me.
Eye wòava me le ɣemaɣi be, Israel ƒe ame susɔeawo kple Yakob ƒe aƒe ƒe ame sisiwo magaɖo dzi ɖe amesi ƒo wo la ŋu azɔ o, ke boŋ woaɖo dzi ɖe Yehowa, Israel ƒe kɔkɔetɔ la ŋu le nyateƒe me.
Ame susɔeawo atrɔ. Yakob ƒe ame susɔeawo atrɔ ɖe Mawu ŋusẽtɔ la ŋu.
Elabena Israel, ne wò dukɔ le abe ƒutake ene hã la, ame mamleawo koe atrɔ ta me. Woɖo gbegblẽ, eye dzɔdzɔenyenye gbagba ɖi!
Elabena Aƒetɔ, Yehowa Zebaot, ahe tsɔtsrɔ̃, si wòɖo kplikpaa la, ava anyigba blibo la dzi.
Eyata ale Aƒetɔ, Yehowa Zebaot, gblɔ esi: Nye dukɔ, si le Zion, megavɔ̃ Asur, si tso ati, be yeaƒo woe, eye, wòka atizɔti dzi ɖe ŋuwò abe Egipte ene la o!
Elabena ekpɔtɔ vie ko dziku la nu natso, eye nye dɔmedzoe natrɔ ɖe wo ŋu, ne woatsrɔ̃ wo.
Yehowa Zebaot aɖe atam ɖe wo dzi, abe alesi wòƒo Midian le Oreb-kpe la gbɔ ene, eye eƒe atìkplɔ anɔ atsiaƒu dzi, abe alesi wòdoe ɖe dzi ɖe Egipte ŋu ene.
Eye ava me le ɣemaɣi be, eƒe agba aɖe le wò abɔta kple eƒe kɔkuti le wò ko, eye kɔkuti la aŋe le amidada ta.
Eva dze Ayat dzi, eto Migron, eye wòva gblẽ eƒe nuwo ɖe Mixmas.
Woto to dome mo, eye wotsi Geba dɔ. Rama dzo nyanyanya, Saul ƒe Gibea de afɔ du me!
Galim-nyɔnuvi ɖo boboe; Laisa ƒu to anyi; nublanuitɔ enye Anatot!
Madmena si, Gebim-tɔwo ɖe ato du me!
Egbea ke wòadze aʋa ɖe Nob, eye wòanye eƒe asi ɖe Zion-nyɔnuvi ƒe to, Yerusalem ƒe togbe la ŋu.
Kpo ɖa, Aƒetɔ, Yehowa Zebaot, atsɔ ŋɔdzidodo alã atilɔwo, atso esiwo de dzi bobobo, eye kɔkɔtɔwo amũ;
woatso lãnu aƒo ave dodowo, eye ŋusẽtɔ la amũ Libanon aƒu anyi.
Eye atilɔ amie tso Isai ƒe atitakpo me, eye dzedze atso eƒe ke me atse ku.
Eye Yehowa ƒe gbɔgbɔ, si nye nunya kple gɔmesese ƒe gbɔgbɔ, adaŋu dede kple ŋusẽ ƒe gbɔgbɔ, sidzedze kple Yehowa vovo ƒe gbɔgbɔ la, anɔ edzi.
Yehowa vɔvɔ̃ ƒe nu anyo eŋu, madrɔ̃ ʋɔnu ɖe nusi eƒe ŋku le kpɔkpɔm la nu o, eye matso afia ɖe nusi eƒe to le sesem la nu o.
Adrɔ̃ ʋɔnu na ame dahewo le dzɔdzɔenyenye me, eye woatso afia na anyigba dzi hiãtɔwo ɖe eteƒe; atsɔ eƒe nu me likplɔ aƒo ŋutasẽla la, eye woatso eƒe nu me gbɔgbɔ awu ame vɔ̃ɖi lae.
Dzɔdzɔenyenye anye alidziblanu le eƒe ali, eye nyateƒe anye alidziblanu le eƒe aklito.
Amegãxi ana alẽvi gbɔ, lãkle atsyɔ akɔ ɖe gbɔ̃vi gbɔ, nyivi, dzata kple nyi dami woana wo nɔewo gbɔ, eye ŋutsuvi suea ɖe akplɔ wo.
Nyinɔ kple sisiblisinɔ woaɖu gbe, eye wo viwo atsyɔ akɔ ɖe afi ɖeka. Dzata aɖu gbe abe nyi ene.
Ɖevi nono ate le ƒli ƒe do nu, eye ɖevi, si ɖi no la, aƒo asi ɖe dakpui ƒe do me.
Womawɔ vɔ̃a ɖeke o, eye womahe gbegblẽ ava nye tonyigba kɔkɔe blibo la dzi o, elabena sidzedze Yehowa xa anyigba la dzi, abe alesi tsi yɔ atsiaƒu me ene.
Eye woava me le ɣemaɣi be, dukɔwo adi Isai ƒe ke, si nye aflaga li na anyigba dzi dukɔwo la yome, eye eƒe gbɔɖemeƒe anye atsyɔ̃.
Eye woava me le ɣemaɣi be, Aƒetɔ la ado eƒe asi ɖa zi evelia, ne wòaxɔ eƒe dukɔ mamlea, si kpɔtɔ ɖi la, aƒle tso Asur, Egipte, Patros, Kus, Elam, Sinear, Xamat kple atsiaƒu me ƒukpowo dzi.
Akɔ aflaga dzi na dukɔwo, eye wòaƒo Israel ƒe amesiwo woava de gbe kple Yuda-nyɔnu, siwo wokaka hlẽ la nu ƒu tso anyigba ƒe go eneawo dzi.
Efrayim ƒe ŋuʋaʋã nu atso, eye woatsrɔ̃ Yuda ƒe ketɔwo. Efrayim mana ŋu Yuda o, eye Yuda maxaxa Efrayim ɖo o.
Woadzo ɖe abɔta na Filistitowo le ƒu gome, eye woaƒo ƒu aɖaha ɣedzeƒeviwo, woake asi ɖe Edom kple Moab ŋu, eye Amon-viwo aɖo to wo.
Yehowa ana Egipte-ƒu la ƒe ado namie, eye anyẽ eƒe asi ɖe tɔsisi la dzi le eƒe ya sesẽ me, eye wòamãe ɖe tonu adre me, ale be woano atokota me atsoe.
Eye wòanye ma tata na eƒe dukɔ ƒe ame mamlea, siwo akpɔtɔ tso Asur, abe alesi wònɔ na Israel, esime wòʋu tso Egipte-nyigba dzi la ene.
Ɣemaɣi la àgblɔ bena: Mekafu wò, Yehowa, elabena edo dɔmedzoe ɖe ŋunye, ke wò dɔmedzoe nu fa, eye nève nunye.
Kpɔ ɖa, Mawu enye nye xɔname, dzi le ƒonye, nyemavɔ̃ o; elabena nye ŋusẽ kple nye hadzidzi enye Yehowa, ẽ, Yehowa, eye eya zu nye xɔname!
Eye miadu tsi le xɔname ƒe vudowo me kple dzidzɔ
ahagblɔ le ɣemaɣi be: Mikafu Yehowa, miyɔ eƒe ŋkɔ, miɖe eƒe nuwɔwɔwo fia le dukɔwo dome, miɖe gbe ƒãe be, eƒe ŋkɔ de dzi.
Midzi ha na Yehowa, elabena ewɔ nu klitsuwo; woanya esia le anyigba blibo la dzi.
Zion-nɔla, kpɔ dzidzɔ, eye natso aseye, elabena Israel ƒe kɔkɔetɔ la tri akɔ le dowò me.
Nya, si Yesaya, Amoz vi la, kpɔ ɖe Babel ŋu enye si:
Mitu aflaga ɖe to ƒeƒle la ta me, mido ɣli yɔ wo, mimiã asi wo, ne woage ɖe amegãwo ƒe du la me!
Medɔ nye ame kɔkɔewo, meyɔ nye kalẽtɔwo, nye aseyetsolawo kple adegbeƒolawo ɖe nye dɔmedzoe la ŋu.
Miƒu to anyi, zi le ɖiɖim le towo dzi abe dukɔ geɖewo tɔ ene; fiaɖuƒewo kple anyigba dzi dukɔ, siwo kpe ta la ƒe howɔwɔ le ɖiɖim. Yehowa Zebaot le aʋakɔwo xlẽm!
Wotso anyigba didi dzi, tso dziƒo ƒe mlɔenu, Yehowa kple eƒe dziku ƒe dɔwɔnuwo, ne woagblẽ anyigba blibo la.
Mifa avi, elabena Yehowa ƒe ŋkeke la tu aƒe, egbɔna abe ŋusẽkatãtɔ ƒe nugbegblẽ ene.
Eyata asiwò katã ado agblɔ, eye amegbetɔwo ƒe dziwo katã alólo gbanaa.
Dzidzi ƒo wo, nutsoame kple veve lé wo, eye wole ku lém abe nyɔnu dzivi ene; wofa ŋku ɖe wo nɔewo dzi gã, eve woƒe mo le vem hẽ!
Kpɔ ɖa, Yehowa ƒe ŋkeke dziŋɔ la gbɔna, dziku kple dɔmedzoe heliheli, ne wòado gbegbe anyigba la, eye woatsrɔ̃ nuvɔ̃wɔlawo ɖa le edzi.
Elabena dziƒoɣletiviwo kple woƒe avũ kple avũtɔwo mana woƒe kekeli naklẽ o, ne ɣe dze la, ado viviti, eye ɣleti mana eƒe kekeli naɖi o.
Matu xexeame ƒe vɔ̃ɖiwɔwɔ kple ame vɔ̃ɖiwo ƒe vodada ŋu fe na wo, mana dadalawo ƒe dada nu natso, eye mate ŋutasẽlawo ƒe adegbeƒoƒo ɖe to.
Mana amegbetɔ nave abe sika nyuitɔ ene, eye ame kodzogbea abe Ofir-sika ene.
Eyata matsɔ Yehowa Zebaot ƒe dzikudodo kple eƒe dɔmedzoedogbe ana dziƒo nadzo kpekpekpe, eye anyigba naʋuʋu le enɔƒe.
Ava me na wo abe sãde, si wonyã ɖe nu, kple alẽ, siwo amea ɖeke mele wo nu o la ene; amesiame atu ta eƒe dukɔ gbɔ, eye amesiame asi ayi eƒe anyigba dzi.
Woada nu amesi ke woakpɔ, eye amesi ke asi tu la, atsi yi nu;
woaxlã wo viwo ɖe nu le wo ŋku me, woaha woƒe aƒewo, eye woade asi wo srɔ̃wo ŋu.
Kpɔ ɖa, made adã Mediatɔwo ƒe ta me ɖe wo ŋu, amesiwo mebua klosalo o, eye sika medzroa wo o;
woƒe dawo tea ɖekakpuiwo, womekpɔa nublanui na fu nɔdɔmee o, eye woƒe ŋkuwò mevea ɖeviwo nu o.
Ale woava me na Babel, si nye fiaɖuƒewo ƒe nu vevi kple Kaldea-tɔwo ƒe adegbeƒoƒo kple atsyɔ la, abe alesi Mawu trɔ Sodom kple Gomora bu anyi ene.
Womatso aƒe ɖe afima akpɔ o tegbee, eye wòatsi anyi aƒedoe tso dzidzime yi dzidzime, Arabiatɔwo matu agbadɔ ɖe afima o, eye lãkplɔviwo mana lãwo natsyɔ akɔ ɖe afima o;
gbemelãwo atsyɔ akɔ ɖe afima, eye favieʋuto ayɔ woƒe xɔwo me, golowo atso aƒe ɖe afima, eye azizãwo aɖi adzra le afima.
Gbevũwo axlã le woƒe dziƒoxɔwo me kple amegãxiwo le woƒe agbeɖuɖu ƒe fiasãwo me. Woƒe ɣeyiɣi tu aƒe, eye woƒe ŋkeke mahe ɖe megbe o.
Elabena Yehowa ave Yakob nu, eye wòagatia Israel ahakplɔ wo aɖo woƒe anyigba dzi, du bubu me tɔwo akpe ɖe wo ŋu, eye woaku ɖe Yakob ƒe aƒe la ŋu.
Woakplɔ dukɔwo ayi wo teƒee, eye woazu Israel ƒe aƒe la tɔ anye dɔlaŋutsuwo kple dɔlanyɔnuwo le Yehowa ƒe anyigba la dzi; ale woalé amesiwo ɖe aboyo wo la, eye woaɖu amegã ɖe woƒe ŋutasẽlawo dzi.
Eye ava me le gbesigbe Yehowa ana gbɔdzɔe wò tso wò fuɖeɖewo kple hiãkakawo kpakple dɔ sesẽ, siwo wotsɔ do kluvi wò me la,
be ado hamelo sia ɖa ɖe Babel-fia ŋu agblɔ bena: Funyafunyawɔwɔ nu tso, eye ŋutasesẽ wu enu!
Yehowa ŋe ame vɔ̃ɖiwo ƒe ati, dziɖulawo ƒe atikplɔ,
si ƒo dukɔwo le dziku me atraɖi, si te anyigba dzi dukɔwo ɖe anyi le dɔmedzoe me heti wo yome madzudzɔmadzudzɔe la.
Anyigba blibo la gbɔ ɖe eme bɔkɔɔ, wode asi aseyetsotso me.
Sesewuwo kple Libanon ƒe sedertiwo le dzidzɔ kpɔm ɖe ŋuwò be. Esime nèmlɔ anyi kpaa la, mia lãlawo megaho ɖe mia ŋu kpɔ o.
Tsieƒe le to me ʋi dzo nyanyanya le ŋkuwò me, le esi neva do goe la ta; enyɔ ŋɔli, siwo nye anyigba dzi ŋusẽtɔwo katã le ŋkuwò me, ena dukɔwo ƒe fiawo katã tso le woƒe fiazikpuiwo dzi.
Wo katã wòxɔ dzi gblɔ na wò bena: „Wò ha egbɔdzɔ abe míawo ke ene, ezu abe miawo ene.
Wò atsyɔ̃ kple wò saŋkuwo ƒe ɖiɖi yi tsieƒe, wotsɔ nyẽwo ɖo aba na wò, eye ŋɔwo tsyɔ dziwò.
Wò ŋukeɣletivi, agudzevi, ale nège tso dziƒo enye si! Wò, amesi te dukɔwo ɖe anyi, woƒo wò ƒu anyigba!
Egblɔ le wò dzi me be: Malia dziƒo, mali nye fiazikpui ɖe Mawu ƒe ɣletiviwo ta me, eye mabɔbɔ nɔ takpeto la dzi le anyiehe kekeake;
malia alilikpowo ta me, eye mia kple dziƒoʋĩtɔ la mianɔ tasɔsɔ me.
Ke woatutu wò aƒu tsieƒe, ɖe aʋli doblukɔ tsiɖitsiɖi la me.
Amesiwo kpɔ wò la, aɖe ŋku ɖe wò, agaɖe ŋku ɖe wò ʋuu agblɔ bena: Ŋutsu, si na anyigba dzo nyanyanya, eye wòʋuʋu fiaɖuƒewo la, nye esia?
Amesi wɔ xexeame wòzu gbegbe, gbã eƒe duwo ƒu anyi, eye mede asi le eƒe aboyomewo ŋu ɖo de aƒe o la, nye esia?
Anyigba dzi dukɔwo ƒe fiawo katã la, wo katã wòmia anyi le bubu me, wo dometɔ ɖesiaɖe ɖe eƒe ɖiƒe.
Ke wotsɔ wò ya ƒu gbe tso wò yɔdo gbɔ, abe atilɔ, si wotsɔ ƒu gbe, kple lã kuku, si wofanya kple afɔ la ene, eye ame tsiaʋa, siwo woda yii, eye woyi agu me kpewo gbɔ la, tsyɔ dziwò.
Masɔ kple woamawo le yɔ me o; elabena ègblẽ wò anyigba, eye nèwu wò dukɔ. Womayɔ ame vɔ̃ɖiwo ƒe viwo ŋkɔ akpɔ o tegbee.
Midzra wuƒe ɖo hena viawo le wo fofowo ƒe vodada ta. Womegatso, ne woaxɔ anyigba la, eye woatsɔ anyiglãgowo ayɔ xexeame o.
Eyata Yehowa Zebaot be: Matso ɖe wo ŋu, Yehowa Zebaot be: Matsrɔ̃ ŋkɔ kple ame susɔeawo, viwo kple dzidzimeviwo ɖa le Babel ŋu.
Yehowa Zebaot be: Matsɔe awɔ hlɔ̃madewo nɔƒe kple simee, eye matsɔ tsɔtsrɔ̃ ƒe abaya akplɔe.
Yehowa Zebaot ka atam be: Alesi mebu ɖe ta me la, nenema wòanɔ, eye alesi meɖo la, nenema woava mee
Magbã Asur le nye anyigba dzi, eye mafanyae kple afɔ ɖe nye towo dzi, eƒe kɔkuti aɖe ɖa le wo ŋu, eye eƒe agba adzo ɖa le woƒe kɔʋu me.
Esia nye ta me, si woɖo ɖe anyigba blibo la ŋu, eye esia nye alɔ, si wodo ɖe dzi ɖe dukɔwo katã ŋu.
Elabena ne Yehowa Zebaot ɖo nu ɖe ta me la, ameka agble eme, eye ne edo eƒe alɔ ɖe dzi la, ameka agbugbɔe?
Gbe, siwo va le ƒe, si me fia Axaz ku la, wonye esi:
Filisti-nyigba blibo la, meganɔ dzidzɔ kpɔm le esi ati, si ƒo wò la ŋe ta o! Elabena ƒli ado tso da ƒe ke me, eye eƒe kutsetse anye da toaʋala.
Ame dahewo ƒe ame dahewo aɖu nu, eye hiãtɔwo anɔ anyi bɔkɔɔ, ke matsɔ dɔwuame awu wò ke, eye matsrɔ̃ wò ame susɔeawo.
Agbo, fa avi; du, do ɣli: Filisti-nyigba blibo la, lolo gbanaa! Elabena dzudzɔ tso anyiehe gbɔna, eye amea ɖeke metsi megbe le eƒe aʋawɔlawo dome o.
Eye aleke woahaɖo eŋu na dukɔwo ƒe ame dɔdɔwo ma? Yehowa tso Zion, eye eyae eƒe dukɔ ƒe hiãtɔwo asi atso.
Nya ɖe Moab ŋu. Vavãe, woaha Ar-Moab le zã, eye woatsrɔe! Vavãe, woaha Kir-Moab le zã, eye woatsrɔe!
Dibon-nyɔnuvi yi nuxe ƒe avi fa ge, Moab le konyi fam le Neho kple Medeba ta me, wo katã wolũ ta kokoe, eye wolũ gewo katã.
