Egipte azu aƒedo, eye Edom azu gbegbe ƒeƒle, le ŋuta, si wosẽ le Yuda-viwo ŋu, eye wokɔ du maɖifɔ ɖe anyi le woƒe anyigba dzi la ta.
Ke Yuda anɔ anyi tegbee, eye Yerusalem anɔ dzidzimewo katã me;
mabia hlɔ̃ woƒe ʋu, si nu nyemebia hlɔ̃ ɖo haɖe o, eye? Yehowa anɔ Zum.
Esia nye Amos, amesi tso alẽnyilawo dome le Tekoa la ƒe nya, si wòkpɔ ɖe Israel ŋu ƒe eve ɖo ŋgɔ na anyigbaʋuʋu le Yuda-fia Uziya ŋɔli kple Israel-fia Yerobeam, Yoas-vi ŋɔli la.
Eye wògblɔ bena. Yehowa le gbe ɖem tso Zion, eye wòna eƒe gbe le ɖiɖim tso Yerusalem, tete lãkplɔviwo ƒe lãnyiƒe yrɔ, eye Karmel tame; ƒu.
Ale Yehowa gblɔ esi: Le Damasko ƒe nu vɔ̃ɖi wowɔ etɔ̃ kple eneawo ta la, nyematsɔe akee o; elabena emli galuƒotasiaɖam to Gilead dzi.
Eyata mada dzo ɖe Xazael ƒe me, eye wòafia Ben-Hadad ƒe fiasãwo.
Maŋe Damasko ƒe gametiwo, eye amesiwo le nuvɔ̃bali me la kple amesi; lé fiatikplɔ ɖe asi le dzidzɔkpɔxɔwo me la, atsrɔ̃, eye woaɖe aboyo Aram-dukɔ la ayi Kir; Yehowa ye gblɔe!
Ale Yehowa gblɔ esi: Le Gaza ƒe nu vɔ̃ɖi wɔwɔ etɔ̃ kple eneawo ta, nyematsɔe akee o; elabena woɖe amewo keŋkeŋ, be woakplɔ wo ayi aɖade asi na Edom.
Eyata mada dzo ɖe Gaza ƒe gliwo dzi, ne wòafiã woƒe fiasãwo.
Eye matsrɔ̃ Asdodtɔwo kple amesi lé fiatikplɔ ɖe asi le Askalon, matrɔ nye asi ɖe Ekron ŋu, eye Filistitɔwo ƒe susɔea nu ayi; Aƒetɔ Yehowa ye gblɔe!
Ale Yehowa gblɔ esi: Le Tiro ƒe nu vɔ̃ɖi, wɔwɔ etɔ̃ kple eneawo la, nyematsɔe akee o; elabena woɖe aboyo amewo keŋkeŋ ɖade asi na Edom, eye womeɖo ŋu nɔviwo ƒe nubabla la o.
Eyata mada dzo ɖe Tiro ƒe gliwo dzi, ne wòafiã woƒe fiasãwo.

Ale Yehowa gblɔ esi. Le Edom ƒe nu vɔ̃ɖi wɔwɔ etɔ̃ kple eneawo ta, nyematsɔe akee o; elabena etsɔ yi ti nɔvia yome, eye wòmia ŋku ɖe nublanuikpɔkpɔ dzi na eɖokui, ele nu vuvum ɖaa le dɔmedzoe me, eye wòlé dziku ɖe dɔ me ɖikaa.
Eyata mada dzo ɖe Teman, ne wòafiã Bozra ƒe fiasãwo.
Ale Yehowa gblɔ esi. Le Amon-viwo ƒe nu vɔ̃ɖi wɔwɔ etɔ̃ kple eneawo ta, nyematsɔe; ake wo o; elabena wodze ƒo le Gilead ƒe funɔwo nu, ne woakeke woƒe anyigba ɖe enu.
Eyata mado dzo ɖe Raba ƒe gliwo ŋu, ne wòafiã woƒe fiasãwo, ne ɣli ɖi le aʋakpegbe, eye ya tso ʋuɖuʋudu le ahomtugbe.
Eye Woƒe fia kple eƒe amegãwo siaa wòayi aboyo me; Yehowa ye gblɔe!
Ale Yehowa gblɔ esi: Le Moab ƒe nu vɔ̃ɖi wɔwɔ etɔ̃ kple eneawo ta, nyematsɔe akee o, elabena etsɔ Edom-fia ƒe ƒuwo me akaloe.
Eyata mada dzo ɖe Moab, ne wòafiã Keriyot ƒe fiasãwo, eye Moab naku le ʋunyarunyawɔwɔ me, ne ɣli ɖi, eye kpẽwo ɖi.
Matsrɔ̃ ʋɔnudrɔ̃la lé wo dome, eye mawu eƒe amegãwo katã akpe ɖe eŋu; Yehowa ye gblɔe!

Ale Yehowa gblɔ esi: Le Yuda ƒe nu vɔ̃ɖi wɔwɔ etɔ̃ kple eneawo ta, nyematsɔe akee o; elabena wogbe Yehowa ƒe se, eye womelé eƒe ɖoɖowo me ɖe asi o, ke boŋ wona woƒe alakpalegba, siwo yome wo fofowo dze la, kplɔ wo trae.
Eyata mada dzo ɖe Yuda, ne wòafia Yerusalem ƒe fiasãwo!
Ale Yehowa gblɔ esi: Le Israel ƒe nu vɔ̃ɖi wɔwɔ etɔ̃ kple eneawo ta, nyematsɔe akee o; elabena etsɔ ame dzɔdzɔe dzra ɖe ga nu kple hiãtɔ ɖe atokota dodo ɖeka nu.
Wo amesiwo ƒe ve me le fiefiẽm ɖe kekui, si le ame dahe ƒe ta me la ŋu, woglɔ̃a mɔ na hiãtɔwo, eye vi kple fofoa woyia gbolo ɖeka gbɔ, ne woaɖo gu nye ŋkɔ kɔkɔe la.
Wodraa afɔ ɖe awɔbavɔ dzi le vɔsamlekpuiwo katã gbɔ, eye wonoa nyadrɔ̃ha le woƒe mawuwo ƒe me.
Evɔ wònye metsrɔ̃ Amoritɔwo le wo ŋgɔ, amesiwo dzo atsu, abe alesi sederti kɔe ene, eye wosesẽ abe sesewu ene hafi; metsrɔ̃ woƒe tsetsea dzi me kple woƒe ke le to me.
Mekplɔ mi tso Egipte-nyigba dzi, eye mena miezɔ gbe dzi ƒe blane, ne miaxɔ Amoritɔwo ƒe anyigba.
Eye meɖo nyagblɔɖilawo tso miaƒe ŋutsuviwo dome kple Mawu ƒe kluwo tso miaƒe ɖekakpuiwo dome Israel-viwo, Yehowa be, ɖe mele alea oa?
Ke miena wein Mawu ƒe kluwo wono, eye miede se na nyagblɔɖilawo gblɔ be: Migagblɔ nya ɖi o!
Kpɔ ɖa, mate mi ɖe to me, abe alesi tasiaɖam, si wode lubablae taŋ la, nyẽna ɖe to mee ene
Sitsoƒe abu ɖe ame ɖablɛ, ŋusẽtɔ mate ŋu awɔ eƒe ŋusẽ ŋu da o, eye kalẽtɔ maɖe eƒe agbe o;
aŋutrɔdala manɔ te o, afɔ tsɔtsɔe tɔ masi o, eye sɔdola maɖe eƒe agbe o;
eye amesi nye dzideƒotɔ te kalẽtɔwo dome la, asi amama gbemagbe; Yehowa ye gblɔe!
Mise Yehowa ƒe nya, si wògblɔ ɖe mi Israel-viwo, mi ƒome blibo, si wòkplɔ tso Egipte-nyigba dzi la ŋu:
Miawo koe menya le anyigba dzi ƒomeawo katã dome; eyata mahe to na mi le miaƒe vodadawo katã ta.
Ne ame eve be, yewoazɔ ma la, ɖe womeɖoa gbe ɖi hafi oa?
Ne nuléle mesu dzata si o la, ɖe wòxlɔ̃na le ave mea? Ɖe dzatavi ɖea gbe le emlɔƒe, ne mekpɔ lé nu haɖe oa?
De xevi dzona ɖe mɔ̃ dzi lé anyigba, ne mɔ̃a ɖeke meli nɛ oa? Eye ɖe mɔ̃ fena, ne naneke meɖo eme oa?
Ɖe wokua kpẽ le du me, eye vɔvɔ̃ gbea amewo ɖoɖoa? De dzɔgbevɔ̃e dzɔna le du me, eye menye Yehowa ye wɔe oa?
Elabena Yehowa mewɔa naneke, ne meɖe eƒe tameɖoɖo fia eƒe ɖɔla, nyagblɔɖilawo hafi o.
Ne dzata ɖe gbe la, amekae agbe vɔvɔ̃? Ne Aƒetɔ Yehowa ƒo nu la, amekae agbe nyagbɔgblɔ ɖi?
Miɖo kpo ɖe fiasãwo ta le Asdod kple ɖe fiasãwo ta le Egipte-nyigba dzi gblɔ bena: Miƒo takpli ɖe Samaria-towo dzi, eye mikpɔ ʋunyaʋunyawɔwɔ geɖe kple ame teteɖeanyi, si le eme la ɖa.
Yehowa be: Womenya nu dzɔdzɔe wɔwɔ o, eye woli kɔ nu madzɔmadzɔ wɔwɔ kple ŋutasesẽ ɖe woƒe fiasãwo me gleglegle.
Eyata ale Aƒetɔ Yehowa gblɔ esi: Futɔ ɖe to ɖe wò anyigba godoo, atu ŋusẽ le ŋuwò, eye woaha wò fiasãwo.
Eyata ale Yehowa gblɔ esi: Alesi lãkpɔvi ɖea lã ƒe ata eve kple to kakɛ tsoa dzata ƒe nu mee la, nenema ke woaɖe Israel-vi, siwo bɔbɔ nɔ Samaria le aba ƒe dzogoe dzi kple aba ƒe kuntru dzi lae.
Aƒetɔ Yehowa, Mawu Zebaot, be: Misee, eye mitsɔe ɖi ɖase na Israel ƒe aƒe la be:
Gbesigbe mahe to na Israel ƒe nu vɔ̃ɖi wɔwɔ la, mahe to na Betel ƒe vɔsamlekpuiwo hã, eye woaŋe vɔsamlekpui la ƒe dzowo woage adze anyi.
Magbã vuvɔŋɔlixɔ akpe ɖe ɖzomeŋɔlixɔ ŋu, nyiɖuxɔwo atsrɔ̃, eye xɔ gbogboawo nu ayi; Yehowa ye gblɔe!
Mise nya sia, mi Basan-nyinɔ, siwo le Samaria-to dzi! Mi amesiwo te ame dahewo ɖe anyi, miegbã hiãtɔwo gudugudu, eye miegblɔ na miaƒe atsuwo bena: Miku aha vɛ míano!
Aƒetɔ Yehowa tà eƒe dzɔdzɔenyenye be: Kpo ɖa, ŋkeke li gbɔna na mi, woaɖe mi kple ƒu, eye woatsɔ ʋã atɔ mia viwo.
Miato gli ƒe gbagbãƒe, amesiame akpɔ eŋgɔ te, eye miatsɔ miaƒe legbawo axlã ɖe anyi; Yehowa ye gblɔe!
Miyi Betel, ne miaɖawɔ nu tovo; miyi Gilgal, ne miaɖawɔ nu tovo ɖe edzi! Misa miaƒe vɔwo ŋdi sia ŋdi, eye mitsɔ miaƒe nuwo ƒe ewoliawo ɖeka sa vɔe ŋkeke etɔ̃etɔ̃.
Mina dzudzɔ nade dzi ɖe abolo ʋaʋã ŋu, ne wòanye akpedavɔsa; miɖe gbe ƒã be, woana nu faa, midee sesĩe, elabena alea vivia mi Israel-viwo nu, Aƒetɔ Yehowa ye gblɔe!
Medo kuvia miaƒe aɖuwo le miaƒe duwo katã me, eye mena abolokoe wɔ nu le mia nɔƒewo katã; ke miegbe tɔtrɔ ɖe ŋunye, Yehowa ye gblɔe.

Esi dzinu etɔ̃ susɔ, ne nuŋeɣi naɖo la, mete tsidzadza mi; mena tsi dza, ɖe du ɖeka me, ke nyemena wòdza ɖe evelia me o; tsi dza ɖe agble ɖeka me; ke agble, si me tsi medza ɖo o la me ƒu kplakplakpla.
Du eve kple du etɔ̃ wole ya mum sagãsagã yi du ɖeka me, be yewoano tsi, ke womeɖi kɔ o; gake miegbe tɔtrɔ ɖe ŋunye, Yehowa ye gblɔe!
Mena miaƒe bliwo dze heteku, eye wohlɔ̃: ʋetsuviwo ɖu miaƒe abɔwo kple weingblewo, gbotiwo kple amitiwo; ke miegbe tɔtrɔ ɖe ŋunye, Yehowa ye gblɔe!
Mehe dɔvɔ̃ va mia dzi abe Egipte tɔa ene; mewu miaƒe ɖekakpuiwo kple yi, woha miaƒe sɔwo, eye miaƒe, asaɖa me ʋẽ kũ ɖo ŋɔti me na mi; ke miegbe tɔtrɔ ɖe ŋunye, Yehowa ye gblɔe!
Metrɔ mi bu anyi, abe alesi Mawu trɔ Sodom kple Gomora bu anyi ene, eye miele abe ati, si woɖe tso dzo me la ene; ke miegbe tɔtrɔ ɖe ŋunye, Yehowa ye gblɔe!
Eyata Israel, ale mele wɔ wò ge enye si: Esi mele esia wɔ ge wò la, eyata Israel, dzra ɖo naɖakpe kple wò Mawu!
Elabena eya amesi mè towo, eye wòwɔ ya, etoa amegbetɔ ƒe tamesusuwo nɛ, enana agudzedze zua viviti, eye wòzɔa anyigba ƒe kɔkɔƒewo la ŋkɔ enye Yehowa, Mawu Zebaot!
Israel ƒe aƒe, mise nya sia, elabena mele konyifaha to ge ɖe mia ŋu!
Israel-ɖetugbi dze anyi, megale fɔfɔ ge o; eɖo baba ɖe eƒe anyigba dzi, amea ɖeke mele efɔ ge ɖe tsitrenu o!
Elabena ale Aƒetɔ Yehowa gblɔ esi: Ne dua ɖe ho kple ame akpe le Israel ƒe aƒe la me la, ame alafa akpɔtɔ, eye ne eho kple ame alafa la, ame ewo akpɔtɔ.
Elabena ale Yehowa gblɔ na Israel ƒe aƒe la enye si: Midim, ne mianɔ agbe!
Ke migabia Betel ta se o, migava Gilgal o, eye migayi Beer-Seba o; elabena Gilgal ayi aboyo me, eye Betel atsrɔ̃.
Midi Yehowa, be mianɔ agbe, ne magadze Yosef ƒe aƒe la dzi, abe dzo ene ahafiãe, eye dzotsilaa ɖeke manɔ anyi na Betel o;
mi amesiwo trɔ nya dzɔdzɔe wòzu atsa, eye miete dzoe dzɔenyenye ɖe to!
Eya amesi wo atifieŋu kpakple avũ kple avũtɔ, eye wotsɔ blukɔ wɔ ŋdii, ena ŋkeke do viviti abe zã ene, eye wòyɔ atsiaƒu me tsiwo vɛ hetrɔ wo ƒo ɖe anyigba dzi la ŋkɔ enye Yehowa;
eya amesi de gbegblẽ ame sesẽ la dome, eye wòhe gbegblẽ va du sesẽ la dzi.
Wole fu amesi xlɔ̃a nu ame le ʋɔnu, eye wonyɔ ŋu nyateƒetola.
Esi miefanya ame dahewo kple afɔ, eye miexɔ blidzɔ le wo si la, eyata miatsɔ kpe fufuwo atu xɔe, gake mianɔ wo me o; miade weingble nyowo, gake miano woƒe wein o.
Elabena menyae be, miaƒe dzidadawo sɔ gbɔ, eye miaƒe nuvowo teƒe mekɔ o, mielé ame dzodzɔewo ɖe ke me, miexɔ zãnu, eye miete ame dahewo ɖe anyi le ʋɔnu!
Eyata nunyala ƒe nu nede gã le ɣemaɣi, elabena ɣeyiɣi vɔe wònye.
Midi nyui, eye menye vɔ̃ o, ne mianɔ agbe, eye Yehowa, Mawu Zebaot, nanɔ anyi kpli mi, abe alesi miele gbɔgblɔm ene.
Milé fu vɔ̃, milɔ̃ nyui, eye mifɔ nya dzɔdzɔe ɖe tsitrenu le ʋɔnu, amea ɖe menya nu o Yehowa, Mawu Zebaot, ave Yosef ƒe ame mamleawo nu.
Eyata ale Yehowa, Mawu Zebaot, Aƒetɔ la, gblɔ esi: Konyifafa anɔ ablɔwo katã me, eye woana alele dom le kpɔdomeewo katã, woayɔ agbledela ɖe nuxaxa ŋu, eye kuteƒehadzilawo ɖe konyifafa ŋu;
eye konyifafa anɔ weingblewo katã me, ne meva to dowòme yi, Yehowa ye gblɔe.
Baba na amesiwo dzrom Yehowa ƒe ŋkeke la le! Viɖe ka Yehowa ƒe ŋkeke la nye na mi? Viviti wònye, menye kekeli o.
Ele abe ŋutsua ɖe, si si le dzata nu, eye sisiblist va do goe, eye esi wògbɔ va aƒe hetsɔ asi ziɔ ɖe gli ŋu la, da ɖui la ene.
De menye vivitie nye Yehowa ƒe ŋkeke la, eye menye kekeli oa, ɖe menye blukɔ wònye, eye eme mekɔ oa?
Melé fu miaƒe ŋkekenyuiewo, eye metsri wo, eye nyemaʋẽ miaƒe takpegbewo ase o.
Elabena ne miesa numevɔ kple nuɖuvɔ nam hã la, womadze ŋunye o, eye nyemanyẽ: kɔ akpɔ miaƒe nyivi damiwo ƒe akpedavɔsawo o.
Te wò hawo ƒe ɖiɖi ɖe megbe tso gbɔnye, wò saŋkuƒoƒowo le to me vem nam!
Nya dzɔdzɔe nesi abe tsi ene, eye dzɔdzɔenyenye abe tɔʋu, si memiena o la ene boŋ!
Israel ƒe aƒe, ɖe miesa akpedavɔ kple nuɖuvɔ nam le gbe dzi le ƒe blaneawo mea?
Eyata miatsɔ miaƒe legbawo: Miaƒe fia Sakut kple miaƒe mawu Kewan ƒe dzinuvi, si miewɔ na mia ɖokui la;
eye mana woaɖe aboyo mi agbɔ Damasko ŋu ʋĩ ayii, Yehowa, amesi ŋkɔ nye Mawu Zebaot lae gblɔe!
Baba na mi amesiwo ɖe dzi ɖe anyi le Zion, kple mi amesiwo le Samaria-towo dzi bɔkɔɔ, mi dukɔwo ƒe ame veviwo dome ŋkutatɔwo, amesiwo gbɔ Israel ƒe aƒe la vana!
Miyi Kalne, eye milé ŋku ɖe anyi, mitɔ edzi tso afima yi Xamat-gã, eye mihoe ɖe dzi yi Filistitɔwo ƒe Gat be, ɖe eme nyo na wo wu fiaɖuƒe siawo tɔ loo, alo woƒe anyigba lolo wu mia tɔa?
Mi amesiwo ɖi be, dzɔgbevɔ̃egbe la nate ɖa, eye miele ŋutasesẽ ƒe fiazikpui hem vɛ;
mi amesiwo mlɔ nyiɖubatiwo dzi, eye miedra ɖe mia mlɔƒewo, mieɖu alẽviwo le lãhawo dome kple nyiviwo le lãkpɔ me;
mi amesiwo nɔa saŋku ƒom kɔ kple avu, eye mienɔa hã kpam abe Dawid ene;
mi amesiwo noa wein le vɔsatrewo me, eye miesa ami veviwo, eye Yosef ƒe abixɔxɔ metsɔa fu lã me na mi o!
Eyata mianɔ ŋgɔ na aboyomewo ayi aboyo me, eye amesiwo dra ɖe aba dzi la ƒe nukoko hahaha nu atso!
Aƒetɔ Yehowa ta eƒe agbe be: Ale Yehowa, Mawu Zebaot, gblɔ esi: Yakob ƒe dàda le ŋu nyɔm nam, melé fu eƒe fiasãwo, eye matsɔ du la kple eme nuwo ade asi.
Eye woava me be, ne ŋutsu ewo kpɔtɔ ɖe aƒe ɖeka me la, woaku;

eye ne woƒe ƒometɔ, amesi be, yeatɔ dzo wo la, va, be yeafɔ ame kukuawo tso aƒea me, eye wòbia amesi kpɔtɔ ɖe xogã me be: Amea ɖe gale gbɔwò hã, eye wòɖo ŋu be: Ɖeke megali o la, agblɔ be. Mia nu, ne womagaɖo ŋku Yehowa ƒe ŋkɔ dzi o.
Elabena kpɔ, ɖa, Yehowa le se de ge, tete woagbã xɔ gãwo, eye xɔ suewo agba gudugudu
Ɖe sɔwo ate ŋu aƒu du le agakpe dzia, eye ɖe woatsɔ nyiwo aŋlɔ agble ɖe atsiaƒu dzia? Elabena miawo mietrɔ nya dzɔdzɔe wòzu aɖi, kple dzɔdzɔenyenye ƒe kutsetse wòzu atsa
Mi amesiwo le dzidzɔ kpɔm le nu maɖinuiwo ŋu, eye miele gbɔgblɔm be: De menye sesẽ mietsɔ to dzo ɖe ta oa?
Israel ƒe aƒe, ale Yehowa, Mawu Zebaot gblɔ esi: Maɖo dukɔa ɖe ɖa ɖe mia ŋu, ne woaxaxa mi ɖo tso Xamat-nutowo me vaseɖe tɔʋu, si le gbegbe la nu.
Eye Aƒetɔ Yehowa na mekpɔ ŋutega, kpɔ ɖa, ewo ʋetsuviwo, esime kelegbewo de asi miemie me; elabena kelegbewo miena, ne wova gbe na fia megbe.
Eye esi woɖu anyigba dzi gbewo vo keŋkeŋ la, megblɔ bena: Aƒetɔ Yehowa, tsɔe ke dzro! Aleke Yakob ate ŋu anɔ te, esi mele ɖeke me o?
Tete wòve Yehowa, eye Yehowa gblɔ bena. Mava me o.
Eye Aƒetɔ Yehowa na mekpɔ ŋutega, kpo ɖa, Aƒetɔ Yehowa yɔ dzo vɛ, be wòatsɔ ahe toe, eye wòfiã to gãwo helé agblewo.
Eye megblɔ be: Aƒetɔ Yehowa, dzudzɔ dzro! Aleke Yakob ate ŋu anɔ te, esi mele ɖeke me o?
Tete wòve Yehowa, eye Aƒetɔ Yehowa gblɔ be: Esia hã mava me o.
Eye wòna mekpɔ ŋutega, kpɔ ɖa, Aƒetɔ la tsi tre ɖe gli, si dzɔ kã la dzi, eye wòlé tsumikpe ɖe asi.
Tete Yehowa gblɔ nam bena: Amos, nuka kpɔm nele? Meɖo ŋu bena. Tsumikpee Eye Aƒetɔ la gblɔ bena: Kpo ɖa, mada tsumikpe ɖe Israel-duko la dome, eye nyemagatsɔe akee azɔ o.
Isak ƒe nuxeƒewo azu gbegbe, Israel ƒe kɔkɔefewo azu aƒedo, eye matso yi atso ɖe Yerobeam ƒe aƒe la ŋu.
Tete Amazya, amesi nye nunɔla le Betel la, dɔ ame ɖo ɖe Israel-fia Yerobeam, ne woagblɔ nɛ bena: Amos ɖo gbe ɖi ɖe ŋuwò le Israel ƒe aƒe la dome; anyigba la magaɖo dzi atso eƒe nyawo katã o.
Elabena ale Amos gblɔ esi: Yerobeam aku ɖe yi nu, eye woaɖe aboyo Israel atso eƒe anyigba dzi.
Eye Amazya gblɔ na Amos, bena: Nukpɔla si yi Yuda-nyigba dzi, gblɔ nya ɖi le gama, ne nakpɔ abolo aɖu le afima.
Ke megagblɔ nya ɖi le Betel azɔ o; elabena fia ƒe kɔkɔeƒe kple fiaɖuƒe ƒe gbedoxɔ wònye.
Tete Amos ɖo ŋu gblɔ na Amazya bena: Nyemenye nyagblɔɖila alo nyagblɔɖilawo ƒe vi o, ke boŋ lãkplɔvi kple gbotidola menye.
Ke Yehowa ɖem le lãhawo yome, eye Yehowa gblɔ nam bena: Yi ɖagblɔ nya ɖi ɖe nye dukɔ Israel ŋu.
Azɔ se Yehowa ƒe nya! Egblɔ be: Megagblɔ nya ɖi ɖe Israel ŋu o, eye megadudu nyã ƒo ɖi ɖe Isak ƒe aƒe la ŋu o!

Eyata ale Yehowa gblɔ esi: Srɔ̃wò awɔ gbolo le dua me, wò ŋutsuviwo kple wò nyonuviwo atsi yi nu, eye woatsɔ dzidzeka amã wò anyigbae, wò ŋutɔ àku ɖe anyigba makɔmakɔ dzi, eye woaɖe aboyo Israel atso eƒe anyigba dzi.
Eye Aƒetɔ Yehowa na mekpɔ ŋutega, kpo ɖa, kutsetse ɖiɖiwo yɔ kusia ɖe fũ.
Eye wògblɔ nam bena: Amos, nuka kpɔm nèle? Meɖo ŋu be: Kutsetse ɖiɖi kusi taŋ. Tete Yehowa gblɔ nam bena: Nye dukɔ Israel ɖiɣi ɖo, nyemagatsɔe akee azɔ o.
Ale Aƒetɔ Yehowa gblɔ esi: Nyɔnu, siwo dzia ha le fiasãwo me la, afa avi gbemagbe, ame kukuwo asɔ gbɔ, eye woazi ɖoɖoe atso wo, aƒu gbe ɖe teƒewo katã.
Misee, mi amesiwo ƒe ve me le fiefiẽm ɖe ame dahewo ŋu, eye mietsrɔ̃ hiãtɔwo;

mi amesiwo le gbɔgblɔm be: Gbekagbe gɔ̃ dzinu yeye nu le yiyi ge, ne míadzra bli, eye dzudzɔgbe nu le yiyi ge, ne míaʋu avawo nu ahakpa nudotree sue, míadzi asi ɖe edzi, eye míaŋe nudanu ɖe eme aha amee;
míaƒle ame dahewo ɖe gã nu kple hiãtɔwo ɖe atokota ɖoɖo ɖeka nu, eye míadzra bli toto ɖe bli ŋutɔ teƒe?
Yehowa ta nu ɖe Yakob ƒe dada ŋu be: Nyematsɔ woƒe nuwɔnawo katã ake wo akpa gbeɖe o!
De anyigba maʋuʋu, eye edzinɔlawo katã naxa nu le esia ta oa? Akɔ dzi glodzoo abe Nil, eye wòadze agbo agadze anyi abe Egipte-tɔsisi la ene.
Ale Aƒetɔ Yehowa gblɔ esi: Le ŋkeke ma me la mana ɣe naɖo to le ŋdɔkutsu dzatsɛ, eye viviti nado ɖe anyigba dzi le ŋkeke me.

Matrɔ miaƒe ŋkekenyuiewo woazu nuxaxa kple miaƒe hawokatã woazu konyifaha, made akpanya aliwo katã, eye tawo katã nazu ta kokoe, mana wòanɔ, abe alesi wofaa konyi na tenuvi ene, eye eƒe nuwuwu anɔ abe ŋkeke vɔ̃e ene.
Ale Aƒetɔ Yehowa gblɔ esi: Kpɔ ɖa, ŋkekewo li gbɔna, eye maɖo dɔwuame ɖe anyigba dzi, ke, menye abolodɔ alo tsikɔwuame ɖe tsi ŋu o, ke boŋ ɖe Yehowa ƒe nyawo sese ŋu.
Woanɔ ya mum tso atsiaƒu nu yi atsiaƒu nu, eye woanɔ tsatsam tso anyiehe yi ɣedzeƒe, ne woadi Yehowa ƒe nya, ke womakpɔe o
Le ɣemaɣi la tsikɔ awu ɖetugbi dzetugbeewo kple ɖekakpuiwo, eye gbafa aƒo wo;
wo amesiwo tà Samaria ƒe dzidada, eye wogblɔna bena: „Dan, míetà wò mawu ƒe agbe, eye míetà Beer-Seba-ma!“ Woadze anyi, eye womagafɔ o.

Eye mekpɔ Aƒetɔ la wòtsi tre ɖe vɔsamlekpui la dzi gblɔ bena: Ŋe kɔ le sɔtiawo nu, ne kpuiawo nadzo kpekpekpe, eye nagbã wo ɖe wo katã ƒe ta dzi! Matsɔ yi awu wo viwoe, wo dometɔa ɖeke masi o, eye amea ɖeke makpɔtɔ o.
Ne woyi tsieƒe ke hã la, nye asi ahe wo tso afima, eye ne wolia dziƒo la, maɖiɖi wo ɖe anyi tso afima.
Ne wobe ɖe Karmel ta me la, maɖi wo le afima ahe wo agbɔe, eye ne wosia ɖem ɖe atsiaƒu gɔme la, madɔ da woaɖu wo le afima.
Eye ne wodze woƒe futɔwo ŋgɔ yi aboyo me la, madɔ yi woawu wo le afima; matso nye ŋku aɖo wo ŋu ɖe vɔ̃ me, eye menye ɖe nyui me o.
Aƒetɔ, Yehowa Zebaot, amesi ka asi anyigba ŋu wòlólo gbanaa, eye edzinɔlawo katã xa nu, ede dzi glodzoo abe Nil ene, eye wòdze eme abe Egipte-tɔsisi ene;
eya amesi tu eƒe dziƒoxɔ ɖe dzi me, eye wòɖo eƒe xɔ goba gɔme anyi ɖe anyigba dzi, eya amesi yɔ atsiaƒu me tsiwo hetsɔ ƒo ɖe anyigba dzi la ŋkɔ enye Yehowa!
Ale Yehowa gblɔ esi: De mi Israel-viwo, miele nam abe Kusiviwo ene oa? De nyemekplɔ Israel tso Egipte-nyigba dzi, Filistitowo tso Kaftor, eye Aramtɔwo tso Kir oa?
Kpo ɖa, Aƒetɔ Yehowa ƒe ŋku le fiaduƒe wonuvɔ̃ sia ŋu, eye matsrɔ̃e ɖa tso anyigba dzi; ke ɖeko nyematsrɔ̃ Yakob ƒe aƒe la keŋkeŋ o, Yehowa ye gblɔe.
Elabena made se, eye woaʋuʋu Israel ƒe aƒe la le dukɔwo katã dome, abe alesi woʋuʋua asɔe, eye blikua ɖeke megena ɖe anyigba o ene.
Nye dukɔ ƒe nuvɔ̃wɔlawo katã aku ɖe yi nu, wo amesiwo le gbɔgblɔm bena: Dzɔgbevɔ̃e la matu mí o, eye maɖi kpe mí o.
Le ɣemaɣi la mafɔ Dawid ƒe agbadɔ gbagbã la de tsitrenu, eye matre eƒe gbagbãƒewo, mafɔ eƒe glikpowo ɖe tsitrenu, eye matui abe tsã ene;
ne woaxɔ Edom ƒe ame mamleawo kple dukɔ, siwo katã ŋu woyɔ nye ŋkɔ ɖo la, woanye wo tɔ; Yehowa, amesi le nusiawo wɔ ge lae gblɔe.
Ale Yehowa gblɔ esi: Kpɔ ɖa, ŋkeke li gbɔna, eye woanɔ agbleŋɔŋlɔ dzi ahade asi na nuŋeɣi, woanɔ weinfiafiã dzi ahade asi na nuƒãɣi, towo atsyɔ aha yeye, eye togbɛwo katã aƒo beke.
Magaɖo nye dukɔ Israel te, eye woatso du zuaƒedowo anɔ wo me, woade weingblewo anɔ wo me wein, eye woatɔ abɔwo aɖu wo me kutsetsewo.
Made woƒe agunu to ɖe woƒe anyigba dzi, eye womagaho wo tso woƒe anyigba, si mena wo la dzi o, Yehowa, wò Mawue gblɔe!
Obadya ƒe ŋutega. Ale Aƒetɔ Yehowa gblɔ ɖe Edom ŋu enye si: Míese nya tso Yehowa gbɔ, eye woɖo du ɖe dukɔwo dome be: Mitso, ne míaho aʋa ɖe wo ŋu!
Kpɔ ɖa, mawɔ wò sue le dukɔwo dome, eye maɖi gbɔ wò vevie.
Wò dzi ƒe dàda ble wò, wò amesi le agatowo me, eye nètso aƒe ɖe kɔkɔƒewo, wò amesi le gbɔgblɔm le wò dzi me be: Ameka atutum aƒu anyi?
Ne èyi dzi ʋĩ abe hɔ̃ ene, eye nèwɔ ato ɖe dzinuviwo dome hã la, matutu wò aƒu anyi tso afima, Yehowa ye gblɔe.
Nenye fiawo kple adzodalawoe ƒo ɖe dziwò le zã la, ɖe womafi nu alesi ko asu wo nu oa? Ke aleke wòa nèhetsrɔ̃e! Nenye weinxalawoe ƒo ɖe dziwò la, ɖe womakpɔtɔ ɖe ɖi oa?
Aleke womehedzro Esau me, eye wotsa le eƒe kesinɔnuwo mee o!
Wò dzoɖuxɔlɔ̃wo katã nyã wò vaseɖe liƒo dzi ke, xɔ̃wòwo ble wò, eye wokpe dziwò; wò aboloɖulawo ɖo mɔ̃ ɖe tewò, ke mèdze sii o.
Yehowa be: De nyematsrɔ̃ nunyalawo ɖa le Edom kple gɔmesese ɖa le Esau ƒe towo dzi gbemagbe oa?
Teman, dzi aɖe le wò kalẽtɔwo ƒo, ne woatsɔ amewuwu atsrɔ̃ amesiame ɖa le Esau ƒe towo dzi.
Le ŋuta, si nesẽ le noviwò Yakob ŋu ŋuti la, ŋukpe anyẽ atsyɔ wò, eye woatsrɔ̃ wò ɖa tegbee.
Gbemagbe èle eteƒe; esi amedzrowo ɖe aboyo eƒe aʋakɔwo ɖzoe gbemagbe, du bubu me towo ge ɖe eƒe agbowo me, eye wodzidze nu ɖe Yerusalem dzi la, wò hã ènye wo dometɔ ɖeka.
Ke megafɔ ŋku ɖe nɔviwò dzi le eƒe ŋkeke la dzi, le eƒe dzogbevɔ̃egbe o, megakpɔ dzidzɔ ɖe Yuda-viwo ŋu le woƒe tsotsrɔ̃gbe o, eye megake wò nu baa le xaxagbe o.
Megage ɖe nye ɖukɔ ƒe agbo me le, eƒe dzɔgbevɔ̃egbe o, megafɔ ŋku ɖe eƒe gbegblẽ dzi le eƒe dzɔgbevɔ̃egbe o, eye megado wò asi ɖa ɖe eƒe kesinɔnuwo ŋu le eƒe dzogbevɔ̃egbe o.
Megatsi tre ɖe mɔ dzevee nu natsrɔ̃ eƒe ame sisiwo o, eye megaɖe aboyo eƒe ame mamleawo le xaxagbe o!
Elabena Yehowa ƒe ŋkeke la tu aƒe na dukɔwo katã; alesi nèwɔ la, nenema woawo wò, eye wò nuwɔwɔwo ava wò ta dzi.
Alesi mieno aha le nye to kɔkɔe dzii la, nenema dukɔwo katã anɔ enono dzii ɖaa; woanoe aɖuɖɔ egɔme ƒiaƒiaƒia, eye woanɔ abe amesiwo medzo kpɔ o la ene.
Ke xɔname anɔ Zion-to dzi, anye kɔkɔeƒe, eye Yakob ƒe aƒe la axɔ woƒe domenyinu.
Yakob ƒe aƒe la anye dzo, eye Yosef ƒe aƒe la anye dzoƒaɖe, ke Esau ƒe aƒe la anye gbe ƒuƒu; woafiãe wòabi, ale be amea ɖeke makpɔtɔ na Esau ƒe aƒe la o; elabena Yehowa ye gblɔe.
Dziehetɔwo axɔ Esau ƒe towo, eye bali me nɔlawo ado Filistitɔwo ƒe anyigba, woaxɔ Efrayim-tagba kple Samaria-tagba, eye Benyamin axɔ Gilead;
eye Israel-viwo ƒe aʋakɔ, siwo woɖe aboyoe la, ado Kanaanitɔwo ƒe anyigba vaseɖe Zarpat, eye Yerusalem ƒe aboyome, siwo le Sefarad la, ado dzieheduwo.
Xɔnametɔwo ava Zionto la dzi, ne woadrɔ̃ ʋɔnu Esau ƒe towo, eye fiaɖuƒe la anye Yehowa to.
Eye Yehowa ƒe gbe va na Yona, Amitai vi, bena:
Tso, nayi Niniwe, du gã la me, eye nagblɔ nya ɖi ɖe eŋu; elabena woƒe nu vɔ̃ɖi wɔwɔ va ŋkunye me.
Ke Yona tso, be yeasi le Yehowa ŋku me ayi Tarsis. Eye esi wòva Yafo, eye wòkpɔ ʋua ɖe, si le Tarsis yi ge la, exe fe, eye wòɖoe, be yeasi atso Yehowa ŋku me ayi Tarsis kpli wo.
Ke Yehowa lɔ ya gãa ɖe trɔ ɖe atsiaƒu la dzi, eye ahom sesẽa ɖe tu ɖe atsiaƒu dzi, ale be ʋu la ɖi be, yeagbã.
Tete ʋukulawo vɔ̃, eye wo dome amesiame do ɣli yɔ eƒe mawu, eye wotsɔ ʋua me nuwo ƒu gbe ɖe ƒu me, ne woazu wodzoe, ke Yona ya yi ɖe ʋua gɔme, eye wòmia anyi do alɔ̃ yi me ʋĩ.
Tete ʋumefia te ɖe eŋu gblɔ nɛ bena: Alɔ̃ dɔm wòa nèlea? Fɔ nayɔ wò Mawu! Amea ɖe menya nu o Mawu aɖo ŋku mía dzi, be míagatsrɔ̃ o hĩ.
Eye wogblɔ na wo nɔewo bena: Mina míadzidze nu, ne míakpɔ amesi ta dzɔgbevɔ̃e sia dza de mía dzi ɖo la! Tete wodzidze nu, eye nudzidze la dze Yona dzi.
Eye wogblɔ nɛ bena: Gblɔ nusi ta dzɔgbevɔ̃e sia dzo ɖe mía dzi ɖo la na mí! Do ka wɔla nènye, eye afika nètso? Mia de ɖe, eye dukɔ ka me nètso?
Eɖo ŋu na wo bena: Hebritɔ menye, eye mevɔ̃a Yehowa, dziƒo Mawu la, amesi wɔ atsiaƒu kple anyigba ƒuƒui.
Tete ŋutsuawo vɔ̃ ŋutɔ, eye wogblɔ nɛ bena: Nukae nèhewɔ ma? Elabena wonyae be, Yehowa nu wòsi le; elabena etoe na wo tsã.
Eye wogblɔ nɛ bena; Nuka míawɔ wò, be atsiaƒu la nadze kɔ anyi le mía ŋu godoo? Elabena ƒu la ƒe nyanyrã nu le sesẽm ɖe dzi.
Eɖo ŋu na wo be: Mikɔm ƒu gbe ɖe ƒua me, ekema ƒua adze anyi le mia ŋu godoo; elabena menyae be, tanyee ahom gã sia va mia dzi ɖo.
Tete ŋutsuawo ku ʋua, be woatrɔ ayi gota, ke womete ŋui o, elabena atsiaƒu da nyrã ɖe edzi hekpe wo.
Eye woyɔ Yehowa gblɔ bena: Ao, Yehowa, megana míatsrɔ̃ le ŋutsu sia ƒe agbe ta o, eye megatsɔ̃ ʋu maɖifɔ ɖo mía dzi o; elabena Yehowa nènye, eye nusi dze ŋuwò la, nèwɔna.
Eye wokɔ Yona ƒu gbe ɖe ƒua me; tete ƒu la dzudzɔ agbodzedze.
Tete ŋutsuawo vɔ̃ Yehowa ŋutɔ, wosa vɔ na Yehowa, eye woɖe adzɔgbe.
Eye Yehowa dɔ ƒumelã gãa ɖe, be wòaɖami Yona; eye Yona nɔ lã la ƒe dɔ me ŋkeke etɔ̃ kple zã etɔ̃.
Tete Yona do gbe ɖa na Yehowa, eƒe Mawu la, le lã la ƒe dɔ me
gblɔ bena, Meyɔ Yehowa le nye xaxa me, eye wòtɔ nam; medo ɣli tso tsieƒe ƒe ƒodo me, eye nèse nye gbe.
Etsɔm ƒu gbe ɖe to gɔme, le atsiaƒu titina, tsi sisiwo ɖe to ɖem, eye wò tsi kpakpawo katã kple wò tsi tsotsoewo to tanye yi.
Megblɔ be, wonyãm ɖa le ŋkuwò me, ɖe magakpɔ wò gbedoxɔ kɔkɔe la akpɔa?
Tsiwo ɖe to ɖem de keke nye luʋɔ gbɔ; tɔ gɔme le ŋunye godoo, eye avawo xatsa ɖe ta nam.
Mede towo ƒe agunu ke, eye anyigba do gameti ɖe nunye ɖikaa, ke èhe nye agbe tso do me, Yehowa, nye Mawu!
Esi nu te nye luʋɔ ŋu le menye la, meɖo ŋku Yehowa dzi, eye nye gbedoɖoɖa ɖo gbɔwò le wò gbedoxɔ kokoe la me.
Amesiwo subɔa yakanu dzodzrowo la, gblẽa woƒe amenuveve ɖi.
Ke nye la matsɔ akpedagbe asa vɔ na wò, eye mawɔ adzɔgbe, si meɖe la dzi. Xɔname enye Yehowa tɔ!
Eye Yehowa ɖe se nalãla be, wòaɖadzɔ Yona ɖegota.
Tete Yehowa ƒe gbe va na Yona zi evelia bena:
Tso, nayi Niniwe, ɖu gã la me, eye naɖe gbe ƒã nya, si gblɔ ge mala na wò la nɛ.
Tete Yona tso yi Niniwe ɖe Yehowa ƒe nya la nu. Niniwe enye du gãa ɖe le Mawu ŋku me, eye eƒe didime enye ŋkeke etɔ̃ ƒe mɔzɔzɔ.
Eye Yona zɔ ŋkeke ɖeka ƒe mɔ le dua me heɖe gbe ƒã gblɔ bena: Esusɔ ŋkeke blane, ne Niniwe natsrɔ̃!
Tete Nimwetɔwo xɔ Mawu dzi se, wodo kpo, be woatsi nu adɔ, eye woata akpanya, tso tsitsiawo dzi vaseɖe ɖeviawo dzi.
Esi nya la ɖe Niniwe-fia gbɔ la, etso le eƒe fiazikpui dzi, eɖe eƒe awu ʋlaya ɖi, eye wòta akpanya hebɔbɔ nɔ dzowɔ me.
Eye wòna wodo kpo gblɔ le Niniwe ɖe fia kple eƒe amegãwo ƒe se nu bena: Amegbetɔwo kple lãwo, nyiwo-kple alẽwo megade naneke nu me o; womegaɖu gbe alo ana tsi o,
ke boŋ amegbetɔwo kple lãwo siaa nata akpanya, woayɔ Mawu sesĩe, eye amesiame naɖe asi le eƒe mɔ vɔwo kple nu vɔ̃ɖi, si le edome la ŋuti.
Amea ɖe menya nu o Mawu atrɔ ta me, avee, eye eƒe dɔmedzoe heliheli la nu afa, be miatsrɔ̃ o hĩ!
Eye esi Mawu kpɔ, alesi wowɔ, be woɖe asi le woƒe mɔ vɔwo ŋu la, vɔ̃, si Mawu gblɔ be, yeawɔ wo la vee, eye mewɔe o.
Ke esia medze Yona ŋu o, eye dzi kui vevie.

Eye wòdo gbe ɖa na Yehowa gblɔ bena: Oo, Yehowa, esia ŋu pɛ mebu, esime mele mía de; eyata medo ŋgɔ be, masi ayi Tarsis; elabena menyae be, Mawu amenuvela kple nublanuikpɔla nenye, egbɔa dzi ɖi blewu, dɔmenyo bɔ ɖe asiwò, eye vɔ̃wɔwɔ vea wò.
Eyata Yehowa, xɔ nye agbe le asinye! Elabena enyo nam be, maku wu esi manɔ, agbe.
Eye Yehowa gblɔ be: Ɖe nèle dɔmedzoe dom ɖe eteƒea?
Tete Yona do le dua me ɖabɔbɔ nɔ dua ƒe ɣedzeƒe gome, eye wòtu agbadɔ ɖe afima hebɔbɔ no eƒe vɔvɔli te, ne yeakpɔ nusi le dzɔdzɔ ge ɖe dua dzi.
Eye Yehowa Mawu dɔ treklɔnu wòva mie ɖe Yona ta me, ne wòado vɔvɔli ɖe edzi ahafa eƒe dzikudodo nu nɛ; tete Yona kpo dzidzɔ le treklɔnu la ŋu ŋutɔ.
Ke esi agu dze le ŋkeke evelia dzi la, Mawu do ŋɔ wòva du treklɔnu la woku.
Esi ɣe dze la, Mawu do ɣedzeƒeya xɔdzo ɖa, eye ɣe ɖu Yona ƒe ta, ale be nu te eŋu belibeli. Tete wodi ku na eɖokui gblɔ bena: Ne meku la, enyo wu esi manɔ agbe.
Eye Mawu gblɔ na Yona bena: Ɖe nèle dziku dom ɖe eteƒe le treklɔnu la taa? Eɖo ŋu bena: Tɔnye dzɔ be, mado dziku, vaseɖe esime maku.
Tete Yehowa gblɔ be: Treklɔnu, Si ŋu medze agbagba le o, mekpɔ edzi wòtsi o, emie le zã ɖeka me, eye woku le zã ɖeka me la ƒe nu le vewòm, —
ɖe du gã Niniwe, si me amewo le wu ame akpe alafa ɖeka blave, siwo menya nuka enye ɖusi kple mia hekpe ɖe lã geɖewo ŋu la ƒe nu mavem oa?
Esia nye Yehowa ƒe nya, si va na Mixa, Moresitɔ la, eye wò-kpɔ ɖe Samaria kple Yerusalem ŋu le Yuda-fia Yotam, Axaz kple Xizkiya ŋɔli.
Mi dukɔwo katã, misee, anyigba kple edzl nuwo, miƒu to anyi! Aƒetɔ Yehowa nye ɖasefo ɖe mia ŋu, Aƒetɔ la tso eƒe gbedoxɔ kɔ: kɔe la me!
Elabena kpɔ ɖa, Yehowa atso le enɔƒe ahaɖi ɖe anyi, eye wòatsa le anyigba ƒe gkɔkɔƒewo.
Towo alólo le ete abe anyĩgba le dzo nu ene, eye gbadzaƒewo aɖe dzoglo, abe alesi tsi sina tsoa aganu wònɔna ene.
Yakob ƒe dzidadawo kple Israel ƒe aƒe ƒe nuvɔ̃wo tae nusiawo katã dzɔ ɖo. Yakob ƒe dzidada ɖe? Ɖe menye eya nye Samaria oa? Yuda ƒe nuxeƒe ɖe? Ɖe menye eyae nye Yerusalem oa?
Eyata matsɔ Samaria awɔ anyiglãgoe ɖe gbe me kple weingbledeƒee, malɔ eƒe kpewo aƒu gbe ɖe abu me, eye maɖi ƒeƒle eƒe agunu.
Woagbãwoƒe aklama kpakpɛwo katã, woatɔ dzo woƒe gbolonunanawo katã, eye matsrɔ̃ woƒe legbawo katã; elabena gboloho wotsɔ ƒo wo nu ƒui, eye gboloho woagazu.
Eyata mafa konyi, mafa avi, eye maɖe ƒeƒle anɔ yiyim; mafa konyi abe amegãxiwo ene, eye maxa nu abe golowo ene.
Elabena gbedada mele eƒe ƒoƒowo ŋu o; elabena eva Yuda ke, eye wòde nye dukɔ ƒe agbo nu vaseɖe Yerusalem ke.
Migado bobloe le Gat o; migafa avi le Ako o, eye mlgaƒo togotogoe le ke me le Bet-Leafra o!
Mi Safirtɔwo, miɖe ama miaʋu adzo; Zaanantɔwo mele dzodzo ge o; mifa konyi le Bet-Haezel, elabena mia gbɔe wòdze aʋa ɖo!
Dzidzi aƒo Ma-rotfɔwo le woƒe dzɔgbenyuie ta, elabena dzɔgbevɔ̃e ɖi tso Yehowa ghɔ ɖe Yerusalem ƒe agbowo dzi.
Laxistɔwo, mitsi sɔwo ɖe tasiaɖamwo ŋu! Elabena wòe nye Zion-nyɔnuvl ƒe nuvɔ̃ gãtɔ, eye gbɔwòe wokpɔ Israel ƒe dzidadawo le.
Eyata àklã ɖa tso Moreset-Gat ŋu; Axsib-xɔwo aflu Israel-fiawo.
Mi Maresatɔwo, magakplɔ nugblẽla aƒu mi, eye Israel ƒe bubumewo aɖe Adulam ke.
Lũ ta kokoe le viwò, siwo ghɔ mèlɔ̃a nu le o la ta; wò ta nebebe tegblẽ abe akagã tɔ ene, elabena wokplɔ wo dzoe le gbɔwò.
Baba na amesiwo ɖoa dzɔ-gbevɔ̃e ɖe ta me, eye wobua nu vɔ̃ɖl wɔwɔ ŋu le woƒe abawo dzi! Ne agu dze la, wowɔnɛ, elabena ŋusẽ le wo si,
Ne agble dzro wo la, woxɔnɛ; ne xɔ dzro wo la, wodaa adzoe, eye woɖua sesẽnu le aƒe kple aƒetɔ si, le ŋu-tsu kple eƒe domenyinu si.
Eyata ale Yehowa gblɔ esi: Meɖo tame vɔ̃ ɖe ƒome sia ŋu, miaɖe ta le eme o, eye miadzɔ kã anɔ yiyim o, elabena ɣeyiɣi vɔ̃ɖi wònye.
Ɣemaɣi la woado lo ɖe mia ŋu, eye woadzi konyifaha agblɔ bena: Wogblẽ ml keŋkeŋ, wodzidze nye ɖukɔ ƒe anyigba, eye wome-gagbughɔe na ml o; womã míaƒe agblewo na amesiwo ɖe aboyo ml.
„Eyata wò amea ɖeke mada dzidzeka ɖe eƒe anyigba ŋu le Yehowa ƒe amehawo dome o.“
Wole gbɔgblɔm be: Migagblɔ nya o, migagblɔ nya siawo tɔgbe o, vlodoame nu metso o,
Nya kae nye esia gblɔm Yakob ƒe aƒe la le be: „Ɖe Yehowa mesea dziku dona o, eye esia nye eƒe nuwɔna?“ Ɖe nye nyawo mefa na ame dzɔdzɔewo oa?
Ke gbaɖegbe ke nye ɖukɔ dze aglã hezu ketɔ: Mieɖe awu ʋlaya le amesiwo ɖe dzi ɖi bɔkɔɔ va tso me yina la ƒe awuwo dzi, abe aʋae miegbɔ tso ene.
Mienyã nye ɖukɔ ƒe nyɔnuwo ɖa le woƒe xɔ, siwo gbɔ womelɔ̃a nu le o la me, eye miexɔ atsyɔ̃ le wo viwo si ɖikaa.
Mitso miadzo! Elabena afi menye mia nɔƒe o; le nu makɔmakɔ wɔwó ta woatsɔ gbegblẽ, si teƒe mekɔ o la, agblẽ mi.
Ne amea ɖe le ya yome lelele, eye wòɖa alakpa be: „Magblɔ nya na mi le wein kple aha muame ŋu“ la, eya anye nyagblɔla asɔe na dukɔ sia.
Maƒo Yakob nu ƒu blibo, eye makplɔ Israel ƒe ame mamleawo ɖe du; maƒo wo nu ƒu ɖe lãkpɔ me abe alẽwo ene, abe lãha le lãnyiƒe titina ene; eye afima agblẽ kple amegbetɔwo.
Gligbãla aho adze wo ŋgɔ, woagbãe ato agbo nu age ɖe eme, eye woagado, woƒe fia adze wo ŋgɔ, eye Yehowa anɔ wo nu.
Eye megblɔ bena: Mi Yakob ƒe tatɔwo kple Israel ƒe aƒe me amegãwo, ɖe menye mlaƒe dɔ wònye be, miadze si se la oa?
Mi amesiwo léa fu nyui, eye mielɔ̃a vɔ̃, mievuvua agbalẽ lewo ŋu kple lã le woƒe ƒuwo ŋu.
Mi amesiwo ɖua nye ɖukɔ ƒe lã, miefloa agbalẽ lewo ŋu, eye miegbãa woƒe ƒuwo; mieflia wo dea ze abe lã ene, eye abe lã le kutu me ene.
Emegbe woado ɣli ayɔ Yehowa, ke matɔ na wo o, eye wòaɣla ŋku me ɖe wo ɣemaɣl le woƒe nuwɔua vɔ̃ɖlwo ta.
Ale Yehowa gblɔ ɖe nyagblɔɖilawo ŋu, wo amesiwo kplɔa nye ɖukɔ tranae, eye ne woƒe aɖu kpɔ nu le ɖuɖum la, woɖoa boblo ŋutl-fafa, ke wotsɔa aʋa ɖe amesi mena nu wo, be woaɖu o ŋu la, enye si:
Eyata zã ghɔna ɖoɖo ge na ml, miakpɔ ŋutega o; blukɔ le dodo ge na mi, miaka afã o; ɣe aɖo to ɖe nyagblɔɖilawo, eye ŋke-ke anyɔ tsiɖitsiɖi ɖe wo.
Ŋu-kpe alé nukpɔlawo, bokɔnɔwo ƒe mo atsi ɖã, eye wo katã woabla nu ɖe ge, elabena Mawu megale nya ŋu ɖom azɔ o.
Ke nye la, ŋusẽ kple Yehowa ƒe gbɔgbɔ, dzɔdzɔenyenye kple dzideƒo yɔm fũ, ne magblɔ Yakob ƒe dzidadawo kple Israel ƒe nuvɔ̃wo nɛ.
Misee, mi Yakob ƒe aƒe ƒe ta-tɔwo kple mi Israel ƒe aƒe ƒe amegãwo, mi amesiwo nyɔa ŋu se la, eye mieglɔ̃a nu dzɔdzɔewo katã;
mi amesiwo tsɔa fʋu tsoa Zion kple nu vɔ̃ɖi wɔwɔ tsoa Yerusalem.

Woƒe tatɔwo drɔ̃a ʋɔnu le zãnunana ta, woƒe nunɔ-lawo fiaa nu ame le fetu ta, eye woƒe nyagblɔɖilawo gblɔa nya ɖl le ga ta; woziɔna ɖe Yehowa ŋu nɔa gbɔgblɔm be: Ɖe Yehowa mele mia dome oa? Dzɔgbevɔ̃ea ɖeke mele mia, dzi va ge o.
Eyata le mia ta woade Zion abe agble ene, Yerusalem azu glikpo, eye gbedoxɔ ƒe to azu togbɛ toave.
Eye wòava me le ŋkeke mlɔeawo me be, Yehowa ƒe aƒe ƒe to la akɔ ta aghɔ towo ŋu, eye wòaƒo togbɛwo ta, eye anyigba dzi dukɔwo aƒo zi ɖe eŋu.

Eye ɖukɔ geɖewo atso agblɔ bena: „Mina míayi Yehowaƒe to la kple Yakob ƒe Mawu ƒe aƒe la gbɔ, ne wòafia eƒe mɔwo mí, eye míazɔ eƒe toƒewo!“ Elabena nufiame atso Zion, eye Yehowa ƒe nya atso Yerusalem.

Adrɔ̃ ʋɔnu na ɖukɔ geɖewo, eye wòatso nya me na anyigba dzi ɖukɔ geɖewo vaseɖe didiƒe ke. Woatsɔ woƒe yiwo atu agblenuwoe, eye woatsɔ woƒe akplɔwo atu hɛ gohɛwoe; dukɔ magatsɔ yi ɖe dukɔ ŋu azɔ o, eye womagasrɔ̃ aʋawɔwɔ azɔ o.
Eye wo dome amesiame abɔbɔ nɔ anyi ɖe eƒe weinka kple eƒe gboti te bɔkɔɔ; elabena Yehowa Zehaotƒe nue gblɔe,
Elabena ne ɖukɔ-wo katã dometɔ ɖesiaɖe le zɔzɔm le eƒe mawu ƒe ŋkɔ me hã la, míawo ya míazɔ le Yehowa, mía Mawu la ƒe ŋkɔ me ɖaa tegbee.
Ale Yehowa gblɔ esi: Le ɣemaɣi la maƒo abutɔlawo nu ƒu, eye makplɔ amesiwo kaka hlẽ, kple amesiwo dzi mehe gbegblẽ vɛ la, ɖe du.
Mana abutɔlawo nazu ame susɔeawo, eye amesiwo wonyã yi didiƒee, nazu dukɔ sesẽ, eye Yehowa aɖu fia ɖe wo nu le Zion-to la dzi tso fifia ɖaseɖe mavɔ me.
Ke wò lãhawo ƒe xɔ tsrala, wò Zion-nyɔnuvi ƒe toghɛ, dziɖuɖu tsãtɔ asu asiwò, Yerusalem-nyɔnuvl ƒe fiaɖuƒe asu asiwò.
Azɔ nukaŋutl nẽle aƒa ɖom ale? Ɖe fiaa ɖeke megale me-wò o, eye adaŋudela bu ɖe wò, ale be nẽle ku lém abe nyɔnu, si le vi ɖzim la enea?

Zion-nyɔnuvi; ƒo togotogoe nalé ku abe uyɔnu, si le vi ɖzim la ene! Elabena ele na wò be, naʋu le ɖua me aɖanɔ gbedadaƒo, eye naɖe Babel ke; afima woaɖe wò le, eye afima Yehowa axɔ wò le wò fu-tɔwo si me le.
Ekema ɖukɔ geɖewo aƒo takpli ɖe ŋuwò agblɔ bena: „Wogblẽ kɔ ɖo nɛ, eye míaƒe ŋkuwo aɖl ƒo ɖe Zion ŋu!“
Ke womenyaa Yehowa ƒe: susuwo o, eye womedzea si eƒe tameɖoɖowo be, eli kɔ wo abe lubabla ɖe lugbɔƒe ene o.

Zion-nyɔnuvi, tso nafanya nu! Elabena mana wò dzo nanye gayibɔ, eye wò afɔkli nanye akɔbli, ne nagbã dukɔ geɖewo gudugudu, eye nakɔ aboyonuwo ŋu na Yehowa kple woƒe kesinɔnuwo ŋu na anyigba blibo la dzi Aƒetɔ.
Azɔ kuko ŋuti na ɖokuiwò; elabena woaƒu kpo ɖe ŋuwò, eye woatsɔ ati aƒo to me na Israel ƒe ʋɔnudrɔ̃la.
Ke wò Betlexem Efrata, esi nènye suetɔ le Yuda ƒe ƒomeawo dome hã la, mewò Israel ƒe dziɖula le dzɔdzɔ ge atso nam, amesi dzɔɣi tso tititi le gbaɖegbe ʋĩ ke.
Eyata atsɔ wo aɖe asi vaseɖe ɣeyiɣi, si funɔa ɖe nadzi vi; emegbe nɔviawo ƒe mamlea atrɔ agbɔ akpe ɖe Israel-viwo ŋu.
Ado ahatsɔ Yehowa ƒe ŋusẽ kple eƒe Mawu, Yehowa ŋkɔ ƒe gãnye-nye anyi woe, eye woanɔ anyi bɔkɔɔ, elabena alolo azɔ vaseɖe anyigba ƒe mlɔenu.
Eyama anye gŋutifafa. Eye ne Asur va míaƒe anyigba ɖzi, eye wòbe, yeaɖo afɔ mlaƒe fiasãwo me la, míadɔ lã-kplɔvi adre kple amegã enyi ɖe eŋu.
Woatsɔ yi agblẽ Asur ƒe anyigba la, eye woadi yi agblẽ Nimrod ƒe anyigba la; woaɖe mi tso Asur si me, ne eva míaƒe anyigba dzi, eye wòbe, yeaɖo afɔ míaƒe llƒowo dzi la.
Yakob ƒe ame mamleawo anɔ ɖukɔ geɖewo dome, abe Yehowa ƒe zãmu kple tsiɖzadza ɖe gbe dzi, si mekpɔa amea ɖeke sinu o, eye melalaa amegbelɔvia ɖeke o la ene.

Eye Yakob ƒe ame mamleawo anɔ anyigba ɖzi dukɔwo me le ɖukɔ geɖewo dome abe dzata le gbemelãwo dome ene, abe dzatavi le alẽhawo dome, si, ne eto wo dome la, enyãa avuzi le nu dzi, eye wòvuvua nu, ke xɔnametɔa ɖeke menɔa anyi o la ene.
Wò alɔ aɖe ɖzl ɖe wò ketɔwo ŋu, eye woatsrɔ̃ wò futɔwo katã!
Ale Yehowa gblɔ esi: Ɣemaɣi la matsrɔ̃ wò sɔwo ɖa le dowòme, eye magblẽ wò tasiaɖamwo.
Matsrɔ̃ wò anyigba ɖzl duwo, eye magbã wò mɔ̃ sesẽwo katã aƒu anyi.
Matsrɔ̃ dzokawo le asiwò, eye gbesalawo maganɔ asiwò azɔ o.
Matsrɔ̃ wò aklama kpakpɛwo kple aƒeliwo ɖa le ɖo-wòme, eye magaɖe ta agu na wò aslnudɔwɔwɔwo azɔ o.
Maho wò Aserawo ɖa le dowòme, eye magblẽ wò duwo.
Eye mabia hlɔ̃ ɖukɔ, siwo gbe toɖoɖo la, le dɔmedzoe kple dziku me.
Mise nya, si gblɔm Yehowa le: Tso nahe nya kple towo, eye togbɛwo nase wò gbe!
Mi towo kple anyigba ƒe agunu sesẽwo, mise Yehowa ƒe dzrenya! Elabena dzre le Yehowa kple eƒe ɖukɔ la dome, eye wòle ʋɔnu yi ge kple Israel.
Nye dukɔ, nukae mewɔ wò, eye fu kae meɖe na wò ma? Ɖo ŋu nam!
Nyee kplɔ wò tso Egipte-nyigba dzi, mexɔ wò ƒle tso kluvinyenyeƒe me, eye medɔ Mose, Aron: kple Miryam woɖze ŋgɔwò ɖe!
Nye ɖukɔ, ɖo ŋu tame, si Moab-fia Balak ɖo, kple alesi Bileam, Beor vi la, ɖo eŋu nɛ; ɖo ŋu nya, siwo dzɔ tso Sitim vaseɖe Gilgal, ne nadze si Yehowa ƒe dɔmenyo!
Nukae matsɔ ɖe asi ado ɖe Yehowa ŋku me, eye made ta agu ɖe Mawu ɖziƒoʋĩtɔ la ŋku me? Ɖe matsɔ enumevɔsa kple nyivi, siwo xɔ ƒe ɖeka la, ɖe asi ado ɖe eŋku mea?
Ɖe agbo akpewo kple amitɔʋu akpe nanewo adze Yehowa ŋua? Ɖe matsɔ vinye ŋgɔgbea ana ɖe nye dzidadawo ta kple nye dɔmevi ana ɖe nye luʋɔ ƒe nuvɔ̃wo taa?
Amegbetɔ, egblɔ nusi nyo la na wò; nusi ko dim Yehowa le tso asiwò la, enye be, nawɔ nusi le eteƒe, nalɔ̃ dɔmenyowɔwɔ, eye uabɔbɔ ɖokuiwò ɖe anyi ahazɔ le wò Mawu ŋku me.
Yehowa le du la yɔm; amesi vɔ̃a wò ŋkɔ la, nunyalae; milé to ɖe ameƒoti kple amesi ɖoe ɖa la ŋu!
Ɖe kesinɔnu madzɔmadzɔ kple nudotree nyaŋui, si ŋu fi-ƒode le la, gale ame vɔ̃ɖi ƒe me koa?
Ɖe matso afia na ame, ne nuɖanu madzɔmaɖzɔ li, eye nudakpe amebatɔ le akplo mea?
Elabena woƒe kesinɔtɔwo yɔ fũ kple ŋulasesẽ, duametɔwo ka aʋatso, eye alakpaɖe le nu me na wo.
Eyata nye hã maƒo wò vevie, eye magblẽ dowòme le wò nuvɔ̃wo la.
Àɖu nu, ke màɖi ƒo o, eye ɖɔ anɔ wuwòm ɖaa; ne èdzra nu ɖo la, ɖeke makpɔtɔ o, eye ne ɖe susɔ la, matsɔe ade asi na yi.
Àƒã nu, ke màŋe nu o; ãɖa ami, ke mãkpɔ ami asi o; àfiã aha, ke mãkpɔ wein ano o.
Miewɔ nu ɖe Omri ƒe ɖoɖowo kple Axab ƒe aƒe ƒe nuwɔnawo katã ŋu, eye miezɔ ɖe woƒe adaŋudedewo nu, ne matsɔ wò awɔ gbegbee, duametɔwo nazu tsiãdonu, eye nye dukɔ ƒe ɖzu uauɔ mia dzi.
Baba nam! Elabena ezu nam, abe alesi kutsetsegbeɣi kple weiuxaɣl nu yinae ene: weintsetsea ɖeke meli, ne woaɖu o, eye nye ve me le fiefiẽm ɖe kutsetse ŋgɔgbea ŋu.
Nuteƒewɔlawo nu yi le anyigba ɖzi, eye ame dzɔdzɔea ɖeke megale amegbetɔwo dome o; wo kalã wode xa ɖe ʋu ŋu, eye woɖo ɖɔ na wo nɔewo.
Vɔ̃ɖiwɔwɔ sɔ alɔ me na wo; amegã dia nu, ʋɔnudrɔ̃la drɔ̃a ʋɔuu le fetu ta, eye dumegãwo gblɔa nusi le wo dzrom; ale woblua afɔ na nya.
Ame nyuitɔ le wo dome le abe ŋu ene, eye nuteƒewɔla vɔ̃ɖi wu aŋɔka. Le wò gbetakpɔlawo ƒe ŋkekea dzi la tohehe ava na wò; azɔ tɔtɔ aɖo wo dome.
Migaxɔ miaƒe zɔhɛ ɖzl se o, eye migaɖo dzi ɖe mia xɔlɔ̃ kutsimea ŋu o; kpɔ wò aɖe dzi le nyɔnu, si le akɔwònu la ghɔ.
Ŋutsuvi aɖe alɔme le fofoa ŋu, eye nyɔnuvi atso ɖe dada ŋu; lɔ̃xoyɔvinyɔnu atso ɖe lɔ̃xoa ŋu, eye ŋutsu ƒe aƒemetɔwo anye eƒe futɔwo.
Ke nye la matsa ŋu na Yehowa, eye makpɔ Mawu, nye xɔnametɔ sinu; nye Mawu ase nye gbe.
Nye futɔ, meganɔ dzidzɔ kpɔm ɖe ŋunye, o; elabena ne medze anyi la, magafɔ, eye ne mebɔbɔ nɔ viviti me la, Yehowa ye nye nye kekeli.
Mado dzi atsɔ Yehowa ƒe dziku, elabena mewɔ nuvɔ̃ ɖe eŋu, vaseɖe esime wòadrɔ̃ nye nya ahatso nam; akplɔm aɖo ɖe kekeli nu, eye makpɔ eƒe dzɔdzɔenyenye kple ŋku.
Nye ketɔ, amesi le gbɔgblɔm nam be: Afika Yehowa, wò Mawu, le hã la, akpɔe, eye ŋukpe alée. Nye ŋku aɖi ƒo ɖe eŋu, emegbe woafanyae abe ba le kpɔdomee ene.
Ŋkeke la ghɔna, be woaɖo wò gliwo, eye wò liƒowo ate ayi adzɔge ʋĩ gbemagbe.
Ɣemaɣi la amewo ava gbɔwò tso Asur vaseɖe Egipte-duwo gbɔ, eye tso Egipte vaseɖe Frat nu, tso atsiaƒu nu yi atsiaƒu nu, eye tso to ghɔ yi lo gbɔ.
Ke anyigba anye gbegbe le edzinɔlawo ŋuti le woƒe nuwɔnawo ƒe kutsetse ta.
Tsɔ wò atikplɔ kplɔ wò dukɔ, wò ŋutɔ wò lãha, siwo ɖe ɖe aga le ave me le Karmel dzi; woaɖu gbe le Basan kple Gilead abe blema ene.
Mana wòakpɔ nukunuwo abe gbesigbe nèʋu tso Egipte-nyigba dzi ene.
Dukɔwo akpɔe, eye woƒe ŋusẽwo katã akpe ŋu na wo, woatsɔ asi aɖo nu, eye woƒe towo me atsi.
Woaɖuɖɔ kewɔ abe dawo kple anyigba dzi nutatawo ene, eye woadzo nyanyanya aɖo atso woƒe mɔ̃wome; dzidzi aƒo wo woava Yehowa, mía Mawu la gbɔ, eye woavɔ̃ wò.
Mawu kae ɖe nuwò? Wò amesi tsɔa vodada kena, eye mèléa ŋku ɖe wò domenyinu mamlea ƒe dzidada ŋu o; meléa dɔmedzoe ɖe ɖɔ me ɖikaa o, eye amenuveve ƒe nu dzea ŋuwò.
Agakpɔ nublanui na mi, àxɔ aɖi le miaƒe vodadawo si, eye wòatsɔ míaƒe nuvɔ̃wo katã aƒu gbe ɖe atsiaƒu ƒe gogloƒe.
Àwɔ nuteƒe na Yakob, eye àve Abraham nu, abe alesi nèka atam na mía fofowo tso blema ŋɔli ke ene.
Nya ɖe Niniwe ŋu: Naxum, Elkositɔ ƒe nyagblɔɖigbalẽ enye si.
Mawu: ŋuʋãla kple hlɔ̃biala enye Yehowa; Yehowa biaa hlɔ̃, eye dzl kunɛ vevie; Yehowa biaa hlɔ̃ eƒe ketɔwo, eye wòléa nya ɖe dɔ me na eƒe futɔwo.
Yehowa gbɔa dzi ɖi blewu, eye ŋusẽ gã le esi, ke megbea tohehe o. Yehowa ƒe mo to ahom kple ya ʋuduʋudu me, eye alilikpowo nye eƒe afɔ ƒe ʋuʋudedi.
Eblu ɖe atsiaƒu: ta wòmie, eye wòna tɔsisiwo katã ƒu kplakplakpla; Basan kple Karmel woyrɔ, eye Libanon ƒe numiemiewo yrɔ.
Towo ʋuʋu le eŋgɔ, togbɛwo lólo gbanaa, eye anyigba kple xexeame kpakple emenɔlawo katã dzo kpekpekpe le eŋku me.
Ameka ate ŋu anɔ te ɖe eƒe dziku nu, eye ameka ato ɖe eƒe dɔmedzoe heliheli nu? Etrɔ eƒe dziku ƒo ɖi abe dzo ene, eye agakpewo le wowom le eŋgɔ.
Yehowa ƒe dɔme nyo, enye sitsoƒe le xaxagbe, eye wònya amesiwo ɖoa dzi ɖe eŋu.
Ke ana tsi naƒo ɖi bababa, eye wòatsrɔ̃ eƒe nɔƒe, eye wòalsɔ viviti ayɔ eƒe fulɔwo ɖe nu.
Tame ka miebe, yewoaɖo ɖe Yehowa ŋu? Ele nu tsrɔ̃ ge, eye xaxa maɖo ta ɖa zi evelia o.
Elabena ne woɖo wo nɔewo me nyamanyama abe aŋɔka ene, eye woƒo tsi abe woƒe nunonowo ene la, woabi keŋkeŋ abe gbe ƒuƒu ene.
Gbɔwòe amesi ɖo tame vɔ̃ ɖe Yehowa ŋu, eye wòɖe adaŋu vlo la tso.
Ale Yehowa ghlɔ esi; Ne ŋusẽ le wo ŋu, eye wosɔ ghɔ kpaŋ hã la, woasẽ wo ɖa, eye wo nu ayi; mehɔhɔ wo ɖe anyi, ke nyemagabɔbɔ wo ɖe anyi azɔ o.
Azɔ maŋe eƒe kɔkutl ɖa le dziwò, eye matso eƒe kawo.
Ke ŋuwò la, ale Yehowa ɖo ɖi enye si: Womagatsɔ wò ŋkɔ aƒã azɔ o; matsrɔ aklama kpakpɛwo kple legba kɔkɔwo ɖa le wò mawuwo ƒe me; maɖe yɔɖo na wò, elabena èle wodzoe akpa.
Kpɔ ɖa, ɖu nyui xɔla ƒe afɔwo ɖo towo dzi, eye wòle gbe ƒã ɖem ŋutlfafa be: Yuɖa, ɖu wò ŋkekenyuiewo, eye nawɔwò adzɔgbeɖeɖewo dzi; elabena ame vlo la magaƒo ɖe, dzlwò azɔ o, wo-tsrɔ̃e keŋkeŋ!
Nughlẽla le ƒoƒo ge ɖe dziwò: Kpɔ mɔ̃ sesẽwo ta, eye natsa ŋu te mɔ dzl, bla ali dzi, eye nade dzo la me vevie!
Elabena Yehowa agaghughɔ Yakob ƒe gãnyenye vɛ abe Israel ƒe gãnyenye ene. Elabena nuhalawo hae keŋkeŋ, eye woghlẽ eƒe weinkawo.
Eƒe kalẽtɔwo ƒe akpoxɔnuwo biã hẽ, eye aʋawɔlawo le abe aɖabɛ dzitɔ ene, tasiaɖam ŋu gawo le dzo kem le akpablagbe, eye wole akplɔwo nyẽm.
Tasiaɖamwo le zi nyẽm le kpɔdomeewo; eye wole du dzi le ablɔwo me; wole abe kakatiwo ene, eye wole zɔzɔm abe dzikedzo ene.
Eɖo ŋku eƒe bubumewo dzi; wole ya mum le yiyim, eye woɖe abla yi ɖua ƒe gli gbɔ, ke wotu akpoxɔ ɖi xoxo.
Woaʋu agbo, siwo le tɔ to, eye dzidzi aƒo fiasã la.
Woaɖe ama fiasrɔ̃ akplɔ adzoe,: eƒe nyɔmidɔlawo anɔ fafam abe akpakpa ene, eye woanɔ akɔta ƒom.
Tso gbaɖegbe ke Niniwe le abe ta, si tsi yɔ fũ ene; ke woasi, eye ne wobe, „mitɔ, mitɔ“ la, amea ɖeke menye kɔ o.
Miha klosalo, miha sika! Aƒemenuwo teƒe mekɔ o, eye nu vevi vovovowo sɔ gbɔ kpaŋkpaŋ!
Woaɖi gbɔloe ƒiaƒiaƒia, eye woahae! Dziwo alólo gbanaa eye klowo anɔ ƒoƒom kpakpakpa, aliwo katã adzo nyanyanya, eye ŋkumewo katã afu tititi.
Afika dzatawo nɔƒe le azɔ, eye afika dzataviwo ƒe nuɖuƒe le, afisi dzatatsu kple dzatanɔ kpakple dzataviwo tsana le, eye amea ɖeke medoa vodi na wo o?
Dzata lé nu alesi atu viawo nu, eye wòwu nu na dzatanɔwo; etsɔ adzonu yɔ eƒe ɖowo fũ kple nuléle yɔ enɔƒewoe.
Ale Yehowa Zebaot gblɔ esi: Kpɔ ɖa, maƒo ɖe dziwò, eye wò dzataviwo atsi yi nu, matsi wò adzodada nu le anyigba dzi, eye womagase wò ame dɔdɔwo ƒe gbe azɔ o.
Baba na hlɔ̃dodu, si me alakpadada hɔ ɖo, ŋutasesẽ yɔe fũ, eye wòghe aslɖeɖe le adzodada ŋu!
Fu to anyi, sɔƒokawo le ɖiɖim, eye tasiaɖamfɔwo le zi nyẽm, sɔwo le du dzl, eye tasiaɖamwo le hoo wɔm!
Sɔdolawo dze aʋa, yi le dzo dam, eye akplɔwo le dzo sim; ame tsiaʋawo teƒe mekɔ o, eye ame kukuwo sɔ gbɔ kpaŋkpaŋ, seƒe meli na ame kukuwo o, eye wodze anyi ɖe woƒe ame kukuwo dzl.
Le gbolo ƒe ahaslwɔwó vivivo kple dzotɔ dzetugbee nyo la, amesi tso eƒe gholowɔwɔ ƒle dukɔwoe, eye wòtsɔ eƒe dzosasa ƒle ƒomewoe ta la,
kpɔ ɖa, ale Yehowa Zebaot gblɔ esi: Maƒo ɖe dziwò, eye maɖe wò taɖedzi lewo ŋutɔ ŋkuwò me, mana dukɔwo nakpɔ wò ama, eye fiaɖuƒewo nakpɔ wò ŋukpeƒe.
Matsɔ nu nyɔŋuwo axlã ɖe wò, maɖi gbɔ wò, eye matsɔ wò aɖo kpɔdzidzee.
Eye wòava me be, ne amea ɖe to ŋuwò yina la, asi le nuwo agblɔ bena; Wogblẽ Niniwe, ameka afa nɛ, eye afika maɖadi akɔfala le na wò?
Ɖe nènye wu No-Amon, si hɔhɔ nɔ Nil-tɔsisi to, tsi ɖe to ɖee goɖoo, atsiaƒu nye kpo nɔ eŋu, eye tsi nye gli nɔ eŋu laa?
Kusitɔ kple Egiptetɔ gbogboawo nye eƒe ŋusẽ, Putitɔwo kple Lubitɔwo nye wò xɔnametɔwo.
Ke wonyã eya hã ɖe gbe wòyi aboyo me, eye woxlã viawo ɖe kpɔdomeewo ƒe dzogoewo katã, wodzidze nu ɖe eƒe bubumewo dzl, eye wode kɔsɔkɔsɔ eƒe amegãwo katã.
Wò hã àmu aha, wò mo atsyɔ zi, eye nadi sltsoƒe le futɔ la nu.
Wò mɔ̃ sesẽwo katã le abe gboti, siwo dzi kutsetse ɖiɖiwo le la ene; ne woʋuʋu wo la, woade adze nu me na wo ɖula.
Kpɔ ɖa, wò amewo le abe nyɔnuwo ene le dowòme; wò anyigba ƒe agbowo aʋu wo ɖokul na wò futɔwo siaa, eye dzo afiã wò gametiwo.
Du tsi na ɖokuiwò, elabena wole to ɖe ge ɖe wò, eye ƒu kpo ɖe dzi, ɖo agbi me nanyã anyi, eye namè anyikpewo!
Afima dzo aɖu wò le, aɖu wò abe ʋefra ene, eye yi atsrɔ̃ wò, ne éde ha abe ʋetrawo ene, eye nèsɔ gbɔ kpaŋkpaŋ abe ʋetsuviwo ene hã.
Wo asitsalawo sɔ gbɔ wu dziƒoɣletiviwo, ke ʋetrawo aɖɔ li aʋala ahadzo adzo.
Wo amegãwo le abe ʋetrawo ene, eye wò aʋaflawo le abe ʋe-tsuviwo ƒe ha ene, wodzona ɖe gliwo ŋu le gbesigbe vuvɔ le wɔwɔm, ke ne ɣe dze la, wotuna dzona, eye womegadzea siwo teƒe o.
Asur-fia, wò lãkplɔviwo le alɔ̃ ɖɔm, eye wò bubumewo le gbɔgbɔm ɖe eme, wò amewo kaka ɖe towo dzi; eye amea ɖeke meƒo wo nu ƒu o.
Wò ghe-ghlẽ nu mafa o, eye hayahaya manɔe na wò ahlxɔxɔ o. Amesiwo katã se nya le ŋuwò la, aƒu akpe ɖe ŋuwò; elabena ameka dzie wò vɔ̃ɖiwɔwɔ meheva atraɖii o ma?
Nya, si nyagblɔɖila Xabakuk kpɔ enye si:
Yehowa, ɣekaɣi mana yɔwòm sesĩe, eye nagbe esese ase ɖo? Mado ɣli na wò le ŋutasesẽ ta, ke màxɔ na ame o?
Nukaŋuti nèna mele nu vlo wɔwɔ teƒe kpɔm, eye nèle hiãkame kpɔm kple ŋku, gbegblẽ kple ŋutasesẽ le ŋkunye me, avuwɔwɔ li, eye dzre dzɔ?
Eyata se la ŋutl nufiafia me gbɔdzɔ, eye nuteƒewɔwɔ megadona ɖe gota o. Elabena ame vɔ̃ɖi ɖe to ɖe ame dzɔdzɔe, eyata nuteƒewɔwɔ trɔ tagbo hafi do.
Miɖe ŋku de dukɔwo dome, mikpɔ nu, eye miaƒe nu neku! Elabena mele nane wɔ ge le mia ŋɔli, eye ne wotoe na mi la, miele exɔ ge ase o.
Kpɔ ɖa, manyɔ Kaldeatɔwo, dukɔ nyanyrã, si ƒe afɔ tsɔna; woatu anyigba ƒe ke-keme, ne woaxɔ nɔƒe, siwo menye wo tɔ o la.
Ŋɔdzi kple vɔvɔ̃ anɔ eŋu, ade se, eye wòaɖu gã ɖe eya ŋutɔ ƒe akɔta.
Eƒe sɔ wo ɖi ɖu wu lãkle, eye woƒe afɔ, wo tsɔ wu famegãxi le zã me, eƒe sɔdolawo le zi nyẽm, didiƒe ke eƒe sɔdolawo tso, eye wole dzodzom abe hɔ̃, si le abla ɖem ɖe nuɖuɖu ŋu la ene.
Wo katã wova ɖe ŋutasesẽ ŋu, wotso woƒe ŋkume tu ŋgɔ tẽ, eye weƒo aboyo mewo nu ƒu abe ke ene
Woaɖe alɔme le fiawo ŋu, eye woaku amegãwo, mɔ̃ sesẽwo anye fefenu na wo, eye woatsɔ anyi aƒu kpoe ahaxɔ wo.
Emegbe aho adzo abe ahom ene, eye enu ayi; ke amesi tsɔ eƒe ŋusẽ wɔ mawui la: to vo ɖe eya ŋutɔ ɖokui ŋu.
Yehowa, nye Mawu, nye kɔkɔetɔ, ɖe menye wòe li tso blema ke oa? Míele kuku ge o. Yehowa, wòe ɖoe na ʋɔnudɔdrɔ̃, wò agakpe, wòe ɖoe na tohehe.
Wò amesi ƒe ŋkuwo dza, be màte ŋu akpɔ nu yɔ̃ɖi wɔwɔ o, eye màte ŋu alé ŋku ɖe hiãkame ŋu o, nu kaŋuti nèle ame tovo kpɔm kpleŋku, eye nèzi kpi, ne ame vɔ̃ɖi mi amesi nye ame dzɔdzɔe wui la?
Ewɔ amegbetɔ abe ƒumelã ene, abe nutata, siwo nu aƒetɔa ɖeke mele o la ene.
Etsɔ ƒu he wo katã ɖe go, eɖe wo kple eƒe ɖɔ, eye wòlɔ wo trɔ ɖe eƒe aguɖɔe me. Eyata wòle dzidze kpɔm le aseye tsom ɖo.
Eyata wòsavɔ na eƒe ɖɔ, eye wòɖo dzudzɔ na eƒe aguɖɔe; elabena woawoe na eƒe gome ɖa ami, eye eƒe nuɖuɖu sɔ gbɔ fũ.
Ɖe wòanɔ eƒe ɖɔ kam, eye wòanɔ dukɔwo wuwu dzi ɖaa nublanui makpɔmakpɔea?
Mayi nye dzɔƒe, eye matsi tre ɖe xɔta, ne matsa ŋu akpɔ nya, si wòle gbɔgblɔ ge nam, kple nya, si tsɔ ge wòala aɖo nye nyahehe ŋu nam
Tete Yehowa ɖo ŋu nam gblɔ bena: Ŋlɔ ŋutega la ɖi, eye naɖee ɖe kpe dzi, be wòanya xlẽ bɔbɔe.
Elabena azãgbe li na ŋutega la, eƒe nuwuwu le aƒe tum, eye maflu ame o; ke ne etsi megbe la, kpɔ esinu; elabena ele vava ge kokoko, eye mahe ɖe megbe o.
Kpɔ ɖa, eƒe luʋɔ vu gblotoo, eye meto mɔ ɖeka le eme o; ke ame dzɔdzɔe ya anɔ agbe to eƒe xɔse me.

Wein la, ameflulae, ŋutsu adegbeƒola manɔ anyi aɖe dzi ɖi akpɔ o, eyama keeƒé nu abe tsieƒe ene, eye nu meɖia ƒo na o abe sãɖagatsi ene, eƒo dukɔwo katã nu ƒu ɖe eɖokui gbɔ, eye wòlɔ anyigba ɖzi dukɔwo katã li kɔe ɖe eɖokui gbɔ.
Ɖe amesiawo katã mado hamelo ɖe eŋu, woasi ahama, eye woado lo ɖe eŋu agblɔ hena: „Baba na amesi ƒo nu geɖe ƒu, hafi menye etɔ o, eye wòtsɔ awɔbanu do agba na eɖokui la“ oa? Ɣekaɣi wòanɔ anyi ase ɖo?
Ɖe wò fetɔwo matso kpoyi, amesiwo axaxa wò ɖo la, nanyɔ, eye woahe wò oa?
Elabena esi nèha dukɔ geɖewo la, eyata dukɔwo ƒe susɔeawo katã aha wò le ameʋu, si nèka ɖe anyi, kple ŋuta, si nèsẽ le anyigba kple ɖu la kpakple emenɔlawo katã ŋu la ta.
Baba na amesi tafaa ame na eƒe aƒe, ne wòawɔ atɔ ɖe dziƒo ʋĩ, be wòasi le dzɔgbevɔ̃e nu la!
Eɖo ŋukpe ɖe ta me ɖe wò aƒe ŋu, esi nèbe, yeatsrɔ̃ dukɔ geɖewo, eye nègblẽ wò agbe dome.
Elabena kpewo axlɔ̃ le gli me, eye daɖedziwo aɖo ŋu na wo le xɔtiwo me.
Baba na amesi tsɔ ʋu tso dui, eye wòtsɔ nu vɔ̃ɖi wɔwɔ tu mɔ̃e!
Kpɔ ɖa, ɖe menye Yehowa Zebaot gbɔ wòtso be, dukɔwo nadze agbagba bena dzo, eye anyigba dzi dukɔwo naku kutri yakatsyɔ oa?
Elabena sidzedze Yehowa ƒe ŋutikɔkɔe ayɔ anyigba dzi taŋ, abe alesi tsi yɔ atsiaƒui ene.
Baba na amesi na nu ehavi wòno, eye wòku dziku nɛ wono mu, be yeakpɔ eƒe ama!
Ŋukpe aɖi ƒo na wò, eye menye bubu o; wò hã noe, ne naɖe ama, Yehowa ƒe nuɖusi lé kplu la wòva ɖo gbɔwò, eye, wò bubu aɖi gbɔ.
Elabena ŋuta, si wosẽ le Libanon ŋu la, ava ddiwò, eye lã, siwo wotsrɔ̃ la, aɖo ŋɔdzi na wò le ameʋu, si nekɔ ɖe anyi, kple ŋuta, si nèsẽ le anyigba kple du la kpakple emenɔlawo katã ŋu la ta.
Viɖe ka nye aklama kpakpɛ be, ekpala kpae, eye viɖe ka nye legba kɔkɔ kple alakpanufiala be, legbamela le dzi ɖom ɖe eƒe legba ŋu, esi wòwɔ legba maƒonuwo?
Baba na amesi lé gbɔgblɔm na ati be: Nyɔ! eye na kpe maƒonu be: Fɔ! Ɖe wòate ŋu afia nu amea? Kpɔ ɖa, sika kple klosalo wotsɔ fa ɖe eŋu, eye gbɔgbɔ ku ɖeka hã mele eme o.
Ke Yehowa le eƒe gbedoxɔ kɔkɔe la me; anyigba blibo la nezi ɖoɖoe le eŋku me.
Nyagblɔɖila Xabakuk ƒe gbedodoɖa, ne woadzi ɖe konyifahawo nu.
Yehowa, esi mese nya le ŋuwò la, vɔvɔ̃ ɖom! Yehowa, gbɔ agbe wò dɔwɔwɔ le ƒewo ƒe domedomee, ɖee fia Ie ƒewo ƒe domedomee; ɖo ŋku nublanuikpɔkpɔ dzi le dɔmedzoedodo me!
Mawu tso Teman, eye kɔkɔetɔ la tso Paran-towo dzi. Sela. Eƒe ŋutikɔkɔe nyẽ tsyɔ dziƒo, eye eƒe kafukafu yɔ anyigba dzi taŋ.
Keklẽ ɖo abe ɣe tɔ ene, keklẽ le eƒe axa dzi, eya mee eƒe ŋusẽ be ɖo.
Dɔvɔ̃ dze eŋgɔ, eye dzoxɔxɔ kplɔe ɖo.
Etɔ, eye anyigba ʋuʋu; eɖo ŋku anyi kpɔ nu, eye dzidzi ƒo dukɔwo, blema towo fe kpla, gbaɖegbe togbɛwo ŋe dze eme, eye wòzɔ blema mɔwo dzi.
Mekpɔ Kusan ƒe agbadɔ wòle hlã me, agbadɔvɔwo le dzodzom nyanyanya le Midian-nyigba dzi.
Yehowa, tɔsisiwo ŋue dzi le kuwòm ɖoa, tɔsisiwo ŋue nèle dɔmedzoe dom ɖo loo, alo atsiaƒu ŋue dzi le kuwòm ɖo, be nèdo wò sɔwo, eye neɖo wò tasiaɖamwoa?
Wò dati ɖi ƒeƒle, eye aŋutrɔwo yɔ wò daku fũ. Sela. Emã tɔsisiwo me wòzu anyigba ƒuƒui.
Towo kpɔ wò, eye wodzo kpekpekpe, eye tɔwo gbagba ɖe anyi bababa; agumetsiwo na wose wo ŋkɔ, eye wodo alo ɖe dzi.
Ɣe kple ɣleti tɔ ɖe wo teƒe, bene wò aŋutrɔ, siwo le yiyim la, nanye kekeli, eyewò akplɔ, siwo le dzo kem la, nanye keklẽ.
Eto anyigba dzi le dziku me, eye nè fanya dukɔwo ledɔmedzoe me.
Eho, be naxɔ na wò dukɔ, naxɔ na wò amesiamina la; egbã ta le ame vɔ̃ɖi ƒe aƒe nu, eye wòɖi ƒeƒle tso afɔ gɔme vaseɖe kɔ gbɔ. Sela.
Etsɔ eƒe akplɔ ƒo ɖe ta na eƒe amegãwo, wonyẽ zi va, be woakam ahlẽ; wole aseye tsom abe ɖe wohe, yewoaɖu ame dahe le bebe me ene.
Etsɔ wò sɔwo to atsiaƒu kple tɔ gã nyanyrãwo dzi.

Mesee, eye nye dɔme ʋuʋu, nye nuyiwo le ƒoƒom kokóko, eye ŋuɖui ɖo ƒuwo me nam; ne metsi tre ɖi la, menɔa dzodzom nyanyanya, elabena mele anyi nɔ ge kpoo akpɔ hiãɣi, si le dukɔ, si xaxa mí ɖo la dzi va ge.
Gboti magaƒo se o, eye weinka matse o; amiti agbe aminana, eye agblewo mana, nuɖuɖu o; woatsrɔ̃ alẽwo le lãkpɔwo me, eye nyiwo maganɔ lãxɔwo me o.
Ke nyea matso aseye, eye makpɔ dzidzɔ ɖe Mawu, nye xɔnametɔ la ŋu.
Aƒetɔ Yehowa enye nye ŋusẽ, awɔ nye afa abe zinɔ tɔ ene, eye wòana mazɔ: kɔkɔƒewo. Na kasaŋkuwo ƒe henɔ.
Esia nye Yehowa ƒe gbe, si va na Zefanya, Kus, amesi nye Xizkiya vi Amarya ƒe vi Gedalya ƒe vi la, le Yuda-fia Yosiya, Amon vi la ŋɔli.
Yehowa be: Matsrɔ̃ nusianu ɖa le anyigba dzi petepete.
Matsrɔ̃ amegbetɔwo kple lãwo, dziƒoxewo kple ƒumelãwo, matsrɔ̃ nuɖianuwo kple ame vɔ̃ɖiwo ɖa, eye matsrɔ̃ amegbetɔwo ɖa le anyigba dzi, Yehowa ye gblɔe!
Mado nye asi ɖa ɖe Yuda kple Yerusalemtɔwo katã ŋu, eye ma-tsrɔ̃ Baal ƒe susɔea ɖa le teƒe sia akpe ɖe trɔ̃nuawo kple nunɔlawo ƒe ŋkɔ ŋu;
matsrɔ̃ amesiwo dea ta agu na dziƒo ŋu nuwo la, akpe ɖe amesiwo dea ta agu na Yehowa, gake wogakaa atam na Milkom la siaa ŋu;
eye matsrɔ̃ amesiwo trɔ le Yehowa yome, kple amesiwo medi Yehowa alo bia eta se kpɔ o la siaa.
Mizi ɖoɖoe le Aƒetɔ Yehowa ŋku me, elabena Yehowa ƒe ŋkeke la tu aƒe, elabena Yehowa do vɔsagbe la ɖi, eye wòkɔ amesiwo wòkpe la ŋu!
Eye wòava me le Yehowa ƒe vɔsagbe be, mahe to na amegãwo kple fiaviwo kpakple amesiwo katã taa dutatɔwo ƒe avɔwo la.
Mahe to na amesiwo katã tia kpo flɔa kpuiwo, eye wotsɔa ŋu-tasese kple alakpadada yɔa wo-ƒe aƒetɔ ƒe xɔwo taŋ la, gbemagbe.
Gbemagbe la asiƒunu aɖl tso tɔmelãgbo la nu, avifafa atso du la ƒe to evelia, eye hoo-wɔwɔ gã atso togbɛwo dzl, Yehowa ye gblɔe!
Mi ʋe me nɔ-lawo, mifa avi, elabena woatsrɔ̃ asitsalawo katã kple amesiwo do klosalogba ɖe ta.
Le ɣemaɣi la matsɔ akaɖi atsa le Yerusalem, eye mahe to na amesiwo katã ɖo ƒã ɖi hele gbɔgblɔm le woƒe dzl me be: Yehowa mele nyui alo vɔ̃ wɔ ge o.
Woaha woƒe ke-sinɔnuwo, eye woƒe aƒewo azu aƒedo; woatu xɔ, ke womanɔ eme o, eye woade weingble, ke womano eƒe wein o.
Yehowa ƒe ŋkeke gã la tu aƒe, etu aƒe, eye wòle du dzi ŋutɔ. Yehowa ƒe ŋkeke la ŋkɔ le ɖiɖim, eye kãletɔ le aʋaɣii dom sesĩe.
Dɔmedzoedogbe, hiãgbe kple xaxagbe, aƒedoɖigbe kple nu-gblẽgbee, blukɔ- kple vivitidogbee, alilikpo kple tsizidogbee;
lãdzo- kple kpẽkugbe wòanye ava du sesẽwo kple xɔta kɔkɔwo dzi.
Mahe xaxa ava amegbetɔwo dzi, ne woanɔ yiyim abe ŋkunɔwo ene, elabena wowɔ nuvɔ̃ ɖe Yehowa ŋu; woakɔ woƒe ʋu ɖe anyi abe ke ene, eye woƒe dɔmenuwo adudu ɖe anyi abe mi ene.
Woƒe klosalo kple sika hã mate ŋu aɖe wo le Yehowa ƒe dɔmedzoedogbe o, eye eƒe ŋuʋa-ʋã ƒe dzo afiã anyigba blibo la; elabena ele anyigbadzitɔwo katã tsrɔ̃ ge zi ɖeka.
Mi dukɔ, si ŋu mekpena o, miƒo takpli, eye mido dɔgɔ̃e,
hafi ne tameɖoɖo la ƒe vidziɣi naɖo, eye ɣeyiɣi la nu nayi, abe alesi gbe ƒuƒu ʋua yae ene, hafi ne Yehowa ƒe dɔmedzoe heliheli nava mia dzi, eye hafi ne Yehowa ƒe dzikudogbe nava mia dzi!
Midi Yehowa, mi amesiwo katã bɔbɔ mia ɖokul ɖe anyi le anyigba dzi, midi dzɔdzɔenyenye, eye midi ɖokuibɔbɔ yome mɔ, amea ɖe menye nu o woatsɔ mi aɣia le Yehowa ƒe dzikudogbe la hĩ!
Elabena Gaza azu du gbɔlo, eye Askalon azu aƒedo; woanyã Asdoɖ le ŋdɔkutsu dzatsɛ, eye woaho Ekron kple ke.
Baba na mi Krefa-ɖukɔ, mi amesiwo le atsiaƒu nu! Filistitɔwo ƒe anyigba Kanaan, mia ŋue Yehowa ƒe gbe va ɖo, eye matsrɔ̃ wò, ale be ame navɔ le dziwò.
Kreta azu lãnyiƒe na lãkplɔvlwo kple lãkpɔ na alẽwo.
Anyigba, si le atsiaƒu nu la, azu Yuɖa ƒe aƒe la ƒe ame mamleawo tɔ, eye woaɖu gbe le edzi; woatsyɔ akɔ ɖe Askalon ƒe aƒewo me le fiẽ, ne Yehowa, woƒe Mawu la, va kpɔ wo ɖa, eye wògaɖo wo te.
Mese Moab ƒe alɔmeɖeɖe kple Amon-viwo ƒe vloɖoɖo, wo amesiwo ɖe alɔme le nye ɖukɔ ŋu, eye woka ɖe eƒe anyigba ŋu.

Eyata ale Yehowa Zebaot, Israel ƒe Mawu la, gblɔ esi: Metà ɖokuinye ƒe agbe: Ne Moab mazu abe Soɖom ene, eye Amon-viwo abe Gomora ene o fĩ! Woazu ŋuve, dzeʋe kple gbegbe tegbee; nye ɖukɔ ƒe susɔea aha wo, eye nye dukɔ ƒe mamlea atsɔ wo anyi domee.
Esia adzɔ ɖe wo dzi le woƒe ɖãɖa ta, elabena woɖe alɔme eye woka ɖe Yehowa Zebaot ƒe ɖukɔ la ŋu.
Yehowa anye ame dziŋɔ anɔ wo nu, elabena ana legbawo katã nu nayi le anyigba dzi, eye dukɔwo ƒe ƒukpowo katã aɖo gbe ɖa na, amesiame le enɔƒe.
Maɖa nye yi mi Kusitɔwo hã!
Ado eƒe asi ɖa ɖe anyiehe ŋu, eye wòatsrɔ̃ Asur, ana Niniwe nazu gbegbe, eye wòaƒu kplakplakpla abe tagba ene.
Lãhawo kple gbemelã vovovowo atsyɔ akɔ ɖe eme, eye aluge kple hlɔmaɖe atsi woƒe sɔtiwo ƒe ko te aɖɔ. Ha anɔ ɖiɖim le fesre nu, eye anyiglãgo anɔ kpui nu, elabena seɖerʋuƒowo atsi go.

Ɖe ɖu, si nɔa aseye tsom, eye wòli bɔkɔɔ henɔa gbɔgblɔm le eƒe dzi me be: Míawoe nye gɔglɔ̃mitɔgɔ̃wo la, nye esia? Ke azɔ la ezu gbegbe kple gbemelãwo mlɔƒe, eye amesiame, si ato eŋu ayi la, ado tsiã, eye wòaʋuʋu asi.
Baba na ɖu sẽto, si ƒo ɖi, eye wòsẽa ŋuta!
Egbe toɖoɖo, eye mena wohe to nɛ o; meɖo dzi ɖe Yehowa ŋu o, eye mete ɖe eƒe Mawu ŋu o.
Eƒe amegawo le eme abe dzata ɖegbe ene, eye eƒe ʋɔnuɖrɔ̃lawo le abe amegãxi, siwo le zã me, eye womekpɔtɔa naneke ɖi na ŋdi o la ene.
Eƒe nyagblɔɖilawonye toflokowo kple alakpatɔwo; eƒe nunɔlawo ɖo gu nu kɔkɔe la, eye woto vo ɖe se la ŋu.
Yehowa enye dzɔdzɔetɔ le wo ɖome, eye mewɔa nu gbegblẽa ɖeke o; eɖea eƒe ʋɔnudɔdrɔ̃ doa goe ŋdi sia ŋɖl, eye medzudzɔnɛ o; ke ame vɔ̃ɖi menya nuka nye ŋukpe o.
Metsrɔ̃ ɖukɔwo, eye woƒe mɔ̃wo gbã; meɖo gbegbe woƒe ablɔwo, eye ame megatoa wo me yina, o; woƒe ɖuwo gbã zu aƒeɖo, eye ame vɔ le wo me.
Megblɔ be; Ne evɔ̃m, eye wòna wobe to nɛ la, ekema nyemagblẽ eƒe nɔƒe o, eye nusiwo katã meɖo ɖe eŋu la, mava edzi o; ke wole nu vɔ̃ɖi wɔwɔ dzi ɖaa atraɖi.

Eyata ale Yehowa gblɔ esi: Mikpɔ asinyenu, vaseɖe gbesigbe manye ɖasefo atso; elabena nye ɖoɖo wònye be, maƒo dukɔwo nu ƒu, eye mana fiaɖuƒewo nakpe ta, ne matrɔ nye dziku kple nye dɔmedzoe heliheli katã akɔ ɖe wo dzi. Elabena nye ŋuʋaʋã ƒe dzo afiã anyigba blibo la.
Emegbe makɔ nuyi ŋu na dukɔwo, ne wo katã nayɔ Yehowa ŋkɔ, eye woatsɔ nusɔsɔ asubɔe.
Nye ameka, siwo ka hlẽ, amesiwo ɖoa gbe ɖa nam la, atso tɔsisi la ƒe go keme le Kus, eye woahe vɔsanuwo vɛ nam.
Ɣemaɣi la ŋu magakpe wò le wò nuwɔna, siwo katã nètsɔ to vo ɖe ŋunye la ŋu o; elabena maɖe amesiwo nɔa aseye tsom nɔa ɖa-dam la ɖa le dowòme, eye màgado ɖokuiwò ɖe dzi le nye to kɔkɔe la dzi azɔ o.
Eye makpɔtɔ dukɔ ɖagbi, si bɔbɔ eɖoku ɖe anyi la, ɖe mewò, eye woaɣia wo ɖokul ɖe Yehowa ƒe ŋkɔ me.
Israel ƒe ame mamleawo mawɔ nu gbegblẽ o, womaka aʋatso o, eye alakpaɖe manɔ nu me na wo o; ke hoŋ woaɖu nu, eye woatsyɔ akɔ anyi ɖl, amea ɖeke maɖo voɖl na wo o.
Zion-nyɔnuvi, tso aseye, Israel, ɖo ɣli; Yerusalem-nyɔnuvi, kpɔ dzidzɔ, natso aseye tso dzi blibo me!
Yehowa ɖe wò ʋɔnudɔdrɔ̃ ɖa, eye wòkplɔ wò futɔ dzoe; Yehowa, Israel ƒe fia la, le dowòme, nu vɔ̃ɖia ɖeke madzi ŋɔ na wò azɔ o.
Ɣemaɣi la woagblɔ na Yerusalem be: Megavɔ̃ o; Zion, wò asi megaɖo agblɔ o!
Yehowa, wò Mawu la, le dowòme, kalẽtɔ, si ate ŋu axɔ na ame la wònye. Akpɔ dzidzɔ le ŋuwò vevie, azi ɖoɖoe le lɔlɔ̃ me, eye wòakpɔ dzldzɔ atso aseye ɖe ŋuwò!
Maƒo amesiwo le nu xam, eye wole adzɔge tso takpekpe gbɔ la nu ƒu; mia deviwo wonye, eye ŋukpe le wo dzi.

Kpɔ ɖa, mawɔ nu kple amesiwo katã te mi ɖe anyi la ɣemaɣi, makpe ɖe ata ŋeŋee tɔwo ŋu, maƒo: amesiwo kaka hlẽ la nu ƒu, eye matso wo awɔ kafukafu kple bubu le anyigba, siwo katã dzi wodo ŋukpe wo le la dzi.
Ma-kplɔ mi agbɔe ɣemaɣi, eye maƒo mia nu ƒu ɣemaɣi; elabena ne meɖo mi te miekpɔ kple ŋku la, matso mi awɔ bubu kple kafukafu le anyigba dzi ɖukɔwo katã ɖome; Yehowa ye gblɔe!
Le fia Dario ƒe ƒe evelia me? le dzinu adelia ƒe ŋkeke gbãtɔ dzi la Yehowa ƒe gbe va na Yuda ƒe anyigbanunɔla Zerubabel, Sealtiel vi, kple nunɔlagã Yosua, Yozadak vi, to nyagblɔɖila Xagai dzi bena:
Ale Yehowa Zebaot gblɔ esi: Amesiawo le gbɔgblɔm be: Azã meɖo edzi, be woatu Yehowa ƒe xɔ haɖe o.
Eye Yehowa ƒe gbe va to nyagblɔɖila Xagai dzi bena:
Azã de na miawo ya, be mianɔ xɔ, siwo me wofa ʋuƒo ɖo la me, eye xɔ sia ya nanye glikpo anɔ anyia?
Eyata ale. Yehowa Zebaot gblɔ esi: Milé ŋku ɖe miaƒe zɔzɔme ŋu:
Mieƒã nu taŋtaŋ, gake nu ʋeea ɖe ko mieŋe; miedu nu, meɖi ƒo na mi o; mieno nu, meɖi kɔ na mi o; mieta avɔ, mede dzo lã me na mi o; miewɔ dɔ xɔ fetu, eye mietsɔe de kotoku ŋɔŋɔ me.
Ale Yehowa Zebaot gblɔ esi: Milé ŋku ɖe mia ƒe zɔzɔme ŋu!
Miyi towo dzi miatsɔ atiwo vɛ, be miatu xɔ lae, ne wòadze ŋunye, eye bubu nanɔ ŋunye, Yehowa ye gblɔe.
Miele nu geɖe sinu kpɔm, gake mesɔ gbɔ o; miehe nu va aƒee, ke meɖo ƒuƒu ɖee. Yehowa be: Nuka tae ma? Le esi nye xɔ nye glikpo li, ke miawo mia dome amesiame le duɖime kem le eƒe xɔtutu me la tae!
Eyata ɖziƒo te zãmu mi, eye anyigba, te agblemenu mi ɖo;
eyata meyɔ kuɖiɖi ɖe anyigba kple towo ŋu, ɖe bli, aha yeye kple ami ŋu, ɖe nusiwo miena tsoa anyigba me la ŋu, ɖe amegbetɔwo kple lãwo kpakple dɔ, siwo katã wotsɔa asi wɔne la ŋu.

Tete Zerubabel, Sealtiel vi, kple nunɔlagã Yosua, Yozadak vi, kpakple dukɔ la ƒe susɔeawo katã wose Yehowa, woƒe Mawu ƒe gbe kple nyagblɔɖila Xagai ƒe nya, siwo Yehowa, woƒe Mawu la, de asi nɛ ɖo ɖe wo; eye dukɔ la vɔ̃ Yehowa.
Eye Xagai, Yehowa ƒe ame dɔdɔ la, to Yehowa ƒe gbe na dukɔ la bena: Ale Yehowa gblɔ esi: Meli kpli mi.
Tete Yehowa de dzo lã me na Yuda ƒe anyigbanunɔla Zerubabel, Sealtiel vi, kple nunɔlagã Yosua, Yozadak vi, kpakple dukɔ ƒe susɔeawo katã, be wova hewɔ dɔ le Yehowa Zebaot, woƒe Mawu la ƒe xɔ la ŋu,
le fia Dario ƒe ƒe evelia me le dzinu adelia ƒe ŋkeke blave vɔ enelia dzi.
Le dzinu adrelia ƒe ŋkeke blave vɔ ɖekɛlia dzi la Yehowa ƒe gbe va to nyagblɔɖila Xagai dzi bena:
Gblɔ na Yuda ƒe anyigbanunɔla Zerubabel, Sealtiel vi, kple nunɔlagã Yosua, Yozadak vi, kpakple dukɔ la ƒe susɔea bena:
Mia dometɔ susɔea, siwo kpɔ xɔ tsãtɔ ƒe atsyɔ̃ la, aleke miele esia kpɔmi? Esia meɖi naneke le mia ŋku me o ɖe!

Eyata Zerubabel, lé dzi ɖe ƒo, Yehowa ye gblɔe! Nunɔlagã Yosua, Yozadak vi, lé dzi ɖe ƒo! Mi dukɔ hahoo la katã, milé dzi ɖe ƒo, eye miwɔ dɔ, Yehowa ye gblɔe! Elabena meli kpli mi, Yehowa Zebaot ye gblɔe,
abe alesi meɖo gbe ɖi kpli mi, esime mieʋu tso Egipte la ene; eye nye gbɔgbɔ anɔ mia dome. Migavɔ̃ o!
Elabena ale Yehowa Zebaot gblɔ esi: Esusɔ vie ko maʋuʋu dziƒo kple anyigba, atsiaƒu kple ƒuƒuiƒe;
maʋuʋu dukɔwo katã, eye woahe dukɔwo katã ƒe nu vevitɔ vɛ, eye matso ŋutikɔkɔe ayɔ xɔ sia taŋ, Yehowa Zebaot ye gblɔe.
Tɔnyee nye klosalo, eye tɔnyee nye sika, Yehowa Zebaot ye gblɔe!
Xɔ megbetɔ ƒe atsyɔ asu gbɔ wu gbãtɔ tɔ, Yehowa Zebaot ye gblɔe! Eye made ŋutifafa teƒe sia, Yehowa Zebaot ye gblɔe!
Le Dario ƒe ƒe evelia me, le dzinu asiekelia ƒe ŋkeke blave vɔ enelia dzi la Yehowa ƒe gbe va to nyagblɔɖila Xagai dzi bena:
Ale Yehowa Zebaot gblɔ esi: Mibia nunɔlawo, ne woafia nu mi be:
Ne ŋutsua ɖe lɔ lã kɔkɔe ɖe avɔ nu; eye avɔ la toga ka abolo alo nuɖaɖa, wein, ami alo nuɖuɖua ɖe ŋu la, ɖe nusiawo ŋu akɔa? Nunɔlawo ɖo ŋu gblɔ bena: Kpao.
Eye Xagai gblɔ bena: Ne amea ɖe gblẽ kɔ ɖo na eɖokui ɖe ame kuku ŋu, eye wòka, asi nusiawo katã ŋu la, ɖe woawo hã azu nu makɔmakɔa? Nunɔlawo ɖo ŋu gblɔ bena: Woazu nu makɔmakɔ.
Tete Xagai ɖo ŋu gblɔ bena: Yehowa be: Alea dukɔ sia kple anyigba dzi dukɔ sia le; alea woƒe asinudɔwɔwɔwo katã kple vɔ, siwo wosana la le; wo ŋu mekɔ o.
Azɔ minyẽ kɔ kpɔ megbe tso egbe dzi, esi womekpɔ tsɔ kpe ɖo kpe dzi le Yehowa ƒe gbedoxɔ la tutu me haɖe o:
Ɣemaɣi la wova lu bablakɔa ɖe, si anye nudotree blave la gbɔ, ke wo ame ewo ko wònɔ; wova weinfiãƒe, be woaku goe blaatɔ̃, gake wo ame blave ko wònɔ.
Mehe to na mi ɖe miaƒe asinudɔwɔwɔwo katã ŋu, ale be miaƒe bliwo hlɔ̃, eye wodze heteku, eye dzikpewo dza; gake miegbe tɔtrɔ ɖe ŋunye, Yehowa ye gblɔe!
Minyẽ kɔ kpɔ megbe tso egbe, dzinu asiekelia ƒe ŋkeke blave vɔ enelia dzi vaseɖe gbesigbe woɖo Yehowa ƒe gbedoxɔ gɔme anyi la dzi; milé ŋku ɖe eŋu:
De nukuwo tsi ava mea, eye ɖe wein kple gboti, yevuboɖati kple amiti wogbe tsetsea? Made yayra aƒe tso ŋkeke ma dzi.
Eye Yehowa ƒe gbe va na Xagai zi evelia, le dzinu la ƒe ŋkeke blave vɔ enelia dzi bena:
Gblɔ na Yuda ƒe anyigbanunɔla Zerubabel bena: Mele dziƒo kple anyigba ʋuʋu ge,
mamũ fiaɖuƒewo ƒe fiazikpuiwo aƒu anyi, eye miatsrɔ̃ dukɔwo ƒe fiaɖuƒe sesẽwo, mamũ tasiaɖamwo kple wo me nɔlawo aƒu anyi, sɔwo kple wo dolawo adze anyi, eye amesiame atsi ehavi ƒe yi nu.
Ale Yehowa Zebaot gblɔ esi: Ɣemaɣi la matsɔ wò, nye ɖɔla Zerubabel, Sealtiel vi, awɔ ŋkɔsigee; elabena wòe metia, Yehowa Zebaot ye gblɔe!
Le Dario ƒe ƒe evelia me, le dzinu enyilia dzi la Yehowa ƒe gbe va na nyagblɔɖila Zaxarya, Iɖo vi Berexya ƒe vi, bena:
Yehowa ɖo ɖɔmedzoe ɖe mia fofowo ŋu vevie.
Eyata ale nagblɔ na wo enye si: Yehowa Zebaot be: Mitrɔ ɖe ŋunye, Yehowa Zebaot ye gblɔe, ekema nye ha matrɔ ɖe mia ŋu, Yehowa Zebaot ye gblɔe!

Miganɔ abe mia fofowo ene o; wo amesiwo nyagblɔɖila tsãtɔwo gblɔ na bena: Yehowa Zebaot be: Miɖe asi le miaƒe zɔzɔme vɔ̃ɖiwo kple nuwɔna vɔ̃ɖiwo ŋu! Ke wogbe toɖoɖo, eye womelé ŋku ɖe ŋunye o, Yehowa ye gblɔe!
Afika mia fofowo le azɔ, eye ɖe nyagblɔɖila-wo ami agbe tegbetegbea?

Ke nye gbe kple nye fameɖoɖo, siwo meɖe asi na nye dɔla nyagblɔɖilawo la, ɖe womeva mia fofowo dzi, ale be woyi ta me hegblɔ bena: Alesi Yehowa Zebaot ɖo be, yeawɔ mi ɖe miaƒe zɔzɔme kple míaƒe nuwɔnawo nu la, nenema wòwɔ mi oa?
Le Dario ƒe ƒe evelia me, le dzinu wulɖekɛlia Sebat ƒe ŋkeke blave vɔ enelia dzi la Yehowa ƒe gbe va na Zaxarya, Iɖo vi Berexya ƒe vi, bena:
Le za me la mekpɔ ŋutega, eye kpɔ ɖa, ŋu-tsua ɖe do sɔ dzĩa ɖe, eye wòtɔ ɖe gbemiti, siwo le bali me la domee, eye sɔ, siwo le dzie, hẽ kple ɣle la, le emegbe.
Tete me-gblɔ bena; Nye aƒetɔ, amekawoe nye esiawo? Eye mawudɔla, si ƒo nu kplim la, gblɔ nam bena: Magblɔ amesiwo wonye la, afia wo.
Tete ŋutsu, si tɔ ɖe gbemitiawo domee la, xɔ edzi gblɔ bena: Woawo nye amesiwo Yehowa ɖɔ, be woaɖatsa le anyigba dzi.
Eye woɖo ŋu na Yehowa ƒe dɔla, si tɔ ɖe gbemitiawo domee la, gblɔ bena: Míeyi ɖatsa le anyigba dzi, eye kpɔ ɖa, ɖo-ɖoe zi le anyigba blibo la ŋu klenee.
Tete Yehowa ƒe dɔla la xɔ edzi gblɔ bena: Yehowa Zebaot, ɣekaɣi nagbe nublanuikpɔkpɔ na Yerusalem kple Yuda-du, siwo ŋu nẽdo dziku ɖo ƒe blaadre sɔŋ enye si la, ase ɖo?
Tete Yehowa gblɔ nya nyui kple akɔfanyawo na mawudɔla, si ƒo nu kplim, la,
Eye mawudɔla, si ƒo nu kplim le gblɔ nam bena: Ɖe gbe ƒã be: Ale Yehowa Zebaot gblɔ esi: Maʋã ŋu ɖe Yerusalem kple Zion nu vevie,
eye dzi akum vevie ɖe dukɔ dadalawo ŋu; elabena esi dɔ me nya vem vie ko la, woawo kpe asi ɖe eŋu hetrɔ gbegblẽ la ɖo.
Eyata ale Yehowa gblɔ esi. Makpɔ nublanui na Yerusalem agatrɔ ɖe eŋu, woatu nye xɔ ɖe eme, eye woada dzidzeka ɖe Yerusalem ŋu, Yehowa Zebaot ye gblɔe!
Gaɖe gbe ƒã bena: Ale Yehowa Zebaot gblɔ esi; Nu nyui agagbagba ɖe nye ɖuwo me, Yehowa agave Zion nu, eye wòagatia Yerusalem.
Tete mefɔ ko dzi heɖo ŋku anyi, eye mekpɔ lãdzo ene,
Eye megblɔ na mawudɔla, si ƒo nu kplim bena; Nusiawo gɔme ɖe?. Eɖo ŋu nam bena; Woawoe nye lãdzo, siwo kaka Yuda, Israel kple Yerusalem hlẽ la.
Eye Yehowa na mekpɔ gbeɖe ene.

Tete megblɔ be; Nuka wɔ ge amesiawo va? Eɖo ŋu bena; Esiawo nye lãdzo, siwo kaka Yuda hlẽ, ale be amea ɖeke megafɔ ta dzi o la; eyata wova, be yewoaɖo ŋɔdzi na wo, eye yewoatutu dukɔ, siwo kɔ dzo dzi ɖe Yuda-nyigba ŋu, be woakakae ahlẽ la ƒe dzowo aƒu anyi.
Tete mefɔ kɔ dzi heɖo ŋku anyi, eye mekpɔ ŋutsua ɖe le dzidzeka ɖe asi.
Eye megblɔ bena: Afika nèyina? Eɖo ŋu nam bena; Yerusalem dzidze ge meyina, ne niakpɔ alesi wòkeke kple alesi wòdidii.
Eye mawudɔla, si ƒo nu kplim la ɖo, eye mawu-dɔla bubu do va kpee.
Tete wògblɔ nɛ bena: Ɖe abla naɖagblɔ na ɖekakpuivi ma bena: Yerusalem anɔ nuvo le ame kple lã geɖe, siwo anɔ eme la ta.
Nye ŋutɔ manye dzogli anɔ eŋu godoo, eye manye atsyɔ̃ ana eme; Yehowa ye gblɔe.
Hee! hee! Misi tso anyiehenyigba dzi, Yehowa ye gblɔe; elabena mekaka mi hlẽ ɖe dziƒo ƒe ya eneawo dzi, Yehowa ye gblɔe!
Hee! Mi amesiwo le Babel-nyɔnuvi gbɔ, misi yi Zion!
Elabena ale Yehowa Zebaot gblɔ esi. Bubu ta wòdɔm ɖe dukɔ; siwo ha mi la gbɔ ɖo; elabena amesi ka asi mia ŋu la, eka asi eƒe ŋkuvi ŋu.
Kpɔ ɖa, manyẽ nya asi ɖe wo ŋu, ne woazu aboyonu na woƒe kluviwo, eye miadze sii be, Yehowa Zebaot ye ɖɔm ɖa.
Zion-nyɔnuvi, tso aseye nakpɔ dzidzɔ; elabena megbɔna, be manɔ dowòme, Yehowa ye gblɔe!
Ɣemaɣi la dukɔ geɖewo aku ɖe Yehowa ŋu ahazu nye dukɔ, eye manɔ dowòme, ne nadze sii be, Yehowa Zebaot ye dɔm ɖe gbɔwò.
Yehowa axɔ Yuda awɔ eya ŋulɔ tɔe le anyigba kɔkɔe la dzi, eye wòagatia Yerusalem.
Ŋutilãwo katã nezi ɖoɖoe le Yehowa ŋku me! Elabena efɔ tso eƒe nɔƒe kɔkɔe la.
Eye wòna mekpɔ nunɔlagã Yosua tsi tre ɖe Yehowa ƒe dɔla ŋku me, eye Satana tsi tre ɖe eƒe ɖusi me, be wòatso enu.
Tete Yehowa gblɔ nu Satana bena: Yehowa blu ɖe tawò, Satana, Yehowa, amesi fia Yerusalem la, blu ɖe tawò! Ɖe menye eyae nye ati takpoe woɖe tso dzo me oa?
Ke Yosua le awu ƒoɖiwo me hetsi tre ɖe mawudɔla la ŋku me.
Tete wòxɔ edzi gblɔ na amesiwo tsi tre ɖe eŋku me la bena; Miɖe awu ƒoɖlawo le eŋu! Eye wògblɔ nɛ bena: Kpɔ ɖa, meɖe wò voɖaɖawo ɖa le ŋuwò, eye maɖo atsyɔ̃wuwo na wò.
Eye megblɔ bena: Woatsɔ tablanu dzadzɛ abla ta nɛ! Tete wotsɔ tablanu dzadzɛ bla ta nɛ, eye wodo awuwo nɛ, esime Yehowa ƒe dɔla gali ko.
Tete Yehowa ƒe dɔla xlɔ̃ nu Yosua gblɔ bena:
Ale Yehowa Zebaot gblɔ esi: Ne ézɔ nye mɔwo dzi, eye nèlé ŋku ɖe nye ɖoɖowo ŋu, énɔ nye aƒe nu, eye nèlé ŋku ɖe nye xɔxɔnuwo ŋu la, ekema maɖe mɔ na wò nazɔ amesiwo tsi tre ɖi la dome.
Wò nunɔlagã Yosua kple xɔ̃wò, siwo bɔbɔ nɔ gbɔwò la, misee; elabena ŋutsu, slwò nye kpɔdzidze la wonye. Elabena mele nana ge nye dɔla Zemax nava.
Elabena woafɔ ŋku adre ɖe kpe, si metsɔ ɖo Yosua ŋku me la dzi; kpɔ ɖa, ma-ŋlɔ nu ɖe edzi, eye maɖe anyigba sia ƒe voɖaɖa ɖa le ŋkeke ɖeka dzi, Yehowa Zebaot ye gblɔe.
Ɣemaɣl la mia ɖome amesiame akpe nɔvla ayi weinka kple gbotiwo te, Yehowa Zebaot ye gblɔe.
Tete mawudɔla, si ƒo nu kplim la, trɔ gbɔ va nyɔm, abe alesi wonyɔa ame tsoa alɔ̃ me ene.
Eye wògblɔ nam bena: Nuka kpɔm nèlé? Meɖo ŋu bena: Mele akaɖitia ɖe, si wolsɔ sika ɖeɖe wɔe la kpɔm; aminu le eta me, eye akaɖlgbɛ adre le eŋu, eye alɔ adre, siwo me to le la, le aka-ɖlgbɛawo ŋu.
Amiti eve le exa, ɖeka le aminu la ƒe ɖusi me, eye evelia le eƒe mia me.
Eye me-xɔ edzi gblɔ na mawudɔla, si ƒo nu kplim la bena: Nye aƒetɔ, nusiawo gɔme ɖe?
Tete mawu-dɔla, si ƒo nu kplim la, xɔ edzi gblɔ nam bena: Mènya nusiawo gɔme oa? Meɖo ŋu bena: O, nye aƒetɔ!
Tete wòɖo ŋu gblɔ nam bena: Yehowa ƒe gbe na Zerubabel enye si: Mava me to aʋa-kɔ alo ŋusẽ me o, ke hoŋ to nye gbɔgbɔ dzi, Yehowa Zebaot ye gblɔe!
Wò to gã, nenye nuka ke nènye hã, azu gbadzaƒe le Zerubabel ŋku me. Eyama aɖe etamakpe adoe, eye woanɔ ɣli dom be: Eme nenye, eme nenye nɛ!
Eye Yehowa ƒe gbe va nam bena:
Zerubabel ƒe asie ɖo xɔ sia gɔme anyi, eye eƒe asi kee awu enu, ne nadze sii be, Yehowa Zebaot ye ɖom ɖe mia gbɔ.
Elabena amekae ado vlo gɔmedzedze nyaŋui? Weakpɔ tsumikpe, si le Zerubabel si la, kple dzidzɔ, wo ame aɖre siawo nye Yehowa ƒe ŋku, siwo le tsatsam le anyigba blibo la dzi.
Tete meɖo ŋu gblɔ nɛ hena: Amiti eve, siwo le akaɖiti la ƒe ɖusi me kple mia me la gɔme ɖe?
Eye megaxɔ edzi gblɔ nɛ bena: Amitiɖɔmee eve, siwo Ie si-kalɔ, siwo me to le, eye sikami sina tea wo me la xa la gɔme ɖe?
Tete wògblɔ nam bena: Mènya nusiawo gɔme oa? Meɖo ŋu bena: O, nye aƒetɔ!
Eye wògblɔ bena: Woawo nye amivi eveawo, siwo tsi tre ɖe anyigba blibo la ƒe Aƒetɔ ŋku me.
Eye megafɔ kɔ dzi heɖo ŋku anyi, eye mekpɔ agbalẽ toaʋa-laa ɖe.
Tete wògblɔ nam bena: Nuka kpɔm nèle? Meɖo ŋu bena: Mele agbalẽ toaʋalaa ɖe kpɔm wòdidi abɔklugui blave, eye wòkeke ahɔklugul ewo.
Eye wògblɔ nam hena: Esia nye fiƒode, si le anyigba blibo la dzi yim; elabena fiafitɔwo katã tsi tomahemahe, eye atam dzodzro kalawo katã tsi tomahemahe.
Ale Yehowa Zebaot gblɔ esi: Nyee ɖoe ɖa, be wòayi fiafitɔ kple atam dzodzro kala ƒe me le nye ŋkɔ me, eye wòatsi eƒe xɔ me afiã eƒe xɔtlwo kple kpewo.
Eye mawuɖɔla, si ƒo nu kplim la, ɖo va gblɔ nam bena: Fɔ kɔ dzi nakpɔ nusi do gbɔna la ɖa!
Tete megblɔ be: Nuka enye esia? Eɖo ŋu hena: Esia enye nudotree, si ɖo gbɔna. Eye wògblɔ bena: Eyae nye woƒe vodada le anyigba blibo la dzi.
Eye kpɔ ɖa, tsumigbaa ɖe kɔ eɖokui dzi eye nyɔnua ɖe bɔbɔ nɔ nudotree la me.
Eye wògblɔ bena: Esia enye nu vɔ̃ɖi wɔwɔ. Tete wòtigii ɖe nudotree la me, eye wòtsɔ tsumigba tu enu.
Eye esi mefɔ kɔ dzi la, mekpɔ nyɔnu eve wodo va, eye ya ɖo aʋala me na wo, woto aʋala abe ɖamixe ƒe aʋala ene, eye woka nuɖotree la ɖe dziƒo kple anyigba domee.
Eye mebla mawudɔla, si ƒo nu kplim la bena: Afika wokɔ nuɖotree la yinae?
Eɖo ŋu nam bena: Ɖe wobe, yewoatu xɔ nɛ ɖe Sinear-nyigba dzi, eye ne wotui vɔ la, woatsɔe adre ɖe enɔƒe le afima.
Eye megafɔ ke dzi heɖo ŋku anyi, eye mekpɔ taslaɖam ene woto to eve domee; toawo nye akɔbli towo.
Sɔ dzĩwo le tasiaɖam gbãtɔ ŋu, eye sɔ ylhɔwo le tasiaɖam evelia ŋu,
sɔ ɣiwo le tasiaɖam etɔ̃lia ŋu, eye sɔ ŋɔŋɔe hẽwo le taslaɖam enelia ŋu.
Tete mexɔ edzi gblɔ na mawu-dɔla, si ƒo nu kplim la bena: Nye aƒetɔ, nusiawo gɔme ɖe?
Mawudɔla la ɖo ŋu gblɔ nam bena: Woawoe nye dziƒo ƒe ya eneawo, siwo tso, esime wotsi tre ɖe anyigba blibo la ƒe Aƒetɔ ŋku me megbe.
Tasiaɖam, siwo ŋu sɔ yibɔwo le la, ho ɖo ta anyiehe, eye ɣiawo kplɔ wo ɖo; ke ŋɔŋɔeawo ho ɖo ta dziehe.
Eye dzĩawo ho, be yewoayi aɖatsa le anyigba dzi. Eye wògblɔ bena; Miyi miaɖatsa le anyigba la dzi! Tete woɖatsa le anyigba la dzi.
Eye wòyɔm gblɔ nam bena: Kpɔ ɖa, esiwo ho ɖo ta anyiehe-nyigba dzi la, woawoe le nye dɔmedzoe nu fa ge le anyiehe-nyigba dzi.
Tete Yehowa ƒe gbe va nam bena:
Xɔ nunanawo le Xeldai, Tobiya kple Yedaya si, eye nayi Yosiya, Zefanya vi la ƒe me gbemagbe, afisi wotso Babel va dze;
eye natsɔ klosalo kple sika awɔ fiakuku aɖɔ ɖe ta na nunɔlaga Yosua, Yozadak vi;
eye nagblɔ na bena: Ale Yehowa Zebaot gblɔ esi: Ŋutsua ɖe, si ŋkɔ nye Zemax la, amie tso to me, eye wòatu Yehowa ƒe gbeɖoxɔ la.
Eyama atu Yehowa ƒe gbeɖoxɔ la, eye atsyɔ̃ anɔ eŋu, abɔbɔ nɔ eƒe fiazikpui dzi aɖu fia, anye nunɔla anɔ eƒe fiazikpui dzi, eye ŋutlfafa anɔ woa kple eve la dome.
Ke fiakuku la nenɔ Yehowa ƒe gbedoxɔ me, ne woafsɔ aɖo ŋku Xeldai, Tobiya kple Yedaya kpakple Zefanya vi la ƒe dɔmenyowɔwɔ dzi
Amewo atso dldiƒe ava tu Yehowa ƒe gbedoxɔ, eye miadze sii be, Yehowa Zebaot ye dɔm ɖe mi. Esia ava me, nenye be, miese Yehowa, mia Mawu la ƒe gbe.
Le fia Dario ƒe ƒe enelia me la Yehowa ƒe gbe va na Zaxarya, le dzinu asiekelia Kislew ƒe ŋkeke enelia dzi.
Eye Beteltɔ, siwo nye Sarezer kple Regem-Melex kpakple woƒe ƒometɔwɔ ɖo ame ɖa, be woaɖaƒo koko le Yehowa ŋku me,
eye woabia nunɔlawo kple nyagblɔɖilawo, siwo le Yehowa Zebaot ƒe me la, agblɔ bena: Ɖe mafa avi atsi nu aɖɔ le dzinu atɔ̃lia me, abe alesi mewɔ ƒe geɖe xoxo enea?
Eye Yehowa Zebaot ƒe gbe va nam bena:
Gblɔ na dukɔ hahoo la katã kple nunɔlawo bena: Esi mietsi nu ɖɔ, eye miexa nu le dzinu atɔ̃lia kple adrelia me ƒe blaadre sɔŋ nye esi la, nyee mietsi nu dɔ na loo?
Eye ne mieɖu nu no nu la, ɖe menye mia ŋutɔwoe nye nuaɖulawo kple nuanolawo oa?
Ɖe menye esia nye nya, si Yehowa tsɔ ɖe gbe ƒãe to nyagblɔɖila tsãtɔwo dzi, esime Yerusalem kple eƒe ɖu, siwo ƒo xlãe goɖoo la, li bɔkɔɔ, eye ame le wo me, eye ame le dziehe kple gbadzaƒe la oa?
Eye Yehowa ƒe gbe va na Zaxarya bena:
Ale Yehowa Zebaot gblɔ esi: Miɖrɔ̃ ʋɔnu ɖe eteƒe, eye mia dome amesiame nelɔ̃ ehavi, eye wòakpɔ nublanui nɛ!
Migate ahosiwo kple tsyɔ̃eviwo, amedzrowo kple ame dahewo ɖe anyi o, eye migaɖo nu vɔ̃ɖi wɔwɔ ɖe ta me ɖe mia nɔewo ŋu o!
Ke wogbe toɖoɖo, wolia ʋume kpakoo, eye wote nu ɖe to me, be yewomagase nu o.
Wotsɔ woƒe dzi wɔ lotamekpee, be yewomagase se la kple Yehowa Zebaot ƒe nya, siwo wòɖo ɖa to eƒe gbɔgbɔ kple nyagblɔɖlla lsã tɔwo dzi la o; eyata dɔmedzoe ga tso Yehowa Zebaot gbɔ va ɖo.
Eyata alesi meyɔ wo wogbe esese la, nenema woayɔm, ke nyemasee o, Yehowa Zebaot ye gblɔe.
Makaka wo ahlẽ ɖe dukɔ, siwo katã womenya o la ɖome, eye anyigba la atsi anyi aƒeɖoe le wo megbe, ale be amea ɖeke magato edzi ayi o; eye ale woatsɔ anyigba vevi la awɔ gbegbee.
Eye Yehowa Zebaot ƒe gbe va bena:
Ale Yehowa Zebaot gblɔ esi: Meʋã ŋu ɖe Zion nu vevie, eye meɖo dziku vevie be ʋã ŋu ɖe enu.
Ale Yehowa gblɔ esi: Magatrɔ ɖe Zion ŋu, eye manɔ Yerusalem. Woayɔ Yerusalem be, „nyateƒeɖu“, eye Yehowa Zebaot ƒe to la be „to kɔkɔe“.
Ale Yehowa Zebaot gblɔ esi: Amegã ɖeɖiwo kple nyagãwo agabɔbɔ nɔ Yerusalem ƒe ahlɔwo me, eye wo ɖometɔ ɖesiaɖe alé atlzɔtl ɖe asi le ƒe geɖe xɔxɔ la.
Ŋutsuvlwo kple nyɔnuvlwo ayɔ ɖua ƒe ahlɔwo me laŋ, eye woanɔ fefem le eƒe ahlɔwo me.
Ale Yehowa Zebaot gblɔesl: Ne enye nukunu na dukɔ sia ƒe susɔea le ɣemaɣi la, ɖe wòanye nukunu na nye ha loo? Yehowa Zebaot ye gblɔe
Ale Yehowa Zebaot gblɔ esi: Kpɔ ɖa, maɖe nye dukɔ tso ɣedzeƒe-nyigba kple ɣeloɖoƒe-nyigba dzi,
eye makplɔ wo vɛ, ne woanɔ Yerusalem, woanye nye dukɔ, eye manye Mawu na wo le nyateƒe kple dzɔdzɔenyenye me.

Ale Yehowa Zebaot gblɔ esi. Agbe neɖo miaƒe asiwo me mi amesiwo se nya siawo tso nyagblɔɖilawo nu le ŋkeke siawo me, nya, siwo wogblɔ na mi le gbe sigbe woɖo Yehowa Zebaot ƒe xɔ la gɔme anyi, be woagatu gbeɖoxɔ la.
Hafi ŋkeke siawo naɖo la, fetu menɔ anyi na amegbetɔwo kple lãwo o; amesi do alo va eme la ŋu mefa o, le futɔ ta, eye meɖe adã ta me na amegbetɔwo katã ɖe wo nɔewo ŋu.
Ke azɔ la nyemele na dukɔ sia ƒe susɔea abe tsã ene o, Yehowa Zebaot ye gblɔe;
ke boŋ nuku ŋu afa, eye weinka atse, anyigba aʋã nu, eye dziƒo adza zãmu, eye mana nusiawo katã nazu dukɔ sia ƒe susɔea tɔ.
Yuda ƒe aƒe kple Israel ƒe aƒe, alesi mienye fiƒoɖe le dukɔwo ɖomee la, nenema maxɔ na mi, be miazu yayra; migavɔ̃ o, agbe neɖo miaƒe asiwo me!
Ale Yehowa Zebaot gblɔ esi: Alesi meɖo ta me be, mawɔ vɔ̃ mi, eye mevem o, le esi mia fofowo ɖo dziku nam ta la, Yehowa ye gblɔe,
nenemae me-gaɖo ta me le ŋkeke siawo me be, mawɔ nyuie na Yerusalem kple Yuda ƒe aƒe la; migavɔ̃ o!
Nusiwo miawɔ la, wonye esi: Amesiame neto nyateƒe na ehavi, midrɔ̃ ʋɔnu ɖe eleƒe le ŋutifafa me le miaƒe ablɔwo me!
Migaɖo vɔ̃ ɖe dzi me ɖe mia nɔewo ŋu o, eye alakpatamkaka megavivi mia nu o, elabena melé fu nusiawo kafã, Yehowa ye gblɔe.
Eya Yehowa Zebaot ƒe gbe va nam bena:

Ale Yehowa Zebaot gblɔ asi: Nutsitsidɔ le dzinu enelia kple etɔ̃lia dzi, le dzinu adrelia kple ewolia dzi azu dzidzɔkpɔkpɔ kple aseyatsotso kpakple ŋkekenyuie na Yuda ƒe ale la; ke milɔ̃ nyateƒe kple ŋutifafa!
Ale Yehowa Zebaot gblɔ esi: Dukɔwo kple ɖu geɖewo me nɔlawo agava.
Eye du si me nɔlawo atso aɖagblɔ na ekeme me nɔlawo bena: Mitso, ne míayi aɖaƒo koko le Yehowa ŋku me, eye miaɖl Yehowa Zebaot. Nye hã mayi!
Eye dukɔ geɖewo kple anyigba dzi dukɔ gawo ava ɖl Yehowa Zebaot la Yerusalem, eye woaƒo koko le Yehowa ŋku me.
Ale Yehowa Zebaot gblɔ esi: Ɣemaɣi la ŋutsu awu atso dukɔwo ƒe gbegbɔgblɔwo kalã me alé Yuda-ŋutsu ɖeka ƒe awu toga agblɔ bena: Miayi kpli mi, elabena míese be, Mawu li kpli mi.
Esia nye Yehowa ƒe nya, si wògblɔ ɖe Xadrax-nyigba ŋu, kple eƒe nya, si va nɔ Damasko — elabena Yehowa ƒe ŋku le amegbetɔwo kple Israel ƒe toawo katã ŋu —
hekpe ɖe Xamat, si ɖo liƒo nɛ, kple Tiro kpakple Zidon ŋuti, le, esi nunya le wo si ŋutɔ ta.
Tiro tu mɔ̃ sesẽ na eɖokui, eli kɔ klosalo gleglegle abe ke ene kple sika abe gbeɖuɖɔ le kpɔdomee ene.
Kpɔ ɖa, Aƒetɔ la ana woaxɔe, eye atsiaƒu agble eƒe ŋusẽ dome, ke dzo afiã eya ŋutɔ.
Askalon akpɔe, eye vɔvɔ̃ aɖoe; dzidzi aƒo Gaza akpe ɖe Ekron ŋu, elabena eƒe sitsoƒe azu ŋukpe. Fia atsrɔ̃ ɖa le Gaza, eye Askalon azu aƒeɖo.
Ame tsakatsakawo anɔ Asdod, eye matsi Filistitɔwo ƒe ɖaɖa nu.
Maɖe ʋu ɖa le eƒe nu me kple ŋunyɔnu ɖa le eƒe aɖuwo dzi, eya ha asusɔ na mia Mawu, eye wòanɔ abe Yuda ƒe amegãwo ene, eye Ekron anɔ abe Yebusitɔwo ene
Manye dzɔla aƒu asaɖa anyi ɖe nye aƒeŋu le amesiwo vana gadzonu la ta, eye ŋutasẽla magaƒo ɖe wo dzi azɔ o, elabena nye ŋutɔ mekpɔe kple nye ŋkuwo.
Zion-nyɔnuvi, kpɔ dzidzɔ vevie; Yerusalem-nyɔnuvi, tso aseye! Kpo ɖa, wo fia gbɔna gbɔwò; dzɔdzɔetɔ kple xónametɔ wonye, eye wodo tedzi kple tedzivi, si nye tedzinɔ ƒe vi.

Matsrɔ̃ tasiaɖam ɖa le Efrayim kple sɔwo ɖa le Yerusalem, aʋadatiwo atsrɔ̃, eye wòaɖe gbe ƒã ŋutifafa le dukɔwo dome; eƒe fiaɖuƒe atso atsiaƒu nu ayi atsiaƒu nu, eye tso tɔsisi la nu vaseɖe anyigba ƒe mlɔenuwo ke.
Maɖe esi le wo gatɔwo bã ŋu tso ɖo ƒuƒiu la me, le nu, si metsɔ bla nu kpli wo la ta.
Mi gatɔ siwo le mɔ kpɔm, mitrɔ gbɔ va mɔ̃ sesẽ la me! Mele gbe ƒã ɖem egbea be: Maɖo eteƒe na wò zi gbɔ zi eve.
Elabena mehe Yuda me abe ɖatl ene, eye metsɔ Efrayim wɔ aŋutrɔe heɖo edzi: Zion, maɖe aɖã ta me na viwòwo ɖe Helaviwo ŋu, eye matsɔ wo awɔ kalẽtɔ ƒe yii.
Yehowa ado ɖe wo ta me, eye ele aŋutrɔ alũ ʋɔ abe dzikedzo ene. Aƒetɔ Yehowa aku kpẽ, eye wòanɔ dziehe ƒe ahom me ave yi.
Yehowa Zehaot akpa wo ta, be woaɖu wo, eye woanyã avuzi le akafokpewo dzi, woano nu anɔ ɣli dom abe weinmulawo ene, eye woayɔ banaa abe vɔsalre kple vɔsamiekpul ƒe dzogoewo ene.
Yehowa, woƒe Mawu, axɔ na eƒe dukɔ ɣemaɣi abe lãha ene; elabena woanɔ dzo sim le eƒe anyigba dzi abe kpe xɔasi le fiakuku ŋu ene.
Elabena aleke wòhenyo, eye wòdze ani ale? Bli nana ɖekakpuiwo tsina, eye aha yeye nana ɖetugbiwo tsina.
Mibia tsidzadza Yehowa; Yehowa ye nana tsi dzana ɖe edza ɣi le kele me, enana dzi ɖona, eye tsi dzana na gbe me numiemiewo kalã
